Indulge in stylish urban living with this exceptional 2-bed condo offering stunning downtown skyline views! With full height windows, chic furnishings, and a fully stocked kitchen, you're not going to want to leave! Marvel at Rocky Mountain sunsets from your living room!

Walk to Calgary's best restaurants, nightlife, and events. Close to Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, 17th Ave SW, Calgary Saddledome & Stampede Grounds! Don't miss this chance to experience Calgary's finest!

The space
- FREE parking for one vehicle in the heated underground parkade!
- Modern condo with stunning views!
- Breathtaking downtown view!
- Floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light!
- Air conditioning for optimal comfort!
- Granite countertops and polished concrete floors!
- Tastefully furnished bedrooms!
- Plush mattresses and pillows!
- Ample closet space!
- Dedicated work area!
- In-suite laundry!
- Fully equipped kitchen!
- Comfortable living room!
- Shower essentials provided!
- Dedicated workspace!
- Located in the prestigious Colours building!
- Developed by award-winning Batistella Developers!

We look forward to hosting you! Feel free to reach out and inquire if you have any additional questions about the unit :)

Guest access
- Secure smart lock!
- Elevator to your floor!

Other things to note
- Missing keys incur a $250 replacement fee.
- Respect condo bylaws, especially quiet hours after 10pm.
- We use a noise monitoring device; It does NOT record actual sounds or conversations, it simply monitors the noise level (measured in decibels). Minut is 100% privacy compliant and is required on this property.

If you have any questions, please ask! :)

A prime location just walking distance to coffee shops, restaurants, pubs, parks, public transportation, Stampede grounds, The Saddledome, BMO Convention centre and 17th Ave.The spaceThe main bedroom features a queen size bed, plenty of closet space, ensuite bathroom with tub and blackout curtains. The secondary bedroom is a bright open room with a queen size murphy bed, dresser, sun shades and a desk/vanity. The second bathroom includes a shower stall and in-suite laundry (pods and sheets provided). There is a bar height dining table with seating for four in the open concept living room and a fully equipped kitchen to enjoy home cooked meals or indulge in a local treat with take-out from the many surrounding restaurants. The private balcony provides a small outdoor space with caf√© lights and seating perfect for your morning coffee or enjoying some wine as the sun sets.An array of food options at your doorstep from Starbucks, to multiple vendors at the First Street Market, a pub in St James Corner, or fast and convenient at Subway and Fresh Slice Pizza. Fancy an Italian or Indian, check out Ten Foot Henry‚Äôs and the Calcutta Cricket Club down 1st SW, or indulge in delicious family style eating at Pat & Betty. As well as many more options in the surrounding blocks or head over to 17th Ave to discover a diverse dining area with everything from bakeries to award winning restaurants and everything in between. 17th Ave is a lively area to eat, shop, play and explore.Guest accessColours by Battistella is a privately-owned residential condo building with no services or amenities for rental guests.Other things to noteRules, bylaws and regulation must be read, agreed and signed by the guests prior to occupancy is authorized. The secondary bedroom is a bright open room with a queen size murphy bed, dresser, sun shades and a desk/vanity. description_html:
Comfort and convenience in Calgary’s vibrant Beltline district. Enjoy the breathtaking city skyline with floor to ceiling windows in this bright and airy 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom suite, with in-suite laundry and one free heated underground assigned parking stall. A prime location just walking distance to coffee shops, restaurants, pubs, parks, public transportation, Stampede grounds, The Saddledome, BMO Convention centre and 17th Ave.

The space
The main bedroom features a queen size bed, plenty of closet space, ensuite bathroom with tub and blackout curtains.

The secondary bedroom is a bright open room with a queen size murphy bed, dresser, sun shades and a desk/vanity.

The second bathroom includes a shower stall and in-suite laundry (pods and sheets provided).

There is a bar height dining table with seating for four in the open concept living room and a fully equipped kitchen to enjoy home cooked meals or indulge in a local treat with take-out from the many surrounding restaurants.

The private balcony provides a small outdoor space with café lights and seating perfect for your morning coffee or enjoying some wine as the sun sets.

An array of food options at your doorstep from Starbucks, to multiple vendors at the First Street Market, a pub in St James Corner, or fast and convenient at Subway and Fresh Slice Pizza. Fancy an Italian or Indian, check out Ten Foot Henry’s and the Calcutta Cricket Club down 1st SW, or indulge in delicious family style eating at Pat & Betty. As well as many more options in the surrounding blocks or head over to 17th Ave to discover a diverse dining area with everything from bakeries to award winning restaurants and everything in between. 17th Ave is a lively area to eat, shop, play and explore.

Guest access
Colours by Battistella is a privately-owned residential condo building with no services or amenities for rental guests.

Other things to note
Rules, bylaws and regulation must be read, agreed and signed by the guests prior to occupancy is authorized. Hard copy will also be available to the guests inside the condo unit. Additional rules details will be sent out to the guests for review and agreement once booking is completed and approved.

description_html:
Welcome to your perfect escape @ 6th and Tenth—a warm, stylish 11th-floor condo that feels just like home. At night, unwind in the balcony’s hanging chair and take in sparkling Calgary Tower views. Inside, relax in the open-concept living area with a cozy fireplace and gourmet kitchen. The bedroom offers skyline views and great storage. With chic concrete accents, in-suite laundry, smart TV, high-speed Wi-Fi, FREE parking, plus pool and gym access—book your stay today!

The space
This inviting one-bedroom condo features a bright, spacious living area with natural light, a modern bathroom with a relaxing bathtub, and a cozy dining space ideal for meals or entertaining. Ample closet space throughout makes storage a breeze. Step onto the private balcony to enjoy stunning Calgary Tower views, complete with a hanging chair and BBQ. Located in the heart of downtown, you’re just steps from top dining, shopping, attractions, and vibrant nightlife.

Guest access
You'll enjoy exclusive, private access to the entire condo, designed for maximum comfort and relaxation. Your stay includes complimentary parking in a secure, heated underground garage. Feel free to unwind at the refreshing pool, stay active in the fully-equipped fitness center, or relax and socialize in the recreation room. For your convenience and safety, building access is secured via a fob system—please keep your fob with you at all times. Welcome home!

Other things to note
To ensure the condo remains clean, cozy, and welcoming for all guests, I kindly ask that you remove your shoes upon entering. A designated space in the entryway closet is available for your footwear during your stay. As I’ve kept the cleaning fee minimal to offer you greater value, your care in helping maintain the space is genuinely appreciated. Thank you in advance for treating this home with the same warmth and respect as your own. 🙏

Smoking or vaping is strictly prohibited inside the condo and on the balcony. If you wish to smoke, please use designated outdoor areas. Disposing of cigarette butts from the balcony is a serious fire hazard and strictly forbidden. Violations of this policy may result in a $700 fine.

Free parking is available on-site at Level P2, Spot #299. Once you’ve collected your fob, use Button #1 on the remote to open the main garage door when nearby. For access through the second garage door near visitor parking, use Button #2.

Please keep your fob with you at all times. A replacement fee of $200 will be charged for any lost or unreturned fobs.

If you need any assistance during your stay, feel free to reach out—I'm always happy to help!

Registration Details
BL288353

name: Condo in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.55 ¬∑ 2 bedrooms ¬∑ 3 beds ¬∑ 1.5 baths
description: This gorgeous, remote-work-friendly, 2 bedroom condo is large enough to host 4 guests at a time. There are 2 King sized beds, plus fold out sofa-bed in the living room. Enjoy the city views and all the natural light that the floor-to-ceiling-windows offer. Featuring an open concept design, fully equipped kitchen (with a dishwasher), in suite laundry machines, and dedicated workstation with free wifi.  We're walking distance from Stampede Park; in the Beltline neighbourhood.The space‚Ä¢ 2 bedrooms with King sized beds‚Ä¢ 1.5 bathrooms‚Ä¢ Fully equipped kitchen with high end appliances‚Ä¢ Dining table with seating capacity for 4, plus additional dining space for 4 at the kitchen island bar‚Ä¢ 55" Smart TV with Netflix in the living room‚Ä¢ Dedicated laptop friendly workstation‚Ä¢ High speed internet service‚Ä¢ Central air conditioning‚Ä¢ In-suite laundry machines‚Ä¢ 814 sq.ft‚Ä¢ Private balcony‚Ä¢ Secure, gated underground parking (for an additional fee)For everyone‚Äôs comfort and in accordance with local regulations, we use a smart noise monitoring system (NoiseAware) that tracks decibel levels ‚Äî not conversations ‚Äî to ensure respectful noise levels are maintained.This bright and airy apartment is in the perfect location! Only steps away from outdoor tennis courts and public parks, and walking distance from Stampede Park! You'll be just a few blocks from downtown, in the Beltline neighbourhood of Calgary's Design District. The open concept design feels even more spacious with the floor to ceiling windows, offering loads of natural light. The living room has a pull out sofa bed and a 55" smart TV with Netflix. There is a dining table with space for 4, plus additional seating at the kitchen island bar. The kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher. And that's not all! There's also in suite laundry machines, free to use for our guests. You'll find a powder room bathroom beside these. Just down the hallway behind the kitchen you'll find a King sized bedroom. This bedroom has a smart TV, and the whole condo is connected to high speed internet service. Outside of this bedroom is the main bathroom which features a shower/tub combo. The other bedroom is next to the living room, and is separated by a sliding glass door. This King sized bedroom features a private balcony patio, a dedicated laptop-friendly work-station and floor to ceiling windows. Pack your bags and hit the booking button ‚Äì adventure awaits!Guest accessYou will have exclusive use of this apartment. There is dedicated parking in the secure, underground parking garage for one vehicle at a cost of $20.00/night. There's also paid street parking nearby. The building is wheelchair accessible with a ramp at the entrance and an elevator to take you to your floor.Other things to note*IMPORTANT NOTE*KEY PICK-UP:‚Ä¢ Please note that keys for the unit must be picked up at an alternate KeyNest location before 10:00 PM.‚Ä¢ To help ensure a safe and trusted experience for all guests, ID verification may be required after booking.‚Ä¢ The COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All confirmed bookings indicate guest agreement to adhere to the property's residential bylaws and community standards.‚Ä¢ Please note that the dishwasher is currently  not available to use. We are sorry for any inconvenience this may cause and do not hesitate to contact us if you have any other concern. ‚Ä¢ Please note that we are not responsible for any unreceived parcel delivery or shipping orders. We encourage guests to avoid placing online orders during their stay as shipping times can vary. Even when the expected delivery date is within your stay, we do not recommend placing orders that must be shipped to your vacation rental property.‚Ä¢ We offer on-site, underground parking for one vehicle at $20 per night. Please inquire for further details about obtaining a parking pass.Registration DetailsBL261385
reviews: The place is beautiful and comfortable. Loved living in the heart of Downtown. Apartment had more space than we expected. Perfect for family stays‚Ä¶will definitely love to stay again in future.

Had a great stay! Was easy to access instructions on check-in were clear. We did have one hiccup on check out though as we were instructed to leave the keys in the unit but it was not made clear that you need to get your car out of the parkade before leaving the keys behind. We got stranded in the lobby and couldn‚Äôt get back up to the unit as we didn‚Äôt have the fob, also couldn‚Äôt get down into the parkade without the fob. Luckily a gentleman who lives in the building was nice enough to let us into the parkade to get our vehicle. Other than this the unit was decent and overall quite clean. I would happily stay here again.

This was by far the worst Airbnb I‚Äôve stayed in & I do not recommend it. After booking, we learned check-in required walking 10 minutes to another location to pick up keys. The provided link for underground parking was useless; no payment option existed so we had to park on the street. Upon entry, we were met with an overwhelming odor of cigarette smoke & a hockey gym bag that lingered in the bedding, towels & furniture. Cleanliness was nonexistent - crumbs, stains, a dirty Kleenex under the uncomfortable couch that had a metal rod running throughout. Hair & dirt on the rug, random stains on the bedding, walls & ceiling, & dust on nearly every surface. A sticker on the fridge telling guests to leave high ratings felt highly inappropriate. After only 2 hours, we left & booked a hotel at 3 a.m. Hosts showed zero concern for our experience & only cared about the keys.Unclean, unprofessional - never again. Only pro was location. I‚Äôd have a lot more to say more if there weren‚Äôt a word count
Really enjoyed my stay the place was great great location very clean. Everything worked. Would love to stay again.

Well,I found this place is very affordable and close to all locations like restaurants,mall and so many places to visit.
Place is really nice and peaceful.Everything well organized and I will definitely love to rebook if I get a chance to come to Calgary again.
Will come again soon! Samantha is awesome host!!!!
Great place and close to everything. Would easily come back if visiting Calgary again

Pros: Great location‚Äîwalking distance to bars, restaurants, and downtown/17th Ave. The unit is clean, well-maintained, and looks like the photos. Secure building with easy check-in.
Cons: The unit lacks warmth and feels bare. The couch is stiff and uncomfortable, with metal bars running through the cushions. The kitchen is poorly stocked‚Äîno ice trays and minimal essentials, making it impractical for cooking.
The real issue? Greed. I had a medical emergency during the first night and had to leave for the hospital, meaning I never even stayed in the unit. Despite this, the host refused a date change, even though it was Valentine‚Äôs Day weekend and could have been rebooked. Worse, they changed the door code without notice, locking me out for 1.5 hours when I returned for my luggage. I was still charged a full cleaning fee for a unit I barely used.
Overall: The unit itself is decent, but the host‚Äôs lack of empathy and money-first attitude left me with a bad impression :(
Amazing place great host would stay again
Great apartment!

We had an amazing stay, and would stay here again in the future if able to, the place is even better in person and is right in the heart of downtown Calgary making it very easy to get around the area with plenty of things to do.

Condo was clean and comfortable and hosts are very responsive.
Little bit of a surprise to find we couldn‚Äôt park in underground parking until paying an additional fee after we‚Äôd already got into the condo (maybe I missed that in the description?) , but once that was sorted everything else was seamless.
Hosts were quick to respond when we messaged and checked in later that day to make sure everything was going alright.
Great hosts and a nice place in a convenient location.
Overall really great stay!! So much to do in the area, great location to walk from, enjoy restaurants and downtown. Ample towels and other amenities.  Great value, great location and would recommend.
We enjoyed our stay here. The hosts are quick to respond and helpful when needed. The condo met our needs: the location was fantastic and the space was well laid out and decorated.
Super nice place

Great location and very easy to get around the City.
Very cozy and well maintained.
Would stay there again.

From start to finish this was a pretty terrible experience. The hosts was not flexible with the check-in time and only provided check-in instructions 2 hours or so before the designated time. There was only 1 set of keys available for 3 people which was very surprising given that the place is listed to accommodate 4. The host was unable to provide an extra set of keys despite asking for this in advance. Then, the AC was broken and the condo was at 28.5 degrees, which was completely uninhabitable. For 4 (business) days the host was saying it was being repaired and a technician was coming, but no one ever showed up. The host clearly had no intention of ever fixing anything and I am pretty sure I was speaking with an AI for the most part. Would not recommend, it was completely unreasonable to live in a condo at 28.5 degrees and the host misled us in saying it was being repaired.
Great location. Host was helpful. I would stay here again. Thank you

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: The hip Beltline area is bounded by 17th Avenue SW, with cool boutiques selling fashion, retro furniture, vinyl and quirky gifts. Dining spans trendy taco joints, locavore eateries and Korean restaurants, while nightlife encompasses craft beer pubs, live music venues and dance clubs. There are landscaped gardens at Central Memorial Park, while nearby Stampede Park is known for the annual Calgary Stampede rodeo.

description_html:
This gorgeous, remote-work-friendly, 2 bedroom condo is large enough to host 4 guests at a time. There are 2 King sized beds, plus fold out sofa-bed in the living room. Enjoy the city views and all the natural light that the floor-to-ceiling-windows offer. Featuring an open concept design, fully equipped kitchen (with a dishwasher), in suite laundry machines, and dedicated workstation with free wifi. We're walking distance from Stampede Park; in the Beltline neighbourhood.

The space
• 2 bedrooms with King sized beds
• 1.5 bathrooms
• Fully equipped kitchen with high end appliances
• Dining table with seating capacity for 4, plus additional dining space for 4 at the kitchen island bar
• 55" Smart TV with Netflix in the living room
• Dedicated laptop friendly workstation
• High speed internet service
• Central air conditioning
• In-suite laundry machines
• 814 sq.ft
• Private balcony
• Secure, gated underground parking (for an additional fee)

For everyone’s comfort and in accordance with local regulations, we use a smart noise monitoring system (NoiseAware) that tracks decibel levels — not conversations — to ensure respectful noise levels are maintained.

This bright and airy apartment is in the perfect location! Only steps away from outdoor tennis courts and public parks, and walking distance from Stampede Park! You'll be just a few blocks from downtown, in the Beltline neighbourhood of Calgary's Design District.

The open concept design feels even more spacious with the floor to ceiling windows, offering loads of natural light. The living room has a pull out sofa bed and a 55" smart TV with Netflix. There is a dining table with space for 4, plus additional seating at the kitchen island bar. The kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher. And that's not all! There's also in suite laundry machines, free to use for our guests. You'll find a powder room bathroom beside these.

Just down the hallway behind the kitchen you'll find a King sized bedroom. This bedroom has a smart TV, and the whole condo is connected to high speed internet service. Outside of this bedroom is the main bathroom which features a shower/tub combo.

The other bedroom is next to the living room, and is separated by a sliding glass door. This King sized bedroom features a private balcony patio, a dedicated laptop-friendly work-station and floor to ceiling windows.

Pack your bags and hit the booking button – adventure awaits!

Guest access
You will have exclusive use of this apartment. There is dedicated parking in the secure, underground parking garage for one vehicle at a cost of $20.00/night. There's also paid street parking nearby. The building is wheelchair accessible with a ramp at the entrance and an elevator to take you to your floor.

Other things to note
*IMPORTANT NOTE*

KEY PICK-UP:
• Please note that keys for the unit must be picked up at an alternate KeyNest location before 10:00 PM.

• To help ensure a safe and trusted experience for all guests, ID verification may be required after booking.

• The COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All confirmed bookings indicate guest agreement to adhere to the property's residential bylaws and community standards.

• Please note that the dishwasher is currently not available to use. We are sorry for any inconvenience this may cause and do not hesitate to contact us if you have any other concern.

• Please note that we are not responsible for any unreceived parcel delivery or shipping orders. We encourage guests to avoid placing online orders during their stay as shipping times can vary. Even when the expected delivery date is within your stay, we do not recommend placing orders that must be shipped to your vacation rental property.

• We offer on-site, underground parking for one vehicle at $20 per night. Please inquire for further details about obtaining a parking pass.

reviews_details.review: The place is beautiful and comfortable. Loved living in the heart of Downtown. Apartment had more space than we expected. Perfect for family stays‚Ä¶will definitely love to stay again in future.

Had a great stay! Was easy to access instructions on check-in were clear. We did have one hiccup on check out though as we were instructed to leave the keys in the unit but it was not made clear that you need to get your car out of the parkade before leaving the keys behind. We got stranded in the lobby and couldn‚Äôt get back up to the unit as we didn‚Äôt have the fob, also couldn‚Äôt get down into the parkade without the fob. Luckily a gentleman who lives in the building was nice enough to let us into the parkade to get our vehicle. Other than this the unit was decent and overall quite clean. I would happily stay here again.

This was by far the worst Airbnb I‚Äôve stayed in & I do not recommend it. After booking, we learned check-in required walking 10 minutes to another location to pick up keys. The provided link for underground parking was useless; no payment option existed so we had to park on the street. Upon entry, we were met with an overwhelming odor of cigarette smoke & a hockey gym bag that lingered in the bedding, towels & furniture. Cleanliness was nonexistent - crumbs, stains, a dirty Kleenex under the uncomfortable couch that had a metal rod running throughout. Hair & dirt on the rug, random stains on the bedding, walls & ceiling, & dust on nearly every surface. A sticker on the fridge telling guests to leave high ratings felt highly inappropriate. After only 2 hours, we left & booked a hotel at 3 a.m. Hosts showed zero concern for our experience & only cared about the keys.Unclean, unprofessional - never again. Only pro was location. I‚Äôd have a lot more to say more if there weren‚Äôt a word count
Really enjoyed my stay the place was great great location very clean. Everything worked. Would love to stay again.

Well,I found this place is very affordable and close to all locations like restaurants,mall and so many places to visit.
Place is really nice and peaceful.Everything well organized and I will definitely love to rebook if I get a chance to come to Calgary again.
Will come again soon! Samantha is awesome host!!!!
Great place and close to everything. Would easily come back if visiting Calgary again

Pros: Great location‚Äîwalking distance to bars, restaurants, and downtown/17th Ave. The unit is clean, well-maintained, and looks like the photos. Secure building with easy check-in.
Cons: The unit lacks warmth and feels bare. The couch is stiff and uncomfortable, with metal bars running through the cushions. The kitchen is poorly stocked‚Äîno ice trays and minimal essentials, making it impractical for cooking.
The real issue? Greed. I had a medical emergency during the first night and had to leave for the hospital, meaning I never even stayed in the unit. Despite this, the host refused a date change, even though it was Valentine‚Äôs Day weekend and could have been rebooked. Worse, they changed the door code without notice, locking me out for 1.5 hours when I returned for my luggage. I was still charged a full cleaning fee for a unit I barely used.
Overall: The unit itself is decent, but the host‚Äôs lack of empathy and money-first attitude left me with a bad impression :(
Amazing place great host would stay again
Great apartment!

We had an amazing stay, and would stay here again in the future if able to, the place is even better in person and is right in the heart of downtown Calgary making it very easy to get around the area with plenty of things to do.
reviews_details.host_response: Thank you for sharing your experience, Miguel! We are thrilled to hear you had an amazing stay and enjoyed the convenient location in downtown Calgary. It‚Äôs also wonderful to know the place exceeded your expectations in person. We‚Äôd love to welcome you back anytime you‚Äôre able to visit again!

reviews_details.review:
Condo was clean and comfortable and hosts are very responsive.
Little bit of a surprise to find we couldn‚Äôt park in underground parking until paying an additional fee after we‚Äôd already got into the condo (maybe I missed that in the description?) , but once that was sorted everything else was seamless.
Hosts were quick to respond when we messaged and checked in later that day to make sure everything was going alright.
Great hosts and a nice place in a convenient location.
reviews_details.host_response: Thank you for your wonderful review, Jules! We‚Äôre glad to hear you found the condo clean and comfortable, and that our responsiveness made your stay enjoyable. We do communicate the parking fees to our guests and will work on making that information clearer in the future. We appreciate your feedback! Thanks again for choosing to stay with us, and we hope to welcome you back soon!

It‚Äôs great to know you found the amenities and value to your liking. We truly appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back soon!

We hope to welcome you back soon!

reviews_details.host_response: Thanks for the kind words, Lisa! We're so glad you enjoyed the location and found it easy to explore the city. Happy to hear the space felt cozy and well-maintained‚Äîit would be a pleasure to welcome you back anytime!

reviews_details.review: From start to finish this was a pretty terrible experience. The hosts was not flexible with the check-in time and only provided check-in instructions 2 hours or so before the designated time. There was only 1 set of keys available for 3 people which was very surprising given that the place is listed to accommodate 4. The host was unable to provide an extra set of keys despite asking for this in advance. Then, the AC was broken and the condo was at 28.5 degrees, which was completely uninhabitable. For 4 (business) days the host was saying it was being repaired and a technician was coming, but no one ever showed up. The host clearly had no intention of ever fixing anything and I am pretty sure I was speaking with an AI for the most part. Would not recommend, it was completely unreasonable to live in a condo at 28.5 degrees and the host misled us in saying it was being repaired.
Great location. Host was helpful. I would stay here again. Thank you
reviews_details.host_response: Thank you for your kind words, Brandon. I'm thrilled to hear you enjoyed the great location! I‚Äôd love to welcome you back anytime, thank you for choosing to stay with us!

the apartment is spacious with lots of closet space. the shower was great
the bed and couch were pretty hard and not super comfy, and the building is definitely old and smells like cigs.

Beautiful apartment in a quieter area while still being close to 17th Ave. Liana was incredibly responsive and proactive with any questions or problems I brought up to her. It wasn‚Äôt the first time staying at a place she hosts and it won‚Äôt be the last! Highly recommend!

Place was as described. Some ppl were cooking strong smelling meals or smoking weed, the apartment door could be sealed better to keep these smells out.

Located in the vibrant downtown of Calgary, just off of the 17th avenue strip, surrounded by bars and restaurants, the location was transit accessible and perfect for us. Its very busy so if youre into peace and quiet, it might not be 100% perfect for you, but it was not a big issue for us personally.
As for the apartment, it was better than we anticipated for the price, but it is in a bit of a rough building. The rooms were sufficiently clean with utensils and cooking appliances available + some ingredients as well.
Overall, it was a very pleasant stay. Would recommend if youre looking for affordable accommodation.
This suite is in an older building that shows its wear, but the unit is acceptable and is located within walking distance of 17 Ave SW. This place needs a little TLC.

The apartment is great for the price and well located. It would be nice to pay more attention to the cleaning especially of the bathroom which was quite dusty.

great bed and kitchen, geary peaceful and easy to walk or take transit. there is also street parking.

name: Rental unit in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.92 ¬∑ 1 bedroom ¬∑ 2 beds ¬∑ 1 bath
description: Welcome to this beautiful downtown apartment! Enjoy stunning views from the high floor and relax in the designer atmosphere. Surrounded by great restaurants and shops, rest assured you're at the center of all the action. This amazing property also features a pool (seasonal), gym, parking (one stall) and around the clock support from Your Key Rental Management for your convenience.The spaceThis suite can accommodate 1-4 guests, however we recommend 1-3 for ideal comfort.Offering; - One bedroom (queen bed)- Built-in bed (full bed) just off the kitchen- One bathroom with a walk-in shower - Full kitchen; complete with coffee maker, toaster, pots, pans and everything you need to make meals at home - We offer international TV channels, sports and paper-view movies - Fitness equipment in the suite as well as in the shared gym in the building - Private patio with views from 30+ floors up - Mountain and city views In the summer guests will enjoy access to the rooftop pool (seasonal, outdoor). Guests have access to one underground parking stall.Guest accessGuests have access to the entire one bedroom (two bed), one bathroom condo and the patio. Registered guests are welcome to use the shared building amenities; a gym and outdoor pool. Please note that access may change at any time, including routine maintenance, change to bylaws or seasonal availability. We do not refund based upon their availability. Guests have access to one underground parking stall.Registration DetailsBL264715
reviews: I loved my stay! Being downtown was very convenient, parking was accessible as well as a very clean and beautiful apartment. Host was very responsive and delightful to communicate with, I would heavily recommend this place and if I‚Äôm ever needing to stay in Calgary again I will find myself revisiting this listing. Overall it was a very beautiful and peaceful stay.

Wow this place has been the most beautiful place I have ever stayed in. The views are incredible. I wanted to hurry back to the suite just so I can enjoy the space. I love how everything just felt like home and looked modern. You must stay here!!

We stayed during Stampede and anticipated noise and party goers. We were not disappointed. Check-in and checkout are involved and mildly tedious but VERY well described. Lovely space. Great views. Allow extra time for checking and checkout as two trips up the elevator to the 30th floor are required for both. Would stay again.

Beth and her team did a great job of providing instructions ahead of time, they were clear and easy to follow making the check in and check out process super easy. Host was super proactive and responsive.
Condo was clean and in a good location. Great views of Calgary downtown. We only stayed the one night but would definitely stay here again!

An absolute gem. Have been here before. Return customer. Excellent stay. Sub-penthouse provides exceptional views of DT, close to restaurants and everything. Underground parking. Private, secure and convenient to everything. Host is fantastic, friendly, responsive and helpful. I‚Äôll be back for sure! Highly recommend this place. Great value, amazing stay!

From start to finish the host was so onto of our every question and need . The service and price was so 100% above and beyond our every expectation. For Downtown Calgary the price and location you can't find that in any hotel. we can't wait to rebook cheers  and you guys were amazingü•∞ü•∞ Thank you again Brian & Tanya

We arrived a little early and the host was kind enough to let us drop our bags of before the flat was cleaned.  The cleaning girl was very precise, cheerful and kind. I highly recommend this place and will definitely return. Thank you!  :)

Exactly as described, in a great location with amazing views. Plenty of food and drink options nearby, as well as a handful of urban parks. Would stay again!

Beautiful apartment, very comfortable and spacious for 2 people. Beth was a very responsive host
The apartment was terrific. Just beautifully decorated and a great location. So happy with the stay

This property was over the moon!!!! The views are stunning and I love the access to downtown, restaurants and walking on the Bow River Trail. Beth and her group made my stay so comfortable.
I could not possibly find anything wrong with this property. Highly recommend! I'm going back!
Thank you very much!

Had a fantastic stay at this condo! The unit was exactly as described, clean, and had everything needed for a comfortable short stay. description_html:
Welcome to this beautiful downtown apartment! Enjoy stunning views from the high floor and relax in the designer atmosphere. Surrounded by great restaurants and shops, rest assured you're at the center of all the action. This amazing property also features a pool (seasonal), gym, parking (one stall) and around the clock support from Your Key Rental Management for your convenience.

The space
This suite can accommodate 1-4 guests, however we recommend 1-3 for ideal comfort.

Offering;
- One bedroom (queen bed)
- Built-in bed (full bed) just off the kitchen
- One bathroom with a walk-in shower
- Full kitchen; complete with coffee maker, toaster, pots, pans and everything you need to make meals at home
- We offer international TV channels, sports and paper-view movies
- Fitness equipment in the suite as well as in the shared gym in the building
- Private patio with views from 30+ floors up
- Mountain and city views

In the summer guests will enjoy access to the rooftop pool (seasonal, outdoor).

Guests have access to one underground parking stall.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire one bedroom (two bed), one bathroom condo and the patio.

Registered guests are welcome to use the shared building amenities; a gym and outdoor pool. Please note that access may change at any time, including routine maintenance, change to bylaws or seasonal availability. We do not refund based upon their availability.

Guests have access to one underground parking stall.

description: FREE UG Secured Parking - 1 spot***Walk Score 96***Welcome to this downtown Calgary oasis, a perfectly positioned 2-bedroom gem designed both for both diligent worker on a business trip  and the adventure-seeking traveler visiting Alberta Rocky Mountains! The building is perfectly located in a walking distance to Stampede grounds, vibrant 17th avenue and Financial district of Calgary.The spaceThis peaceful corner unit features:- floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning panoramic views,  - modern sliding glass doors, - flowing layout,- fully equipped kitchen,- granite countertop, - dedicated workstation, - highspeed Internet, - Nostalgic Classic Turntable with records, - 58" Smart ROKU TV, - One designated underground parking lot.Our 2 bedroom condo can accommodate up your 4 guests and offers all amenities you need to feel like at home.Start your day in our bright, sunlit living area, with natural light pouring through the floor-to-ceiling windows. Prepare breakfast in the fully equipped kitchen and enjoy it at our dining table set for four, while gazing out at the cityscape or‚Ä¶Step out and start exploring downtown Calgary and crab the fresh morning coffee from the coffee shop right across the building! With a walk score of 96, you're just minutes away from the vibrant 17th Avenue, brimming with trendy restaurants, cafes, and shops. For those keen on sightseeing, take a short walk to the iconic Stampede Grounds and the state-of-the-art BMO Centre. The location is also perfect for working professionals as it is minutes walk to Calgary‚Äôs finance district.After long day return to this serene condo for a relaxing break. Lounge in the living area with a book or put on your favorite vinyl on the turntable, setting the perfect ambiance. The electric fireplace adds a cozy touch, especially on cooler days.As the sun sets, gather around again for dinner in the comfortable dining area or visit one of the fantastic restaurants in a neighbourhood! For some entertainment, explore our collection of records or simply gaze at the city lights through the expansive windows. The mood interior lighting sets the perfect tone for winding down.When it's time for bed, retreat to the master bedroom, separating it from the living area with a modern sliding door. You'll appreciate the blackout window coverings, ensuring a restful sleep. The second bedroom offers the utmost privacy and quiet‚Äîa perfect escape for those who value tranquility. Both bedrooms feature queen size beds with high quality cotton linens for utmost comfort. Being centrally located, you're in the heart of the action. From morning coffee runs to late-night adventures, everything you need is within walking distance! Whether you're here for business or leisure, our space is designed to cater to all your needs.Perfect for working professionals and travelers alike, our modern condo promises an unforgettable stay in dynamic Calgary!Guest accessYou will have access to the whole condoOther things to note‚ÄúThe COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. reviews: We had a wonderful stay! The space was clean, cute, and cozy - just like the photos showed. Anna was incredibly welcoming and accommodating, with thoughtful touches throughout, including some yummy little treats! The location was convenient and made getting around easy. We‚Äôd definitely stay here again!

We loved the cozyness and warmth of the condo. We would definitely stay again on a future trip. Excellent location for Wordfest events.
Anna is a top notch host, responsive and helpful.

Anna was great to deal with, very friendly and responded very quickly. The place was really clean and looked just like the pictures. It was a nice walk to either downtown core or 17th Ave. Had a lovely stay.
Well located for those requiring a place to stay downtown with 2 x bedrooms & kitchen. Street can be a little noisy at night, but that is natural for a downtown apartment in a big city.

The location of the unit was GREAT, we walked to several restaurants, parks, playgrounds, etc.
The building and unit are dated, but seemed safe.
Check in was a little difficult, but after that initial time entering, it was super easy and convenient.
Same with the garage/parking situation, only tricky at first.
The host was quick and clear when communicating.
It was worth the cost.
Overall, I would recommend and stay at the unit again primarily because of location.

Lovely condo in a great area! So close to Stephen Ave and the saddle dome. We we were able to walk to all of our destinations!
Anna was easy to communicate with and check in was a breeze!

We cannot recommend this apartment enough. Anna was very responsive to all our questions about the property and surrounding area. The location is great, easy access to everything in the city as well as getting to the C train for trips further out. The apartment was just what we needed for visiting relations, plenty of space for a family of 4. A great kitchen, spacious bedrooms and great views. Thanks Anna üòÉ

Anna was an excellent host and her place was fantastic! Check in instructions were straightforward and easy to follow and her home felt very welcoming and clean. The beds were super cozy, especially when you‚Äôve been outside exploring Calgary and beyond all day and there‚Äôs a lot of restaurants coffee shops bars and a nice little grocery store all within walking distance, definitely worth staying in her Airbnb, if you visit Calgary!

A perfect home base, for my family of 4 (children ages 12 & 14), while in Calgary, for a baseball tournament. Comfortable and homey. Anna, was attentive and friendly. Would definitely stay here again!

Fantastic stay during a challenging work trip. Perfect location with incredible food options within 1 block.  Restaurant market across the street has probably 15 delicious food options. Apartment was new, very clean and stocked with coffee, water, and snacks.  Beds were extremely comfortable. We had to extend 1 day due to work and Anna was extremely responsive.  Will try to stay with Anna in this neighborhood next time I'm in Calgary. Thanks Anna!!!
Great place - second bedroom doesn‚Äôt have a window although there is a lot  natural light in the rest of the apartment.  Immaculate presentation and we enjoyed our short stay.
Great stay at Anna‚Äôs place. Great location for downtown access and plenty of bars and restaurants nearby.
Anna's apartment is conveniently located and easy to get around, the apartment is clean and tidy, we had a very pleasant stay for three nights, highly recommended!
Great location, the apartment was clean and felt right at home. I would definitely recommend this stay!
My son and I had a great stay at Anna‚Äôs Place.  Beautiful space and we LOVED the neighborhood! Makes me want to live downtown.
Enjoyed our stay at Anna‚Äôs condo. The unit was clean and bright.  Great location‚Äîclose to everything with easy, secure parking. Thanks Anna!

The apartment is located at a very convenient location, with really good restaurants and bars in the area. The apartment is a very cute space located in downtown, perfect for stay for a single person or a couple.
Anna is a wonderful host and promptly responded to all my messages. I‚Äôm definitely sharing this listing with other friends who will be travelling to Calgary.

Wonderful location, especially for going to an event at the Saddledome-just a 15 minute walk, albeit extremely cold, but that‚Äôs winter in Calgary! Good restaurant and grocery options nearby and the unit was great-so nicely set up. Anna was so helpful, especially in quickly resolving a TV issue when the prior visitor logged out of the unit‚Äôs Roku account. Would love to stay here again!
Anna‚Äôs place was exactly as described. Clean and tidy. Great restaurants around.
Very clean and nice apartment.  Looks just like the photos.  Nice neighborhood with lots in walking distance.
Amazing flexibility and communication, even got us an extra key to help with our unique travel situation. Definitely recommend!
Great location, lots great of restaurant and bars on 1st.  Place was spacious and clean. Beds were comfortable and it was nice to have the roki tv option.
My friends and I had a wonderful stay at Anna‚Äôs. The location was super central and access to the parkade was a huge plus. Would definitely stay again!
Anna was great! Clear communications, seamless check-in. The condo is clean and bright, and in a great location. 3-4 excellent restaurants within a block.

description_html:
FREE UG Secured Parking - 1 spot

***Walk Score 96***

Welcome to this downtown Calgary oasis, a perfectly positioned 2-bedroom gem designed both for both diligent worker on a business trip and the adventure-seeking traveler visiting Alberta Rocky Mountains!

The building is perfectly located in a walking distance to Stampede grounds, vibrant 17th avenue and Financial district of Calgary.

The space
This peaceful corner unit features:

- floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning panoramic views,
- modern sliding glass doors,
- flowing layout,
- fully equipped kitchen,
- granite countertop,
- dedicated workstation,
- highspeed Internet,
- Nostalgic Classic Turntable with records,
- 58" Smart ROKU TV,
- One designated underground parking lot.

Our 2 bedroom condo can accommodate up your 4 guests and offers all amenities you need to feel like at home.

Start your day in our bright, sunlit living area, with natural light pouring through the floor-to-ceiling windows. Prepare breakfast in the fully equipped kitchen and enjoy it at our dining table set for four, while gazing out at the cityscape or…

Step out and start exploring downtown Calgary and crab the fresh morning coffee from the coffee shop right across the building!

With a walk score of 96, you're just minutes away from the vibrant 17th Avenue, brimming with trendy restaurants, cafes, and shops. For those keen on sightseeing, take a short walk to the iconic Stampede Grounds and the state-of-the-art BMO Centre. The location is also perfect for working professionals as it is minutes walk to Calgary’s finance district.

After long day return to this serene condo for a relaxing break. Lounge in the living area with a book or put on your favorite vinyl on the turntable, setting the perfect ambiance. The electric fireplace adds a cozy touch, especially on cooler days.

As the sun sets, gather around again for dinner in the comfortable dining area or visit one of the fantastic restaurants in a neighbourhood!

For some entertainment, explore our collection of records or simply gaze at the city lights through the expansive windows. The mood interior lighting sets the perfect tone for winding down.

When it's time for bed, retreat to the master bedroom, separating it from the living area with a modern sliding door. You'll appreciate the blackout window coverings, ensuring a restful sleep. The second bedroom offers the utmost privacy and quiet—a perfect escape for those who value tranquility. Both bedrooms feature queen size beds with high quality cotton linens for utmost comfort.


Being centrally located, you're in the heart of the action. From morning coffee runs to late-night adventures, everything you need is within walking distance! Whether you're here for business or leisure, our space is designed to cater to all your needs.

Perfect for working professionals and travelers alike, our modern condo promises an unforgettable stay in dynamic Calgary!

Guest access
You will have access to the whole condo

Other things to note
“The COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific
services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay.”

Anna was an excellent host and her place was fantastic! Check in instructions were straightforward and easy to follow and her home felt very welcoming and clean. The beds were super cozy, especially when you‚Äôve been outside exploring Calgary and beyond all day and there‚Äôs a lot of restaurants coffee shops bars and a nice little grocery store all within walking distance, definitely worth staying in her Airbnb, if you visit Calgary!

A perfect home base, for my family of 4 (children ages 12 & 14), while in Calgary, for a baseball tournament. Comfortable and homey. Anna, was attentive and friendly. Would definitely stay here again!

Will try to stay with Anna in this neighborhood next time I'm in Calgary. Thanks Anna!!!

Great stay at Anna‚Äôs place. Great location for downtown access and plenty of bars and restaurants nearby.

Great location, the apartment was clean and felt right at home. I would definitely recommend this stay!
My son and I had a great stay at Anna‚Äôs Place.  Beautiful space and we LOVED the neighborhood! Makes me want to live downtown.
Enjoyed our stay at Anna‚Äôs condo. The unit was clean and bright.  Great location‚Äîclose to everything with easy, secure parking. Thanks Anna!

The apartment is located at a very convenient location, with really good restaurants and bars in the area. The apartment is a very cute space located in downtown, perfect for stay for a single person or a couple.
Anna is a wonderful host and promptly responded to all my messages. I‚Äôm definitely sharing this listing with other friends who will be travelling to Calgary.

Wonderful location, especially for going to an event at the Saddledome-just a 15 minute walk, albeit extremely cold, but that‚Äôs winter in Calgary! Good restaurant and grocery options nearby and the unit was great-so nicely set up. Anna‚Äôs place was exactly as described. Clean and tidy. Great restaurants around.

Top floor apartment with skyline views, full AC, in-suite laundry, private parking — right on 17th Ave. Enjoy a fully renovated space and ultimate comfort in Calgary’s most walkable downtown district.

Free 2 vehicle parking on premises.

The space
Apartment is located on the top floor of an 8-storey building. You are right on top of the “red mile” and a 10 minute walk from Saddledome and BMO centre!

Guest access
Guests can access the building 24/7 with a set of unique entry codes.

Other things to note
Full AC in every room of the apartment.
Laundry drying machine has a heat pump with no vent - please empty water compartment (top left).

name: Rental unit in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.97 ¬∑ 2 bedrooms ¬∑ 2 beds ¬∑ 1 bath
description: Whether you're here for business or a city getaway, this cozy 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom condo is your perfect downtown escape. Take in the glowing Calgary Tower and city lights from your window, enjoy fast Wi-Fi and cable, or settle into the workspace for remote work. You're steps from the Stampede grounds, shops, and the city‚Äôs best food and drink.  The space pops with vibrant touches inspired by the Colours building itself!The spaceWelcome to your home away from home! Step into a cozy and thoughtfully arranged space designed for comfort and convenience.Living RoomThe heart of the home features a spacious living area with a comfortable seating arrangement, perfect for relaxing after a day out. Enjoy your favorite shows or a movie night on the 55" TV with cable.Kitchen & Dining AreaJust off the living room, you'll find a well-equipped kitchen stocked with essential cookware and utensils. A dining table for four makes it easy to enjoy meals together, whether you're cooking in or bringing home local eats.Work SpaceNeed to catch up on emails or do a bit of work? A dedicated desk nook provides a quiet spot to focus.Master BedroomThe serene master bedroom includes a queen-size bed with a plush mattress and beautiful views of downtown, offering a peaceful retreat at the end of the day.2nd BedroomThe 2nd bedroom features a comfortable double bed with a plush mattress. Please note, this room does not have windows.BathroomA full-sized bathroom includes a tub/shower combo, perfect for a refreshing rinse or a relaxing soak.Other things to noteThe unit includes 1 free heated underground parking stall - the underground parking clearance is 6'8".Additional street parking is available just outside the unit, though please note it does require payment.Registration DetailsBL290586
reviews: We have used Airbnb for several years and have even been Airbnb hosts for some of those years.  This listing was the best by far.  Beautiful, clean, we had everything we needed to feel comfortable, walkable, and great view of Calgary.  Need I go on?  So many more reasons to love this place.  Do not miss an opportunity to stay here if you are in Calgary.

We had a fantastic stay at Teressa's Airbnb.  The place was very clean & comfortable. Decorated just lovley. Everything to make our stay feel like home. Location was also perfect to be able to walk to many landmarks & the many yummy food establishments. Would highly recommend this place & would absolutely go back again. Thank you from, MJ & Denine

Couldn't fault this place at all! Teresa was absolutely fantastic and quick to reply to any queries. The view was stunning and the beds sooo comfortable. We will 100% be back.
Thank you so much guys!

I give this stay a 10 out of 10! The hose was super communicative and friendly. She allowed us to check in earlier and was very flexible. The space was super clean and she had everything you could possibly need as far as toiletries an iron, a blow dryer‚Ä¶ you name it! The views from the stay are spectacular. You can see the Calgary Tower and it‚Äôs amazing. It‚Äôs also really close by many local restaurants which make it easy to sightsee.  I really enjoyed the place and hope to be back again soon!

The place has an incredible view of the city center and is located right on an avenue full of dining options. The host responded quickly and left very clear instructions and some recommendations. The apartment is exactly as described and very comfortable. The area is quiet during the day, but at night I wouldn't recommend straying too far as there are many homeless people and it makes you feel unsafe. Other than that, everything is great to stay here!

Great apartment in the heart of Calgary with close access to stores, coffee and food. The apartment was as described, very clean and comfortable. The views of the city and Calgary tower at night are amazing. We‚Äôd definitely stay here again on our next visit. Thanks again
This unit is in a perfect location.  We were able to park the vehicle and walk to all things.  The place was very clean and had everything that we needed. I would highly recommend.

The place was really clean, the self check in process was very clear and easy to follow. The downtown view is a great add-on. The location is pretty good and walkable distance to shops, good for family with baby who want to buy some baby stuff. Overall it‚Äôs a very nice and cozy place to live

Teresa‚Äôs place was spotless and incredibly well-maintained. You can tell she takes great pride in keeping everything clean and organized. From the fresh linens to the sparkling bathroom, every corner felt tidy and welcoming. It made my stay so much more comfortable and relaxing. Highly recommend for anyone who values cleanliness and a peaceful environment!

Staying in Calgary? Teresas place is very clean and comfortable. Beds are super comfy, views are great, and the access to the building is simple. Highly recommend staying here.
13th Ave is a always a great spot to stay and this place is exceptionally located to all the fun stuff. It's close to the Beltliner for a classic diner breakfast. Coffee is North across the street at Starbucks or West at the Market. You also have proof which is a great cocktail bar. A hop and a skip away from Leopolds Tavern for a later night burg. Great place to stay if you are attending a concert at the Saddledome or Expo at the BMO Centre.

I had an amazing stay at this Airbnb! The place was exactly as described‚Äîclean, cozy, and thoughtfully decorated. The bed was super comfortable, and all the amenities were well-stocked (bonus points for the fast Wi-Fi!)
The location was perfect‚Äîquiet and peaceful, but still close to everything I needed. Check-in was smooth and hassle-free, and the host was incredibly responsive and helpful throughout my stay.
You can tell they really care about their guests‚Äô experience. I would absolutely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable and welcoming place to stay!

very beautiful well maintained condo. loved the decor and the vibe, amazing views of the city and so family friendly. was really helpful to have high chair and other kids amenities. location is great with nice restaurants just around the corner

Our stay at Teresa‚Äôs downtown Calgary apartment was fantastic. Centrally located and neat as a pin, the space was both comfortable and well-equipped, with a full kitchen setup that made it easy to settle in. From its 11th-floor windows, we enjoyed excellent views of the downtown skyline and the lively bustle below‚Äîa perfect blend of comfort and city energy. Teresa was a thoughtful and responsive host, making the experience all the more enjoyable. Out of 40+ hosted stays over the past nine months, this one stands out as one of the better ones.

This place was just amazing. We are a family of 4, with 2 under 2 and a pregnant wife and the condo was just perfect for us, with everything we needed for the kiddos and us and the VIEW is just breathtaking.
It‚Äôs was extremely clean !!! All of us just loved the condo and location, walkable to everything Calgary has to offer.
Would stay here anytime and definitely recommend Teresa‚Äôs place to anybody, her communication was great !
Overall, flawless experience! Thank you so much Teresa and Steven ! Blessings ! üôè

I definitely recommend this condo . It's a beautiful space in a secure building with an amazing view of downtown including the Calgary Tower
I had a small issue with the access fob and had a response from the host in minutes with a resolution

We loved our stay at Teresa‚Äôs, was so clean and everything felt so fresh and new! Couldn‚Äôt have found a better place, location was great. Amazing views, gorgeous apartment and Teresa was great host

The location is very walkable with lots of great eateries nearby. Great view of the city and we were easily able to get everywhere we needed to from here.
Very nicely decorated and comfortable!Highly recommend!!
very clean, excellet location and great view from apartment. would highly recommend
We especially appreciated the amenities for children. Having a travel crib, high chair and kids plates was incredibly helpful for our youngest!
We loved to stay at Teresa's What a view! Everything was nicely decorated and we had enough space for us, a group of 4. Nice neighborhood, lots to do and enjoy.
Lovely place and in a great neighborhood! We loved being able to walk to some cool restaurants & cafes
Great place with lots of amenities nice and close!! Hosts were great and place was very clean. Will be booking again!

description_html:
Whether you're here for business or a city getaway, this cozy 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom condo is your perfect downtown escape. Take in the glowing Calgary Tower and city lights from your window, enjoy fast Wi-Fi and cable, or settle into the workspace for remote work. You're steps from the Stampede grounds, shops, and the city’s best food and drink. The space pops with vibrant touches inspired by the Colours building itself!

The space
Welcome to your home away from home! Step into a cozy and thoughtfully arranged space designed for comfort and convenience.

Living Room
The heart of the home features a spacious living area with a comfortable seating arrangement, perfect for relaxing after a day out. Enjoy your favorite shows or a movie night on the 55" TV with cable.

Kitchen & Dining Area
Just off the living room, you'll find a well-equipped kitchen stocked with essential cookware and utensils. A dining table for four makes it easy to enjoy meals together, whether you're cooking in or bringing home local eats.

Work Space
Need to catch up on emails or do a bit of work? A dedicated desk nook provides a quiet spot to focus.

Master Bedroom
The serene master bedroom includes a queen-size bed with a plush mattress and beautiful views of downtown, offering a peaceful retreat at the end of the day.

2nd Bedroom
The 2nd bedroom features a comfortable double bed with a plush mattress. Please note, this room does not have windows.

Bathroom
A full-sized bathroom includes a tub/shower combo, perfect for a refreshing rinse or a relaxing soak.

Other things to note
The unit includes 1 free heated underground parking stall - the underground parking clearance is 6'8".

Additional street parking is available just outside the unit, though please note it does require payment.

reviews_details.review: We have used Airbnb for several years and have even been Airbnb hosts for some of those years.  This listing was the best by far.  Beautiful, clean, we had everything we needed to feel comfortable, walkable, and great view of Calgary.  Need I go on?  So many more reasons to love this place.  Do not miss an opportunity to stay here if you are in Calgary.

We had a fantastic stay at Teressa's Airbnb.  The place was very clean & comfortable. Decorated just lovley. Everything to make our stay feel like home. Location was also perfect to be able to walk to many landmarks & the many yummy food establishments. Would highly recommend this place & would absolutely go back again. Thank you from, MJ & Denine

Couldn't fault this place at all! Teresa was absolutely fantastic and quick to reply to any queries. The view was stunning and the beds sooo comfortable. We will 100% be back.
Thank you so much guys!

I give this stay a 10 out of 10! The hose was super communicative and friendly. She allowed us to check in earlier and was very flexible. The space was super clean and she had everything you could possibly need as far as toiletries an iron, a blow dryer‚Ä¶ you name it! The views from the stay are spectacular. You can see the Calgary Tower and it‚Äôs amazing. It‚Äôs also really close by many local restaurants which make it easy to sightsee.  I really enjoyed the place and hope to be back again soon!

The place has an incredible view of the city center and is located right on an avenue full of dining options. The host responded quickly and left very clear instructions and some recommendations. The apartment is exactly as described and very comfortable. The area is quiet during the day, but at night I wouldn't recommend straying too far as there are many homeless people and it makes you feel unsafe. Other than that, everything is great to stay here!

Great apartment in the heart of Calgary with close access to stores, coffee and food. The apartment was as described, very clean and comfortable. The views of the city and Calgary tower at night are amazing. We‚Äôd definitely stay here again on our next visit. Thanks again
This unit is in a perfect location.  We were able to park the vehicle and walk to all things.  The place was very clean and had everything that we needed. I would highly recommend.

The place was really clean, the self check in process was very clear and easy to follow. The downtown view is a great add-on. The location is pretty good and walkable distance to shops, good for family with baby who want to buy some baby stuff. Overall it‚Äôs a very nice and cozy place to live

Teresa‚Äôs place was spotless and incredibly well-maintained. You can tell she takes great pride in keeping everything clean and organized. From the fresh linens to the sparkling bathroom, every corner felt tidy and welcoming. It made my stay so much more comfortable and relaxing. Highly recommend for anyone who values cleanliness and a peaceful environment!

Staying in Calgary? Teresas place is very clean and comfortable. Beds are super comfy, views are great, and the access to the building is simple. Highly recommend staying here.
13th Ave is a always a great spot to stay and this place is exceptionally located to all the fun stuff. It's close to the Beltliner for a classic diner breakfast. Coffee is North across the street at Starbucks or West at the Market. You also have proof which is a great cocktail bar. A hop and a skip away from Leopolds Tavern for a later night burg. Great place to stay if you are attending a concert at the Saddledome or Expo at the BMO Centre.

I had an amazing stay at this Airbnb! The place was exactly as described‚Äîclean, cozy, and thoughtfully decorated. The bed was super comfortable, and all the amenities were well-stocked (bonus points for the fast Wi-Fi!)
The location was perfect‚Äîquiet and peaceful, but still close to everything I needed. Check-in was smooth and hassle-free, and the host was incredibly responsive and helpful throughout my stay.
You can tell they really care about their guests‚Äô experience. I would absolutely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable and welcoming place to stay!

very beautiful well maintained condo. loved the decor and the vibe, amazing views of the city and so family friendly. was really helpful to have high chair and other kids amenities. location is great with nice restaurants just around the corner

Our stay at Teresa‚Äôs downtown Calgary apartment was fantastic. Centrally located and neat as a pin, the space was both comfortable and well-equipped, with a full kitchen setup that made it easy to settle in. From its 11th-floor windows, we enjoyed excellent views of the downtown skyline and the lively bustle below‚Äîa perfect blend of comfort and city energy. Teresa was a thoughtful and responsive host, making the experience all the more enjoyable. Out of 40+ hosted stays over the past nine months, this one stands out as one of the better ones.

This place was just amazing. We are a family of 4, with 2 under 2 and a pregnant wife and the condo was just perfect for us, with everything we needed for the kiddos and us and the VIEW is just breathtaking.
It‚Äôs was extremely clean !!! All of us just loved the condo and location, walkable to everything Calgary has to offer.
Would stay here anytime and definitely recommend Teresa‚Äôs place to anybody, her communication was great !
Overall, flawless experience! Thank you so much Teresa and Steven ! Blessings ! üôè

I definitely recommend this condo . It's a beautiful space in a secure building with an amazing view of downtown including the Calgary Tower
I had a small issue with the access fob and had a response from the host in minutes with a resolution

We loved our stay at Teresa‚Äôs, was so clean and everything felt so fresh and new! Couldn‚Äôt have found a better place, location was great. Amazing views, gorgeous apartment and Teresa was great host

The location is very walkable with lots of great eateries nearby. Great view of the city and we were easily able to get everywhere we needed to from here.
Very nicely decorated and comfortable!Highly recommend!!
very clean, excellet location and great view from apartment. would highly recommend
We especially appreciated the amenities for children. Having a travel crib, high chair and kids plates was incredibly helpful for our youngest!
We loved to stay at Teresa's What a view! Everything was nicely decorated and we had enough space for us, a group of 4. Nice neighborhood, lots to do and enjoy.
Lovely place and in a great neighborhood! We loved being able to walk to some cool restaurants & cafes
Great place with lots of amenities nice and close!! Hosts were great and place was very clean. Will be booking again!
Stunning view, perfect location there‚Äôs a ton of local restaurants and pubs right outside of the building. Area is safe & clean!
A very nice and clean apartment in a great location near restaurants.

description: Welcome Home!This Luxe Condo located in a prime central downtown location with spacious and stylish living.Welcome to your luxury stay at the heart of Calgary! This stunning apartment, located on the 12th floor, offers a unique experience of comfort and sophistication. With breathtaking views of the city, this apartment is designed for those who seek the best in urban living without sacrificing a peaceful and cozy atmosphere.The spacePerfect for diverse groups of travellers, including; business, couples, families, friends and even solo travellers looking for extra space.With walking distance to C-Train, 17th Ave, Stephen Ave, coffee shops & a variety of notable trendy restaurants, this location is in a prime location for you to explore the city with ease and comfort!This is also a prime location for travellers visiting for Calgary Stampede - with Stampede Grounds being a short walk away!Notable Features:-Private balcony with city views-Queen Bed & Double Bed Pull Out-Fresh bedding & linens-1 fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries-65" Smart TV -Bright living room w/ large sofa, coffee table & accent chair-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities-High-speed WiFi-Free parking spot in the buildings parkade (see note below)-Complimentary coffee and coffee machineGuest accessFull access to private Condo & private balconyOther things to notePLEASE NOTE HOUSE RULES :1. No parties or events allowed. No unregistered guests allowed.2. No smoking allowed. Any remnants or smell left behind will result in a $500 fine charged to your Airbnb account.3. No pets allowed.4. You must pay the appropriate cost for any damages or theft caused on the property.7. No illegal substances allowed on the premises. You will be asked to leave with no refund.Registration DetailsBL286039
reviews: Alizeh was a great hostess!!! Very responsive with communication and so patient with me as I had a hard time with the door code. The place was beautifully decorated. Appreciated the coffee, creamer and sugar. Bed was super comfortable! Great location with lots to do; terrific restaurants and coffee shops.

Alizeh‚Äôs unit was the perfect size for a couple and 1 or 2 children.  The location is right in the downtown with restaurants and bars, entertainment, and nice areas to walk by the river.  There‚Äôs a fantastic view from the 12th floor with floor to ceiling windows.   Visiting Calgary was made all the better by this lodging‚Äôs location.  We highly recommend Alizeh‚Äôs AirBnB.
Our stay at Alizeh‚Äôs place was great - The instructions for check in were clear, the apartment looked exactly like the photos, and everything went smoothly! Definitely recommend booking!
Had a great weekend stay here! Beautiful home and location with tons of walkable restaurants. Dedicated parking spot made the stay convenient! Would love to book if I find myself in Calgary again

Alizeh was very responsive from booking through to departure. The condo looked exactly like the photos. It‚Äôs within walking distance of downtown, the Calgary Tower, and other attractions. There‚Äôs a Starbucks right across the street and plenty of restaurants nearby.

Perfect location and a beautifully furnished apartment‚Äîexactly as pictured. We loved the thoughtful touches and how comfortable everything felt. The host was incredibly responsive and accommodating from check-in to checkout, which made the stay seamless. Would absolutely stay here again!

Overall, our stay was great. Alizeh was incredibly responsive - quick, thorough, and very helpful. The location was incredibly convenient.
A few notes if folks are staying on the couch:
- Bring an eye mask (the blinds are very thin).
- The bedroom has a sliding door and an opening to the kitchen near the ceiling, so bring ear plugs.
- You have to go through the bedroom to get to the bathroom.
- But the pull out couch is pretty big and comfy!

This place is STUNNING! It is my new favourite place to stay in Calgary. It‚Äôs so cozy and felt like a home away from home. The parking stalls in this building are usually quite tight but this one seemed more manageable than others. Alizeh was very wonderful and responsive as well! I can‚Äôt wait to go back!

I stayed for five nights in the apartment and had a great stay. Alizeh is very helpful, proactive, and accommodating.
The condo came with all mentioned amenities and was clean.
The neighbourhood is in walking distance to downtown and the stampede grounds, with all required amenities (groceries, etc.) in the vicinity.
Would definitely recommend staying in the condo when looking for accommodation in Calgary.
Great location! Walking distance from bars, restaurants and stampede. Glad the place came with a parking spot for our day trips out of town. Very clean, beautiful place with view. Would stay again.

We had a wonderful stay at Alizeh‚Äôs. The place is lovely with a great ambience and very comfortable. Great neighborhood, walkable to good eateries and to shopping.
Alizeh is so responsive to messaging it makes planning a breeze. Would definitely stay again!

Excellent condo, great location and awesome host. Alizeh was very responsive and super helpful when we had to make adjustments to our plans. The unit is beautiful and very quiet, didn‚Äôt hear any noise from inside or outside. Location is great, lots of bars and restaurants in walking distance.
Alizeh place is very beautiful and very clean definitely will book it again amazing host very responsive
Fabulous apartment in the heart of town. Couldn't have asked for more, Alizeh is a fantastic host. Made the trip from Scotland all the better!
would definitely come back the apartment was beautiful and so was the view the location was super nice too and close to starbucks and other food places!

This Airbnb is on my short list for Calgary visits. I love the neighbourhood - close to scenic park, a variety of delicious dining, and wonderful view from the room. The decorating was also gorgeous and ammenaties was exactly what I needed. Not to mention clean space, and a kind and responsive host.

It was a wonderful experience staying in this apartment. The apartment is cozy and functional for staying a few days or longer, with a convenient location and everything just like in the photos!
Many thanks to the host for the quick responses to messages and for the help with arrival and some questions!

This place really is a gem! üíé I love to stay places that are unique with thoughtful decor, and every detail was thought through! It‚Äôs honestly stunning! I took notes for styling my own home üôà The location was perfect with lots of walkable restaurants. The host is also very kind and responsive! I really enjoyed my stay! 10/10 would definitely recommend this place to my friends and family üñ§

I had an incredible stay at Alizeh‚Äôs place! From start to finish, everything exceeded my expectations. The property was spotless, beautifully decorated, and equipped with all the amenities I could possibly need. Alizeh was incredibly responsive and went above and beyond to ensure I had a comfortable and enjoyable experience. I truly felt at home and can‚Äôt recommend this place enough. Looking forward to staying here again in the future!
Fabulous location, spectacular host, lovely and comfortable apartment, easy access, great amenities, lovely view, close to bars and restaurants and grocery, safe

Great place in downtown Calgary, easy access and parking. Alizeh is super responsive, very good experience.
We will be back!
This place was great, had everything I looked for both inside the unit and out in the neighborhood.
We had a really great stay at Alizehs place. She is a super nice host that made sure our stay was super comfortable and peaceful. The space is so clean and the aestheticly pleasing. Thank you Alizeh.

Alizeh‚Äôs was really nice and it was in a good location. Her place was clean and beautiful, looked exactly like the photos. She was very responsive and explained the check in instructions really. Would stay at her place again! :)

description_html:
Welcome Home!

This Luxe Condo located in a prime central downtown location with spacious and stylish living.

Welcome to your luxury stay at the heart of Calgary! This stunning apartment, located on the 12th floor, offers a unique experience of comfort and sophistication. With breathtaking views of the city, this apartment is designed for those who seek the best in urban living without sacrificing a peaceful and cozy atmosphere.

The space
Perfect for diverse groups of travellers, including; business, couples, families, friends and even solo travellers looking for extra space.

With walking distance to C-Train, 17th Ave, Stephen Ave, coffee shops & a variety of notable trendy restaurants, this location is in a prime location for you to explore the city with ease and comfort!

This is also a prime location for travellers visiting for Calgary Stampede - with Stampede Grounds being a short walk away!

Notable Features:
-Private balcony with city views
-Queen Bed & Double Bed Pull Out
-Fresh bedding & linens
-1 fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries
-65" Smart TV
-Bright living room w/ large sofa, coffee table & accent chair
-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities
-High-speed WiFi
-Free parking spot in the buildings parkade (see note below)
-Complimentary coffee and coffee machine

Guest access
Full access to private Condo & private balcony

Other things to note
PLEASE NOTE HOUSE RULES :
1. No parties or events allowed. No unregistered guests allowed.

2. No smoking allowed. Any remnants or smell left behind will result in a $500 fine charged to your Airbnb account.

3. No pets allowed.

4. Please respect noise levels and noise curfew. 10PM on weekends and 9PM on weekdays.

5. Please take care of your fob keys. Lost Keys incur a replacement cost.

6. Please take care of the space. You must pay the appropriate cost for any damages or theft caused on the property.

7. No illegal substances allowed on the premises. You will be asked to leave with no refund.
