description_html:
Discover the luxury of our 2-bedroom condominium in the heart of downtown Calgary, offering mesmerizing views of the city skyline.

Situated within close proximity to the financial district and the famous 17th Street, known for its excellent dining options and charming outdoor seating.

This unit is elegantly furnished, fully equipped, and ideally suited for both business travelers and those seeking a city escape with their loved ones.

Walk Score - 96
Free Underground Heated Parking Included

The space
THE CONDO:

1) Entrance from Main Building Access
2) Large Open Plan Living and Dining Room
3) Queen Room 1 - Cosy Bed - Closet - Standing Mirror
4) Double Room 2 - Cosy Bed - Closet - Mirror
5) Private Fully Equipped Kitchen
6) Full Bathroom with Shower and Toilet
7) Stunning Skyline Views


INVENTORY:

The condo comes equipped with;

1) A Large 65" Smart TV, Dining Table, Dining Chairs, Sofas, Coffee Table
2) Kettle, Electric Stove, Oven, Fridge, Freezer, Cooking Utensils, Cutlery, Plates, Glasses, Knives, Forks, Spoons, Bowls
3) Vacuum Cleaner/ Mop and other Cleaning Products
4) Essentials; Bed Linen, Towels, Iron and Hair Dryer
5) Furniture: Queen bed and Double Bed, Closet x 2, Dining Table x 1 (4 Chairs)
6) Washing Machine and Dryer
7) Central Heating

Guest access
As a guest in this 2-bedroom modern condo, you will have access to a luxurious living area that promises comfort and relaxation. The living area features a Large Smart TV, allowing you to unwind and enjoy your favorite shows and movies.

Within the Condo, you will find two warm and cozy bedrooms with luxurious beds and ample storage.

The bathroom is beautifully designed and well-equipped, offering a tranquil space to refresh and rejuvenate.

The apartment also features a modern kitchen, where you can indulge your culinary desires. The kitchen is equipped with all the necessary amenities and appliances, making it easy for you to prepare your meals and enjoy some home-cooked delicacies during your stay.

name: Rental unit in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.81 ¬∑ 2 bedrooms ¬∑ 3 beds ¬∑ 2 baths
description: Enjoy the fantastic views of the city from the floor to ceiling windows in our downtown condo! This 2-bedroom condo is large enough to host 6 guests at at time, since we have a pull out sofa bed in the living room!  The condo features an open concept design, fully equipped kitchen (with a dishwasher), in suite laundry machines, a private balcony patio, high speed internet access and available secure on site parking. We're walking distance from Stampede Park; in the Beltline neighbourhood.The spaceCity views, cozy vibes, and a killer location‚Äîthis modern 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo in Calgary‚Äôs Beltline neighbourhood puts you right in the heart of the action. Steps from tennis courts, green spaces, and Stampede Park, you‚Äôll be staying in the city‚Äôs vibrant Design District, just a short walk from downtown.For everyone‚Äôs comfort and in accordance with local regulations, we use a smart noise monitoring system (NoiseAware) that tracks decibel levels ‚Äî not conversations ‚Äî to ensure respectful noise levels are maintained. Whether you're here for business or exploring Calgary‚Äôs best, this bright and airy suite has everything you need for a comfortable and stylish stay.Chill, dine & unwind:‚Ä¢ Private balcony with outdoor dining (table + 2 chairs)‚Ä¢ East-facing views of downtown Calgary‚Ä¢ Open-concept living space with floor-to-ceiling windows & laminate floors‚Ä¢ Living room with 55" Smart TV & full-size pull-out sofa‚Ä¢ Fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances & granite countertops‚Ä¢ Dedicated dining area (seating for 4)Rest easy in style:‚Ä¢ Bedroom 1: King bed + 43" Smart TV + private ensuite bathroom‚Ä¢ Bedroom 2: Queen bed + direct patio access‚Ä¢ 2 full bathrooms (including 1 ensuite)‚Ä¢ In-suite laundry for your convenience‚Ä¢ Central air conditioning + high-speed Wi-Fi throughoutParking & perks:‚Ä¢ On-site parking is available for one vehicle ‚Ä¢ Modern building in a prime walkable location‚Ä¢ Steps from parks, public transit, and local cafesGuest access‚Ä¢ You will have exclusive use of this apartment. ‚Ä¢ There is dedicated parking in the secure, underground parking garage for one vehicle at a cost of $20.00/night. ‚Ä¢ There's also paid street parking nearby. ‚Ä¢ The building is wheelchair accessible with a ramp at the entrance and an elevator to take you to your floor.Other things to note**Important Notice**KEY PICK-UP:‚Ä¢ Please note that keys for the unit must be picked up at an alternate KeyNest location before 10:00 PM.‚Ä¢ To help ensure a safe and trusted experience for all guests, ID verification may be required after booking.‚Ä¢ The COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All confirmed bookings indicate guest agreement to adhere to the property's residential bylaws and community standards.‚Ä¢ Please note that we are not responsible for any unreceived parcel delivery or shipping orders. We encourage guests to avoid placing online orders during their stay as shipping times can vary. Even when the expected delivery date is within your stay, we do not recommend placing orders that must be shipped to your vacation rental property.‚Ä¢ We offer on-site, underground parking for one vehicle at $20 per night. Please inquire for further details about obtaining a parking pass. You will need to park your vehicle temporarily outside the building upon arrival while you go up to the unit to collect the garage fob. Please obey all street signs.Registration DetailsBL266123
reviews: Great location, clean and well stocked apartment. Literally the only negative was a broken soap dispenser and the pullout bed is uncomfortable, but overall a great place to stay.

The dish washer was broken, and a limited supply of dish soap. You have to be careful if you parking in this building. Firstly, the parking instructions were not clear. description_html:
Enjoy the fantastic views of the city from the floor to ceiling windows in our downtown condo! This 2-bedroom condo is large enough to host 6 guests at at time, since we have a pull out sofa bed in the living room! The condo features an open concept design, fully equipped kitchen (with a dishwasher), in suite laundry machines, a private balcony patio, high speed internet access and available secure on site parking. We're walking distance from Stampede Park; in the Beltline neighbourhood.

The space
City views, cozy vibes, and a killer location—this modern 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo in Calgary’s Beltline neighbourhood puts you right in the heart of the action. Steps from tennis courts, green spaces, and Stampede Park, you’ll be staying in the city’s vibrant Design District, just a short walk from downtown.

For everyone’s comfort and in accordance with local regulations, we use a smart noise monitoring system (NoiseAware) that tracks decibel levels — not conversations — to ensure respectful noise levels are maintained.

Whether you're here for business or exploring Calgary’s best, this bright and airy suite has everything you need for a comfortable and stylish stay.

Chill, dine & unwind:
• Private balcony with outdoor dining (table + 2 chairs)
• East-facing views of downtown Calgary
• Open-concept living space with floor-to-ceiling windows & laminate floors
• Living room with 55" Smart TV & full-size pull-out sofa
• Fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances & granite countertops
• Dedicated dining area (seating for 4)

Rest easy in style:
• Bedroom 1: King bed + 43" Smart TV + private ensuite bathroom
• Bedroom 2: Queen bed + direct patio access
• 2 full bathrooms (including 1 ensuite)
• In-suite laundry for your convenience
• Central air conditioning + high-speed Wi-Fi throughout

Parking & perks:
• On-site parking is available for one vehicle
• Modern building in a prime walkable location
• Steps from parks, public transit, and local cafes

Guest access
• You will have exclusive use of this apartment.
• There is dedicated parking in the secure, underground parking garage for one vehicle at a cost of $20.00/night.
• There's also paid street parking nearby.
• The building is wheelchair accessible with a ramp at the entrance and an elevator to take you to your floor.

Other things to note
**Important Notice**

KEY PICK-UP:
• Please note that keys for the unit must be picked up at an alternate KeyNest location before 10:00 PM.

• To help ensure a safe and trusted experience for all guests, ID verification may be required after booking.

• The COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All confirmed bookings indicate guest agreement to adhere to the property's residential bylaws and community standards.

• Please note that we are not responsible for any unreceived parcel delivery or shipping orders. We encourage guests to avoid placing online orders during their stay as shipping times can vary. Even when the expected delivery date is within your stay, we do not recommend placing orders that must be shipped to your vacation rental property.

• We offer on-site, underground parking for one vehicle at $20 per night. Please inquire for further details about obtaining a parking pass. You will need to park your vehicle temporarily outside the building upon arrival while you go up to the unit to collect the garage fob. Please obey all street signs.

Check out fortunately
was easy! This apartment did just the job for a one night pre-airport stay with my boyfriend and mom, but I may not have chosen to stay longer. This would be a great place for a small bachelor(ette) trip or the like!

name: Rental unit in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.85 ¬∑ 2 bedrooms ¬∑ 3 beds ¬∑ 1 bath
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base.This delightful two-bedroom condo is located in the best location, offering large windows, with sun filled early afternoons, city skyline and beautiful mountain views.You‚Äôll enjoy being within close proximity to; restaurants, shops, gyms, cafes, downtown core, convention centres, Saddeldome, 17th Avenue, mission, grocery stores and more.The spaceWalking into the suite you'll find an open living space with large windows. The condo has two bedrooms, a bathroom, living room, a kitchen, and laundry space. The kitchen has a dining table with seating for four, as well as all the essentials; (coffee, pots, pans, oil, salt/pepper). The kitchen and dining space flow nicely into the living area. This open floor plan makes it easy to cook, eat, relax, entertain and feel connected to the people you're traveling with. In the living room, you're able to log into your own accounts using the smart TV and will find cuddling up on the couch quite comfortable. The couch can be used as an additional sleeping space, and it folds out into a sofa bed, should you wish to travel in a larger group. In the bathroom, you'll find towels, shampoo/conditioner, soap, a hair dryer, and a combo bath/shower. The primary bedroom offers a queen-sized bed, lamp, shelf, and closet. It also boasts large windows which brighten up the space.  The sliding fogged doors can be closed or completely opened up to allow you to watch TV from bed.  The second bedroom offers a double bed for comfortable sleep.The space is great for those traveling or anyone living in Calgary and looking for a date night. Instead of rushing home and having to come back downtown, pack a bag and get ready in the suite. You'll be able to walk to popular favorites such as 10 Foot Henry (1 min walk), The Allium (2 min walk), Native Tongues Taqueria (3 min walk), Two Penny (1 min walk) or the Saddledome (13 min walk).  The best part?! You'll be able to skip the pricey cab ride and sleep in the next morning! Leaving you feeling refreshed. Use that extra time (and energy) to hit a fitness class (Hot Shop Yoga is just across the street!) or head to brunch to catch up with a friend.Guest accessGuests have access to the whole suite, designated parking stall and the shared building amenities, including a shared rooftop patio.Other things to noteIn-person check-in is required.Registration DetailsBL287248
reviews: Had a great stay in this apartment clean and tidy just looks like the pictures got everything you need ie kitchen/living space etc..host is very responsive and very helpful with any questions you may have..check in is very easy as well..the apartment has restaurants/bars/coffee shops just mins away which is great plus downtown/calgary tower is about 10 mins away.

Beth's place was walkable from Calgary Tower and other historical locations.
We used the kitchen most of the time and it was stocked with rice cooker, pans, mugs, paper towel, dish soaps & etc.
We were able to use the wash & dry before our flight back home.
It was a good location & very convenient.
Will definitely book again.

Nice place, not far from downtown and also from other restaurant/social areas on 17th. Well equipped and comfortable - was just right for our needs.
If you are light sensitive, bring an eye mask as one of the bedrooms looks out over the city - quite light in the mornings. Other bedroom at the back.
Very good communication and responsiveness - thanks Beth!
Ian

We had a great stay at this apartment. The location is perfect - right in the heart of downtown, close to everything. The apartment itself is modern, clean and very comfortable, exactly as described. Communication with the host was easy and clear, and check-in and check-out went smoothly. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting the city!

The location of our accommodation was convenient. Lots of cafes and restaurants around. Beth was really easy to talk to. She replies right away. The apartment had everything we need. Would definitely book here again if we need a place to stay in Calgary!

The apartment was just like the photos, clean, comfortable, and right in the heart of the city, close to everything. Beth was always very friendly and responsive, and Ali, who helped us when we arrived, was also extremely helpful. It was a wonderful stay ‚Äî we‚Äôll definitely be back!

We really enjoyed our stay here! The Airbnb is in a central location, very walkable area and lots of amazing restaurants. Easy parking, and host was very responsible and accommodating. Would absolutely recommend staying here!
We had a wonderful stay! The place was clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The host was very responsive and made check-in easy. Would definitely recommend and stay again!

Airbnb was a great location in town, super walkable for everything. You need a fob for everything which was a little tricky with 5 people traveling together and the shower drain was backed up but other than that the space was clean and everything else was easy enough.

One of the best service i ever had. She was clear with her instructions which made it pretty easy for us to find the place anf navigate throught everything .I will definitely recommend my friends .The view from the apartment was breath taking and worth every penny i spent

Had a great quick getaway with friends! The BnB was clean, cozy, and had a nice view. We loved how it was in a walkable area‚Äîlots of spots to eat nearby and an easy walk downtown for anything we needed. Would definitely stay again!
We had a great stay at this spot! Beth was so responsive and helpful!! Would for sure recommend!
In downtown, so near everywhere we need to go. Great local places near me and the apartment had a lot of kitchen appliances so you can easily cook, if you choose.
Awesome view of Calgary! Great neighborhood with restaurants, quick places to eat, and green spaces. Close enough to explore downtown Calgary.

We had a great stay at this condo! It was within walking distance to all our amenities and to the conference we were attending. The building and unit all felt clean, safe and secure. Incredible views! the AC wasn't working but we were able to keep cool with the multiple fans provided. Host was easy to work with. Would stay here again!

A great stay in downtown Calgary , great apartment well stocked and looked after . Beth was a great host very responsive always helpful , 2 parking spaces .
Close to bars and restaurants, loved the 1st market over the road , bars and restaurants, Calgary tower , bankers hall , supermarkets all in walking distance even in the cold , thanks to Beth and team for a great stay, definitely use you again , John

We had an absolutely fantastic stay! It was the perfect downtown spot, surrounded by incredible restaurants, we were spoiled for choice. The apartment was spotless, and they'd thought of everything. We didn't have to hunt for anything because everything was labeled and organized perfectly. Plus, the flexible check-in was a huge bonus. Honestly, we couldn't have asked for more. Highly recommend this place!
The location and the apartment was better than expected. It was conveniently located and close to a lot of shops & restaurants. I had a wonderful stay.
Such a great location! Apartment was clean and very responsive host. Only negative is that the ‚Äúsecond bedroom‚Äù doesn‚Äôt have a window so feels more like a closet. Will stay again.

Fantastic location with lots of restaurants within 5min of walk. The neighborhood is quiet, very walkable and feels safe. The unit is super clean and looks just like the pictures. Definitely recommend this place when visiting downtown Calgary.
The place was clean and the host was responsive! There were a few minor damages from a previous guest, but the host told us with lots of notice! Would definitely stay there again.

This apartment was perfect for a business trip to Calgary, with everything close!
Very helpful hosts, and lots of great restaurants around.
Would totally recommend staying here.

Would definitely stay here again. So much to do right next to the home and even more just a slight walk away. The apartment was super cozy to come back to and the view was very nice as well:)) 100% recommend
My stay was brilliant! The place was clean, the host was communicative throughout, and the kitchen had everything I could possibly need for my stay. I would definitely recommend Beth and her team!

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: The condo is located in the Beltline district, which is one of the most accessible districts in Calgary. Some of the best bars and restaurants are literally across the street (One of the best cocktail bars in town is in the building!). Close to the saddledome, minutes to downtown and the Red Mile (17th Ave), and a stone's throw from the river walks, parks, library, museums, and shopping.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Most hot spots are an easy couple of minutes of walking away. 7th Ave free transit zone is about 6 blocks away (10 minutes walking).

description_html:
Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base.

This delightful two-bedroom condo is located in the best location, offering large windows, with sun filled early afternoons, city skyline and beautiful mountain views.

You’ll enjoy being within close proximity to; restaurants, shops, gyms, cafes, downtown core, convention centres, Saddeldome, 17th Avenue, mission, grocery stores and more.

The space
Walking into the suite you'll find an open living space with large windows. The condo has two bedrooms, a bathroom, living room, a kitchen, and laundry space.

The kitchen has a dining table with seating for four, as well as all the essentials; (coffee, pots, pans, oil, salt/pepper). The kitchen and dining space flow nicely into the living area. This open floor plan makes it easy to cook, eat, relax, entertain and feel connected to the people you're traveling with.

In the living room, you're able to log into your own accounts using the smart TV and will find cuddling up on the couch quite comfortable. The couch can be used as an additional sleeping space, and it folds out into a sofa bed, should you wish to travel in a larger group.

In the bathroom, you'll find towels, shampoo/conditioner, soap, a hair dryer, and a combo bath/shower.

The primary bedroom offers a queen-sized bed, lamp, shelf, and closet. It also boasts large windows which brighten up the space. The sliding fogged doors can be closed or completely opened up to allow you to watch TV from bed.

The second bedroom offers a double bed for comfortable sleep.

The space is great for those traveling or anyone living in Calgary and looking for a date night. Instead of rushing home and having to come back downtown, pack a bag and get ready in the suite. You'll be able to walk to popular favorites such as 10 Foot Henry (1 min walk), The Allium (2 min walk), Native Tongues Taqueria (3 min walk), Two Penny (1 min walk) or the Saddledome (13 min walk). The best part?! You'll be able to skip the pricey cab ride and sleep in the next morning! Leaving you feeling refreshed. Use that extra time (and energy) to hit a fitness class (Hot Shop Yoga is just across the street!) or head to brunch to catch up with a friend.

Guest access
Guests have access to the whole suite, designated parking stall and the shared building amenities, including a shared rooftop patio.

Other things to note
In-person check-in is required.

Registration Details
BL287248
location_details_html: The condo is located in the Beltline district, which is one of the most accessible districts in Calgary. Some of the best bars and restaurants are literally across the street (One of the best cocktail bars in town is in the building!). Close to the saddledome, minutes to downtown and the Red Mile (17th Ave), and a stone's throw from the river walks, parks, library, museums, and shopping.

reviews_details.review: Had a great stay in this apartment clean and tidy just looks like the pictures got everything you need ie kitchen/living space etc..host is very responsive and very helpful with any questions you may have..check in is very easy as well..the apartment has restaurants/bars/coffee shops just mins away which is great plus downtown/calgary tower is about 10 mins away.

Beth's place was walkable from Calgary Tower and other historical locations.
We used the kitchen most of the time and it was stocked with rice cooker, pans, mugs, paper towel, dish soaps & etc.
We were able to use the wash & dry before our flight back home.
It was a good location & very convenient.
Will definitely book again.

Nice place, not far from downtown and also from other restaurant/social areas on 17th. Well equipped and comfortable - was just right for our needs.
If you are light sensitive, bring an eye mask as one of the bedrooms looks out over the city - quite light in the mornings. Other bedroom at the back.
Very good communication and responsiveness - thanks Beth!
Ian

We had a great stay at this apartment. The location is perfect - right in the heart of downtown, close to everything. The apartment itself is modern, clean and very comfortable, exactly as described. Communication with the host was easy and clear, and check-in and check-out went smoothly. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting the city!

The location of our accommodation was convenient. Lots of cafes and restaurants around. Beth was really easy to talk to. She replies right away. The apartment had everything we need. Would definitely book here again if we need a place to stay in Calgary!

The apartment was just like the photos, clean, comfortable, and right in the heart of the city, close to everything. Beth was always very friendly and responsive, and Ali, who helped us when we arrived, was also extremely helpful. It was a wonderful stay ‚Äî we‚Äôll definitely be back!

We really enjoyed our stay here! The Airbnb is in a central location, very walkable area and lots of amazing restaurants. Easy parking, and host was very responsible and accommodating. Would absolutely recommend staying here!
We had a wonderful stay! The place was clean, cozy, and exactly as described. The host was very responsive and made check-in easy. Would definitely recommend and stay again!

Airbnb was a great location in town, super walkable for everything. You need a fob for everything which was a little tricky with 5 people traveling together and the shower drain was backed up but other than that the space was clean and everything else was easy enough.

One of the best service i ever had. She was clear with her instructions which made it pretty easy for us to find the place anf navigate throught everything .I will definitely recommend my friends .The view from the apartment was breath taking and worth every penny i spent

Had a great quick getaway with friends! The BnB was clean, cozy, and had a nice view. We loved how it was in a walkable area‚Äîlots of spots to eat nearby and an easy walk downtown for anything we needed. Would definitely stay again!
We had a great stay at this spot! Beth was so responsive and helpful!! Would for sure recommend!
In downtown, so near everywhere we need to go. Great local places near me and the apartment had a lot of kitchen appliances so you can easily cook, if you choose.
Awesome view of Calgary! Great neighborhood with restaurants, quick places to eat, and green spaces. Close enough to explore downtown Calgary.

We had a great stay at this condo! It was within walking distance to all our amenities and to the conference we were attending. The building and unit all felt clean, safe and secure. Incredible views! the AC wasn't working but we were able to keep cool with the multiple fans provided. Host was easy to work with. Would stay here again!

A great stay in downtown Calgary , great apartment well stocked and looked after . Beth was a great host very responsive always helpful , 2 parking spaces .
Close to bars and restaurants, loved the 1st market over the road , bars and restaurants, Calgary tower , bankers hall , supermarkets all in walking distance even in the cold , thanks to Beth and team for a great stay, definitely use you again , John

We had an absolutely fantastic stay! It was the perfect downtown spot, surrounded by incredible restaurants, we were spoiled for choice. The apartment was spotless, and they'd thought of everything. We didn't have to hunt for anything because everything was labeled and organized perfectly. Plus, the flexible check-in was a huge bonus. Honestly, we couldn't have asked for more. Highly recommend this place!
The location and the apartment was better than expected. It was conveniently located and close to a lot of shops & restaurants. I had a wonderful stay.
Such a great location! Apartment was clean and very responsive host. Only negative is that the ‚Äúsecond bedroom‚Äù doesn‚Äôt have a window so feels more like a closet. Will stay again.

Fantastic location with lots of restaurants within 5min of walk. The neighborhood is quiet, very walkable and feels safe. The unit is super clean and looks just like the pictures. Definitely recommend this place when visiting downtown Calgary.
The place was clean and the host was responsive! There were a few minor damages from a previous guest, but the host told us with lots of notice! Would definitely stay there again.

This apartment was perfect for a business trip to Calgary, with everything close!
Very helpful hosts, and lots of great restaurants around.
Would totally recommend staying here.

Would definitely stay here again. So much to do right next to the home and even more just a slight walk away. The apartment was super cozy to come back to and the view was very nice as well:)) 100% recommend
My stay was brilliant! The place was clean, the host was communicative throughout, and the kitchen had everything I could possibly need for my stay. I would definitely recommend Beth and her team!

description_html:
Heart of Downtown Calgary | High Rise Panoramic Views | POOL + GYM | FREE Underground Parking & FAST WIFI

★Limited Time Weekly and Monthly Discounts Available★

Experience luxury and breathtaking views at our luxe retreat in downtown Calgary.

The space
This spacious 2 bedroom suite can accommodate 1-6 guests comfortably with the added benefit of an extra cozy sofa bed in the living room.

Walk to the Bow River, Calgary Tower, Stampede grounds, Stephen Ave, 17 Ave, top restaurants and more!

FLOOR TO CEILING windows with incredible Calgary Tower VIEWS

Includes:

- Two bedrooms (both queen beds)
- Sofa bed in living room
- Two full bathrooms with tub shower combo
- Fully stocked kitchen; with coffee maker, toaster, pots, pans etc.
- Shared gym in the building
- Large private patio and shared rooftop patio
- Shared pool (seasonal) (Currently Open)

Go out for incredible downtown cuisine or dine in with Netflix in our fully stocked kitchen. Soak up the sun in the outdoor pool or enjoy views with friends and family in this peaceful and private space. Book now for an unforgettable stay!

Guest access
In the summer guests can enjoy access to the outdoor rooftop pool.

The pool is currently CLOSED until Summer of 2026.

Guests will also have access to one dedicated underground parking stall.

Other things to note
Pets:
No pets are allowed on the property. A violation of this rule will result in a fine of $500.

Smoking and Illicit Substances:
Smoking and the use of any illicit substances are strictly prohibited in the building and the unit. Violation will result in a minimum fine of $500.

Parties/Events:
Parties or events are not allowed on the property. Violation will result in a $2000 fine and immediate eviction.

Keyfob Replacement:
If the keyfob is lost or stolen, a $300 replacement fee will be charged.

Deep Cleaning Fee:
Our standard cleaning checklist includes disposing of your trash, washing your dishes, and clearing the fridge of any items you may have placed in there during your stay. We kindly ask guests to this maintain this standard and the property in the clean condition it was found in. Failure to follow will result in a $150 deep cleaning fee.

Late Check-Out Fee (After 10 AM):
A flat fee of $100 will be charged for late check-out.

Registration Details
BL278037

description: Welcome to our stunning downtown Calgary corner unit condo! This modern retreat offers you the perfect combination of convenience, luxury, and breathtaking views.As you step inside, you'll immediately be captivated by the floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase the stunning city skyline and majestic mountain vistas. Please be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location.*** POOL is closed for the winter.The spaceOur condo boasts all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. The air conditioning ensures that you stay cool during the warmer months, while the cozy king bed promises a restful night's sleep. You'll also have the convenience of underground parking, so you can explore the city without worrying about parking hassles.Additionally, the surrounding area is a haven for food enthusiasts, with an array of fantastic restaurants, bars, and shops within easy walking distance. Immerse yourself in the vibrant nightlife Calgary is renowned for, knowing that a comfortable retreat awaits you at the end of the night.Notable Features:-Balcony with spectacular skyline view-Dedicated work station-Dining Table (4 seats)-Fresh beddings & linens-Fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)-Bright living room w/ sofa-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities-High-speed WiFi-Free underground parking-Hairdryer-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machineID Verification Required for our property.All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.Guest accessYou will have entire private access to the condoFor patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.*** POOL is closed for the winter.Other things to notePlease be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you are arriving later than this, do not proceed with the booking or inquire about late check in (40$ Fee)Registration DetailsBL285708
reviews:
I enjoyed my stay here. Clean linens and equipment.
Excellent and clear directives.
The building is in quite a strategic location which enables you have an excellent view of downtown.
It‚Äôs smaller than I expected but overall it‚Äôs cozy.
I look forward to spending time here if have to visit Calgary again

We absolutely loved staying in this apartment.  We had everything we needed, the apartment itself was immaculate and in a great location.  We loved the views of the city and sitting out on the balcony. We probably spent more time in the apartment than we usually would just because we loved being in there so much. Everything went very smoothly and we wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to stay there again.

I had a wonderful stay at this beautiful home! It was spotless, comfortable, and had everything I needed for my visit. Kyle & Andrew were amazing hosts. friendly, responsive, and thoughtful throughout my stay. The location was great and made my time in Calgary even better. Everything was perfect, and I would definitely stay here again. Highly recommend this beautiful home!

Our stay was absolutely excellent! Communication with the hosts was very quick and clear from the start ‚Äî the check-in and check-out instructions were easy to follow. One time, we accidentally left one of our keys inside the apartment, and they responded immediately, helping us right away. We also forgot an item at check-out, and they kindly returned it to us in perfect condition with no extra charge. Everything was handled so well! Highly recommend this place.
My second stay in Calgary. This apartment was better than the previous I had.  It is situated far better in a more cozy area compared to SE Calgary.   Would rent this place again.

This is the second time staying at this location, very walkable and accesible, central to many restaurants. It was a bit noisy due to the stampede tent but that will not be a problem until next year. The hosts are great and understanding even after I lost the key-fobs, obviously I needed to pay the replacements. I like the alternative option of calling someone to give access to the condo. description_html:
Welcome to our stunning downtown Calgary corner unit condo! This modern retreat offers you the perfect combination of convenience, luxury, and breathtaking views.

As you step inside, you'll immediately be captivated by the floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase the stunning city skyline and majestic mountain vistas.

Please be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location.


*** POOL is closed for the winter.

The space
Our condo boasts all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. The air conditioning ensures that you stay cool during the warmer months, while the cozy king bed promises a restful night's sleep. You'll also have the convenience of underground parking, so you can explore the city without worrying about parking hassles.

Additionally, the surrounding area is a haven for food enthusiasts, with an array of fantastic restaurants, bars, and shops within easy walking distance. Immerse yourself in the vibrant nightlife Calgary is renowned for, knowing that a comfortable retreat awaits you at the end of the night.

Notable Features:
-Balcony with spectacular skyline view
-Dedicated work station
-Dining Table (4 seats)
-Fresh beddings & linens
-Fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries
-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)
-Bright living room w/ sofa
-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities
-High-speed WiFi
-Free underground parking
-Hairdryer
-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machine

ID Verification Required for our property.

All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.

Guest access
You will have entire private access to the condo

For patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.

*** POOL is closed for the winter.

Other things to note
Please be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you are arriving later than this, do not proceed with the booking or inquire about late check in (40$ Fee)

We're always more than willing to resolve problems promptly when given the opportunity to do so, and we truly value open communication with our guests.

reviews:
Very well located near 17ave, great value for money. Place was exactly as advertised. A bit older but functional. Murray was responsive if anything was missing .
Supplies (kitchen , bathroom) are bare minimum, just enough for 4 people, might wanna ask for extra.
Great stay- perfect location for stampede
Good!

It was an amazing stay ! It is 2 blocks away from red mile that has a variety of options. Restaurants and cute shops . Murray is an amazing host ! I saw him painting the fence while we were there , he was pleasant and friendly . The place is beautiful! ü§© the doors are glass and super cool ! I will be back , thanks again Murray . See you soon

This is a fantastic apartment! It's stylish, comfortable and in an absolutely amazing location. Almost every possible amenity is within walking distance and the dining options are out of this world. Tacos... Shawarma... Burgers... Hot sandwiches... Sushi... Bubble tea... Trendy coffee spots... it's got everything near by.

Murray was an amazing host, so responsive on any issues or questions we had and the place was perfect for getting us started in Calgary. A minutes walk from 17th with loads of bars and restaurants but also very quiet in the apartment. Would recommend this apartment and Murray to anyone for their stay in Calgary!

Murray‚Äôs place was a great location and he was a communicative host when we had issues with the shower and a mixup with check-in communications. Would recommend staying for a peaceful place but the unit could use some better blinds for the bedrooms for light control in the future.

Stayed a week. Place is exactly as described. Murray was very helpful and responsive.
Location is excellent. Lots to do with restaurants and groceries close at hand.
Will stay here again when we return to Calgary.

This was a great Air BNB. 5 stars all around. Very comfortable and spacious apartment, in a very central location. Check in was easy and straightforward. I would happily stay here again in the future.
Thank you.
Great location and great unit! Absolutely loved it. Murray was super responsive and helpful with everything. Definitely would stay here again.
Great property, very easily accessible.

Is a great quiet location. Beautiful tree lined street. Close to 4th street businesses and restaurants. Walkable to 17th and Stephen ave. Suite was clean and bed was comfy. Was nice to have the balcony to sit out on and have a coffee. Had a great stay.

I had doubts at first cos I saw poor ratings on Google, but I was pleasantly surprised!
I booked a month stay with a friend and arrived during winter. The place is simple, modern and elegant! The beds, were sooo comfortable. The appartment had everything we needed to get by comfortably for a month (pots, pans, small appliances, baking utensils etc.). We just had to buy groceries. The location was also great! It was walking distance from pretty much everything (restaurants, grocery stores, Dollarama, city center, bus stops, etc.) but far away from noise and chaos.
Murray was really kind and helpful. When the weather was really bad he checked in regularly to make sure everything was okay.
To summarize, it was home away from home and the perfect place to stay till we got our appartment.
I would recommend this place in a heartbeat especially for longer stays.
This spot is great price for a great location! Nice and cozy in the winter.
Great location! Clean and nice.
Great location next to 17ave, very clean.

Tacos... Shawarma... Burgers... Hot sandwiches... Sushi... Bubble tea... Trendy coffee spots... it's got everything near by.

Murray was an amazing host, so responsive on any issues or questions we had and the place was perfect for getting us started in Calgary. A minutes walk from 17th with loads of bars and restaurants but also very quiet in the apartment. Would recommend this apartment and Murray to anyone for their stay in Calgary!

Murray‚Äôs place was a great location and he was a communicative host when we had issues with the shower and a mixup with check-in communications. Would recommend staying for a peaceful place but the unit could use some better blinds for the bedrooms for light control in the future.

Stayed a week. Place is exactly as described. Murray was very helpful and responsive.
Location is excellent. Lots to do with restaurants and groceries close at hand.
Will stay here again when we return to Calgary.

This was a great Air BNB. 5 stars all around. Very comfortable and spacious apartment, in a very central location. Check in was easy and straightforward. I would happily stay here again in the future.
Thank you.
Great location and great unit! Absolutely loved it. Murray was super responsive and helpful with everything. Definitely would stay here again.
Great property, very easily accessible.

Is a great quiet location. Beautiful tree lined street. Close to 4th street businesses and restaurants. Walkable to 17th and Stephen ave. Suite was clean and bed was comfy. Was nice to have the balcony to sit out on and have a coffee. Had a great stay.

I had doubts at first cos I saw poor ratings on Google, but I was pleasantly surprised!
I booked a month stay with a friend and arrived during winter. The place is simple, modern and elegant! The beds, were sooo comfortable. The appartment had everything we needed to get by comfortably for a month (pots, pans, small appliances, baking utensils etc.). We just had to buy groceries. The location was also great! It was walking distance from pretty much everything (restaurants, grocery stores, Dollarama, city center, bus stops, etc.) but far away from noise and chaos.
Murray was really kind and helpful. When the weather was really bad he checked in regularly to make sure everything was okay.
To summarize, it was home away from home and the perfect place to stay till we got our appartment.
I would recommend this place in a heartbeat especially for longer stays.
This spot is great price for a great location! Nice and cozy in the winter.
Great location! Clean and nice.
Great location next to 17ave, very clean.

I had a great stay at Kyle and Andrew‚Äôs modern condo! The space was clean, cozy, and well-appointed with everything I needed for a comfortable visit. description_html:
Stylish and comfortable one bedroom condo with beautiful high rise views of the downtown skyline.

This condo is located in the heart of the Beltline. Walking distance to everything such as restaurants, bars, shops, grocery stores and all popular/trendy avenues. 5 minute drive to river, Stampede grounds and the Saddledome.

Please be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location.

The space
Our condo boasts all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. The air conditioning ensures that you stay cool during the warmer months, while the cozy queen bed promises a restful night's sleep. You'll also have the convenience of underground parking, so you can explore the city without worrying about parking hassles.


Notable Features:
-Balcony with downtown skyline view
-Queen bed
-Dedicated work station
-Dining Table (4 seats)
-Fresh beddings & linens
-Fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries
-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)
-Bright living room w/ sofa
-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities
-High-speed WiFi
-Free underground parking
-Hairdryer
-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machine

ID Verification Required for our property.

All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.

Guest access
You will have entire private access to the condo

For patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.

*** POOL is closed for the winter.

reviews: The unit is perfectly clean and stylish. The host is very caring to provide us with tea and coffee. The kitchen is well-equipped with classy cooking utensils. It was easy for us to transform the couch into a comfy bed. The location is brilliant and has a vibrant community. The instructions to the garage room could be clearer.

We were a group of five and really enjoyed our stay. The apartment was clean, comfortable, and in a great location. It has two bedrooms: one is pretty big, while the other is smaller and windowless. It matches the photos, but we didn‚Äôt pay close attention to that detail when booking. Overall, we had a great experience and would happily stay here again.

Excellent stay! Brandy communicated well and was very receptive to our feedback (2 fobs would be convenient if even possible).
Very fun area, lots of activity and easy walk to Prince‚Äôs island.

Brandy‚Äôs place was located in the city and walkable to a lot of restaurants. We were a party of 5 and unfortunately the sofa bed was broken when we arrived. She was very reasonable and accommodated us for the mishap. One thing to note was that the other room behind the washer and dryer can get really noisy if you‚Äôre running the appliances as they share a wall. If you time your washes right there should be no issues.

We had a great stay at Renboga at Colours. The location was amazing with many things to do right around the area and within walking distance. We felt very safe in the apartment and the view from the balcony was amazing. The space was very clean and spacious. We highly recommend this place to anyone who might be visiting Calgary soon and wishing to stay right downtown.

Wonderful condo. It was downtown, close to shops and restaurants and a great view from the balcony. The host was super friendly and easy to reach. Her directions were detailed which made it easy to check in

It was the perfect place for two families to stay.
We‚Äôd love to come back again for our next trip to Banff or calgary
Brandy was really helpful and always responding. We asked if there was a possibility for early check-in and she managed to do this for us. Was amazing!
Really good stay, just as described! Brandy was super responsive also! Would definitely return!
Absolutely gorgeous place easy to get in responsive host at all time and super clean
Great stay, clean and comfortable! Restaurants and nightlife nearby, walkable to Saddledome and much more!
Brandy is responsive and helpful to her guest. The place is clean, tidy and comfortable. Check in instructions are clear and easy. Highly recommended.
Great place in an excellent location! It had everything we needed, and the host was super responsive and helpful. Would definitely stay here again.
Brandy's place was very accurately described, comfortable, and offered a lot of value for the money!

I want to start off by saying that the arrival instructions were perfectly described and easy to follow. The decor of this unit is sheek and upscale, with a little twist of humor (I'll leave that as a surprise). The hostess has provided everything that you will need for your stay for a few days or two weeks (like myself). I hope that this unit is available the next few times that I travel to the area over the next several months, as I will pick this place every time.
I also want to talk about the location of this unit, it is perfectly located near the best restaurants in the area, great pubs, wine store, Asian market, and much more. The location alone will have me coming back, and the unit was perfect for my business trip. I have been a super host for over 10 years, and I don't think you will find anything in the area that will top this unit, the location, and the value. Very well done!
Great location, felt right at home, and was super clean!
Great host, enjoyed my stay. Would recommend.

Loved every minute of our stay at this location.
We will definitely be booking again for next year's Stampede
Great cozy place, awesome location. Great restaurants and coffee shops near by
Really clean and  well organized place!
Great place, excelent location and super friendly host.

Walking distance to restaurants, bars, shops, amenities, Saddledome, and the Calgary stampede.The space‚Ä¢Independent entrance‚Ä¢Free street parking around house‚Ä¢Neflix, Crave & Disney+ on 50‚Äù TV‚Ä¢5 minutes walking distance to LaundromatOther things to noteA violation of the House Rules can lead to a fine and an immediate removal of all guests without refund, please read the House Rules carefully.Registration DetailsBL287081
reviews: We stayed for one week and really enjoyed our time here. The host was very responsive, available and attentive, always replying quickly and even coming by promptly when needed ‚Äî it made everything easy and stress-free. The place is comfortable, just keep in mind it‚Äôs a basement unit, so there‚Äôs limited natural light and you might hear some noise from upstairs, but overall it‚Äôs a cozy and convenient stay.

Very walkable area, super close to stampede grounds. Place is 15minutes from downtown, 15minutes from the grounds. Entrance to suite is a bit sketchy. Understand it is a basement suite and you will hear footsteps from the floor above. Overall loved the space for what it was.
Awesome, awesome area. Walk to the river on one side and a lively 17th ave on the other! The house in in a quiet block and the surroundings are very lively and interesting.

Joseph was an excellent host! Extremely responsive and had lots of great recommendations in the area. The location was perfect - right by 17th Ave and the suite had everything we needed for our stay in Calgary. I would definitely stay here again!

It was the best location very close to 17th Ave and lots to do around. It was clean and exactly how it was described. Joseph was always very quick response and also recommended places to go around. It‚Äôs also walking distance to Stephan‚Äôs Ave. would definitely stay here again!!!!
Great location. The basement is super quiet and private. Joseph was very communicative. Thanks üôè

I don‚Äôt tend to get wordy with my reviews, I‚Äôm very much a ‚Äúgreat place, would stay again‚Äù kind of guy.
We rented this suite as my wife was coming out the hospital and we really just needed a well equipped, safe and clean little area to decompress.
Not only did the suite and amenities exceed our needs and expectations, our host suggested amazing local dining options that were equally 10 out of 10 options.
Beautiful little suite. Quiet and peaceful space that quite frankly works great if you work remotely.
My only tip for future renters: listen to the host‚Äôs restaurant recommendations closely; you won‚Äôt be disappointed.
Joseph's place was perfect and cozy! He was also an incredible host, always responsive and helpful! üòÄ
clean & cute place at prime location! Joseph was very helpful and gave many good recommendations for local restaurants. Would stay here again!

The host was truly kind and did their best to take care of me.
Although I couldn‚Äôt stay long due to the noise from the air circulation, the host was so thoughtful that I would gladly visit one of their other properties in the future.

Very clean place and well maintained, properly licensed with the city of Calgary with permits on display, surface parking in the backyard is easy and included, walkable area. Host is pleasant to deal with and responsive.

The place was a nice studio style, warm upon entry. During the snow storm the walk way was shoveled. Everything inside was clean, orderly and simple for one or two people. Communications were direct, clear and concise. Would highly recommend!

reviews_details.review: We stayed for one week and really enjoyed our time here. The host was very responsive, available and attentive, always replying quickly and even coming by promptly when needed ‚Äî it made everything easy and stress-free. The place is comfortable, just keep in mind it‚Äôs a basement unit, so there‚Äôs limited natural light and you might hear some noise from upstairs, but overall it‚Äôs a cozy and convenient stay.

Very walkable area, super close to stampede grounds. Place is 15minutes from downtown, 15minutes from the grounds. Entrance to suite is a bit sketchy. Understand it is a basement suite and you will hear footsteps from the floor above. Overall loved the space for what it was.
Awesome, awesome area. Walk to the river on one side and a lively 17th ave on the other! The house in in a quiet block and the surroundings are very lively and interesting.

Joseph was an excellent host! Extremely responsive and had lots of great recommendations in the area. The location was perfect - right by 17th Ave and the suite had everything we needed for our stay in Calgary. I would definitely stay here again!

It was the best location very close to 17th Ave and lots to do around. It was clean and exactly how it was described. Joseph was always very quick response and also recommended places to go around. It‚Äôs also walking distance to Stephan‚Äôs Ave. would definitely stay here again!!!!
Great location. The basement is super quiet and private. Joseph was very communicative. Thanks üôè

I don‚Äôt tend to get wordy with my reviews, I‚Äôm very much a ‚Äúgreat place, would stay again‚Äù kind of guy.
We rented this suite as my wife was coming out the hospital and we really just needed a well equipped, safe and clean little area to decompress.
Not only did the suite and amenities exceed our needs and expectations, our host suggested amazing local dining options that were equally 10 out of 10 options.
Beautiful little suite. Quiet and peaceful space that quite frankly works great if you work remotely.
My only tip for future renters: listen to the host‚Äôs restaurant recommendations closely; you won‚Äôt be disappointed.
Joseph's place was perfect and cozy! He was also an incredible host, always responsive and helpful! üòÄ
clean & cute place at prime location! Joseph was very helpful and gave many good recommendations for local restaurants. Would stay here again!

The host was truly kind and did their best to take care of me.
Although I couldn‚Äôt stay long due to the noise from the air circulation, the host was so thoughtful that I would gladly visit one of their other properties in the future.

Very clean place and well maintained, properly licensed with the city of Calgary with permits on display, surface parking in the backyard is easy and included, walkable area. Host is pleasant to deal with and responsive.

The place was a nice studio style, warm upon entry. During the snow storm the walk way was shoveled. Everything inside was clean, orderly and simple for one or two people. Communications were direct, clear and concise. Would highly recommend!

description: This modern and bright, 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom Condo is located in the heart of Downtown Calgary and has a walk score  ranking of 96! This condo is close to 17th Ave, Stephen Ave, Core Shopping Centre, the Calgary Tower, Stampede Grounds, public transit and much more! This space includes a Private Balcony, Free Underground Parking, Panoramic Views of the Calgary Tower &Mountains, Wifi, 50in TV with Cable and Netflix, 10 ft ceilings, Brand New Furniture and Air Conditioning.Guest accessSeamless self check in:  Check yourself in with the key-pad. Please note, we cannot accommodate check-ins after 10pm MST.While staying here, guests have access to the condo gym, outdoor pool, indoor business lounge area and outdoor roof patio.The outdoor pool is only open during summer months (Mid June-Early September)Other things to noteThis place is fully cleaned and sanitized after every guest so you can book with confidence.Registration DetailsBL262325
reviews: Teresa‚Äôs condo was exactly as described. It is beautiful, clean, and comfortable with amazing views. Parking on site was an extra bonus. Shopping and restaurants were close by which made the experience even better. Teresa was very kind and I would love to stay at her place if ever in the city again.
We were really happy with the condo, exactly what we expected based on the listing. The proximity to the BMO Center and restaurants was really great since we prefer to walk when we can.

The apartment was beautiful, wonderful views across downtown Calgary from the bedroom windows and balcony, everything we wanted to visit in Calgary was in walking distance and the train line was just a 10 minute walk from the apartment for going a wee bit further out of the city.
The apartment was spotless and lovely dining area to sit and watch the skyline, with excellent cooking and laundry facilities.
The gym excellent facilities for a condo, and each time I used it I was the only one in there.
Very clear directions to the apartment and easy check in. Thanks for hosting us Teresa.

thank you so much for putting a lot of care and thought into your apartment. it was the best apartments throughout our trip in Canada :)
However, it did feel as if both the mattresses had lost their shape and form. I would suggest replacing them with firmer ones where you can sit on the side and not fall through.

We enjoyed a few days in this lovely apartment with great views of the city from its high floor and great balcony. It was super clean with a really comfy bed with great secure underground parking, we easily fit our large car in the bay. About a 10 minute easy walk to Stephen Avenue which has a great atmosphere and loads of restaurants and bars to enjoy.  Can recommend Craft Beer Market a five minute walk from the apartment, has a rooftop bar and great beers and cocktails and the Nachos are huge and Ten Foot Henry if you like sharing plates. We wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to stay in Teresa‚Äôs apartment again.
Beautiful place and location in downtown Calgary!  This was our first time visiting and the views from this condo were amazing!!!  We‚Äôd stay at Teresa‚Äôs place again if ever in Calgary!
Lovely apartment in great location in Calgary. Really convenient for restaurants and bars in the area. Would 100% recommend and would love to stay again when visiting Calgary.

Great location for easy access to downtown restaurants and entertainment Small space but sufficient for a couple or two. Nicely decorated and comfortable beds. Great views. Elevators can be busy and slow.

Great host and location. Heart of Calgary and close to many bars and eateries. Lovely view from the balcony and spacious unit with nice Keurig machine to start those early mornings.
Will recommend for anyone visiting Calgary!
Thanks again.

This 30th floor has amazing views from your kitchen and bedrooms. The balcony is amazing adding to the overall experience. Very clean and tidy with most amenities needed. If you are looking for a place with great views and a comfortable stay, this is the place.

The accommodation was great. The view was amazing. It was very clean and Teresa was a great host always got back to us promptly when we had any questions. I would definitely recommend this accommodation if your staying in Calgary

I had a great stay at this condo.
The place was clean, cozy, and matched the description perfectly. Check-in was smooth, and the host was responsive and helpful throughout my visit.
The neighborhood was quiet and conveniently located near shops and restaurants.
I‚Äôd definitely stay here again!

This was a great stay for the price and excellent, walkable location. The instructions to check in were easy to follow, and having a parking spot below was nice as well. The building is beautiful and newer. It is a 5 minute walk to Stephen Street district with tons of shopping and dining choices. The condo itself is clean and modern, with lots of windows and great views from the 30th floor. The washer and dryer worked well as did everything else. Would definitely stay here again.

Hands down the best AirBnB in this building. I've stayed in 3 other AirBnBs in this building, and Teresa's is the best. From the design to special touches to price to view. It's unbeatable!! I hope to stay there every time.
The place was a great modern space with a fantastic view over Downtown Calgary. The unit had everything we needed.

Fabulous place. Clean, comfortable and located in the heart of downtown.
Highly recommended!!
Thank you again for hosting us, looking forward to returning!!
The apartment is well located to enjoy  numerous dining opportunities. The views from the apartment are fantastic, especially at sunrise. We had an excellent stay.
Very good option for staying a couple of nights in Calgary, and Teresa was very kind and welcoming.
We loved our stay here! Amazing city views from the 30th floor, easy access to all that Calgary downtown has to offer, and well stocked comfortable space.

Had issues getting into the building. The directory at the front wasn‚Äôt working and building concierge wasn‚Äôt at the front desk. One of the elevators was out of order, which caused our ‚Äòbuzz in‚Äô to time out. Took us a total of 45 minutes to get into the suite.
Teresa was responsive, and trying to assist over text.
The place was great when we got in. Clean, well decorated, had family games and other small amenities.

Teresa's place was as pictured. They were very responsive and helpful to all of our questions before and during our stay. This condo is near the top of the building, with a balcony and beautiful view. We stayed during winter so there was no pool available, and we didn't go to the fitness center.  We basically just slept/showered here and didn't use most of the things in the condo but the beds worked well. We would stay again.

"A Perfect Christmas Getaway!"
My family and I had a wonderful time spending the Christmas holiday at Teressa‚Äôs condo! The space was spotless and exactly as described. A thoughtful touch was the dark chocolate left on the counter, which my daughter absolutely loved. The condo offered stunning views and was in a very convenient location. I highly recommend it!
Teresa goes above and beyond to make her place as comfortable as possible.  Condo was spotless and well appointed.
Awesome apartment and wonderful location. It was easy to get to everywhere in downtown. Communication was great from the host

This modern and bright, 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom Condo is located in the heart of Downtown Calgary and has a walk score ranking of 96! This condo is close to 17th Ave, Stephen Ave, Core Shopping Centre, the Calgary Tower, Stampede Grounds, public transit and much more!

Guest access
Seamless self check in: Check yourself in with the key-pad.

Please note, we cannot accommodate check-ins after 10pm MST.

While staying here, guests have access to the condo gym, outdoor pool, indoor business lounge area and outdoor roof patio.

The outdoor pool is only open during summer months (Mid June-Early September)

Other things to note
This place is fully cleaned and sanitized after every guest so you can book with confidence.

name: Rental unit in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.87 ¬∑ 2 bedrooms ¬∑ 3 beds ¬∑ 2 baths
description: There are so many features that make this unit special! The view, outdoor pool, gym, and the best floor plan in the building are just to name a few! The open-concept floor plan has an abundance of space, a kitchen island, and a dining table for the utmost entertainment value.Each bedroom boasts floor-to-ceiling windows and exposed concrete which is eye-catching in its beauty. You will always be comfortable in this professionally designed and professionally managed space.The spaceYou have full and private access to everything inside the beautifully designed condo. This property is full of amenities, such as; a gym, rooftop patio, and pool (seasonal)!  These amenities are shared with all other building occupants and there are rules that must be adhered to when in use. Inside the unit, you will find everything you need for a comfortable stay. Every window has an amazing view. Whether you are sitting on the patio staring at the City horizon to the south or you are in the primary bedroom checking out the Mountains to the west, you have a view for days! There is one underground assigned parking stall for your sole use. Additional parking will need to be off-site on the street ($) or at nearby paid parking lots ($$).Guest accessAs our guest you'll have access to the following amenities:‚Ä¢Private patio from the unit and shared rooftop patio‚Ä¢Kitchen w/ gas stove, convection oven, range and all utensils‚Ä¢Pool (seasonal)‚Ä¢Gym‚Ä¢TV ‚Ä¢Cable (IPTV)‚Ä¢ High-speed internet‚Ä¢Washer & Dryer ‚Ä¢Underground Parking ‚Ä¢Professionally cleaned‚Ä¢Hosts that are available 24/7, should you have any questions.*** Always refer to the amenities section of the listing for the most up-to-date list of amenities ***Other things to noteView our virtual tour to step inside the space ahead of your stay.Registration DetailsBL265981
reviews: Great stay in beautiful apartment. The unit was gorgeous and well equipped. Lots of space for 2 adults and 3 teenage boys. The balcony was huge and the apartment got a lot of sunlight.

We had a great stay here. The apartment is very well equipped. The location is great for exploring Calgary with lots of sights in walking distance. It is quite noisy and there is a lot of homelessness/drug use in the area (particularly down the adjacent alley) but that seems to be unavoidable in the city.

Great location. Everything was really easy but did have to access a different portal to Airbnb to get any info about the place or to check in.
Space was really clean and had everything you needed. Main room with sofa bed has a lot of windows and no blinds which isn‚Äôt ideal for those sleeping there. Although eye masks were provided for them

This was my first experience with Airbnb, Beth and her team have set the bar very high. Flawless experience for our girls trip (myself, my best friend of 30 years, and our two daughters).
From answering questions early in the booking process, detailed instructions for all steps of our stay (including pictures), spotless unit, and quick response time, I couldn‚Äôt have asked for better.
I have already forwarded her profile and listings to all of my colleagues, as we frequently travel to Calgary. I will not be booking hotels in the area again, as I plan on using Beth, her team, and their listings for future travels.
Thank you to Beth and her team for helping to make our trip great!

Great place to stay. The area is close to downtown and it feels safe at all times. Communication with the host was very prompt and friendly.
The apartment is just like the picture, actually bigger in person. The only recommendation for summer visitors is the sun in the living room stays until 11 pm and there are not blinds in that area. If you have someone sleeping in there, Beth provides sleep mask that you will sure need. The sofa bed is smaller than expected, only for people 1.60 m or shorter. Everything else is great!

We had a wonderful stay. The location was great with plenty of places to eat and a grocery store just down the street. Beth responded quickly and was very helpful. We would definitely stay again and would recommend to anyone looking for a place downtown.

We had a great time in Calgary. Beth was super quick communicationing when we had a question. Great to work with. The place was perfectly placed for our convention and would be perfect for the Calgary Stampeders. Would definitely stay again.
The place is spectacular,, very nice, great view, close to everything, great location and very clean. We would come back again.. I would recommend this place and a rate of five star.

The unit was welcoming from the time we arrived. The units ample windows are warm and inviting on a fair weather days.  The location was perfect for our first time in The Beltline to explore midtown and uptown by 17 Avenue.  The balcony patio is a nicely situated to get some away time as there aren't too many high rises impeding the views. Kitchen was fairly well stocked enough to  do  the odd meal homecooked meal including patio BBQ. In suite laundry was good to have on our extended 4 day stay. description_html:
There are so many features that make this unit special! The view, outdoor pool, gym, and the best floor plan in the building are just to name a few!

The open-concept floor plan has an abundance of space, a kitchen island, and a dining table for the utmost entertainment value.

Each bedroom boasts floor-to-ceiling windows and exposed concrete which is eye-catching in its beauty.

You will always be comfortable in this professionally designed and professionally managed space.

The space
You have full and private access to everything inside the beautifully designed condo.

This property is full of amenities, such as; a gym, rooftop patio, and pool (seasonal)! These amenities are shared with all other building occupants and there are rules that must be adhered to when in use.

Inside the unit, you will find everything you need for a comfortable stay. Every window has an amazing view. Whether you are sitting on the patio staring at the City horizon to the south or you are in the primary bedroom checking out the Mountains to the west, you have a view for days!

There is one underground assigned parking stall for your sole use. Additional parking will need to be off-site on the street ($) or at nearby paid parking lots ($$).

Guest access
As our guest you'll have access to the following amenities:

•Private patio from the unit and shared rooftop patio
•Kitchen w/ gas stove, convection oven, range and all utensils
•Pool (seasonal)
•Gym
•TV
•Cable (IPTV)
• High-speed internet
•Washer & Dryer
•Underground Parking
•Professionally cleaned
•Hosts that are available 24/7, should you have any questions.

*** Always refer to the amenities section of the listing for the most up-to-date list of amenities ***

Other things to note
View our virtual tour to step inside the space ahead of your stay.

reviews_details.review: Great stay in beautiful apartment. The unit was gorgeous and well equipped. Lots of space for 2 adults and 3 teenage boys. The balcony was huge and the apartment got a lot of sunlight.

We had a great stay here. The apartment is very well equipped. The location is great for exploring Calgary with lots of sights in walking distance. It is quite noisy and there is a lot of homelessness/drug use in the area (particularly down the adjacent alley) but that seems to be unavoidable in the city.

Great location. Everything was really easy but did have to access a different portal to Airbnb to get any info about the place or to check in.
Space was really clean and had everything you needed. Main room with sofa bed has a lot of windows and no blinds which isn‚Äôt ideal for those sleeping there. Although eye masks were provided for them

This was my first experience with Airbnb, Beth and her team have set the bar very high. Flawless experience for our girls trip (myself, my best friend of 30 years, and our two daughters).
From answering questions early in the booking process, detailed instructions for all steps of our stay (including pictures), spotless unit, and quick response time, I couldn‚Äôt have asked for better.
I have already forwarded her profile and listings to all of my colleagues, as we frequently travel to Calgary. I will not be booking hotels in the area again, as I plan on using Beth, her team, and their listings for future travels.
Thank you to Beth and her team for helping to make our trip great!

Great place to stay. The area is close to downtown and it feels safe at all times. Communication with the host was very prompt and friendly.
The apartment is just like the picture, actually bigger in person. The only recommendation for summer visitors is the sun in the living room stays until 11 pm and there are not blinds in that area. If you have someone sleeping in there, Beth provides sleep mask that you will sure need. The sofa bed is smaller than expected, only for people 1.60 m or shorter. Everything else is great!

We had a wonderful stay. The location was great with plenty of places to eat and a grocery store just down the street. Beth responded quickly and was very helpful. We would definitely stay again and would recommend to anyone looking for a place downtown.

We had a great time in Calgary. Beth was super quick communicationing when we had a question. Great to work with. The place was perfectly placed for our convention and would be perfect for the Calgary Stampeders. Would definitely stay again.
The place is spectacular,, very nice, great view, close to everything, great location and very clean. We would come back again.. I would recommend this place and a rate of five star.

reviews: I thoroughly enjoyed staying here! Aisling is a wonderful host and created such a beautiful place to stay and enjoy! Beautiful decor, extremely comfy bed, spotless, and the view is just spectacular. Thank you so much Aisling for having us!

this place has the best view out of 60 Air BNBs I've stayed in. This was our second time staying here and we would stay again it's always been clean and a convenient location. however if any other units are available in the building I usually opt for those due to the 10 AM check out time with this unit. Not a fan of the third party platforms to sign additional agreements and collect deposits etc. I actually kept getting an invalid phone message on this one which delayed my check in but all in all our stay was great.

I really enjoyed my stay at this Airbnb! The location was convenient and within walking distance to many of the places I wanted to visit, which made exploring Calgary very easy. The view from the unit was absolutely beautiful and definitely one of the highlights. The hosts were very responsive and kind throughout the stay. There were a few checkout tasks required, but nothing too demanding. Overall, the experience was well worth it!

It was a bit of a hassle as it was busy time and hard to find parking to than access the unit to get into the parking garage. It would have been helpful if I was advised were to go in the parking garage as there was up or down options.
It was quite warm and the A/C didn‚Äôt work the time I stayed.
The coffee table was very unstable and looked like it would break if u used it.
The location was great and close to the stampede grounds. The host was quick to help and provide access when I left something in the unit after check out. It was great.

The place is everything in the pictures and more. Conveniently located near the core and walkable. The area felt safe with amazing restaurants and pubs within walking distance. Apartment has all the amenities that you‚Äôd need for your stay and amazing views of the city. Highly recommend!!

Amazing Views! Perfect location for walkable Calgary! Quick responses from hosts! We did utilize the parking garage which was very easy to maneuver. It had amazing bars, restaurants, and coffee shops all on the surrounding block. 8th and 17th was confidently close (on foot) for shopping and nightlife! We did drive to the National Parks a few days and found the city very easy to navigate. Avis rental is just a few blocks away as well. We would stay again!
The view was spectacular!  And the layout was absolutely beautiful   looking forward to staying again soon.
The host provided timely and complete instructions. The place was beautiful and is in a great location!

I had a great time staying at Aisling Baile‚Äôs place! The condo was beautiful and very clean. I especially loved the city view at night it was absolutely stunning. There was plenty to do in the neighborhood, with lots of great restaurants nearby. I enjoyed it so much that I extended my stay, and I‚Äôm glad I did. I visit Calgary often, and I‚Äôll definitely be booking this place again when I return.

The apartment was clean and looks like the photos online. The bed was extremely comfortable and provided a great sleep. The apartment was located in a great part of the city and had a tremendous view. Located very close to restaurants and bars, even a Starbucks directly across the street. It was well worth the money.
Was excellent location for hip dinning. Really good view of Calgary tower from balcony.

Very beautiful appartment with a nice view on the downtown.
Very clean and well equipped. Many facilities are by walk (5-15 minutes).
Great Stay I love staying at Aisling Baile‚Äôs Condo. Great location the condo is super nice and very chic. I truly enjoyed my stay
What an amazing apartment! Beautiful view of the city and the best place we could have asked for our stay during the Stampede!
Amazing location peaceful yet very close to everything you need. Beautiful place. I look forward to returning. Amazing view of the city
The place entering took my breath away with the view the bed was like a cloud! It‚Äôs the best way to escape reality and feel free. I really appreciate everything and definitely recommend‚ò∫Ô∏è
Great communication and a can‚Äôt beat downtown location
Fantastic spot and great host. We had a blast and would recommend.
We had a great stay! Lots to do in the area and very walkable location!
This is now my 2nd time staying here, I enjoyed it so much last time so wished I booked for longer

The place was conveniently located based on our itinerary. There are plentiful of restaurants nearby and very walkable area. The place looked just like the photos and was clean. I appreciated how quick and responsive Aisling Baile was! The one downside was that the sofa had a broken leg so we weren‚Äôt able to comfortably lounge about after a long day. This was out of their control, but an elevator was down which was a bit inconvenient during our stay.
Overall, the place had everything we needed and Aisling Baile were great hosts and I would recommend this place!
P.S. the parking is between two pillars so I wouldn‚Äôt suggest driving a big car (e.g. truck) if you want to take advantage of the free parking spot.
Amazing place to stay if you are visiting Calgary! Beautiful view and close to all amenities! Easy check in / check out. Very enjoyable experience!
Great location near a ton of shops & restaurants. Very walkable area.
excellent clean friendly and great fast communication. highly recommend !
