description_html:
Book a stay at All My Favorite Colors and experience city living at its finest. This downtown condo was designed to provide guests with a place to stay and play, whether visiting for pleasure, work or both. Only 20 minutes from the Calgary International airport, you can be checked in and sipping a cocktail. Take in the amazing city views from the balcony before heading out to explore the vibrant city of Calgary.

The space
You’ll love the:
- Amazing downtown views from floor to ceiling windows
- Modern interior design
- Large kitchen with dining table
- Proximity to vibrant 17th Ave and Saddledome

Common Room:
With a bright and open concept, the main living area is designed to create a space where families or friends can comfortably enjoy time together, whether you’re whipping up a masterpiece in the kitchen, hanging out at the kitchen island or kicking back on the couch. The 43" smart TV will allow you to stream, movies, or your favorite series.

Bedroom:
Decorated in calming neutral colors with large comfy bed and cozy lux linens, you’ll want to take your mornings slow and stay in bed just a little longer.

Kitchen supplies included are:
A full set of pots/pans/platters for large meals.
Serving utensils.
A complete set of knives.
Wine and martini glasses,
Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, Toaster, Coffee Maker
Stocked with coffee, tea, salt, pepper and all your basic condiments.

Laundry:
There is a washer and dryer available for your use. Laundry detergent and dryer sheets are supplied. Is there any better feeling than heading home with 0 laundry?

Check-in/Check-out:
Upon booking we will send you a short message thanking you. 3 days prior to your arrival we will send you step by step check-in instructions.

Guest access
Consumables
Please note that we provide a starter supply of consumables (toilet paper, paper towel, coffee etc.) but do not provide refills during the stay.

The place was super comfy and had everything I needed for a relaxing stay. The host was absolutely amazing and helpful throughout my visit. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great stay!

Stayed for 3 nights during summer. Had everything that we needed.
Great location in the heart of downtown CGY with plenty of restaurants, cafes, and bars within a 5 min. walk.

Stayed here during Stampede week, and had a pretty mixed experience. Got into the building without issue, but instructions regarding entering the unit were unclear/required correction from co-host. Empty water bottle and mouthwash left behind in the bathroom from a previous tenant, empty beer case full of garbage on the patio and dishes in the cupboard requiring re-cleaning before use. We were able to get responses quickly from the co-host which was a plus, and the apartment is true to the images listed and in a fantastic walkable spot in town.
For the price we paid, we would rather have spent the same to stay in a hotel in a less convenient location, to avoid the complications. (It also gets quite warm without A/C in the unit)

Good place to stay, as we attended a Convention at the nearby Stampede Park. All clean & tidy. Great bed. Thank you.
Good instructions to enter building and unit, however once we entered, there were no instructions that there was no key, but a garage fob (we had no car) was also the fob to use to enter the building after the 1st time, and to use for the lifts to access the required floor, and that when leaving the unit, and to get into the unit again, there were numbers to use on the door (the unit was open when we arrived). I had to email to find out all these instructions! so not that was not user friendly, especially as we had arrived after a nearly 10 hour flight!
Also when we departed, there was a long email which i did not read beyond the 1st sentence asking for certain things we should do. I only saw the first sentence. I was in a rush to leave. Irecommend the host sends such a departure email 2 days before departure date and then again on evening before departure.
Many thanks.

There were a few issues that led me to leave shortly after check-in. Communication before arrival was unclear‚Äîespecially around personal info required due to Calgary regulations, which wasn‚Äôt properly explained. Check-in instructions were missing and had to be sent manually. I couldn‚Äôt be buzzed in and had to follow someone else, and the door code wasn‚Äôt immediately available. The co-host wasn‚Äôt very apologetic, which added to the frustration.
Inside, there were dirty dishes in the sink and dishwasher, and the towels didn‚Äôt appear clean. The bed was technically made, but the pillows were disheveled, it made me question whether it had been cleaned properly.
That said, the location was great, and I believe this may have been a one-off situation due to miscommunication and oversight. While I wouldn‚Äôt rebook, I encourage others to read recent reviews and give it a chance if the host has addressed these issues.

The space
Charming One-Bedroom Retreat in the Heart of Calgary🌆

Welcome to your cozy, fully furnished one-bedroom apartment in Calgary! This stylish and modern space offers everything you need for a comfortable and relaxing stay, whether you’re here for business or leisure.

### **Key Features:**
- **Prime Location:** Situated in a vibrant neighborhood, you'll be just minutes away from downtown Calgary, trendy cafes, restaurants, shopping districts, and parks.
- **Spacious Bedroom:** The bright and airy bedroom comes with a comfortable queen-sized bed, premium linens, and ample closet space to make you feel at home.
- **Equipped Kitchen:** Prepare your meals in the kitchen, complete with cooking appliances, cookware, and utensils.
- **Cozy Living Area:** Relax in the tastefully decorated living room with a plush sofa, smart TV , and high-speed Wi-Fi.
- **In-Unit Laundry:** Enjoy the convenience of a washer and dryer, making longer stays stress-free.
- **Private Balcony:** Step outside and enjoy the fresh air on your own private balcony with city views.
- **Secure Building:** The apartment is located in a secure, well-maintained building with an elevator and free heated parking.

Whether you're exploring Calgary’s iconic sights or just relaxing after a long day, this home away from home has everything you need for a perfect stay.

We look forward to hosting you! 😊

Other things to note

listing_title: MicroNest - Modern Overlooking Downtown Parking
listing_name: Entire rental unit in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: The '6th & Tenth' building is situated centered in the Beltline just on the south edge of the downtown coreThe hip Beltline area is bounded by 17th Avenue SW, with cool boutiques selling fashion, retro furniture, vinyl and quirky gifts. Dining spans trendy taco joints, locavore eateries and Korean restaurants, while nightlife encompasses craft beer pubs, live music venues and dance clubs. There are landscaped gardens at Central Memorial Park and a giant indoor escape at Devonian Gardens in the Core Mall.Right next to Beltline is Victoria Park which is an up-and-coming area, with converted warehouses on 1st Street SW, now home to cool clothes designers and offbeat home decor shops. Eateries include casual cafes, laid-back global spots and Jewish delis, while bars and small music venues get lively after dark. The Saddledome arena hosts concerts and Calgary Flames hockey games, and the annual Calgary Stampede rodeo takes place at Stampede Park.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: City transit (C-Train and bus) are available and stops are conveniently located nearby. Taxis, Ubers, bike and scooter rentals are also options. You'll find that you'll be able to walk to many of the local amenities. There are so many convenient restaurants, pubs, stores and things to do in close proximity.We have one reserved parkade spot included in your stay. Please specify during your booking if you‚Äôll need the parking.

description_html:
Enjoy a stylish, 450 sq ft retreat in Calgary’s vibrant Beltline. Perched high above the city, MicroNest offers breathtaking skyline views, free underground parking, and quick access to the Stampede Grounds, Bow River pathways, and the best dining and nightlife on 17th Ave, Stephen Avenue, and First Street. Whether you’re exploring the urban scene or road tripping to Banff or Drumheller, your chic downtown escape awaits!

The space
Open‑Concept Living: Bright, seamless flow from fully equipped kitchen (including cooking essentials) to dining and living areas.

Bathroom: Three‑piece with a deep soaker tub and handheld shower.

Bedroom: Queen‑size bed with luxurious Egyptian cotton linens and a generous closet.

Entertainment: Large‑screen TVs in both living room and bedroom.

Outdoor Retreat: Private balcony with table, cushioned chairs, and a hanging egg chair.

Building Amenities: Seasonal rooftop pool (warm months), common lounge, and free gym access.

Guest access
Entire Unit: The MicroNest is yours alone.

Shared Amenities on 2nd Floor: Gym, lounge/library, kitchen, rooftop pool & patio with loungers, tables, chairs, and BBQ.

Parking: One secure underground stall included.

Other things to note
*Review house rules before booking*

Please message us upon booking—we'd love to know what brings you to Calgary and who will be staying. We are happy to answer any questions and provide personalized recommendations for your stay!

IG handle: @birdstone.nests

Compact Footprint: At 450 sq ft, MicroNest is best suited for up to two guests. Please message us if you plan to host visitors.

City Sounds & Trains: You may hear occasional emergency vehicles or passing trains. We provide earplugs under the bathroom sink, and the concrete construction helps minimize noise.

Your Beltline adventure starts here—book now for the ultimate Calgary skyline experience!

location_details_html:
The '6th & Tenth' building is situated centered in the Beltline just on the south edge of the downtown core

The hip Beltline area is bounded by 17th Avenue SW, with cool boutiques selling fashion, retro furniture, vinyl and quirky gifts. Dining spans trendy taco joints, locavore eateries and Korean restaurants, while nightlife encompasses craft beer pubs, live music venues and dance clubs. There are landscaped gardens at Central Memorial Park and a giant indoor escape at Devonian Gardens in the Core Mall.

Right next to Beltline is Victoria Park which is an up-and-coming area, with converted warehouses on 1st Street SW, now home to cool clothes designers and offbeat home decor shops. Eateries include casual cafes, laid-back global spots and Jewish delis, while bars and small music venues get lively after dark. The Saddledome arena hosts concerts and Calgary Flames hockey games, and the annual Calgary Stampede rodeo takes place at Stampede Park.

reviews_details.review: Amazing place with grest hosts! The little touches meant alot. Would definetley be staying here again! Amazing location in downtown with great views. Was fun people watching from thr balcony

I was impressed with how responsive Richard & Teresa were. Any time I had an issue OI heard back quickly. The apartment is a quick walk to my office so was extremely convenient and also close to restaurants and shopping. The apartment was spotless, well decorated and had all the amenities of a hotel room and more - the snack bowl was a godsend as I demolished that with late night munchy attacks.
Worth the money and I would highly recommend staying there again - I certainly will be.

Great place for a quick trip to Calgary but would gladly stay again for longer if we could. Exactly as shown in photos and Richard&Teresa were extremely prompt when replying to any questions or concerns. Even with the train tracks close by, it was very quiet and you really only heard the trains if you were outside (which was a great view). We even caught a glimpse of a parade going by downtown from the balcony. Highly recommended. Well stocked kitchen, bathroom, bedroom. 10/10

location_details.title: Neighbourhood highlights
location_details.value: Welcome to the Heart of Calgary ‚Äì The Beltline!Nestled in one of Calgary‚Äôs most vibrant and walkable neighbourhoods, our home puts you right in the center of it all. The Beltline is loved for its perfect blend of urban convenience and local charm.Step outside and in just 5 minutes, you‚Äôll be strolling along 17th Avenue SW‚ÄîCalgary‚Äôs iconic "Red Mile"‚Äîlined with some of the city‚Äôs best restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and boutiques. Whether you're in the mood for a cozy brunch, craft cocktails, or international cuisine, you‚Äôre truly spoiled for choice.Need groceries or essentials? You‚Äôre just a short walk from Save-on-Food, Safeway, and local markets, making it easy to settle in and feel right at home.Here for an event or summer adventure? The Calgary Stampede Grounds and Saddledome are about a 15-minute walk away, so you can enjoy concerts, hockey games, and the ‚ÄúGreatest Outdoor Show on Earth‚Äù without the hassle of parking.With downtown just a few blocks north and peaceful parks like Central Memorial and Haultain nearby, the Beltline offers a balanced lifestyle‚Äîenergetic yet relaxed, lively yet livable.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: One of the best parts of staying in the Beltline is how easy it is to get around‚Äîmost of what you need is just a short walk away!üö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Walk Score: This area is a walker‚Äôs paradise. From restaurants and bars to grocery stores and parks, everything is close by‚Äîno car needed.üö≤ Bike Friendly: Calgary has a growing network of bike lanes, and the Beltline is right in the middle of it. You‚Äôll find shared e-scooters and bike rentals nearby if you're up for a fun and fast way to explore.üöÜ Transit Access: The C-Train (LRT) is only a 10 minute walk away, giving you quick access to downtown, the university, or the Stampede grounds.üöó Driving & Parking: If you‚Äôre bringing a vehicle, there‚Äôs easy access to major roads like Macleod Trail, 14th Street, and Crowchild Trail, making it a great hub for exploring the rest of Calgary.‚úàÔ∏è Airport Access: Getting to Calgary International Airport (YYC) is straightforward - about 20-25 minutes by car or rideshare.

description_html:
Stay in the heart of Calgary! This cozy 2BD condo offers free parking, a gym, roof top patio and top walkability. Located in Beltline, step from 17th Ave’s best restaurants, bars, and shops, yet in a quiet, secure building. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, fast WiFi, in-suite laundry, two smart TVs, and a cozy living space. Walk to transit, parks, and downtown attractions. Perfect for business travelers, couples, families, and small groups! Enjoy city views, top amenities, and a hassle-free stay!

The space
Stay in our cozy and bright 2-bedroom condo located in the heart of Calgary’s Beltline district. This inviting space features a spacious living area, two bedrooms, a full-size kitchen and bathroom, a private balcony, free parking, free in-building gym, and access to roof patio.

Just steps from 17th Ave, you’ll be surrounded by some of the city’s best restaurants, cafes, and boutique shops. The condo is also conveniently located near several major grocery stores, all within a 5-10 minute walking distance, making it easy to stock up on essentials during your stay.

With in-unit laundry, a fully equipped kitchen, and an unbeatable location, this condo provides both comfort and convenience in Calgary’s most walkable neighborhood. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, you’ll have everything you need for a seamless stay.

This highly secured building features controlled access entry and security measures, ensuring a safe and peaceful environment for all guests.

For added flexibility, guests can request in advance how they would like the second bedroom arranged—either as two separate twin beds or combined into a king-size bed with a mattress topper for extra comfort.

The space
You’ll feel perfectly at home in this beautiful apartment, which accommodates up to 4 guests. Perfect for solo travelers, couples, families, or business guests.

For your comfort and convenience, the unit includes:
✔ High-speed WiFi
✔ Smart TV in the living room and bedroom on which you can access your Netflix and YouTube accounts
✔ Bedroom 1: Queen-size bed + Smart TV
✔ Bedroom 2: Two twin beds that convert into a king with a mattress topper
✔ Cozy living room with a comfortable sofa, two armchairs, and a small desk
✔ Fully equipped kitchen with all major appliances, including a large fridge and stove
✔ Dining table seats up to 5 guests comfortably
✔ Full-size bathroom with a bathtub
✔ In-suite laundry closet with a washer & dryer
✔ Private balcony – a great spot to relax

✘ There is no air conditioning in the unit, but each bedroom has a ceiling fan, and a portable tower fan is available in the living room.

Toilet paper, garbage bags, and basic toiletries will be provided for guests at the beginning of their stay, enough for the first while. After that, the guest will be responsible for purchasing these items for the rest of their stay.

You will have full access to the apartment, a private parking spot, and gym.
Please note that smoking, pets, and parties are not allowed.
Book your stay today and enjoy a comfortable and hassle-free experience!

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire apartment, a private parking spot, and all building amenities, including:
✔ Fully equipped gym – stay fit without extra costs

✔ Rooftop patio – a cool place to relax with nice views in summer

Other things to note
✔ Please keep the apartment generally clean

✔ No smoking (cigarettes, vapes, weed, etc.)

✔ No pets (due to allergy risks)

✔ No parties, loud music, or excessive noise – please respect your neighbors

Guest access
The guests will have access to the entire apartment. Please, make yourself at home.
A private parking spot and access to the gym are available as well.

Other things to note
Check-ins after 10:30 PM cannot be accommodated.
We kindly ask all guests to plan their arrival accordingly.

Please keep the apartment generally clean.

Any smoking (cigarettes, vapes, weed, etc.) is not allowed.

Pets are not allowed (due to allergy risks)

Parties, loud music, and noise are not allowed. Please respect your neighbours.

location_details_html:
Welcome to the Heart of Calgary – The Beltline!

Nestled in one of Calgary’s most vibrant and walkable neighbourhoods, our home puts you right in the center of it all. The Beltline is loved for its perfect blend of urban convenience and local charm.

Step outside and in just 5 minutes, you’ll be strolling along 17th Avenue SW—Calgary’s iconic "Red Mile"—lined with some of the city’s best restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and boutiques. Whether you're in the mood for a cozy brunch, craft cocktails, or international cuisine, you’re truly spoiled for choice.

Need groceries or essentials? You’re just a short walk from Save-on-Food, Safeway, and local markets, making it easy to settle in and feel right at home.

Here for an event or summer adventure? The Calgary Stampede Grounds and Saddledome are about a 15-minute walk away, so you can enjoy concerts, hockey games, and the “Greatest Outdoor Show on Earth” without the hassle of parking.

With downtown just a few blocks north and peaceful parks like Central Memorial and Haultain nearby, the Beltline offers a balanced lifestyle—energetic yet relaxed, lively yet livable.

reviews: Calgary was a bucket list trip for us; Kyle and Andrew raised the bar on hosting.  Great location to experience Calgary and amazing Canadian hospitality.  Perfect for remote work and savoring food on par with New Orleans.

We had a wonderful stay! The place was very clean and well appointed and the location was great! We arrived just as the Calgary Stampede was happening and had a fantastic view of the opening parade! Check in was seamless with the easy instructions and the underground carpark location was great. We would absolutely stay again and would highly recommend it!

Kyle's listing was as advertised.
Very good location, clean, and comfortable.
I would recommend it to other travelers.
If you plan on using the parking garage, be advised that the spot is next to a large pole. We had a midsized SUV and it just fit. Anything bigger would have been pretty difficult to park in the spot provided. It could be done, but it would be very tight with the car in the next spot.
Great place to stay! I had issues with my travel arrangements getting there and they were able to accommodate a late check in for me, definitely recommend these guys!

description_html:
Welcome to our stunning downtown Calgary corner unit condo! This modern retreat offers you the perfect combination of convenience, comfy, luxury, and breathtaking views.

As you step inside, you'll immediately be captivated by the floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase the stunning city skyline and majestic mountain vistas.

Please be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location.

Scan QR code for 3D Tour!

The space
Our condo boasts all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. The air conditioning ensures that you stay cool during the warmer months, while the cozy king bed promises a restful night's sleep. You'll also have the convenience of underground parking, so you can explore the city without worrying about parking hassles.

Additionally, the surrounding area is a haven for food enthusiasts, with an array of fantastic restaurants, bars, and shops within easy walking distance. Immerse yourself in the vibrant nightlife Calgary is renowned for, knowing that a comfortable retreat awaits you at the end of the night.

Notable Features:
-Balcony with downtown skyline view
-King bed
-Dedicated work station
-Dining Table (4 seats)
-Fresh beddings & linens
-Fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries
-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)
-Bright living room w/ sofa
-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities
-High-speed WiFi
-Free underground parking
-Hairdryer
-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machine

ID Verification Required for our property.

All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.

Guest access
You will have entire private access to the condo

For patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.

*** POOL is closed for the winter.

reviews:
We had another great stay with Kyle and Andrew, they have some lovely places in Calgary!
The place was clean and inviting, and the location was excellent. The Mission area in Calgary is walkable and has plenty of great restaurants! This place allowed us to enjoy everything.
Communication was prompt, and the directions for check in and check out were clear and concise.
We will be back, thank you for having us!
Jon and Erinn

Stayed here with my partner and loved it. The suite was calm and peaceful despite being right off 17th Ave‚Äîperfect balance of quiet and convenience. Kyle and Andrew were great to deal with: super responsive and even checked in to make sure everything was alright. We felt well looked after and would happily stay again.

A great location that's close to many eating establishments.
The apartment is cozy and nicely decorated. And the hosts super helpful. They checked regularly to make sure everything was okay.
Highly recommend.
Really enjoyed the stay with very clear instructions. Will definitely comeback to the same place when coming back to Calgary. One of the best locations i stayed in Calgary by far.
This was an excellent place for us to stay during our couples visit to Calgary. A truly walkable neighbourhood with everything you need nearby. The place was perfect thanks to our hosts.

Kyle‚Äôs place was a cozy clean perfectly located unit. Very walkable to a multitude of areas and their restaurants and shops. It also had the benefit of being quiet in the evening ! I would definitely stay again at this unit or one of their others as they obviously take pride in what they do.

‚ÄãMy stay at Kyle's place was fantastic! The location is truly unbeatable‚Äîbeing just 5 minutes from downtown made it incredibly easy to explore and get around. The convenience was a huge plus for my trip to Calgary. Kyle was a wonderful host‚Äîvery kind and informative, providing great tips that made my visit even better. If I ever find myself in Calgary again, I would absolutely choose to stay here without a second thought. Highly recommended!

I had a great stay here! Would definitely recommend. Very close to everything you need especially during stampede weekend. Very glad there was designated parking and a very nice balcony. The host was very responsive and ensured I had everything I needed for the stay. The place was clean and roomy. Thanks for the great stay!!

Kyle‚Äôs place was a perfect home base for our stay in Calgary. We were in the city for a convention at the BMO Centre and Saddledome. It was an easy walk - less than 20 minutes.
The location was also perfect for restaurants- so many and great variety within a few blocks.
Kyle and Andrew were always very responsive. We had a minor issue and they sent someone over right away to address it.
Location, location, location. Heart of Mission for all the happenings and walkable to downtown for work. Unit was squeaky clean.
This was a great spot close to Red Mile. I would stay there again.
Had a short but nice stay at Kyle & Andrew's place in Calgary. Check-in was easy and the place was very clean and cute! Thanks for a great stay.

My stay was great. The hosts were responsive and easy to communicate with. The spot felt like home right away. The location was perfect! Easily walkable or a short ride share to just about everything I wanted to do. I would book again in a heartbeat.
Everything perfect. Amazing location.
very responsive. clean. no problems at all. I would stay again.
Convient place to stay for a last minute booking. Thanks!
Great stay, Great location and great communication!  Would definitely stay again!
It was a great place to stay, I would definitely come back again

Good location and parking included. Nicely decorated and well equipped. Check in was quite good, although host needs to communicate first contact and buzz in is for BOTH front doors. Why is key in unit when code only is required and stated as to be used for remainder of stay. Directions to parking around the block should say "4th St" not "2nd St."

Thank you for a comfy 4 night stay.  The apartment was exactly as photographed.  The kitchen was well appointed with new appliances.  The bed was very comfortable.  I appreciated the designated parking stall.  You made check in and check out very easy.  I will stay again upon a return visit to Calgary.
Great location! Walkable. Host was responsive. AC was broken but host provided fans the next day. The bed and pillows could be more comfortable. Otherwise, the stay was great for what we needed.

The place was very clean and well-maintained. The host was communicative and made the check-in process easy. The location is perfect, with tons of restaurants just a short walk away. I had a great stay!

Kyle‚Äôs place was clean and tidy , we stayed 11days so the washing machine was good .
We walked everywhere in Calgary , it was never too far from Kyle‚Äôs Airbnb.
We enjoyed our stay very much

The check in instructions were very detailed but it says that the alley parking is off 2nd Street when it is actually 4th, which made it a bit confusing. I saw another review mention this error as well.
The apartment had an AC unit in the bedroom which was nice, but it was leaking water as the carpet was damp and there was a bowl placed under it.
The location is excellent, close enough to walk to Stampede and Saddledome area and also near a number of great restaurants.

description_html:
Welcome to our stylish one-bedroom apartment, perfectly situated in the heart of the vibrant Mission community in Calgary. With its central location, you'll find yourself just minutes away from the world-renowned Calgary Stampede and the iconic Saddledome.

The space
This modern and thoughtfully designed space is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers looking to experience the best that Calgary has to offer. Step outside and discover the trendy 17th Avenue, known for its lively atmosphere, charming boutiques, and diverse culinary scene. Additionally, the nearby Safeway ensures convenient access to any essentials you may need during your stay.

Parking in the city can be a hassle, but worry not! Our apartment comes with the added benefit of designated parking, ensuring a stress-free experience for our guests.

Notable features:
- King Bed
- High Speed Internet
- One FREE parking stall
- Smart TV with FREE Netflix (No cable TV)
- Keurig Coffee Machine with complementary coffee
- Washer/Dryer w/complementary detergent and dryer sheets
- Fresh Linens
- Large Fully Equipped Kitchen
- Complementary Shampoo & Body Wash
- Hairdryer
- Soft towels
- Iron & ironing board

ID Verification required for our property.

We do not accept arrivals 2am onwards. If you plan on arriving near or after this time please refrain from booking. Thank you

Guest access
You will have entire private access to the condo.

For patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.

Other things to note
Rules:

PLEASE NOTE HOUSE RULES :
1. No parties or events allowed.
2. No smoking allowed. Any remnants or smell left behind will result in a $500 fine charged to your Airbnb account.
3. No pets allowed.
4. No unregistered guests allowed.
5. Please don’t eat or drink in the bedrooms.
6. Please respect noise levels and noise curfew. 10PM on weekends and 9PM on weekdays.
7. Please respect Check-in & Check-out times.
8. Please take care of your keys. Lost Keys incur a replacement cost.
9. Please take care of the furnishings. You must pay for any damages caused.
10. Please do not rearrange the furniture.
11. No illegal substances allowed on the premises. You will be asked to leave with no refund.
12. Please DO NOT take towels home after your stay. Any missing towels will be charged to your account.
13. Please do not have any mail, packages, or documents sent to our property. If you require something of this nature during your stay inquire with us first.
14. If any items are left behind there is $50 charge for having it shipped back to you for postage and Staff time/efforts.

The building is at a prominent location of downtown and within walking distance from the Bow river, C-train station, Kensington and Eau Claire area. The building also provides concierge service.The spaceThis beautifully furnished and luxurious unit includes:-In-suite washer and dryer-Fully equipped kitchen with upgraded stainless steel appliances and granite counter top; dish washer, microwave, toaster-TV in bedroom and living room (TVs come with Chromecast for wireless connection to your phone) - note the unit doesn‚Äôt come with cable but available through local service provider upon request at a cost-Free High speed internet-Queen size bed and night stand-Full Linen package, blankets, towels-Free-standing closet, chest, lamps-Decorations, Pictures, Plants, etc-Free assigned above ground heated parkingGuest accessThe building comes with a amenity room with pool table which guests can enjoy during their visit.Other things to noteInstruction for Heater and AC thermostat (located in the kitchen area)1) The toggle switch shall be in Auto mode not fan2) Press up or down button and the high set point temperature flashes and is displayed i.e 20H. The H means when the temperature drops below that set-point the heater with kick in. Suggest setting the high limit to 20degC or any other desired set point by pressing  the up or down arrows to change the set point 3) Give it a few seconds while the temperature is flashing and you will see the cooling temperature flashing i.e. 24C. The C means once the unit temperature reaches above that set point the AC will kick in to drop the temperature.  You can lower this by pressing the down button. Give it a few seconds, you may see the High setpoint flashing again but now the thermostat goes in Auto and you should see the green light coming on which means the AC has kicked in.As mentioned the chillers for the building might be off and will be turned on towards end of May. Might want to have the windows open to provide some additional cooling.
reviews: It was my son who stayed at Nima's place for his university work-term for 4 months.  Location is excellent and Nima is a great and caring host!  I would definitely choose to stay there again!

My wife and I stayed at Nima's place for a month and it was absolutely amazing to say the least. The place is gorgeous, has a beautiful view, is in the heart of downtown but also very quiet ( we heard nothing when we were at home, no noise whatsoever from neighbours or neighbourhood), warm during the coldest days of the month. description_html:
Beautiful fully furnished corner unit with downtown view at the Five West Phase II Condo. The building is at a prominent location of downtown and within walking distance from the Bow river, C-train station, Kensington and Eau Claire area. The building also provides concierge service.

The space
This beautifully furnished and luxurious unit includes:
-In-suite washer and dryer
-Fully equipped kitchen with upgraded stainless steel appliances and granite counter top; dish washer, microwave, toaster
-TV in bedroom and living room (TVs come with Chromecast for wireless connection to your phone) - note the unit doesn’t come with cable but available through local service provider upon request at a cost
-Free High speed internet
-Queen size bed and night stand
-Full Linen package, blankets, towels
-Free-standing closet, chest, lamps
-Decorations, Pictures, Plants, etc
-Free assigned above ground heated parking

Guest access
The building comes with a amenity room with pool table which guests can enjoy during their visit.

Other things to note
Instruction for Heater and AC thermostat (located in the kitchen area)
1) The toggle switch shall be in Auto mode not fan
2) Press up or down button and the high set point temperature flashes and is displayed i.e 20H. The H means when the temperature drops below that set-point the heater with kick in. Suggest setting the high limit to 20degC or any other desired set point by pressing the up or down arrows to change the set point
3) Give it a few seconds while the temperature is flashing and you will see the cooling temperature flashing i.e. 24C. The C means once the unit temperature reaches above that set point the AC will kick in to drop the temperature. You can lower this by pressing the down button.
Give it a few seconds, you may see the High setpoint flashing again but now the thermostat goes in Auto and you should see the green light coming on which means the AC has kicked in.
As mentioned the chillers for the building might be off and will be turned on towards end of May. Might want to have the windows open to provide some additional cooling.
location_details_html:
Five West building is at a great location of downtown, two blocks away from the Bow river and within a walking distance to heart of downtown with many restaurants nearby, close to Princess Island park, Eau Claire market, and prominent Kensington neighborhood.

There is also a spin class under the sister building and a Yoga studio a block away.

reviews_details.host_response: Hank thanks for your review. I was glad to host you and have nothing positive to say. However, your location rating of 3 out of 5 based on proximity of my place to Banff seems unfair. My unit as advertised is in downtown Calgary and located on the SW side of it which is quite close to the highway leading up to Banff. My unit is located in a great location with walking access to various prominent neighborhoods. I suggest in the future to consider staying in town of Canmore that is close to Banff but I can't control the proximity of downtown Calgary to city of Banff.

reviews:
Excellent experience. Cleanest, most well stocked Air BnB I‚Äôve been in for a long time.
Super clear communication from hosts, with instant response time.
This experience is what Air BnB used to be like, and I can‚Äôt recommend this location, or this rental group, enough.
Will definitely look to stay at this location again.

We had a wonderful stay. We were three people and had plenty of space. Great to have 2 bathrooms!
Location was good - downtown Calgary is easy to get around by foot or car

Beautiful condo with great views of downtown Calgary. Private accessible parking spot. The condo has all the amenities that we needed including laundry, and exercise room. Very clean and no clutter. Hosts are quick to respond to questions that we have. I would highly recommend this place.
Great place to stay in Downtown Calgary. Walking distance to anything you want. Host was very responsive and easy to work with. Would highly recommend if you want to see Downtown.

We had a wonderful stay! The check-in process was smooth and easy, and the place was exactly as described‚Äîclean, well-maintained, and very comfortable. Communication with the host was prompt and helpful throughout our stay. The location was convenient and close to everything we needed. Overall, a great experience and excellent value for the price. Highly recommended!

This apartment was a great find! I was here for a work trip and this space has everything I needed. Bed was cozy, restrooms were nice and clean, and the view from the balcony was beautiful! Good location and the heated parking was great.

Location was perfect, easy to walk throughout downtown Calgary from the apartment! Main issue was the AC wasn‚Äôt working at all. Our only saving grace was that the smoke cooled down the weather outside. Yes, the host was responsive and gave us a couple of fans to help us out but‚Ä¶ I really don‚Äôt know what we would‚Äôve done if the weather would‚Äôve been hotter. The apartment is south facing and one of the bedrooms is south/west facing so it lets in a lot of sun. We did have the blinds closed during the day too.
Otherwise‚Ä¶ great location, was clean, and had a nice city view. Beds are on the softer side. Building was secure, underground parking spot was a nice plus.
We had a wonderful stay at the condo! Very beautiful place and clean! The city lights view from our bedrooms at night was awesome!  We are definitely going to book again. üòä

The check-in was easy and smooth and the hosts were accommodating, and quick to respond.  The space was a true gem, home away from home, and walking distance to lots of attractions, parks and restaurants.

It‚Äôs the location, in the heart of downtown within a kid and senior friendly neighborhood. It‚Äôs the two slabs of glass walling offering expansive vistas east and south. Thoughtfully stocked kitchen. Cold AC. Good beds. Very clean, bathrooms especially.

Great location, very responsive host and accommodating. There's lots to do nearby also some excellent restaurants, the instructions were very clear and the place was just as described. Would definitely love to stay here again when visiting Calgary next time.
Great spot and great location. Conveniently located close to all amenities that Calgary has to offer.
Amazing price for such a beautiful place we loved it and definitely will be returning, the hosts are amazing at responding aswell! Thank you guys so much :)

The place is spacious, clean and the service is friendly and respond quickly.

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Welcome to Calgary‚Äôs vibrant Beltline! Nestled just steps from downtown, this trendy neighborhood offers a perfect blend of urban convenience and local charm. Enjoy exploring 17th Avenue SW, famous for its bustling bars, boutique shops, and top-rated restaurants like Ten Foot Henry for vegetable-forward cuisine or Model Milk for elevated comfort food.For coffee lovers, Analog Coffee and Phil & Sebastian serve up some of Calgary‚Äôs best brews. When it's time for something sweet, Made by Marcus is a must-visit for artisanal ice cream.Take a leisurely stroll to Central Memorial Park, one of Calgary‚Äôs oldest and most picturesque green spaces, or check out Lougheed House, a historic mansion with lush gardens. The nearby CORE Shopping Centre offers high-end retail therapy, while the Calgary Tower provides stunning city views.At night, catch live music at Broken City or experience Calgary‚Äôs craft beer scene at Last Best Brewing. Whether you‚Äôre here for business or leisure, Beltline‚Äôs unbeatable location and vibrant energy make it the perfect home base.

description_html:
Welcome to The Poolside Loft in Calgary’s Beltline! This spacious retreat features a king bed, a queen bed, a sofa bed, and 2 full bathrooms, offering plenty of room to relax. The open living space is bright and inviting, with a fully equipped kitchen for easy meals. Step onto the massive patio for stunning downtown views. Enjoy access to a seasonal outdoor pool, a modern gym, and thoughtful touches designed to make you feel right at home.

The space
Office:
Ergonomic office chair for comfortable work sessions
Spacious desk with ample room for your laptop and essentials
High-speed Wi-Fi for seamless video calls and browsing

Main Bathroom

location_details_html:
Welcome to Calgary’s vibrant Beltline! Nestled just steps from downtown, this trendy neighborhood offers a perfect blend of urban convenience and local charm. Enjoy exploring 17th Avenue SW, famous for its bustling bars, boutique shops, and top-rated restaurants like Ten Foot Henry for vegetable-forward cuisine or Model Milk for elevated comfort food.

For coffee lovers, Analog Coffee and Phil & Sebastian serve up some of Calgary’s best brews. When it's time for something sweet, Made by Marcus is a must-visit for artisanal ice cream.

Take a leisurely stroll to Central Memorial Park, one of Calgary’s oldest and most picturesque green spaces, or check out Lougheed House, a historic mansion with lush gardens. The nearby CORE Shopping Centre offers high-end retail therapy, while the Calgary Tower provides stunning city views.

At night, catch live music at Broken City or experience Calgary’s craft beer scene at Last Best Brewing. Whether you’re here for business or leisure, Beltline’s unbeatable location and vibrant energy make it the perfect home base.

The apartment is south facing and one of the bedrooms is south/west facing so it lets in a lot of sun. We did have the blinds closed during the day too.
Otherwise‚Ä¶ great location, was clean, and had a nice city view. Beds are on the softer side. Building was secure, underground parking spot was a nice plus.

description: FREE UG Secured Parking - 1 spot***Walk Score 96***Welcome to our modern downtown condo situated just above the famed 17th Avenue in downtown core! This stunning one-bedroom condo is perfect for working travelling people or couples seeking adventure in the heart of the city. Whether you're here to explore the city,  business trip, attend the famous Stampede festival, or simply relax with someone special, this charming place has everything you need for an unforgettable stay!BL266105The spaceThis peaceful corner unit features:- floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning panoramic views,  - modern sliding glass doors, - flowing layout,- fully equipped kitchen,- granite countertop, - ergonomic workstation, - highspeed Internet, - Nostalgic Classic Turntable with records, - 50" Smart TV with Netflix, - One designated underground parking lot.*** Please inquire if you need additional sleeping arrangements, we can provide bedding set for the sofa bed if you travel with children***The moment you step into this stunning condo, you will be greeted by gorgeous city views through floor-to-ceiling windows and a warm, welcoming atmosphere. The condo is bright and sunny, perfect for starting your day on the right foot. And if you love coffee or tea, you're in for a treat! Our condo boasts a Nespresso coffee machine that will make sure you feel energized and ready to tackle the day ahead. Our condo is also equipped with a turntable, perfect for those of you looking to kick back, relax, and let the music transport you to another world. Whether you're into classical tunes, smooth jazz, or some upbeat pop, our turntable has got you covered. In the bedroom you'll find a comfortable queen-sized bed that guarantees a good night's rest. As you wake up refreshed, head to the fully-equipped kitchen to whip up a delicious breakfast. Enjoy your meal at the stylish granite countertop kitchen bar, where you can admire the stunning views of the city from the high floor.And if you are a remote worker in search of perfect space that combines productivity, comfort and leisure, this condo with dedicated  working ergonomic place and calming atmosphere that allows to focus is the ultimate retreat.If you're in town for the Stampede festival, you're in luck! This condo is conveniently located close to the festivities and offers easy access to all the exciting events. After a long day of exploring, return to the comfort of your home-away-from-home and lose yourself in the pages of a good book or enjoy 50" Smart TV  with Netflix perfect for movie nights with a complementary pop corn. Book with us today and experience downtown living at its best!Guest accessYou will have access to entire condo and its balconyOther things to note‚ÄúThe COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. reviews: We had a wonderful stay at Anna‚Äôs place!! The apartment was just as pictured with gorgeous views. The location was absolutely perfect and walking distance to everywhere we needed to go. The location is close to downtown, and there are two supermarkets nearby, which made cooking very convenient. A sofa bed was also provided, making the room spacious and comfortable.

This was a perfect condo for my trip. The location is prime, the condo is spacious, well equipped and very modern, and the host is very nice and helpful. Very suitable for both short and longer term stays in Calgary.

Anna‚Äôs condo was great.  Loved the location which was walkable to many restaurants and shops in the heart of the city.  It was nice not having to worry about parking being so close to everything.
Great place to stay! Clean, easy check-in/out, convenient location in city, quiet building, loved the corner unit. No issues at all, Anna was a great host, would highly recommend to others!
Great location with much walkable food and amenities near by. Amazing view of the city and skyline of the mountains on the horizon. The full Calgary experience.
Great place to spend a few nights in Calgary. Near great restaurants and coffee shops. Very walkable. Clean and cozy.

Anna‚Äôs beautiful place was perfect for our stay in Calgary!  An easy walk to and from BMO Center/Saddledome/Stampede grounds.  The bedroom doors close so a second person can stay up later and watch TV in the living room which has a good sofa bed.  A walk-in shower and a bath/shower combo were a bonus. Great closet space and laundry.  All the apartment features made for a comfortable and wonderful multi-day stay.  Anna is the BEST kind of host‚Ä¶communicates clearly, responds quickly.  She answered my many questions about the neighborhood which as a first-timer to that part of Canada, I GREATLY appreciated!   I highly recommend this place!

Anna was a great host.  Her place was as described and was everything I expected.  Her place is in a great neighbour and very close to everything downtown.  The only draw back to the building is having to use the fob to exit the parkade, finding a place to park on the street, and then returning the fob to the unit.
Anna‚Äôs place was exactly as described. We will definitely return. Highly recommend.
Great space to stay for a quick trip.  Anna was extremely responsive to all questions.
We loved our stay at Anna‚Äôs apartment, it was comfortable, clean and had everything we needed there. Location was perfect too. Would definitely stay there again!

Can't say enough about this place - bed was firm and super supportive and comfortable - couldn't even feel my partner who typically tosses all night. The water pressure was a pleasant surprise - very powerful! room darkening blinds really help because this unit has windows on 2 sides, which gives a very open roominess feel. The location was perfect as our son was competing at the nearby MNP sport complex, less than a 10 min walk away and the unit was so close to 17th avenue where there is incredible nightlife and energy.
Anna was extremely pro-active on the happenings of the condo complex and an excellent communicator with great recommendations. Typically responded to text messages in less than 2 minutes. It felt like we were her top priority. The Nespresso machine and pods was also a nice touch as were the granola bars and microwave popcorn (which we took advantage of having arrived at 10pm). Great place - we will come back for sure!!

we stumbled across Anna's rental when our original rental had some plumbing issues they couldn't fix immediately. The unit is in a great location, and Anna was very accommodating with it being a last minute booking. we will definitely be back as this place has a great vibe to it.

Very clean centrally located. Lovely views. Easy walking distance to restaurants and shopping. Very clear instructions how to get in and leave. Host was available and responded immediately to any questions we asked. The unit was pristine and had everything available to make our stay enjoyable. We highly recommend this unit and we would love to stay there again if/and when we might visit Calgary in the future. Thank you for making our Christmas memorable.
Lila & Ron Tucker

Anna‚Äôs place is in a great location, surrounded by great restaurants and coffee spots.
It was clean, quiet, and easy to access. It was a great value compared to hotels in the area.
Beautiful condo. Great location. Would highly recommend.
We had a great stay and appreciated the hospitality of the hosts.
Fantastic location.  The host is also extremely responsive!
Anna was great. The place was homey. Very happy with the stay.

description_html:
FREE UG Secured Parking - 1 spot

***Walk Score 96***

Welcome to our modern downtown condo situated just above the famed 17th Avenue in downtown core! This stunning one-bedroom condo is perfect for working travelling people or couples seeking adventure in the heart of the city.

Whether you're here to explore the city, business trip, attend the famous Stampede festival, or simply relax with someone special, this charming place has everything you need for an unforgettable stay!

BL266105

The space
This peaceful corner unit features:

- floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning panoramic views,
- modern sliding glass doors,
- flowing layout,
- fully equipped kitchen,
- granite countertop,
- ergonomic workstation,
- highspeed Internet,
- Nostalgic Classic Turntable with records,
- 50" Smart TV with Netflix,
- One designated underground parking lot.

*** Please inquire if you need additional sleeping arrangements, we can provide bedding set for the sofa bed if you travel with children***

The moment you step into this stunning condo, you will be greeted by gorgeous city views through floor-to-ceiling windows and a warm, welcoming atmosphere.

The condo is bright and sunny, perfect for starting your day on the right foot. And if you love coffee or tea, you're in for a treat! Our condo boasts a Nespresso coffee machine that will make sure you feel energized and ready to tackle the day ahead.

Our condo is also equipped with a turntable, perfect for those of you looking to kick back, relax, and let the music transport you to another world. Whether you're into classical tunes, smooth jazz, or some upbeat pop, our turntable has got you covered.

In the bedroom you'll find a comfortable queen-sized bed that guarantees a good night's rest.

As you wake up refreshed, head to the fully-equipped kitchen to whip up a delicious breakfast. Enjoy your meal at the stylish granite countertop kitchen bar, where you can admire the stunning views of the city from the high floor.

And if you are a remote worker in search of perfect space that combines productivity, comfort and leisure, this condo with dedicated working ergonomic place and calming atmosphere that allows to focus is the ultimate retreat.

If you're in town for the Stampede festival, you're in luck! This condo is conveniently located close to the festivities and offers easy access to all the exciting events.

After a long day of exploring, return to the comfort of your home-away-from-home and lose yourself in the pages of a good book or enjoy 50" Smart TV with Netflix perfect for movie nights with a complementary pop corn.

Book with us today and experience downtown living at its best!

Guest access
You will have access to entire condo and its balcony

Other things to note
“The COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific
services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will
comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay.”

Great place - we will come back for sure!!

we stumbled across Anna's rental when our original rental had some plumbing issues they couldn't fix immediately. The unit is in a great location, and Anna was very accommodating with it being a last minute booking. we will definitely be back as this place has a great vibe to it.

description_html:
Business License: BL257338
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally of Calgary's downtown. It is a SHORT WALK to all downtown attractions, bountique shops, and night life with a system of famous restaurants, coffe shop and bars, are the soul of the Calgarian.
Stay in and experience our services with the exquisite furniture, a completed equipment & AN PORTABLE AIR-CONDITIONAL.
A SMALL DOG/CAT friendly will be a plus.
FREE UNDERGROUND PARKING
And a PLAYPEN will be provided with 20$ extra fee

The space
On the top floor of 6-storey building, you will be immersed in the gorgeous views of downtown of Calgary city, enjoyed fresh Tims roasted coffee and tea at our nice patio. And PET FRIENDLY and FREE UNDERGROUND PARKING.

(*) Check-in by smart lock: 4pm-10pm (on the weekday); 4pm-11pm (on the weekend).
If you need to check in outside of these hour, you will need to contact with host to get the key in person and may be charged an extra fee of 30$

(*) Check out time: 12pm

(*) IMPORTANT NOTES:
- Starting October 1, 2024, the tourism levy tax of 4% per one booking will be collected and remitted by us to Tax and Revenue Administration (TRA) of Alberta.

- The extra fee will be charged for EVERY PET together with an additional cleaning fee (to be negotiated).

(*) Pets are allowed with rules:
- No pet on the funiture/bed
- Pick up your pet’s waste carefully
- Bowls in the kitchen
- Dogs must be leashed
- Before you leave, pls sweep any pet hair and dispose of waste in outside trash.

We offer plenty of space and comfortable beds, a full kitchen & bath room. The main bedroom features a comfortable and luxurious QUEEN BED and large WALK-IN closet. The living room is romantic area with the rustic funiture that you should love them like us. Extra bedding can be found in the closet for extra comfort.

Get connected with ultra-high-speed internet with access to all your favorite streaming services on your 43 inch SMART TV. Please enjoy your night in this place like at your home.

With the FULLY STOCKED KITCHEN, you have everything you need to make your go-to dish. Coffee and tea are avalible over on our small coffe bar for you to enjoy at any time of the day.

Especially, just a few minutes walk, you can reach the center of downtown - and enjoy the patio dinning at many kind of restaurants from Asia (Sushi, Chinese, Vietnamese) or French, Mexican style.

And more...

Guest access
Our guests will have access to the entire unit, please feel free to make yourself at home.

There is one FREE Underground parking lot (No 108- 6 ft height) available and there are additional street parking, both paid and free zones, readily available on the surrounding streets.

When checking in with a vehicle, please first park on the street, then come in through the front door. Press the code that was be sent to you by Host to get access into the building. (please text to us as soon as you can to get this code)
There will be a separate code, given directly by the Host to access the unit. On the kitchen counter, will be the FOB for the garage’s access.

Uber is also widely available in the city.

Throughout the warmer months, there are scooters available right around the building.

Other things to note
(*) The bathroom, featuring a bathtub, is equipped with towels, toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, body wash) and a hair dryer to ensure your stay is as homely as possible.

(*) Laundry Service
We do have a washing machine in unit, but not a dryer. So if our guest require additional laundry unit, please notify us.

Please treat the space with respect and be noise-conscious of the neighbours. If anything arises, please reach out and we will do our best to take action as soon as possible. Events are not allowed. Be sure that the door is closed and locked when you leave. Any events/parties will lead to immediate eviction.

Our stay was amazing. There was so much within walking distance - downtown, BMO center/Stampede grounds, the location is perfect. description_html:
Imagine inviting nine of your closest friends to enjoy this upscale new 4-bedroom in the heart of downtown Calgary. Just under 200 meters (<0.2 miles) from Calgary’s iconic 17th Ave, famously known as the Red Mile, you'll be steps away from lively patios, buzzing bars, trendy restaurants, and an atmosphere charged by the energy of stampeders, hockey fans, and city-goers alike.

Ready for an unforgettable Calgary adventure?? Reach out and we can help plan your perfect trip ᯓ✈︎

The space
♛ AMENTITIES ♛
✔ Central AC + heating for year-round coziness
✔ Four smart 4K UHD Flat Screen TVs
✔ High Speed Internet
✔ Coffee bar with decaf and tea – start your mornings right!
✔ Fully stoked Gourmet kitchen
✔ Single Car Garage (larger vehicles like trucks may not fit)
✔ 2 street parking permits within surrounding neighborhoods
✔ Master bedroom with built-in fireplace
✔2 spacious King beds, 2 comfy Queen beds & 1 Queen sofa bed (5 beds total)
✔ Bedrooms equipped with lush blankets/linens & room darkening shades
✔ 2-Min Walk to 17 Ave & 6-Min Drive from the Stampede Grounds!
✔ 3 Full Bathrooms equipped with glass showers
✔ 2 Half baths fully stoked
✔ Onsite washer & dryer – pack light!
✔ Self check-in (smart lock)

❤︎ Excited to explore Calgary’s best-kept secrets?? As lifelong residents we have the inside scoop and can help plan your perfect stay! ❤︎

Guest access
✔Full access to the entire property, except for the linen/cleaning closets

✔Experience a true home away from home, with privacy and exclusivity in downtown Calgary

Other things to note
CONTACT US

➤ We are committed to ensuring your comfort and satisfaction during your stay. If we are not on-site, simply send us a text message and we will gladly assist you or provide guidance as needed.

description: Enjoy a private downtown studio just steps from 17th Ave‚Äôs restaurants, cafes, and nightlife. Walk to the Saddledome, Stampede Grounds, Calgary Tower, and Stephen Avenue. The studio includes a comfy bed, stocked kitchenette, seating area, and bathroom. Shared laundry in the building, plus 5 parking stalls (first come first serve) with a paid lot next door. A central and affordable home base to explore Calgary.The spaceThe property presents a mix of bachelor and one-bedroom units, each boasting a modern, hip design with standout red kitchen cabinets. Every suite is equipped with essential amenities like free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, and comfy bedding, ensuring a comfortable stay. Whether you're in town for a short visit or a longer exploration, our suites provide the perfect blend of contemporary style and home comfort in the bustling heart of CalgaryGuest accessGuests have exclusive access to their private suite and all its amenities. Enjoy the convenience of self-contained living with a fully equipped kitchen. While the suites offer a peaceful retreat, the vibrancy of downtown Calgary awaits right outside your door.Parking is available onsite, but please note there are only 5 stalls, and they‚Äôre first come, first served. If those are full, there‚Äôs a paid lot just one block away, and street parking is also available nearby.Other things to noteThe property is located in a lively urban area, and since it‚Äôs an older, wood-framed building, you may occasionally hear some city sounds. We do our best to ensure a comfortable stay, and while a bit of urban ambiance is part of the downtown experience, we‚Äôre here to help you feel right at home.We are committed to ensuring the comfort and safety of all our guests. At this time, we are unable to accommodate pets in the suites. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation in maintaining a pet-free environment.Please be advised that parties and large gatherings of any kind are strictly prohibited at this property. This policy is in place to ensure the tranquility of the neighbourhood and the preservation of the property's condition. Violation of this policy may result in immediate termination of the rental agreement and possible legal action.Registration DetailsBL280744

great place! full unit airbnbs are always nice as you have everything you need in full privacy. great spot to crash after long days, impressive care taken to every detail before guests arrive. the area can be noisy and some unsavory types may be stalking around the premises, but the windows block a lot of noise and multiple keycodes are used to get inside, so no one can follow you. the airbnb itself is a 5/5, just keep your eyea open in the general area. id stay here again!

Really loved this place, just a perfect studio close to some great bars and restaurants and reasonable walking distance to everywhere else. The place was in excellent condition when I arrived and clearly managed by professionals (and I mean that in the best way).
If you're staying on the weekend and actually want to get to sleep at a reasonable hour, the walls are pretty thin and there were people partying loudly well past midnight, but it wasn't an issue for me since I was out late and stay up late in general. There wasn't any noise on Sunday or the weekdays I stayed, however.

Had a very nice stay at Richard‚Äôs place. Super close to food and some shopping on 17th ave, and free parking was a bonus! The building was quite noisy during the night, but we did not find it difficult to sleep through. Location was most important for us and this was an ideal place to book.

description_html:
Enjoy a private downtown studio just steps from 17th Ave’s restaurants, cafes, and nightlife. Walk to the Saddledome, Stampede Grounds, Calgary Tower, and Stephen Avenue. The studio includes a comfy bed, stocked kitchenette, seating area, and bathroom. Shared laundry in the building, plus 5 parking stalls (first come first serve) with a paid lot next door. A central and affordable home base to explore Calgary.

The space
The property presents a mix of bachelor and one-bedroom units, each boasting a modern, hip design with standout red kitchen cabinets. Every suite is equipped with essential amenities like free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, and comfy bedding, ensuring a comfortable stay. Whether you're in town for a short visit or a longer exploration, our suites provide the perfect blend of contemporary style and home comfort in the bustling heart of Calgary

Guest access
Guests have exclusive access to their private suite and all its amenities. Enjoy the convenience of self-contained living with a fully equipped kitchen. While the suites offer a peaceful retreat, the vibrancy of downtown Calgary awaits right outside your door.

Parking is available onsite, but please note there are only 5 stalls, and they’re first come, first served. If those are full, there’s a paid lot just one block away, and street parking is also available nearby.

Other things to note
The property is located in a lively urban area, and since it’s an older, wood-framed building, you may occasionally hear some city sounds. We do our best to ensure a comfortable stay, and while a bit of urban ambiance is part of the downtown experience, we’re here to help you feel right at home.

We are committed to ensuring the comfort and safety of all our guests. At this time, we are unable to accommodate pets in the suites. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation in maintaining a pet-free environment.


Please be advised that parties and large gatherings of any kind are strictly prohibited at this property. This policy is in place to ensure the tranquility of the neighbourhood and the preservation of the property's condition. Violation of this policy may result in immediate termination of the rental agreement and possible legal action.

description_html:
Welcome home!

This stylish suite has features floor to ceiling glass windows, breathtaking city views, kind bed, corner unit, comfy living area, a dedicated work space, UG parking, high speed internet, private patio and more.

When you stay with us you’ll experience all the comforts of home, in a professionally decorated downtown condo.

Perfect for diverse groups of travellers, including; business, couples, families, friends and even solo travellers looking for extra space.

The space
Within walking distance to 17th Ave, Saddledome/Stampede grounds and downtown core. Steps away from Calgary's trendiest restaurants and best nightlife such as St James corner Pub, Proof, Ten Foot Henry, Native Tongues, Two Penny, endless pubs, popular 8th, 10th and 17th Ave, Starbucks and a yoga studio a stone throw from front entrance.

Notable Features:
-King bed
-Work Station
-Dining Table
-Balcony with spectacular skyline view
-Fresh beddings & linens
-1 fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries
-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)
-Bright living room w/ sofa
-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities
-Eating Bar
-High-speed WiFi
-Free underground parking
-Hairdryer
-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machine

ID Verification required for our property.

We do not accept arrivals 2am onwards. If you plan on arriving near or after this time please refrain from booking. Thank you

Guest access
You will have entire private access to the condo

For patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.

reviews: Li's place was amazing. He is a great host, super kind, nice, and easy to reach. I would go back to his place in a heartbeat! I highly recommend the apartment if you are looking to experience Downtown Calgary and all it has to offer. The apartment has a great location, near to lots of restaurants and many walkable entertainment.

Li was a great host! He was very responsive, flexible, and understanding. Check-in was a bit challenging at first due to the building‚Äôs limited hours and my uncertain arrival time, but Li communicated clearly and even stayed on the phone to make sure I got to the unit without any issues. The apartment itself was clean, the bed was very comfortable, and the shower was great.

I had an amazing stay! The condo is in a perfect location ‚Äî right in the heart of downtown with everything within walking distance. The view from the unit was absolutely beautiful and made the stay even more enjoyable. The place was clean, comfortable, and met all of our expectations. Communication with the host was super easy and smooth from start to finish. I‚Äôd definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone visiting the area!!!!

Li was a great host and their downtown views were just as described! Li was very responsive, held open communication and is very friendly to work with. Bed was amazingly soft, apartment was immaculately clean. Would def recommend Li if you are looking for an Airbnb downtown Calgary!

This is an amazing little apartment on the 21st floor with an amazing view on Calgary!
The location is great for visiting the city or attending an event here, everything is in walking distance.
Li is a great host with very good instructions and very proactive. It was essy to get in snd around.
I loved sitting on the balcony and enjoying the sunrise in the morning. Absolutely beautiful!
The apartment itself is in a very clean and safe apartment building.
I would book it again next time I‚Äòm in Calgary.

Greta little condo in the heart of Calgary. Served as base camp for explorations of the city and surrounding parks. Conveniently located within walking distance of food and shopping. Definitely recommend.

The stay was great from start to finish. Check in was easy and Li was pleasant and helpful throughout. The condo was clean,  comfortable , just as described and perfect for our needs. The location was great - walking distance to river walk   Would definetely recommend.

We had a great stay at Li‚Äôs place in Calgary. The location was convenient ‚Äî we could easily get around the city by foot and bus to visit all the sights we wanted to see. The apartment had everything we needed for our stay. Overall, we were very happy with our experience and would definitely recommend it!

Very comfy and clean at LI‚Äôs place. Location is very central and walkable. We took the C train to Stampede and Chinook shopping centre. The station is very near to the apartment and  just walked about 5-8 mins. We enjoyed seeing the downtown parade from the balcony. Li is very responsive when we requested some help. We will stay there again if we are in Calgary in future.

This beautiful condo was located in downtown Calgary. Easy to walk around the area, lots of restaurants. The condo was clean, had a comfortable bed and an incredible view. Smart TV. Sunsets were stunning. The host was very responsive, easy directions for access, and available for anything you need. In suite laundry is a bonus. Would definitely stay again if in the Calgary area.

Staying at Ali‚Äôs apartment was fantastic. Li is super helpful in every regard and did support throughout my stay. The apartment is ideally  located in downtown of Calgary with easy access to the metro network and restaurants and cafes. In the apartment there is everything one needs. Bed super comfy, kitchen well equipped and a really nice bathroom. If in Calgary again, I will definitely book with Li again!

The team AND the condo were both amazing. Li and David were so responsive and able to provide recommendations for the surrounding area. they were also able to anticipate any needs and may have had. The condo is pristine and provides a peaceful getaway in Calgary.  I loved how clean and spotless it was and gave me a perfect place to rest after busy days.

We had a wonderful time at Li‚Äôs place! The location is perfect, downtown and very walkable to anywhere we wanted to explore during our stay. description_html:
⭐️ Our cozy Airbnb in downtown Calgary offers stunning views and is designed for your comfort and convenience. Enjoy a spacious private living room, a fully equipped kitchen for your culinary adventures, and a dedicated workspace for business needs. Unwind on your private patio while taking in the beautiful scenery, or explore the building’s shared gym and outdoor pool. With fast Wi-Fi available throughout, everything you need is at your fingertips. Experience the charm and vibrancy of Calgary!⭐️

The space
⭐⭐⭐ Comfort & Convenience ⭐⭐⭐
❄️ Air Conditioning: Stay cool and comfortable during your stay.
🛁 Bathtub: Enjoy a relaxing soak after a day of exploration.
🛏️ Bed Linens: Sleep soundly with fresh, cozy bedding provided.
🧴 Essentials: Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper provided.
👚 Clothing Storage: Ample closet space to keep your belongings organized.
💤 Extra Pillows and Blankets: Comfort is key with additional bedding available.
🏡 Private Entrance: Enjoy your own separate access to the space.

⭐⭐⭐ Kitchen & Dining ⭐⭐⭐
☕ Coffee Maker and coffee: Wake up to fresh coffee every morning.
🍽️ Cooking Basics: Pots, pans, oil, salt, and pepper for culinary creations.
💻 Dedicated Workspace: A quiet desk area for focused work.
🍽️ Dishes and Silverware: Everything needed to enjoy dining in.
🧼 Dishwasher: Easy clean-up after your meals.
🍳 Kitchen: A fully equipped space for all your cooking needs.
☢️ Microwave: Quick meals or snacks made easy.
🔥 Oven: Bake or roast your favorite dishes with ease.
🧊 Refrigerator: Keep your groceries fresh and drinks chilled.

⭐⭐⭐ Entertainment & Relaxation ⭐⭐⭐
📚 Books and Reading Material: Dive into a good book during your downtime.
🛋️ Private Living Room: A comfortable area to relax and unwind.
📺 TV: Enjoy movie nights or catch up on your favorite shows.
🌅 Patio or Balcony: Enjoy private outdoor space for lounging.
☀️ Sun Loungers: Relax in style on outdoor sun loungers.

⭐⭐⭐ Health & Safety ⭐⭐⭐
🚨 Carbon Monoxide Alarm: Peace of mind with safety features in place.
🔥 Fire Extinguisher: Safety features for your peace of mind.
🩹 First Aid Kit: A stocked kit for any minor emergencies.
🚨 Smoke Alarm: Safety measures in place for your protection.
🛡️ 24/7 Security: Enjoy peace of mind with round-the-clock security for your safety.

⭐⭐⭐ Laundry & Maintenance ⭐⭐⭐
🧺 Dryer: Convenient in-unit dryer for laundry needs.
🧺 Washer: In-unit washer for hassle-free laundry.

⭐⭐⭐ Building Amenities ⭐⭐⭐
🚪 Elevator: Easy access to all floors, suitable for all guests.
🏋️ Gym: Access to a shared gym to keep up your fitness routine.
🏊 Outdoor Pool: Dive into the refreshing shared pool for some fun. ***NOTE*** The pool is an outdoor pool and therefore is only available from June to September - weather permitting.
🚗 Parking Options: Convenient paid street parking available or a paid parking lot across the street.

⭐⭐⭐ Additional Features ⭐⭐⭐
🌐 Wi-Fi: High-speed internet available throughout the listing.
🔥 Heating: Central heating for cozy comfort year-round.
💇 Hair Dryer: Get ready for your day with ease.
👗 Hangers: Keep your clothes organized and wrinkle-free.
🌡️ Hot Water: Enjoy soothing hot showers at your leisure.
🧴 Shower Gel: Soft, scented shower gel provided for your convenience
👕 Iron: Look your best with an included iron for quick touch-ups.
🏋️ Exercise Equipment: Stay active with available fitness gear.

name: Rental unit in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ5.0 ¬∑ Studio ¬∑ 1 bed ¬∑ 0 baths
description: Welcome to your modern 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom condo nestled in Calgary's vibrant Beltline district. Relax by the pool, get a workout in, or enjoy a coffee on your private patio all while being centrally located to Calgary's best shopping and entertainment areas.  With restaurants and bars steps away from your front door you can enjoy the best Calgary has to offer, and skip the Uber ride.  Enjoy downtown Calgary to its fullest while having a gem of a homebase.The spaceCondo Features:‚Ä¢ Living Area: Open-concept space with floor-to-ceiling windows, a flat-screen TV.‚Ä¢ Internet: Fast 750 Mbps up and 100 Mbps down. Wi-Fi throughout unit, and ethernet ports in the living room and bedroom.‚Ä¢ Kitchen: Fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, Keurig coffee maker with pods, and hot water kettle.‚Ä¢ Bedroom: Spacious room with a plush queen-sized bed and a personal TV.‚Ä¢ Bathroom: Sleek design stocked with premium toiletries and fluffy towels.‚Ä¢ Private Balcony: Deck with a cozy atmosphere to hang out on.‚Ä¢ In-Suite Laundry: Washer, dryer, iron, and ironing board for your convenience.Building Amenities:‚Ä¢ Fitness Center: Stay active during your visit with our well-equipped gym.‚Ä¢ Common Area: Unwind in the communal lounge, ideal for socializing or relaxing.‚Ä¢ Outdoor Pool: Enjoy a refreshing swim in the seasonal outdoor pool, open during the warmer months.‚Ä¢ Shared Barbecue Area: Take advantage of the communal barbecue facilities for larger gatherings.Please note that access to these shared amenities is available to registered guests. However, availability may change at any time due to routine maintenance, changes to bylaws, or seasonal considerations. We do not offer refunds based on the availability of these amenities.Guest accessThe entire condo is yours.  You are also able to use the pool, sky lounge, and gym which are located on the second floor.  Please remember to bring your key fob with you so you can access these areas as well as return to your floor.Registration DetailsBL292656
reviews: Andrea‚Äôs place was absolutely beautiful, spotless, and looked exactly like the photos and description in the listing! Thank you so much for being such a wonderful host‚ÄîI would definitely stay here again!

This is a perfect location. Close to shopping, sight seeing and restaurants. In the heart of Calgary. Andrea was super responsive and helpful. My planes landed early and they provided above and beyond accommodation for the trip. I cannot say enough not thank Andrea enough for that. Perfect location to get picked up for Banff tours. Thanks again

Truly one of the best airbnbs I have stayed at , Andrea is such a responsive host , I booked last minute due to a cancelled flight and she went above and beyond. The apartment itself is modern , cosy and really nicely decorated. Bed and bedding super comfy! Next time I am in Calgary I would 100% rebook. Thank you Andrea for making my unexpected stay calm and cosy !

5/5!! I had a wonderful stay! The host was extremely responsive, kind, and truly went above and beyond, she even let me know after checkout that I‚Äôd left my charger behind and offered to drop it off, which was so thoughtful. The place itself was beautiful with amazing scenery and an immaculate vibe. Everything was squeaky clean, overall it was such a cozy and relaxing stay. I had an absolutely fantastic stay at this Airbnb. The place was exactly as described, spotless, it had every single amenity I needed (and then some), and the bed and bed linens were so comfortable. Check-in/out was also a breeze. I will certainly be booking again next time I visit!

it's very accommodating place  to access downtown Calgary. very secure building as far as the building accommodate. one issue i have will be parking. this place don't offer parking. it's additional cost place it's a walk from open public parking to the building. it will be very nice at list one car parking coming with the place in the building parking lot

I had a wonderful stay at this place! The space was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described in the listing.
