The views from the apartment were breathtaking and I won‚Äôt hesitate to seek out this same stay my next visit here.

Book this one!!! The decor is top notch and Andrea is super responsive. Booked this trip on a whim and to say we got our moneys worth for the stay is an understatement. Everything was clean and gorgeous. Highly recommend for couples and small families!
I really enjoyed staying here,  I found the location lovely and communicating seamless.  I would 10/10 stay here again very very nice place,  with great view and ideal location.

description_html:
Welcome to your modern 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom condo nestled in Calgary's vibrant Beltline district. Relax by the pool, get a workout in, or enjoy a coffee on your private patio all while being centrally located to Calgary's best shopping and entertainment areas. With restaurants and bars steps away from your front door you can enjoy the best Calgary has to offer, and skip the Uber ride. Enjoy downtown Calgary to its fullest while having a gem of a homebase.

The space
Condo Features:

• Living Area: Open-concept space with floor-to-ceiling windows, a flat-screen TV.

• Internet: Fast 750 Mbps up and 100 Mbps down. Wi-Fi throughout unit, and ethernet ports in the living room and bedroom.

• Kitchen: Fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, Keurig coffee maker with pods, and hot water kettle.

• Bedroom: Spacious room with a plush queen-sized bed and a personal TV.

• Bathroom: Sleek design stocked with premium toiletries and fluffy towels.

• Private Balcony: Deck with a cozy atmosphere to hang out on.

• In-Suite Laundry: Washer, dryer, iron, and ironing board for your convenience.

Building Amenities:

• Fitness Center: Stay active during your visit with our well-equipped gym.

• Common Area: Unwind in the communal lounge, ideal for socializing or relaxing.

• Outdoor Pool: Enjoy a refreshing swim in the seasonal outdoor pool, open during the warmer months.

• Shared Barbecue Area: Take advantage of the communal barbecue facilities for larger gatherings.

Please note that access to these shared amenities is available to registered guests. However, availability may change at any time due to routine maintenance, changes to bylaws, or seasonal considerations. We do not offer refunds based on the availability of these amenities.

Guest access
The entire condo is yours. You are also able to use the pool, sky lounge, and gym which are located on the second floor. Please remember to bring your key fob with you so you can access these areas as well as return to your floor.

reviews_details.review: Andrea‚Äôs place was absolutely beautiful, spotless, and looked exactly like the photos and description in the listing! This is a perfect location. Close to shopping, sight seeing and restaurants. In the heart of Calgary. Andrea was super responsive and helpful. My planes landed early and they provided above and beyond accommodation for the trip. I cannot say enough not thank Andrea enough for that. Perfect location to get picked up for Banff tours. Thanks again

Truly one of the best airbnbs I have stayed at , Andrea is such a responsive host , I booked last minute due to a cancelled flight and she went above and beyond. The apartment itself is modern , cosy and really nicely decorated. Bed and bedding super comfy! Next time I am in Calgary I would 100% rebook. Thank you Andrea for making my unexpected stay calm and cosy !

5/5!! I had a wonderful stay! The host was extremely responsive, kind, and truly went above and beyond, she even let me know after checkout that I‚Äôd left my charger behind and offered to drop it off, which was so thoughtful. The place itself was beautiful with amazing scenery and an immaculate vibe. Everything was squeaky clean, overall it was such a cozy and relaxing stay. I‚Äôd definitely come back and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a peaceful getaway!

I loved my stay here. Apartment is just like the photos, very well equipped and the bed is extremely comfortable. A bonus was chilling on the balcony taking in the city skyline, very special. Great location being in the heart of downtown and 17th Ave.

I had an absolutely fantastic stay at this Airbnb. The place was exactly as described, spotless, it had every single amenity I needed (and then some), and the bed and bed linens were so comfortable. Check-in/out was also a breeze. I will certainly be booking again next time I visit!

it's very accommodating place  to access downtown Calgary. very secure building as far as the building accommodate. one issue i have will be parking. this place don't offer parking. it's additional cost place it's a walk from open public parking to the building. it will be very nice at list one car parking coming with the place in the building parking lot

I had a wonderful stay at this place! The space was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described in the listing. I can‚Äôt say enough about our first time visiting Calgary. I knew i had to be in the heart of downtown and this was the perfect place. From the decor, space, and location, it was such a warm and cozy unit. Everything was clean, comfortable, and Andrea went over the top to ensure my wife had an amazing birthday weekend. I had requested special accommodations and she made the process easy and communicated with me so well. I will recommend this place to my family, friends, and anyone else reading this. The views from the apartment were breathtaking and I won‚Äôt hesitate to seek out this same stay my next visit here.

Book this one!!! The decor is top notch and Andrea is super responsive. Booked this trip on a whim and to say we got our moneys worth for the stay is an understatement. Everything was clean and gorgeous. Highly recommend for couples and small families!
I really enjoyed staying here,  I found the location lovely and communicating seamless.  I would 10/10 stay here again very very nice place,  with great view and ideal location.

Loved my stay at this condo. Beautifully decorated. Well stocked. Beautiful patio.  Lots of nice restaurants near by. Quiet building.  The bed was so comfortable with the softest linens. Would absolutely stay again.  The hosts were always fast at communicating and very helpful.
Absolutely loved this unit! Would come back 100%. So clean and on point. Walking distance to so much. Look forward to coming back when travelling in Calgary.

Andrea‚Äôs place was great, the bed was super comfortable. Andrea helped me with a package that was going to arrive before I was, I really appreciated that. reviews: i had an awesome stay at ben and lily‚Äôs place. the condo was super clean, cozy, and decorated so cute! i love how modern it is and just had a really good vibe. the building is safe and secure. the views were unreal ‚Äî seriously so pretty. perfect views of the mountains and downtown. sunrise was absolutely stunning on the balcony! i will be 100% be booking to stay here again next time i am in town!

Great place with a decent location, hard to find parking and the train right beside you is an inconvenience when it goes through the city 4 times a night. However minus this our stay was great and the hosts were very friendly and responsive, left very clear details on how to check in and all about the unit! Would stay again however I would bring earplugs this time!

Clean and nice. Walkable to downtown.
Communication could have been better and more prompt with regard to some things brought up with a broken piece of furniture.
Other than that, we would stay again and recommend the flat.

Nice place; however, received a request a week and a half later for $1000 regarding a missing key fob even though we left the fob where we found it. Hosts did not contact us with questions as to where we put it just left it to their management company to send us an accusatory message with the money request. I have since found similar reviews on their other properties. Not good practice and Airbnb should look into this!

Ben and Lily's place is perfectly situated right in the heart of downtown. It is modern and welcoming and very well kept. Ben and Lily were always available and easy to communicate with. I stay here for a little over 2 weeks and have nothing negative I could say about the place. Highly recommend.
Very clean and modern apartment in a fabulous location. Near everything you need. Host was very helpful and responsive when i needed help. Great place. Would stay again.

I have stayed at this Airbnb and other apartments in this building several times. This is my favorite Airbnb. Yes, per the other reviews, there is a noisy train at night that runs several times, but it‚Äôs not that bad. My advice would be to bring earplugs or a loud fan if loud sound bothers you at night. PLEASE DO NOT let the train keep you from staying at this place, because it‚Äôs an amazing Airbnb. It‚Äôs perfect with a washer and dryer, nice deep bathtub and powerful shower, kitchen with everything you need, dining and living area, VERY comfortable bed and pillows, and a balcony that shows a beautiful view of Downtown Calgary. It‚Äôs only a 5 to 10 minute walk to the train. There are also many restaurants and pubs nearby, including a four story mall that‚Äôs in downtown. Thank you for another pleasant experience!
Lovely place, we really enjoyed our stay. Great and fast communicators, really appreciated that from Ben and Lilly! Great service. Really happy

It was a very good location, barely had to drive anywhere. As a student it was nice to be in the same city but feel like you weren‚Äôt in the campus atmosphere. It was very tidy and clean, they had very good communication and were easy to reach with any questions. They made it so easy to check in and out without any hassle. Definitely recommend if you want to have an effortless experience.
The place looked just like the photos. It was super clean, cozy, and had such a nice view!
Great place. It was very clean and covered home necessities. Walking around the area at night was okay, but not the best. Overall I would definitely recommend it.
Very clean and easy to access. Beautiful view of downtown! Would definitely go back.

Listed on booking free parking however it was not. And place is smaller than I expected. Not worth the money I paid for in my opinion.
Nice location and clean.
Great hosts, accurate description and very responsive to questions.  The condo is exactly as described.
Stayed for birthday weekend. Did not disappoint! Heaps of bars and restaurants close by walkable distance to everything!! Would 100% stay again!

It was a very clean place with beautiful cityscapes. One problem we encountered was with entering the building and response/troubleshooting that could have been delivered in a more timely manner. The buzzly app that they use was not optimal for entering the airbnb and hosts had to resend the link. Not ideal. Otherwise the hosts were good at answering our questions prior to check in and the place was true to photos for the most part. Couch did have a huge tear unfortunately.

A beautiful place to stay! The view is amazing, and almost everything you could need is in walking distance! Ben and Lily were very well at communicating and making sure we were more then happy with our stay!

The view was beautiful, and the location was fantastic. Unfortunately, we encountered some issues during our stay. The bathroom was not clean, with hair on the bath, and the bed was extremely uncomfortable, preventing us from getting a good night's sleep. As a result, we felt sore for the next few days. Ultimately, we decided to cancel our reservation. The management was understanding and refunded the remaining nights while still charging us for the first night.

Fantastic Stay in Downtown Calgary!
I had an amazing stay at Ben and Lily‚Äôs apartment in downtown Calgary. The space was spotless, beautifully furnished, and had all the amenities needed for a comfortable stay. The location is perfect‚Äîwithin walking distance of great restaurants, shops, and public transportation. The check-in process was seamless, and Ben and Lily were incredibly responsive and accommodating. I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Calgary and would definitely stay here again!
Felt very cozy and the house was so clean. It was very close to shopping mall, restaurants etc. so very convinient. The view was awesome and the hosts are very accommodating!

The apartment was decorated so beautifully and had the prettiest view of downtown Calgary. It was also very clean when we first entered. We had a wonderful time and for our next visit of city we definitely will be choosing to stay there again!
Just stayed for a night but it was amazing!! The bed is so comfy too
Amazing communication, beautiful view, good description of place
Easy to find. Clean with  great view. Definitely recommend. Super nice host also.

description: Only cat is allowed in this building. One bedroom +1 bathroom with a covered parking.1 queen/1 sofa bed/1 crib/hair dryer/Please let me know if your baby travel with you.Granite countertop, dishwasher.High speed Internet/sport TV.1 block to 17 Ave on 9 Street SW where you can find all kinds of restaurants/pubs/bars/ice creams/shops/SaveOnFood/Dollarama/Safeway/Goodlife/Banks. 15-20 mins walk to DT core, Stampede/BMO center. Ride the scooter to visit Downtown. 8 mins drive to MNP.The spaceWhole unit. Located at 1820-9 St SW. total 20 units in this building and most are one person per unit, quiet building. Whole building was renovated in 2017, even replaced all the drywall, plumbing and electrical wiring. No drugs and parties allowed.Guest accessWhole unit. The laundry is in the basement middle door. The laundry card is in the drawer left of stove, but you need to pay for it. $2.75 for washer and $2.25 for dryer. I have information for adding fund to the card. I have extra washed shower curtain and table cover in the lower cabinet left of stove.There is a electrical heater in the top of cabinet if you feel cold during the winterOther things to noteCovered parking, please park along the wall and leave enough space for behind parking spot. Please check the photo for the parking spot. When you parked, you can connect the wifi right away because the unit is just above the parking spot.If upstairs tenant makes noise, just let me know.If you feel the bed pillow top is too soft for you, you can remove it, the underneath mattress is firm.Registration DetailsBL245473
reviews: Lee has been a great host. Loved the place and the location. Only minor things which wasn't a deal breaker for me, the TV wasn't smart, the sofa bed is much more comfortable than the bed itself, and no laundry in the apartment but there is a paid one in the building. Loved to see cooking essentials in the place.

Lee‚Äôs apartment is great! Very clean and comfortable. There is everything you need in there. The location is also great: in a calm and beautiful area and very close to the downtown. Lee is a very friendly host and quick responsive.
Highly recommended!
The location was perfect, walkable, private and quiet! With tons to do in the area. Lee was very responsive and clear. The place was clean, free of bad odor and had good vibes! Exactly as described.

we really enjoyed our stay here and I have nothing but good things to say about Lee and her property. it was very clean, well stocked with anything a person might need. lots of extras in terms of bedding, toiletries, even non perishables. she even went above and beyond and left treats for my kids. she was very responsive and understanding of my very vague trip schedule because of the circumstances of my stay. I highly recommend staying here and would definitely stay again.
thank-you Lee, from me and my children!! üòä

For a budget stay, Lee‚Äôs place was good. Very close to restaurants, parks, downtown, etc. Lee was very helpful.
Unfortunately, there was no comfortable place to sit in the apartment - the chairs, couch, and futon were all pretty uncomfortable. Also, the apartment is on the first floor and the ceiling is a bit thin, so I could hear people in the upstairs apartment, even though they weren‚Äôt being excessively loud. I didn‚Äôt mention anything to Lee because I figured there wasn‚Äôt much she could do about it.

Lee‚Äôs place was in an amazing location is Calgary, close to 17th - with so many restaurants and shops. And it is tucked just away from 17th where you can enjoy a peaceful evening. Lee is a proactive and responsive host that ensures we had the best stay possible.

Great spot in Calgary! Walking distance to all the best food and drink and tucked away on a quieter street. Lee was responsive and provided a wonderful stay for me and my friends! Would recommend for anyone wanting to stay downtown Calgary on a budget.
The place was super clean, she was always very responsive and clear with instructions. Nice location
Lee was a great host. Kept in touch to make sure we had everything we needed. Very clean. We had a great stay.

Great location, super responsive host and complete amenities .
Lee‚Äôs place was a great option for our stay! The kitchen is fully equipped and is perfect for max 4.

Parking was a bit tight, and we couldn‚Äôt fully open the back of our vehicle without hitting the roof, but it didn‚Äôt take away from the overall experience. Lee is an absolutely lovely host!

Lee is a great communicator and very responsive host. I wanted a downtown location to be near family and so Lee‚Äôs place suited me well.
The apartment was very clean, quiet and appeared as presented in the listing. Although the building is older - the apartment interior is newer. The bed was comfortable, the kitchen had all I needed and Lee was clearly always available if I were to need anything else.
Quiet and clean in a great location. It was perfect for our needs.
Very cute place in a nice area, close to lots of bars/restaurants.
This place was clean and the location was amazing for our first trip to Calgary. Lee did an amazing job, we had a great trip :) we will definitely be staying again
Good place, it is like in the photos, comfortable and with what is necessary for a good stay.
I booked Lee's place for a long weekend adventure with my son, and we had a blast. Thanks Lee!

All you need at one place. Lee is a very good host!
Would definitely stay again at this accommodation.

it was really easy to check in and the place was spacious. I was feeling like home and it was really close to the grocery stores and coffe places. It was a quiet area and everything is there to be able to cook. Lee was easy to talk to and gave me helpful instructions to check-in.

I recommend this place for sure. Our host is amazing and a very nice person, really made me feel at home at this place. Everything was clean and it was what i expected, so if you want a nice place stay here!

description_html:
Only cat is allowed in this building. One bedroom +1 bathroom with a covered parking.
1 queen/1 sofa bed/1 crib/hair dryer/Please let me know if your baby travel with you.
Granite countertop, dishwasher.
High speed Internet/sport TV.
1 block to 17 Ave on 9 Street SW where you can find all kinds of restaurants/pubs/bars/ice creams/shops/SaveOnFood/Dollarama/Safeway/Goodlife/Banks. 15-20 mins walk to DT core, Stampede/BMO center. Ride the scooter to visit Downtown. 8 mins drive to MNP.

The space
Whole unit. Located at 1820-9 St SW. total 20 units in this building and most are one person per unit, quiet building. Whole building was renovated in 2017, even replaced all the drywall, plumbing and electrical wiring.
No drugs and parties allowed.

Guest access
Whole unit. The laundry is in the basement middle door. The laundry card is in the drawer left of stove, but you need to pay for it. $2.75 for washer and $2.25 for dryer. I have information for adding fund to the card.
I have extra washed shower curtain and table cover in the lower cabinet left of stove.
There is a electrical heater in the top of cabinet if you feel cold during the winter

Other things to note
Covered parking, please park along the wall and leave enough space for behind parking spot. Please check the photo for the parking spot. When you parked, you can connect the wifi right away because the unit is just above the parking spot.
If upstairs tenant makes noise, just let me know.
If you feel the bed pillow top is too soft for you, you can remove it, the underneath mattress is firm.

reviews_details.review: Lee has been a great host. Loved the place and the location. Only minor things which wasn't a deal breaker for me, the TV wasn't smart, the sofa bed is much more comfortable than the bed itself, and no laundry in the apartment but there is a paid one in the building. Loved to see cooking essentials in the place.

Lee‚Äôs apartment is great! Very clean and comfortable. There is everything you need in there. The location is also great: in a calm and beautiful area and very close to the downtown. Lee is a very friendly host and quick responsive.
Highly recommended!
The location was perfect, walkable, private and quiet! With tons to do in the area. Lee was very responsive and clear. The place was clean, free of bad odor and had good vibes! Exactly as described.

we really enjoyed our stay here and I have nothing but good things to say about Lee and her property. it was very clean, well stocked with anything a person might need. lots of extras in terms of bedding, toiletries, even non perishables. she even went above and beyond and left treats for my kids. she was very responsive and understanding of my very vague trip schedule because of the circumstances of my stay. I highly recommend staying here and would definitely stay again.
thank-you Lee, from me and my children!! üòä

Great spot in Calgary! Walking distance to all the best food and drink and tucked away on a quieter street. Lee was responsive and provided a wonderful stay for me and my friends! Would recommend for anyone wanting to stay downtown Calgary on a budget.
The place was super clean, she was always very responsive and clear with instructions. Nice location
Lee was a great host. Kept in touch to make sure we had everything we needed. Very clean. We had a great stay.

Great location, super responsive host and complete amenities .

Lee is a great communicator and very responsive host. I wanted a downtown location to be near family and so Lee‚Äôs place suited me well.
The apartment was very clean, quiet and appeared as presented in the listing. Although the building is older - the apartment interior is newer. The bed was comfortable, the kitchen had all I needed and Lee was clearly always available if I were to need anything else.
Quiet and clean in a great location. It was perfect for our needs.
Very cute place in a nice area, close to lots of bars/restaurants.
This place was clean and the location was amazing for our first trip to Calgary. Lee did an amazing job, we had a great trip :) we will definitely be staying again
Good place, it is like in the photos, comfortable and with what is necessary for a good stay.
I booked Lee's place for a long weekend adventure with my son, and we had a blast. Thanks Lee!

All you need at one place. Lee is a very good host!
Would definitely stay again at this accommodation.

Overall we had a nice stay! The location is perfect for walking to the cafes/restaurants along 17th, and the host was very responsive and accomodating. The building is older and the apartment lacked a certain aesthetic that we like, but it was very clean and had all the basic necessities.

it was really easy to check in and the place was spacious. I was feeling like home and it was really close to the grocery stores and coffe places. It was a quiet area and everything is there to be able to cook. Lee was easy to talk to and gave me helpful instructions to check-in.

I recommend this place for sure. Our host is amazing and a very nice person, really made me feel at home at this place. Everything was clean and it was what i expected, so if you want a nice place stay here!

Stayed at Lee's condo for 4 weeks for a work trip. It was a cozy condo in a very lively and walkeable neighbourhood. Space was clean and kitchen and bathroom were well equipped. Lee made sure we were comfortable and was very responsive. Was an excellent stay overall.
The place is really convenient to places around the city. We had a great stay!
Place matched the photos. Receptive host and close to 17th street. Very walkable area

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: The hip Beltline area is bounded by 17th Avenue SW, with cool boutiques selling fashion, retro furniture, vinyl and quirky gifts. Dining spans trendy taco joints, locavore eateries and Korean restaurants, while nightlife encompasses craft beer pubs, live music venues and dance clubs. There are landscaped gardens at Central Memorial Park, while nearby Stampede Park is known for the annual Calgary Stampede rodeo.

description_html:
Soak in breathtaking city views from the floor-to-ceiling windows of our stylish downtown condo! This spacious 2BR retreat sleeps up to 6 guests with a cozy pull-out sofa. Enjoy an open-concept layout, a fully equipped kitchen, in-suite laundry, high-speed WiFi, and a private balcony. Secure on-site parking available. Steps from Stampede Park in the vibrant Beltline neighborhood. Book your stay now for the perfect blend of city excitement and homey comfort!

The space
SUITE FEATURES:
• 2 bedrooms (3 beds in total including the sofa bed)
• 2 Bathrooms including 1 ensuite
• Fully equipped kitchen with high-end appliances
• Dining table (seating for up to 4)
• 55" Smart TV with Netflix in the living room plus high speed internet
• Central air conditioning
• In-suite laundry
• 901 sq.ft
• Spacious balcony
• Outdoor dining (patio table + 2 chairs)
• Convenient onsite parking available

This bright and airy apartment is perfectly located just steps from outdoor tennis courts, public parks, and within walking distance of Stampede Park! Nestled in Calgary’s trendy Beltline neighborhood, you'll be just a few blocks from downtown, surrounded by the energy of the Design District.

For everyone’s comfort and in accordance with local regulations, we use a smart noise monitoring system (NoiseAware) that tracks decibel levels — not conversations — to ensure respectful noise levels are maintained.

The open-concept layout feels even more spacious with stunning floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the space with natural light and showcase breathtaking city views. The sleek laminate flooring flows seamlessly throughout, creating a modern yet cozy atmosphere.

The primary bedroom features a luxurious Queen bed and a stylish ensuite bathroom, while the second bedroom boasts a King bed with private patio access. Need extra sleeping space? The living room sofa easily transforms into a full-sized bed, accommodating two more guests comfortably.

The fully equipped kitchen shines with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and ample cabinet space. Just off the kitchen, a spacious den area is perfect for dining, working, or simply unwinding. Plus, in-suite laundry machines ensure a hassle-free stay.

Step out onto the east-facing balcony and take in the stunning downtown Calgary skyline. With built-in storage throughout, this apartment offers both style and function—perfect for your city getaway!

Book now and experience the best of Calgary from this incredible home!

Guest access
You will have exclusive use of this apartment. There is dedicated parking in the secure, underground parking garage for one vehicle at a cost of $20.00/night. There's also paid street parking nearby. The building is wheelchair accessible with a ramp at the entrance and an elevator to take you to your floor.

Other things to note
**Important Notice**

Please Note: Some minor repairs are currently underway at the property. We’re doing our best to minimise any impact on your stay and appreciate your understanding as we work to improve the space.

KEY PICK-UP:
• Please note that keys for the unit must be picked up at an alternate KeyNest location before 10:00 PM.

• To help ensure a safe and trusted experience for all guests, ID verification may be required after booking.

• The COLOURS BY BATTISTELLA is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All confirmed bookings indicate guest agreement to adhere to the property's residential bylaws and community standards.

• Please note that the dishwasher is currently unavailable. We are sorry for the inconvenience this may cause .

• Please note the sofa bed can be extended from the lower part of the sofa itself.

• Please note that we are not responsible for any unreceived parcel delivery or shipping orders. We encourage guests to avoid placing online orders during their stay as shipping times can vary. Even when the expected delivery date is within your stay, we do not recommend placing orders that must be shipped to your vacation rental property.

1. We offer on-site, underground parking for one vehicle at $20 per day. Please inquire for further details about obtaining a parking pass.

reviews_details.review: Condo is extremely rundown. Needs upkeep. Needs a paint job. They have painted small patches here and there which just makes things look worse. Smelled like smoke. Three blankets that were all dirty. Pull out couch had food in it.  Hair in the fridge. Blinds did not close all the way. Sliding door between bedroom and living space did not budge. Because the couch could not be used, my two adult sons had to share a bed, which was unfortunate. I had booked this place for 2 nights for a reunion with our two adult sons. We only ended up staying one night and had to book a hotel for the second. Our communication was with the management company and it was fantastic. Very much appreciated. Location was fantastic. I would not recommend this rental.

reviews:
I had no major problems with the stay. The place is nice, and the location is prime. The bed is not the most comfortable. There were lots of towels, but I do feel they could include more than a single facecloth for a week long stay.
My concerns happened in the booking phase. The owners asked me for a picture of my driver‚Äôs license, and my phone number. I refused to provide either, thinking they might cancel my booking. But they didn‚Äôt cancel.
The mattress and sofa were a little worn out and didn‚Äôt had a great cushion, however rest of the apartment is great and view was amazing, I really had fun and host is very reachable and friendly.
Had all the basics I needed. Great neighbourhood and walkable to different areas of downtown. Good experience overall.

Easy to get in. Building elevators can be rather busy on Fridays I was told from some residents of the building. Probably wouldn‚Äôt be so bad but I was checking out on the first day of stampede and someone booked one of the elevators to move. Fortunately Joe and Mary were understanding and accommodating for me. The place was absolutely beautiful. We were able to catch the stampede fireworks from the balcony. Found it to get hot one of our mornings during a heat wave (32 or 33 outside before noon) but J&M provide a fallen to move air which helped tremendously. Great communication and offered creative suggestions for outings and dinners. Really felt at home here, I hope to return some time soon.

The place was very spacious and had a really comfortable bed. It was very clean and had enough towels. It was quiet and well soundproofed. The shower was hot and had good water pressure. There was a fan to manage temperature, but no air conditioning. The chairs at the kitchen table were very worn and sunk-in, as was the sofa, and all the seating wasn‚Äôt very comfortable. Also, at check in, I had to carry my suitcases up the stairs for one level, because the buzzer only worked to get guests to floor 17 and the suite was on floor 18. Overall, great stay and great value, and I had good sleeps there, I would stay again.

Joe and Mary‚Äôs place was the perfect stay for my time home. The place is in a great location with everything close by that you‚Äôd need. If I had any questions or concerns they were quick to respond and were always checking in and making sure my stay was comfortable and made sure I and everything I needed. I definitely 100% would book again! Thanks for making my stay great!
This was a good stay, lots of restaurants around. Starbucks right across the street. Walking distance of Saddledome!
Good at communicating, beautiful space, perfect for people with a busy schedule while they are in Calgary, good location.

Great place for the price! Good communication throughout and very detailed instructions for check in and check out were provided. Appreciated the parking garage!
However, it would benefit from some upgrades. The bed was very comfortable but the living room furnishings were in need of replacement - couch was very indented from common seating spots, carpet was stained and spotty, and kitchen chairs were very worn. The kitchen provided all of the small appliances needed for your stay, but if you like cooking your own meals, bring a frying pan (so warped that they could not be cooked in), a sharp knife and spatula/flipper. It also would have been nice to have more than only 2 towels and 1 facecloth provided for a weekend stay but there is in suite laundry so you could wash them as needed.
Overall, a 4 star stay. With some changes and updates, it could be 5 star.
Really good location and good value. Lots of natural light and a great view were a plus, too.

Amazing place! Close to everything you need, with recommendations from Joe and Mary. Place was clean, convenient and quiet. Getting in and out was simple and convenient. They were very responsive and proactive in their messaging. Lovely stay and well worth the price! üòçüëå

Excellent private accommodation in downtown Calgary. Well worth the price. Easy check-in, even at a very late hour. Hosts are highly responsive and very easy to contact. Would happily stay here again - thanks Joe and Mary!
Well located, easy access, parking available.
Thank you for a great stay!
Joe and Mary were good at communicating. Great location and nice view.
Great location! Joe and Mary‚Äôs place is super spacious!
as expected - thank you very much!

Great location, the unit was what it was listed as. Communication was good, accommodating check out at noon.
Only thing I can suggest, instructions of check in was great but a lot of information and realizing after the pictures and unit is on 18th floor, but you need to go to the 17th floor then take the stairs upstairs.
I suggest to bold that outline. It was difficult to carry all my luggage‚Äôs up two level of stairs.
Other than that everything was great

We had a lovely time at Joe and Mary‚Äôs place. The location was ideal as you could access 17th avenue and Stephen avenue within 10 minutes. Had everything we needed and we were able to contact the co-host easily.

The apartment was incredibly spacious, the location was wonderful and had everything you could possibly need for your stay. The host was very responsive and helpful. I honestly could not have asked for a better time!

Location was excellent! Check in process was strange as you had to go to different floors and take stairs, would have been nice if it was less complicated. The unit was spacious. With a few improvements it would be a great place to stay.

Host understanding about my late arrival, clean accommodation with amenities.
Difficulty entering the building the first time, but responsive and patient host.
Very convenient indoor parking. Very safe space
Great Place to stay.

Joe and Mary‚Äôs place was a great deal, its worth the price, if you were lookin for a place to stay in Heart of Downtown Calgary.
We stated for 4 days and from checking in, and up to check out, they had provided clear instructions. Thanks to Mary for being responsive and attentive to our needs.
The place was so pleasing..it was so clean mainly the mirror-polished floor, the washroom was squeaky clean with basic bath needs present.

I most guaranteed that I will book again.

The space
Welcome to this amazing east facing 1 bedroom unit. Colours by Battistella has views of downtown Calgary and a location that can't be beaten.

Fun, Friendly, Vibrant and Walkable!

Take the elevator up to the 18th floor where your lovely accommodation awaits.

As soon as you walk in, you welcomed by the spacious open living room. complimented by floor to ceiling windows and flooded with sunlight.

Come sit down and relax in while admiring the great views Calgary has to offer. Turn on the 43" UHD 4k Smart TV to Netflix and Chill.

The large kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. It is perfect for the gourmet chef and entertaining friends/family.

A frosted glass sliding partition creates separation for the master bedroom. It ensures optimal open concept living.

Central air conditioning, ensuite laundry and washer are available. We also offer underground parking stall and bike storage.

Beautiful interior colour palettes and European-style fixtures are present in this unit.

Act on it and book a top-rated rental in Calgary!
Easy booking. Easy living. Instant confirmation.

Guest access
Entire space plus building amenities are included in this rental. Please, make yourself at home.

Other things to note

location_details_html:
Fabulously located close to C-train, concert halls, Central library, Stampede Grounds, The Saddledome, professional services and some of Calgary’s best restaurants + café’s all within short walking distance.

With a Walkscore of 96, enjoy the best of the urban lifestyle Calgary has to offer!

There really is no shortage of shops, restaurants and services when at First Street Village not only because of its own but also because of those found nearby.

All-in-all, First Street Village absolutely rocks!

It is a great location with tons of amenities, a quick walk to the downtown office and LRT for young urban professionals and has a vibrant 24-hour atmosphere making it a highly desirable and unique pocket in Calgary’s beltline.

Thanks for your outmost assistance during our stay. ‚ù§Ô∏è

The side tables on each side of the sectional have built in outlets, USB chargers, and remote controlled under lights to set the ambiance. They can be set to any colour! reviews: Condo was perfect for my group. Lots of space for the 4 of us and we loved how close of a walking distance it was to the block of restaurants and bars. The place was clean and had clear instructions on everything, from check-in/out to amenities.
Ideal place to stay . Convenient location, perfect for everything. Clean spacious exactly as showed would stay again
Big place, great value, great location and super responsive and friendly host. I highly recommend.

We really enjoyed our stay at this Air BnB. Communication with the hosts was great, everything was very clear. The condo was really clean and comfortable, just like the pictures. It had everything we needed, so we were able to prepare many of our own meals which was great! The building and neighborhood were very quiet, yet close to everything. Secure onsite parking was fantastic. We would definitely stay here again!
Highly recommend! The hosts were incredible and the location was amazing. Definitely would book again!
This establishment offers an exceptional stay, and the host is exceptionally welcoming. I highly recommend it to everyone.

Stay was great I really recommend this place. The location could not have been any better- so many things to do in the area and the parking was great. Walkability was awesome.
Also the beds were so incredibly comfortable everything was clean and fantastic

Fantastic location, the Air B&B was excellent and exactly as advertised! We had an amazing stay! I would highly recommend this place to anyone! Communication was amazing with the hosts, very responsive and extremely helpful!

When our flight was canceled, we needed a place to stay for a couple more nights. Everything looks as advertised. The master bed was great, but bedroom 2 looks like a pullout mattress and wouldn‚Äôt be for an adult. The gym had what we needed. The only complaint was that we couldn‚Äôt change the temperature. The thermostat was as cold as it could be. We didn‚Äôt reach out for help, but just opened the window. It was easy to get to, but there are lots of steps and codes to keep track of. Overall, it worked for what we needed!
Great hosts, immaculately clean, in a great location, quiet, well priced, and filled with all those bells and whistles that make an Airbnb a comfortable stay. Definitely recommend!
Great location, clean and affordable.
the location is very convenient and the place is peaceful. good for families.

The people I spoke with were really nice and accommodating and it was a nice stay but my only complaint was the place needs some TLC like the kitchen needs a paint job and the cups and kitchen utensils are all pretty out dated and there is only 1 size of coffee cups which are really small and the bathroom has this bright orange look to it which wasn't very appealing to the eyes. Lastly when we arrived the bedroom where there is a tv in it was not cleaned I had to strip the bedding and wash it when we got there as there was 3 separate stains on the blanket. But other than that things were okay.

We had a great stay. The place is spacious and has very good amenities. It is close to supermarkets, shops, and restaurants, allowing you to have options to eat out or at home. Something important to note is that YYC Airport is only 25 minutes away by car.
They have a well-established recycling system, which is greatly appreciated.
Clean and the host are very accommodating.
Great location,close to downtown parks and bars
Excellent place to stay and the price is very good
Great location, just off 17th.  Lots of restaurants, three blocks from a major grocer and half a block from a donut shop.
Super clean and communication was fast and friendly. Could have used an extra blanket. Highly recommend!
Great place to stay and very clear check-in instructions. Lots of restaurants and bars near by. I highly recommend!
vert relaxing
Very comfortable place. Furniture,and appliances high quality. Very nice place
It was a very good stay, and a very good location.
Great stay! Exactly as advertised. Would return

description_html:
Welcome to the Central Suite by Empire Estates! This spacious and centrally located condo unit is the perfect space for corporate stays or a family get away in Calgary.

This unit is the perfect place for a long stay in Calgary, or for a short trip to experience the city. Professionally managed by Empire Estates, this unit stays clean and fully stocked for a comfortable stay.

Our team is available 24/7 during your stay so you always have the support you need while travelling.

The space
LOCATION

One of the best features of this Airbnb is the PRIME location in Calgary’s downtown hotspot. Walking distance to the famous “Red Mile”, the most entertaining strip in the heart of Calgary. Featuring some of the city’s finest dining and most lively nightlife, plus you get your own dedicated covered parking stall for the duration of your stay.

Reserve your dates with us now - we look forward to hosting your stay in Calgary!

-

GENERAL

{The Long}
Our space has been designed to provide you with a fun, functional, and comfortable stay. Our large feature wall creates an inviting space, one where you can relax and feel at home while you stay in Calgary. We’ve added so many extras for you to make your stay memorable, from custom lamps and lighting, premium cable and multiple TVs, to small touches like games, luggage racks, and an air purifier.

During your stay with us you will get your own dedicated parking stall in the covered parkade, free access to the gym, and the ROOF TOP PATIO!

We aim to make your stay in Calgary as enjoyable as possible, one that truly feels like a home away from home. We hope our accommodations go above and beyond – we look forward to hosting you!

{The Short}
-Inviting space
-FREE covered parking stall, gym, and ROOF TOP PATIO
-Professionally managed by Empire Estates

-

ENTRYWAY

Upon entering this unit there will be 2 large sliding mirror doors to your right. Behind the sliding door on the left hand side there is lots of

-

KITCHEN

{The Long}
Our full kitchen comes equipped with everything you could expect to have at home, from cook ware and cutlery to matching plates and cups; this kitchen has it all. This space comes with a full set of appliances which are in perfect working condition.

We’ve made sure to keep our kitchen stocked with all the small appliances you would need at home too, like a toaster, blender, and hot water kettle.

And of course, what kitchen would be complete without a coffee station?! We provide complimentary coffee, sugar, cream and tea so you can enjoy a fresh cup whenever you need one.

{The Short}
-Fully stocked
-Full set of appliances
-Small appliances also provided
-FREE coffee station

-

LIVING ROOM

{The Long}

The oversized windows of the sliding glass door in this room provide tons of natural light, while also offering great views of the downtown core. Our comfy sectional pulls out into a queen size bed for an additional sleeping space, and extra bedding and pillows are kept in the storage compartment of the sectional.

The side tables on each side of the sectional have built in outlets, USB chargers, and remote controlled under lights to set the ambiance. They can be set to any colour! The dual lamps in this room also come with a remote so you can easily control the brightness of the light in the room. There is also an Air Purifier located beside the sectional so you can ensure you have the cleanest air possible while enjoying your stay with us.

The 50” Smart TV comes with Netflix, Amazon Prime and more. All you have to do is log into your account to instantly stream your favourite movies and shows.

This space also has a dedicated office desk and chair. The large mat on this desk works as an oversized mouse pad, and the table lamp has its own remote so you can control the brightness of your work space.

{The Short}
-Access to private patio
-Pullout sectional
-Nightstands with outlets, USBs, and remote controlled lights
-Tall lamps with remote control
-50" Smart TV
-Air Purifier
-Desk and office chair

-

BEDROOM #1

{The Long}
The master bedroom of this unit comes with a comfy KING size bed. Matching nightstands and lamps provide the perfect setting for getting a good nights rest. This room comes with a wall mounted 42” TV with a Shaw cable box installed. This box is loaded with tons of premium channels and apps – all you have to do is talk into the remote and tell it what you want to watch!

This bedroom has sliding mirror doors which offer plenty of storage space in the closet to organize your belongings, and we also provide a luggage rack. The window is this room provides more downtown views and can easily slide open for fresh air. The darkening blinds can be pulled down or pushed up to control the lighting.

{The Short}
-KING bed
-42" TV with Shaw cable box - voice controlled remote!
-Large mirror
-Closet with storage space
-Luggage rack
-Sliding window with downtown views
-Room darkening shades

-

BATHROOM

The bathroom in this unit comes with a bathtub/shower combo. We keep this space fully stocked with shampoo, conditioner, and body wash.

-

LAUNDRY

We have free in suite washer and dryer along with detergent and dryer sheets so you can keep your clothing fresh and clean while travelling. We also provide complimentary iron and ironing board.

-

BALCONY

The closed in balcony of this unit is an amazing feature which really helps you get a full experience of the city. Being walking distance to the Saddledome (home of the Calgary Flames) and the Calgary Stampede (the largest outdoor show on earth), this central location is one of the best in the city, and our balcony puts you at the heart of it all!


We provide FREE
• Coffee and tea
• Sugar and coffee cream
• Cooking utensils
• Cutlery
• Wifi
• Air purifier
• Games
• Parking
• Self check-in
• Full kitchen
• In suite laundry
• Quality shampoo and conditioner
• Body wash
• Private balcony

Guest access
• Free, dedicated parking stall. Please view full check-in instructions to view location of stall and all other check-in details.

*Parking Clearance is 6 FT.

• Initial entry to building is by dialing intercom. Intercom code will be given on day of arrival (only to be used one time for first building entry).

• FOB will be in lockbox inside the building and can be used for easy access in and out of building for remainder of your stay.

• FOB must be left in the lockbox at end of your stay, otherwise there will be a $500 replacement fee.

• We cannot accept check ins after 9:00PM.

• Garbage room is located on main floor of building. Garbage and recycling can be discarded here.

• Free in-suite washer and dryer.

• Private balcony.

Other things to note
• Host can be contacted through the Airbnb app 24/7.

Guest Verification Required:
-To ensure the safety and security of all our guests and our property, we require a government-issued photo ID to be submitted after your reservation is confirmed. This is a standard part of our verification process.

- Failure to return furniture to its original position upon checkout may incur a fee.

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Colours is situated on the edge of both Victoria Park and in the Beltline.Victoria Park is an up-and-coming area, with converted warehouses on 1st Street SW, now home to cool clothes designers and offbeat home decor shops. Eateries include casual cafes, laid-back global spots and Jewish delis, while bars and small music venues get lively after dark. The Saddledome arena hosts concerts and Calgary Flames hockey games, and the annual Calgary Stampede rodeo takes place at Stampede Park.The hip Beltline area is bounded by 17th Avenue SW, with cool boutiques selling fashion, retro furniture, vinyl and quirky gifts. Dining spans trendy taco joints, locavore eateries and Korean restaurants, while nightlife encompasses craft beer pubs, live music venues and dance clubs. There are landscaped gardens at Central Memorial Park.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: City transit (C-Train and bus) are available and stops are conveniently located nearby. Taxis, Ubers, bike and scooter rentals are also options. You'll find that you'll be able to walk to many of the local amenities. There are so many convenient restaurants, pubs, stores and things to do in close proximity.We have one reserved parkade spot included in your stay but if you have visitors, paid street parking is available.

description_html:
Perched on the 15th floor, this bright corner suite has floor‑to‑ceiling windows spanning 60 feet—delivering panoramic views of city skyline, the Rockies, and Stampede fireworks (July!). Nestled in the vibrant Beltline, you’re a short walk from the Stampede grounds and steps from top restaurants, pubs, and cafés on 17th Ave, Stephen Ave, and First Street. Whether you’re here to explore downtown or embarking on a road trip to Banff or Drumheller, you’ll love returning to this plush urban retreat.

The space
Open‑Plan Comfort: Welcome into a bright kitchen equipped for basic cooking, flowing into a dining area and spacious living room.

Multi‑Use Nook: A dedicated workstation and yoga/meditation corner let you stay productive or unwind in style.

Restful Retreat: The bedroom features a plush queen‑size bed with luxurious linens for a restful night’s sleep.

Spa‑Inspired Bath: The three‑piece bathroom is conveniently located off the living area.

Iconic Windows: Floor‑to‑ceiling glazing along all exterior walls offers stunning, uninterrupted views.

Guest access
Entire Suite: You’ll enjoy full privacy in your 15th‑floor corner apartment.

Rooftop Oasis: Shared access to the colourful rooftop patio with artistic sunbrellas and lush raised gardens—perfect for soaking in sunshine or city lights.

Other things to note
*Review house rules before booking*

Please message us upon booking—we'd love to know what brings you to Calgary and who will be staying. We are happy to answer any questions and provide personalized recommendations for your stay!

IG handle: @birdstone.nests

Your Beltline adventure starts here—book now for the ultimate Calgary skyline experience!

location_details_html:
Colours is situated on the edge of both Victoria Park and in the Beltline.

Victoria Park is an up-and-coming area, with converted warehouses on 1st Street SW, now home to cool clothes designers and offbeat home decor shops. Eateries include casual cafes, laid-back global spots and Jewish delis, while bars and small music venues get lively after dark. The Saddledome arena hosts concerts and Calgary Flames hockey games, and the annual Calgary Stampede rodeo takes place at Stampede Park.

The hip Beltline area is bounded by 17th Avenue SW, with cool boutiques selling fashion, retro furniture, vinyl and quirky gifts. Dining spans trendy taco joints, locavore eateries and Korean restaurants, while nightlife encompasses craft beer pubs, live music venues and dance clubs. There are landscaped gardens at Central Memorial Park.

reviews_details.host_response:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We‚Äôre glad you enjoyed the location and views, but we‚Äôre sorry your experience fell short of expectations in some areas.
We‚Äôd like to clarify a few points for future guests. The water outage during your stay was an unexpected emergency shut-off by the building, with no advance notice provided to anyone. Unfortunately, a maintenance worker incorrectly told you otherwise, and they‚Äôve since been addressed for spreading misinformation. Once the water returned, silt in the system needed to be flushed ‚Äî a normal result of emergency plumbing repairs.
We know the check-in process is a little more detailed than a hotel, but it‚Äôs necessary to maintain security in the residential building. This is why we ask guests to review the instructions beforehand, and we‚Äôre happy to answer any questions before arrival.
We apologize for the complimentary welcome basket containing a few items past their best before date ‚Äî not expired ‚Äî and we‚Äôve made sure this won‚Äôt happen again.
Regarding comfort, we‚Äôre sorry the bed and pillows weren‚Äôt to your preference. Many guests have praised the bed‚Äôs comfort, but we understand everyone has different needs. The flat pillows you found are intended for those who prefer softer support, and firmer memory foam pillows were provided in the closet (we noticed you used them).
Thank you also for flagging the coffee machine ‚Äî it‚Äôs likely due for a descaling, which we could have addressed had we known during your stay.
Finally, we understand rates during Stampede season are higher ‚Äî this is true citywide, including hotels ‚Äî and we regret if that impacted your sense of value.
We sincerely appreciate your feedback as it helps us improve, and we‚Äôre happy you still found some aspects of your stay enjoyable. Wishing you all the best on your future travels.

description_html:
Welcome to your urban retreat in the heart of Calgary! This stylish 1-bedroom condo is perfectly located in the vibrant Beltline district—just steps away from trendy restaurants, cafes, shops, nightlife, and Calgary’s iconic Stampede Grounds.

Whether you’re here for business or pleasure, this modern space offers all the comforts of home with a touch of luxury overlooking the city on the 16th floor.

The space
• Bright, open-concept layout with large windows and city views
• Fully equipped kitchen with spices, oil, toaster, coffee maker etc
• Comfortable queen-sized bed with high-quality linens and soft lighting for the ultimate relaxing experience
• Additional pull out couch for two more guests or children
• Fully stocked bathroom with shampoo, conditioner, body wash and blow dryer
• Cozy living area with smart TV (log into your favourite streaming service)
• High-speed Wi-Fi for remote work
• In-suite washer and dryer, iron and detergent
• Private balcony with bbq
• Walking distance to Calgary Tower, 17th Ave, Stephen Ave, Saddledome and Stampede
• Ideal for solo travelers, couples, business professionals, family and friends!

PLEASE NOTE HOUSE RULES:
1. No parties or events allowed. No unregistered guests allowed.
2. No smoking allowed. Any remnants or smell left behind will result in a $500 fine charged to your Airbnb account.
3. No pets allowed.
4. Please respect noise levels and noise curfew. 10PM on weekends and 9PM on weekdays.
5. Please take care of your fob keys. Lost keys will require you to pay a replacement fee.
6. Please take care of the space. You must pay the appropriate cost for any damages or theft caused on the property.
7. No illegal substances allowed on the premises. You will be asked to leave with no refund.
8. We use a privacy-safe decibel monitoring system to ensure noise stays within acceptable limits. Thank you for being considerate of neighbours

Book your stay and experience Calgary like a local from one of the city’s most walkable and dynamic neighbourhoods!

Guest access
• Secure building with keyless entry
• Underground heated parking stall included

Other things to note
We use a smart noise monitoring device that tracks decibel levels in the common area to help prevent parties and ensure guest safety. It does not record audio and is 100% privacy compliant. No monitoring is done in the bathroom or bedroom. Thank you for respecting our neighbours!

Packed with trendy cafes, craft breweries, art galleries, and boutique shops, it’s a hotspot for foodies and culture lovers alike. You’ll be steps from the historic 17th Ave SW (“The Red Mile”), beautiful Central Memorial Park, and quick transit to all parts of the city. Whether you’re here for business or pleasure, the Beltline offers a perfect mix of convenience, character, and community.

name: Rental unit in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ5.0 ¬∑ 1 bedroom ¬∑ 2 beds ¬∑ 1 bath
description: Welcome to our charming heritage property in Calgary! Immerse yourself in rich history and character in this renovated apartment. Located near 4th Street and 17th Avenue, explore shops and cafes, with bike and walking paths nearby. Experience old-world charm with modern comforts like marble countertops and fireplaces. Whether for business or pleasure, enjoy plush bedding and high-speed internet. Come experience Calgary's magic from our unique hideaway. Welcome home!The spaceNestled in the charming neighborhood of Cliff Bungalow, Calgary, this heritage property blends timeless character with modern comforts. Impeccably maintained, our family-run retreat offers a unique escape that‚Äôs hard to capture without experiencing it firsthand. Enjoy a lush garden oasis teeming with birds and squirrels, a serene hideaway amidst the city‚Äôs vibrant hustle and bustle. Perfect for nature lovers and city explorers alike, our home promises an unforgettable stay.Other things to notePlease note that you will be required to climb one story of stairs to access this unit.Sofa bed is a futon, not a pull out bed.This is a heritage home, and therefore noise travels easily. Please understand that the quiet hours are strictly enforced for the pleasure of our guests.We have a designated parking available for our guests. Please note that it accommodates a single vehicle and may be quite snug for larger vehicles (especially taller ones). If this poses an issue, we can assist in registering your vehicle for street parking to override the parking time allotments. Just let us know, and we‚Äôll be happy to help ensure a smooth parking experience for you.Registration DetailsBL279210

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Cliff Bungalow is a historic and vibrant neighborhood nestled in the heart of Calgary, Alberta. Known for its charming character homes, tree-lined streets, and eclectic atmosphere, this community offers a unique blend of urban living and peaceful retreat. Residents enjoy easy access to boutique shops, trendy cafes, and local eateries along 4th Street and 17th Avenue. With picturesque views of the city skyline and proximity to parks and pathways, Cliff Bungalow is a sought-after destination for those seeking a dynamic and connected lifestyle in Calgary.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: There is one designated carport stall for guests. There is also street parking available with a guest pass to override the 2-hour allotment upon request. All areas are walkable with plenty of bike lanes and e-scooters.

description_by_sections.value: Welcome to our charming heritage property in Calgary! Immerse yourself in rich history and character in this renovated apartment. Located near 4th Street and 17th Avenue, explore shops and cafes, with bike and walking paths nearby. Experience old-world charm with modern comforts like marble countertops and fireplaces. Whether for business or pleasure, enjoy plush bedding and high-speed internet. Come experience Calgary's magic from our unique hideaway. Welcome home!

description_by_sections.title: The space
description_by_sections.value: Nestled in the charming neighborhood of Cliff Bungalow, Calgary, this heritage property blends timeless character with modern comforts. Impeccably maintained, our family-run retreat offers a unique escape that‚Äôs hard to capture without experiencing it firsthand. Enjoy a lush garden oasis teeming with birds and squirrels, a serene hideaway amidst the city‚Äôs vibrant hustle and bustle. Perfect for nature lovers and city explorers alike, our home promises an unforgettable stay.

description_by_sections.title: Other things to note
description_by_sections.value: Please note that you will be required to climb one story of stairs to access this unit.Sofa bed is a futon, not a pull out bed.This is a heritage home, and therefore noise travels easily. Please understand that the quiet hours are strictly enforced for the pleasure of our guests.We have a designated parking available for our guests. Please note that it accommodates a single vehicle and may be quite snug for larger vehicles (especially taller ones). If this poses an issue, we can assist in registering your vehicle for street parking to override the parking time allotments. Just let us know, and we‚Äôll be happy to help ensure a smooth parking experience for you.

description_html:
Welcome to our charming heritage property in Calgary! Immerse yourself in rich history and character in this renovated apartment. Located near 4th Street and 17th Avenue, explore shops and cafes, with bike and walking paths nearby. Experience old-world charm with modern comforts like marble countertops and fireplaces. Whether for business or pleasure, enjoy plush bedding and high-speed internet. Come experience Calgary's magic from our unique hideaway. Welcome home!

The space
Nestled in the charming neighborhood of Cliff Bungalow, Calgary, this heritage property blends timeless character with modern comforts. Impeccably maintained, our family-run retreat offers a unique escape that’s hard to capture without experiencing it firsthand. Enjoy a lush garden oasis teeming with birds and squirrels, a serene hideaway amidst the city’s vibrant hustle and bustle. Perfect for nature lovers and city explorers alike, our home promises an unforgettable stay.

Other things to note
Please note that you will be required to climb one story of stairs to access this unit.

Sofa bed is a futon, not a pull out bed.

This is a heritage home, and therefore noise travels easily. Please understand that the quiet hours are strictly enforced for the pleasure of our guests.

We have a designated parking available for our guests. Please note that it accommodates a single vehicle and may be quite snug for larger vehicles (especially taller ones). If this poses an issue, we can assist in registering your vehicle for street parking to override the parking time allotments. Just let us know, and we’ll be happy to help ensure a smooth parking experience for you.

Welcome to our stunning 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo unit in the heart of downtown Calgary! This modern and stylish retreat offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience, making it the ideal choice for both business travelers and vacationers seeking an unforgettable stay in this vibrant city.

Fun, Friendly, Vibrant, and Walkable!

Take the elevator up to the 4th floor where your lovely accommodation awaits.

Upon entering the condo, you'll be greeted by a spacious and beautifully furnished living area, designed to provide a relaxing atmosphere after a day of exploring the city. Sink into the plush sofas and catch up on your favorite shows on the large flat-screen TV, or simply unwind while enjoying the panoramic views of the Calgary skyline through the floor-to-ceiling windows.

The fully equipped kitchen boasts sleek countertops, modern appliances, and all the essentials you need to whip up a delicious meal. Whether you prefer to prepare a gourmet feast or simply brew a cup of coffee to start your day, this kitchen has you covered. Adjacent to the kitchen is a stylish dining area with seating for four, perfect for enjoying meals with family and friends or catching up on some work.

Ensuite laundry, and washer are available. We also offer an underground parking stall

Additionally, the condo is conveniently located within walking distance of Calgary's most popular attractions, restaurants, shopping centers, and entertainment venues. Whether you're here for business or pleasure, you'll be perfectly positioned to explore everything Calgary has to offer.

We are committed to ensuring your stay is exceptional and memorable. Our responsive and friendly team is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions or concerns that may arise. We strive to provide a five-star experience for all our guests and look forward to hosting you in our downtown Calgary condo. Book now and make your visit to this vibrant city truly unforgettable!

name: Condo in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.72 ¬∑ 1 bedroom ¬∑ 1 bed ¬∑ 1 bath
description: Welcome to your modern home-away-from-home, perfectly situated just minutes from downtown and steps from vibrant 17th Avenue and Mission. Including a fully equipped kitchen, laundry, underground parking, and a private balcony for those cozy eveningsYou‚Äôll be within walking distance of top-rated restaurants, grocery stores, river pathways, fitness centres, and the Saddledome. Whether you‚Äôre in town for work or leisure, this centrally located gem puts the best of the city right at your doorstep.The spaceThis bright and modern apartment offers a welcoming blend of comfort and convenience. Featuring an open-concept layout, secure underground parking, a yoga mat, and light weights for your at-home workouts. Designed for both short and long stays, this space feels like home in the heart of the city.Registration DetailsBL264196
reviews: I loved my stay! The apartment was spotless, very comfortable, and exactly as described in the listing. The location is perfect close to everything.The host was incredibly responsive and thoughtful. I would definitely stay here again!

The location was excellent, with lots of great shopping and restaurants just a short walk away. The condo was very clean, and check-in was super easy. I would definitely stay again on a future trip to Calgary.

Great location & walkable to everything you need in town. We liked the apartment, everything was as shown in the photos.
There is air con but it‚Äôs extremely loud, so we couldn‚Äôt sleep with it on. Communication with the host could have been better but overall we enjoyed our stay.

The location was perfect. A lot of pubs and restaurants for food. It was a cute little condo perfect for 1 or 2 people for a weekend away. The a/c is two portable units, which could be a bit noisy to some, but we have a fan running all night at home anyways so it didn't bother us and  just gave us the white noise. Would definitely stay again.

Pros - good location, spacious, clean, well equipped, outside balcony is a bonus.
Cons - the bedroom is so bright we had to wear eye masks all night every night. It's the only window in the apartment without a blind, which doesn't make sense, and has a very thin white curtain which basically does nothing. Even at night, there's a bright lamp directly outside, so it's always bright. Frustrating when having a dark place to sleep is a pretty basic requirement of accomodation.
I also messaged, twice, for help or just advice on storing luggage before the flight and they just ignored my questions and instead just continued to send automated messages about checking out. Again, frustrating. Overall we would recommend despite this.

Stayed at Virginias during my stay in Calgary, first time comer so didn‚Äôt know the area too well before arrival- Virginia had recommendations to all her favourite places near by which help! Condo was clean and quiet! Definitely will be using Virginia‚Äôs Airbnb next time I‚Äôm in!
Virginias place was in an amazing location and very well kept and cleaned. All necessities were there like coffee, cups, shampoo, etc

Great location! Other reviews nicely capture the location / condition etc
Good value for money for sure
Great place to stay. Location had lots of places to eat nearby. The apartment itself was as described, very clean with lots of space for two people. Highly recommend!
Great stay at this place, it was nice and spacious and clean. We had a fun stay. Virginia was very accommodating and responsive to our inquiries too. 10/10
Great location for us and the time we spent at the MNP arena. Nice area with lots of restaurants.
Amazing stay. Host checks in with you throughout the stay to make sure everything is well and comfortable. I will definitely book again next time!

Great location! Lots to do nearby in terms of restaurants. Also a short walk to the river which was a lovely walk.
Fabulous to have a parking spot too!

Great location. Lots of walkable places. Cute place. Super responsive.
I would come back!
Love the mission neighborhood!  The apartment was a little warm, a tiny bit noisy and I would have loved some face cloths.   But aside from that I would definitely stay here again!
Lots to enjoy at this unbeatable location with parking! This quiet spacious condo has all the amenities and the 24/7 convenience, restaurants,  grocery are footsteps away. Balcony included!  üòé

Was great to be back in Mission... only a couple blocks from where I lived my first 4 years in Calgary. The place was nicely decorated, with some personal flair. Great decorating. Have already recommended it to some friends.
Virginia was excellent and the place was beautiful. It was like home!
It is a spacious apartment, Virginia is a great, friendly and accommodating host!
She was very welcoming and would stay again.
Great location, clean suite I would recommend staying here
Fantastic spot and beautifully decorated. Very comfortable and Virginia was lovely and very helpful.

Very beautiful apartment within walking distance of many great restaurants and things to do.
The host provided clear instructions for check-in & out
I was in Calgary filming an event at the MNP Sport complex. An easy 15 minute walk. Convenience of location was great. It was just what I was looking for.

name: Condo in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.74 ¬∑ 1 bedroom ¬∑ 1 bed ¬∑ 1 bath
description: Enjoy a luxurious yet cozy experience at this centrally located condo in the heart of downtown Calgary with views of the city skyline, especially at night! Minutes walking distance to notorious bars and clubs along 10th avenue and 5 minute walk to 17th Ave. Easy access to McLeod trail, Crowchild trail, and Deerfoot.The spaceSoft and incredibly comfy leather recliner couch with a captain recliner rocking chair. Soft fluffy carpet to bring a cozy feel to the living room with a huge 60 inch 4K TV. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need to cook up your favourite meal, and a Two stooled island dining table in the centre. Washer and dryer hidden behind a closet door next to a fully equipped washroom with a bathtub shower, and last but not least a comfy memory foam Queen bed bedroom with windows overlooking the city scape for the sweetest dreamsGuest accessGuests have access to all building amenities which includes  the fitness centre and sky lounge.Registration DetailsBL290601
reviews: Thank you. I was impressed by very smooth check-in process. Right before I came to Calgary, my previous reservation got cancelled due to a unforseen problem. Soon after I booked Tommy's airbnb, I got a response and I could be relaxed before taking a flight to Calgary.

The unit does not have window coverings. During the time in the year when the light doesn't go away until 9-10pm, it's hard to fall asleep if you have an early schedule.
Cleaners didn't service the unit properly, no towels in the bathroom and the kitchen, and when I pulled some from the dryer, there were hairs on them.
Kitchen is minimally equipped, in case you are planning to prepare light meals.

Pros: Excellent location, clean, quiet building
Cons: Drinking glasses were dirty and was not provided with any kitchen cloths to wash dishes, no face cloths or hand towels provided anywhere, missing smoke alarm, no top sheet on bed, no parking included.

Had a great stay! The place was squeaky clean, great views and had everything I needed. The host had great communication and was very responsive. The location is very close to the best Calgary nightlife all in walkable distance. All in all a great stay, would love to come back.
Our stay was great! The place was very clean and secure. The location is wonderful if you want to be downtown Calgary
A great option for being right in the core of downtown Calgary. A bit noisy at night with the train but otherwise great.

Beautiful suite to stay at if you‚Äôre in the city of Calgary for a few nights! Within walking distance to all restaurants and amenities, friendly and responsive hosts and beautiful views off the balcony would definitely recommend to anybody staying in the city, felt right at home! Will definitely be back!

We left two days earlier before our check out date. Stayed only one night. Airbnb support team member John was attentive, polite, and problem solver. With all the photos and videos he requested from us, Airbnb support team came up with a solution by offering us two options. John followed all the guidelines, rules and messaged us the two options. We opted for the check out. Didn‚Äôt consider the next option at all.
Thank you Airbnb support team.
Our stay was very comfortable, it was what we expected . The view at night was very lovely. Would stay and recommend Tommy to others .
Host is very responsive and place is very clean and in a good location will definitely book it again
Very responsive host. I enjoyed each minute I stayed in the unit. Definitely recommend!

The location was very noisy and the building was in a very low elevation. Should have stated this Airbnb was on the 6th floor of the building. The pool was not very nice and the "Sky lounge" was in the 2nd floor and not on the top floor. There was also no curtain/blinds in the living room so ppl can easily see us from the other buildings. Supplies were hastily all gathered in the broken door coat closet with some spillage - very unorganized. There where bedsheets and towels left on the dryer. Heard on top of the lung shout in the first night as well as the train can be heard in the bedroom. Bathroom only has one rag, thus, have to drag the rag near bathtub and counter space, vice versa. Invisible stains near toilet sit walls seen by UV light. In addition, there is no extra shelf to put essentials, clean clothing and stuff, and that was quite a  hassle - had to put a chair inside to put my gf's stuff on a clean surface. Price: same as the most hotels, approx. 505 Cad for 2 nights
Great place   very quiet and comfortable. I highly recommend  I would stay again. Thanks for hosting me.
Loved my stay at Tommy‚Äôs place. Looked like the pictures, was squeaky clean, quiet, and such a beautiful apartment! Host was very responsive and friendly. Highly recommend!

Insane noise. You can hear conversations on the street from inside the apartment.
Slow to respond to messages.
Tried to extend before my check out and they respond after saying I can then I was working and the place was booked out as I had to re submit even though I requested extension prior to end of my term as per the RULES.
Lastly, the place had construction going on the entire time in the hallway.
I was there for work and it was a nightmare.

The stay was fine, but the host was extremely rude. He manages multiple properties on the premises and wrongly accused me of an issue caused by another resident. After realizing his mistake, he never communicated back with me or offered an apology for the confusion and accusation. Very unprofessional.

It‚Äôs a decent location however it had a train directly outside the space which was pretty loud at times. We were forced to re wash the bed sheets as they had a moldy smell to them but think it might have been the actual machine themselves.
Walked from Cesars Downtown to here. Easy 15 minutes to some of the best places in Calgary. The place looks exactly like the photos, no need to worry, and is squeaky clean.

Location, location, location! Close to everything downtown and some great galleries.
Deep bathtub was great to have. Wish the main space windows had vertical blinds for privacy and room temperature. (Stayed in November).
This was a great location. Would recommend.
Nize cozy apartment neighbours and security were very welcoming, nice view beautiful home
Thank you for the stay communicated and answered any questions or feedback I had about anything else that could be included the stay was very peaceful and perfect thank you so much I recommend
Great location, nice apartment, no issues with noise
Great service. Good views good surrounding neighborhood

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Beltline (10th Ave) is one of the most strategic sought after locations in Calgary, with restaurants and bars scattered all along the avenue and easy access into and out of the core of downtown into either direction north or south.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: 8 minute walk to the nearest LRT station to get you anywhere you need to be in the city. 10th avenue goes directly onto two major highways (Macleod trail and Crowchild Trail). 7 minute walk to 17th avenue, Calgary number one hotspot for bars, restaurants and nightlife. Tons of street parking
