description_html:
Cozy one-bedroom unit right on 17th Ave. Very lively neighbourhood. Walking distance to restaurants, bars, shops, amenities, Saddledome, and the Calgary stampede.

The space
• free designated parking
• Crave on 50” TV
• Optic Fiber Telus Internet up to 250 Mbps
• 2 minutes walking distance to Laundromat
• Noise monitor in place to ensure respectful noise levels are maintained
• Extra bed (double) will be set up in living room for bookings with more than 2 people. Extra bed can also be set up for an additional $14/night upon request

Other things to note
• A violation of the House Rules can lead to a fine and an immediate removal of all guests without refund, please read the House Rules carefully.
• Balcony is not accessible to prevent pipes from freezing during the winter season.

Highly recommend this unit and working with Kyle. The place was as described: clean, spacious, with beautiful views and a fully equipped kitchen, etc. The check-in and check-out process was easy, the instructions were clear, and Kyle was a friendly and responsive host.

nice place, hosts were helpful and friendly.

Visiting Calgary for work, the apartment perfectly met my expectations. It is very well located in a modern condo with all the necessary amenities. The view from the balcony with the lights in the setting sun is a huge plus! Communication with Kyle was easy, everything was done to make my stay pleasant. Would definitely stay here again!
great place in amazing location

We loved the area and above all, the view from the apartment.
From the beginning it felt quite cozy‚Ä¶ we will miss Calgary, we will certainly return to the same accommodation.
Great place

I really liked the apartment. The proximity to my language school was particularly important to me, but all sights, supermarkets, etc. were also easily accessible on foot.
The view of the Canadian Rockies in the morning at sunrise was indescribable!
The kitchen is equipped with the most necessary things, high-quality kitchen appliances and a large refrigerator complete the furnishings.

The apartment was clean and in a very well maintained condition.
Communication with Kyle and Andrew went smoothly and I felt like they really cared about me. This made me feel at home.
Thank you for having me as your guest!
I would book the apartment again and again and recommend it to anyone who wants to discover Calgary.

description_html:
Stylish and comfortable one bedroom condo with floor to ceiling windows and beautiful high rise views of the Calgary skyline.

This condo is located in the heart of the Beltline. Walking distance to restaurants, bars, shops, grocery stores and all popular/trendy avenues. 5 minute drive to the river, Stampede grounds and the Saddledome.

Please be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location.

The space
Our condo boasts all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. The air conditioning ensures that you stay cool during the warmer months, while the cozy king bed promises a restful night's sleep. You'll also have the convenience of underground parking, so you can explore the city without worrying about parking hassles.


Notable Features:
-Balcony with Calgary skyline view
-Dedicated work station
-Dining Table (2 seats)
-Fresh bedding & linens
-Fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries
-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)
-30" TV in the bedroom
-Bright living room w/ sofa
-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities
-High-speed WiFi
-Free underground parking
-Hairdryer
-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machine

ID Verification Required for our property.

All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.

Guest access
You will have entire private access to the condo

For patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.

*** POOL is closed for the winter.

name: Rental unit in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ3.67 ¬∑ 1 bedroom ¬∑ 1.5 shared baths
description: Master bedroom in the belt line DT Calgary.  Outdoor heated pool, gym, tennis & squash courts, putting green, next door to Hudson's Bar.  Next door to a park, Safeway, liquor store and 24 hour convenience store.  There's a cat, BIG tv and an Xbox.The space5 min walk from the Calgary StampedeGuest accessindoor gym, outdoor heated pool, squash & tennis courts, sky deck, putting green, media room.During your stayOther person living there is a very nice/funny guy from New Zealand.  Keeps to himself / is out alot.Other things to noteThere's a cat named Mylo who is hilarious and friendly.Registration DetailsBL647995
reviews:
Very nice apartment . Comfortable room . The couple who lived in the apartment are lovely people and fun .
The apartment in the city center is very convenient to get to any place .
Great apartment in an excellent location. Beautiful views of downtown Calgary and a very welcoming host. Overall a wonderful stay!

The location was central downtown right across from the lougheed house where we were scheduled to attend a wedding. Walking distance to several pubs and restaurants as well as stampede. Host was not quick to respond and was late for the scheduled check-in.  The private bedroom smells like an ashtray - so much that our clothes contained that smell even after we left.  The shared bathroom was a sight to see. It doesn't look like it has been tended to in months. There was brown gunk at the base of the toilet. There was black mould along the floorboard. The sink area had a thick layer of dirt and a film of white stuff. The sink drains slowly as though something is clogged.  The main area smelled like kitty litter and cat urine.  The idea of showering here was unappealing. So much that I sought out the nearest GoodLife fitness for an area to shower.  The host was kind enough to offer us wine. Although we declined because we had plans. This place is best suited for someone who goes out late and simply needs a bed to crash.

Very worth for the price. The rooftop patio and parking spot is a great perk especially being downtown.
Overall a great stay :)

description_html:
Step into our tranquil 2-bed Beltline gem! Enjoy dining at the spacious table for 6. Relax in the king-sized primary bedroom, and the secondary offers a cozy double bed. For added flexibility there is also a queen sized pull out couch! Insuite laundry and a fully stocked kitchen await. Building perks include a fitness area and rooftop patio with stunning downtown views. Walkability is amazing from this unit, with 17th ave only 3 blocks away! Newly added portable AC keeps things cool when needed!

The space
Experience serenity and comfort in this spacious 2-bedroom condo with modern amenities and a prime location:

Bright & Spacious:
-South-facing balcony for abundant natural light
-Open floor plan with a dining table for 6+ extra seating at the kitchen island

Relaxing Bedrooms:
-Primary bedroom with a king-sized bed and ample closet space
-Second bedroom with a cozy double bed
-Queen-sized pull-out couch in the living room for extra guests
-Portable AC unit that can be used in either bedroom

Bathroom:
-Plush Face, Hand, and Bath Towels
-Stocked with Shampoo, Conditioner, and Body Wash

Convenience:
-Kitchen equipped with a blender, coffee maker, toaster, hot water kettle, and baking essentials
-Keurig Coffee and complimentary coffee pods
-Dedicated laundry room and a 4-piece bathroom
-58" Smart TV

Building Perks:
-Fitness area
-Rooftop Patio with breathtaking city views

Prime Location:
-Surrounded by eateries, shops, and vibrant downtown Calgary
-Perfect for urban explorers and those seeking a dynamic lifestyle

With contemporary upgrades and a peaceful setting, this condo is the ultimate retreat for your stay!

Guest access
You will have access to the entire Condo during your stay.

Other things to note
-Missing keys incur a $250 replacement fee.
-Respect condo bylaws, especially quiet hours after 10pm. We use a noise monitoring device; It does NOT record actual sounds or conversations, it simply monitors the noise level (measured in decibels). Minut is 100% privacy compliant and is required on this property. If you have any questions, please ask! :)

name: Condo in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.92 ¬∑ 1 bedroom ¬∑ 2 beds ¬∑ 1 bath
description: Welcome to this amazing south-west facing one bedroom unit. Fun, Friendly, Vibrant and Walkable!You will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located condo, close to Stampede grounds, famous 17 Ave, and Downtown. This space provides all you need for an enjoyable stay, including FREE underground parking, and easy access to Starbucks, bars, and restaurants at your doorstep!We are excited to welcome you to our condo!The spaceYou are welcomed by the spacious open living room. complimented by floor to ceiling windows and flooded with sunlight.  Turn on the 55" UHD 4k Smart TV to Roku, YouTube and others popular channels. Feel free to connect your iPhone, Android  to Smart TV using casting technologies and see/listen your favourite streams on TV.A frosted glass sliding partition creates separation for the master bedroom. It ensures optimal open concept living.In suite laundry and washer are available. We also offer underground parking stall and bike storage.Guest accessEntire space plus building amenities is included in this rental. Please, make yourself at home.Other things to noteColours by Battistella is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay. Upon arrival the host willprovide you introduction to the building, bylaw and specific rules for Airbnb guests. Condo bylaws rules1. Upon arrival at Colours by Battistella, you must complete a ‚ÄúTenant Undertaking Form‚Äù which provides management company (Equium Group) with basic contact information for emergency purposes and ensure that you have acknowledged that you understand and will comply with the Bylaws and standards of our community. 2. Our building is professionally managed by Equium Group. They will dispatch maintenance staff in the event of any emergency building-related service issues such as flooding, however they will not provide any additional services related to your  stay or your suite. Please contact your rental owner for any suite-related issues you may have.3. If your suite has any building-related service issues such as lack of hot or cold running water, water leaks, or lack of heat or air conditioning, these may be reported or by calling rental owner or Equium‚Äôs after-hours.4. You are responsible to help always maintain the security of our building by safekeeping your keys, and by not letting unknown people or vehicles follow you through doors into the building at any time. 5. As per City of Calgary Bylaws, no more than two guests per bedroom are allowed in your rental suite at any time. Inviting additional guests or visitors, hosting parties or any other social gatherings, is always prohibited.6. City Bylaws require observation of quiet time from 10:00 pm to 7:00 am weekdays and from 10:00 pm to 9:00 am on weekends, and building Bylaws restrict excessive noise that may disturb other residents at any time of the day.7. Use of units for activities which are illegal or that will be injurious to the reputation of the building are strictly prohibited.8. Smoking or vaping of tobacco or cannabis products is prohibited in all interior areas of the building including residential suites, hallways, elevators, parking areas, lobbies and all exterior areas always. Permission to smoke of tobacco products (and for clarity, not cannabis) on your balcony is at the discretion of your suite owner, provided they are following building bylaws.9. No cigarette butts, waste material or any other objects may be disposed of or thrown from your balcony at any time, as they can cause extreme danger from heights. Violations can result in City of Calgary Bylaw fines of up to $10,000 and/or criminal prosecution.10. Waste disposal, recycling and compost bins are available in the garbage room. All waste disposals must be in these areas, disposed of in well-tied, leak-proof bags or similar. No personal belongings or waste can be left in the common hallways outside your suite at any time.11. No signs, banners, laundry or any other objects may be hung or displayed from windows or balconies at any time.12. Exterior windows and balcony doors must remain closed in extreme cold weather conditions to prevent freezing of water lines or other damage to the building. You shall obey any rules made or posted by the Condominium Board regarding the use and care of the building, and any parking lot, balconies or common areas. Do not turn the thermostats in the unit to the ‚Äúoff‚Äù position. The interior unit temperature cannot be set below 15 degrees Celsius.13. Pets are not allowed in units which operate as short-term rental suites.14. Violation of building Bylaws or rules can result in fines, reporting to appropriate authorities, or eviction from Colours by Battistella In the event of any breach of the above Rules and Policies, any of the following actions listed below may be applied:FINE SCHEDULE‚Ä¢ Noise Complaint ‚Äì $500.00 fine.‚Ä¢ Exclusive Space - $500.00 fine.‚Ä¢ Illegal Garbage Disposal - $500.00 fine.‚Ä¢ Please refer to Colours by Battistella Bylaws for a list of all offences.Registration DetailsBL268401
reviews: I had a wonderful stay! Lenovo was a great host ‚Äî very friendly, helpful, and responsive. The place was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. The environment was peaceful and well-maintained, which made my stay even more enjoyable. I would definitely recommend this place and would love to come back again!

One of the best airbnbs we have had the pleasure to stay in. Gorgeous views and exceptionally clean. Location is amazing, and the building itself is very quiet. Best host ever! Very helpful and responsive. Would definitely stay again.

Had a great stay in Alex‚Äòs condo.  It was nice, clean and cozy with big windows.  It‚Äôs in an excellent location with first street market across the road. Everything you‚Äôre hungry for breakfast lunch or dinner. There‚Äôs also lots of other restaurants nearby and easy to walk anywhere you want to go.

This is a beautiful apartment, and larger than I expected. Walkable to downtown, and right beside some great spots to eat.  I made a mistake with my checkout date, which caused Alex the host some inconvenience for sure, but he was very gracious about it.

Alex was a great host, going above and beyond, even accommodating some special requests. It was our wedding anniversary trip and he made it special for us.
The place was well worth the price we paid, and then some - centrally located, near many good restaurants, coffee, pastry, Calgary Tower, parks, etc. We really like the security system, providing safe access to the building, unit, and parking garage.
I great place to stay when planning a trip to Banff as well. I highly recommend it!
Alex‚Äôs place was beautiful, clean, and very well equipped! It was a seamless check in / check out, and the place had everything you could need. I‚Äôd stay there again in a heartbeat.

I had a very nice stay at Alex's Airbnb. The location is great for exploring Calgary on foot and allows you to keep your car in a safe and free parking lot in the building. The apartment was very modern and clean, and Alex's instructions were easy to follow.

Really nice and efficient apartment. Super clean and private. It was easy to access and it was outfitted with everything I needed. The garage parking stalls were really tight. Stampede festivities in the neighborhood made it difficult to sleep. It was awfully loud up to about 3 am. Alex kindly got me into the apartment early which was appreciated

Beautiful view you will not regret staying here even if it‚Äôs just to sit and stare at that amazing view! This place is pristine! Very clean and welcoming! It‚Äôs very central so you can get anywhere in the city without trouble! Alex was great with communication and made this experience amazing!  Would love to stay here again! Would be PERFECT for the stampede( we got to see the fireworks right from the couch)
Incredible find in the heart of Calgary. The place is perfect with amazing views of the city and totally walkable to do many restaurants and bars. Alex was friendly and responsive. Loved it!

This place was amazing! Great location, gorgeous apartment and walking distance from many things. Very clear and detailed instructions on how to get into the apartment and parking space. Very helpful. Definitely recommend!
Ideal place to stay while in Calgary. Beautiful space with every thoughtful detail included. Love having the food market across the street. We highly recommend Alex as a host!
Thank you Alex for providing this beautiful and clean space for my stay during Stampede. It is in the heart of all the business of Stampede which was perfect. I will definitely stay here again!

Wonderful stay! The place was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. Great location and smooth check-in.And easy access to public transit which helpful for banff, canmore trip..!
Highly recommend!

We stayed at Alex's while attending a conference. Great location! Close to great restaurants. Walkable to the conference center. Parking was easy. Condo amenities were perfect for us. I would definitely want to stay here again.

Wonderful condo in a great location. Restaurants and pubs acrossthe road. Close enough to walk into Downtown and Stephens Ave pubs and restaurants and shops. Very comfortable bed,well equipped kitchen and great shower, bathroom.

What a view, and felt right at home! We had a car rental so it was nice being able to leave the car in the garage, and walk around downtown area. Bed was comfy. Spacious home. Perfect for two traveling. Also, Alex provides clear instructions and is very responsive! Highly recommend!

Had a great stay! The location is close to everything and there is lots to do. The apartment was clean and it‚Äôs clear of clutter. The views are amazing. Alex is an amazing host, fast responses and very accommodating! Well worth it and would highly recommend

it all started well. I arrived early so got to check in personally with Alex. he was very welcome and explained everything.
the rest of the stay went smoothly form there.
I'll definitely aim to stay here again on future trips.
The place had an amazing view and close to so many amenities. The check-in process was easy and well-communicated as well!
AMAZING place to stay! Felt very high end. Gorgeous view from the 11th floor. The bed was so comfy! The whole place was amazing. Was flexible with check-in time!
The building is in a great location, very walkable to downtown and restaurants. The unit was beautiful, bright, and spotlessly clean. Highly recommended!
This experience was exactly as advertised‚Ä¶modern/clean condo located in a vibrant section of the downtown core with great views‚Ä¶no complaints at all!
Enjoyed my stay. Clean condo. Great location. Great check-in instructions.

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: ‚Ä¢ 10 minutes to walk to Stampede area and Calgary Flames Saddledome  ‚Ä¢ Rent an e-scooter and explore theEast Village and Calgary‚Äôs riverwalkthat follows the Bow River as part ofa pathway system that extends over900 kilometres throughout Calgary.‚Ä¢ Take in one of the many festivals andevents during the summer months atPrince‚Äôs Island Park and other areas ofCalgary.‚Ä¢ Visit one of Calgary‚Äôs many top-ratedattractions such as:- Heritage Park, one of North America‚Äôslargest and most successful livinghistory museums.- National Music Centre featuring the Bell Stage and the King Eddy bar and music venue.- Glenbow Museum featuring Mavericks: An Incorrigible History of Alberta and numerous other permanentand temporary exhibits.- TELUS Spark Science Centre.- Calgary‚Äôs newest and burgeoning industry, microbreweries and brew pubs are located throughout Calgaryoffering award-winning beers in unique settings.- Walk and shop along Stephen Ave and 17th Avenue S.W., then stop to savour one of Calgary‚Äôs many greatrestaurants and bars.

description_by_sections.value: Colours by Battistella is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay. Upon arrival the host willprovide you introduction to the building, bylaw and specific rules for Airbnb guests. Condo bylaws rules1. Upon arrival at Colours by Battistella, you must complete a ‚ÄúTenant Undertaking Form‚Äù which provides management company (Equium Group) with basic contact information for emergency purposes and ensure that you have acknowledged that you understand and will comply with the Bylaws and standards of our community. 2. Our building is professionally managed by Equium Group. They will dispatch maintenance staff in the event of any emergency building-related service issues such as flooding, however they will not provide any additional services related to your  stay or your suite. Please contact your rental owner for any suite-related issues you may have.3. If your suite has any building-related service issues such as lack of hot or cold running water, water leaks, or lack of heat or air conditioning, these may be reported or by calling rental owner or Equium‚Äôs after-hours.4. You are responsible to help always maintain the security of our building by safekeeping your keys, and by not letting unknown people or vehicles follow you through doors into the building at any time. 5. As per City of Calgary Bylaws, no more than two guests per bedroom are allowed in your rental suite at any time. Inviting additional guests or visitors, hosting parties or any other social gatherings, is always prohibited.6. City Bylaws require observation of quiet time from 10:00 pm to 7:00 am weekdays and from 10:00 pm to 9:00 am on weekends, and building Bylaws restrict excessive noise that may disturb other residents at any time of the day.7. Use of units for activities which are illegal or that will be injurious to the reputation of the building are strictly prohibited.8. Smoking or vaping of tobacco or cannabis products is prohibited in all interior areas of the building including residential suites, hallways, elevators, parking areas, lobbies and all exterior areas always. Permission to smoke of tobacco products (and for clarity, not cannabis) on your balcony is at the discretion of your suite owner, provided they are following building bylaws.9. No cigarette butts, waste material or any other objects may be disposed of or thrown from your balcony at any time, as they can cause extreme danger from heights. Violations can result in City of Calgary Bylaw fines of up to $10,000 and/or criminal prosecution.10. Waste disposal, recycling and compost bins are available in the garbage room. All waste disposals must be in these areas, disposed of in well-tied, leak-proof bags or similar. No personal belongings or waste can be left in the common hallways outside your suite at any time.11. No signs, banners, laundry or any other objects may be hung or displayed from windows or balconies at any time.12. Exterior windows and balcony doors must remain closed in extreme cold weather conditions to prevent freezing of water lines or other damage to the building. You shall obey any rules made or posted by the Condominium Board regarding the use and care of the building, and any parking lot, balconies or common areas. Do not turn the thermostats in the unit to the ‚Äúoff‚Äù position. The interior unit temperature cannot be set below 15 degrees Celsius.13. Pets are not allowed in units which operate as short-term rental suites.14. Violation of building Bylaws or rules can result in fines, reporting to appropriate authorities, or eviction from Colours by Battistella In the event of any breach of the above Rules and Policies, any of the following actions listed below may be applied:FINE SCHEDULE‚Ä¢ Noise Complaint ‚Äì $500.00 fine.‚Ä¢ Exclusive Space - $500.00 fine.‚Ä¢ Illegal Garbage Disposal - $500.00 fine.‚Ä¢ Please refer to Colours by Battistella Bylaws for a list of all offences.

description_html:
Welcome to this amazing south-west facing one bedroom unit.
Fun, Friendly, Vibrant and Walkable!
You will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located condo, close to Stampede grounds, famous 17 Ave, and Downtown.
This space provides all you need for an enjoyable stay, including FREE underground parking, and easy access to Starbucks, bars, and restaurants at your doorstep!
We are excited to welcome you to our condo!

The space
You are welcomed by the spacious open living room. complimented by floor to ceiling windows and flooded with sunlight. Turn on the 55" UHD 4k Smart TV to Roku, YouTube and others popular channels. Feel free to connect your iPhone, Android to Smart TV using casting technologies and see/listen your favourite streams on TV.
A frosted glass sliding partition creates separation for the master bedroom. It ensures optimal open concept living.

In suite laundry and washer are available. We also offer underground parking stall and bike storage.

Guest access
Entire space plus building amenities is included in this rental. Please, make yourself at home.

Other things to note
Colours by Battistella is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay. Upon arrival the host will
provide you introduction to the building, bylaw and specific rules for Airbnb guests.

Condo bylaws rules
1. Upon arrival at Colours by Battistella, you must complete a “Tenant Undertaking Form” which provides management company (Equium Group) with basic contact information for emergency purposes and ensure that you have acknowledged that you understand and will comply with the Bylaws and standards of our community.
2. Our building is professionally managed by Equium Group. They will dispatch maintenance staff in the event of any emergency building-related service issues such as flooding, however they will not provide any additional services related to your stay or your suite. Please contact your rental owner for any suite-related issues you may have.
3. If your suite has any building-related service issues such as lack of hot or cold running water, water leaks, or lack of heat or air conditioning, these may be reported or by calling rental owner or Equium’s after-hours.
4. You are responsible to help always maintain the security of our building by safekeeping your keys, and by not letting unknown people or vehicles follow you through doors into the building at any time.
5. As per City of Calgary Bylaws, no more than two guests per bedroom are allowed in your rental suite at any time. Inviting additional guests or visitors, hosting parties or any other social gatherings, is always prohibited.
6. City Bylaws require observation of quiet time from 10:00 pm to 7:00 am weekdays and from 10:00 pm to 9:00 am on weekends, and building Bylaws restrict excessive noise that may disturb other residents at any time of the day.
7. Use of units for activities which are illegal or that will be injurious to the reputation of the building are strictly prohibited.
8. Smoking or vaping of tobacco or cannabis products is prohibited in all interior areas of the building including residential suites, hallways, elevators, parking areas, lobbies and all exterior areas always. Permission to smoke of tobacco products (and for clarity, not cannabis) on your balcony is at the discretion of your suite owner, provided they are following building bylaws.
9. No cigarette butts, waste material or any other objects may be disposed of or thrown from your balcony at any time, as they can cause extreme danger from heights. Violations can result in City of Calgary Bylaw fines of up to $10,000 and/or criminal prosecution.
10. Waste disposal, recycling and compost bins are available in the garbage room. All waste disposals must be in these areas, disposed of in well-tied, leak-proof bags or similar. No personal belongings or waste can be left in the common hallways outside your suite at any time.
11. No signs, banners, laundry or any other objects may be hung or displayed from windows or balconies at any time.
12. Exterior windows and balcony doors must remain closed in extreme cold weather conditions to prevent freezing of water lines or other damage to the building. You shall obey any rules made or posted by the Condominium Board regarding the use and care of the building, and any parking lot, balconies or common areas. Do not turn the thermostats in the unit to the “off” position. The interior unit temperature cannot be set below 15 degrees Celsius.
13. Pets are not allowed in units which operate as short-term rental suites.
14. Violation of building Bylaws or rules can result in fines, reporting to appropriate authorities, or eviction from Colours by Battistella In the event of any breach of the above Rules and Policies, any of the following actions listed below may be applied:
FINE SCHEDULE
• Noise Complaint – $500.00 fine.
• Exclusive Space - $500.00 fine.
• Illegal Garbage Disposal - $500.00 fine.
• Please refer to Colours by Battistella Bylaws for a list of all offences.

location_details_html:
• 10 minutes to walk to Stampede area and Calgary Flames Saddledome
• Rent an e-scooter and explore the
East Village and Calgary’s riverwalk
that follows the Bow River as part of
a pathway system that extends over
900 kilometres throughout Calgary.
• Take in one of the many festivals and
events during the summer months at
Prince’s Island Park and other areas of
Calgary.
• Visit one of Calgary’s many top-rated
attractions such as:
- Heritage Park, one of North America’s
largest and most successful living
history museums.
- National Music Centre featuring the Bell Stage and the King Eddy bar and music venue.
- Glenbow Museum featuring Mavericks: An Incorrigible History of Alberta and numerous other permanent
and temporary exhibits.
- TELUS Spark Science Centre.
- Calgary’s newest and burgeoning industry, microbreweries and brew pubs are located throughout Calgary
offering award-winning beers in unique settings.
- Walk and shop along Stephen Ave and 17th Avenue S.W., then stop to savour one of Calgary’s many great
restaurants and bars.

reviews_details.review: I had a wonderful stay! Lenovo was a great host ‚Äî very friendly, helpful, and responsive. The place was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. The environment was peaceful and well-maintained, which made my stay even more enjoyable. I would definitely recommend this place and would love to come back again!

One of the best airbnbs we have had the pleasure to stay in. Gorgeous views and exceptionally clean. Location is amazing, and the building itself is very quiet. Best host ever! Very helpful and responsive. Would definitely stay again.

Had a great stay in Alex‚Äòs condo.  It was nice, clean and cozy with big windows.  It‚Äôs in an excellent location with first street market across the road. Everything you‚Äôre hungry for breakfast lunch or dinner. There‚Äôs also lots of other restaurants nearby and easy to walk anywhere you want to go.

This is a beautiful apartment, and larger than I expected. Walkable to downtown, and right beside some great spots to eat.  I made a mistake with my checkout date, which caused Alex the host some inconvenience for sure, but he was very gracious about it.

Alex was a great host, going above and beyond, even accommodating some special requests. It was our wedding anniversary trip and he made it special for us.
The place was well worth the price we paid, and then some - centrally located, near many good restaurants, coffee, pastry, Calgary Tower, parks, etc. We really like the security system, providing safe access to the building, unit, and parking garage.
I great place to stay when planning a trip to Banff as well. I highly recommend it!
Alex‚Äôs place was beautiful, clean, and very well equipped! It was a seamless check in / check out, and the place had everything you could need. I‚Äôd stay there again in a heartbeat.

I had a very nice stay at Alex's Airbnb. The location is great for exploring Calgary on foot and allows you to keep your car in a safe and free parking lot in the building. The apartment was very modern and clean, and Alex's instructions were easy to follow.

Really nice and efficient apartment. Super clean and private. It was easy to access and it was outfitted with everything I needed. The garage parking stalls were really tight. Stampede festivities in the neighborhood made it difficult to sleep. It was awfully loud up to about 3 am. Alex kindly got me into the apartment early which was appreciated
reviews_details.host_response: Not sure what kind of noise and where you heard it. The unit has a noise detector and it shows the noise level was less than 45 db during the night on July 10-July 11,  so this is a lie. Moreover, all Stampede activity ends at 11.30 pm.  You also should know If anybody makes a noise after 11 pm you can call police or you can just notify me and I will the rest. The parking spot matches the standard size approved  by city. My guests sometimes parks big tracks there and you are the first guest who complained on it. I am just wondering what kind of vehicle you tried to park there

reviews_details.review: Beautiful view you will not regret staying here even if it‚Äôs just to sit and stare at that amazing view! This place is pristine! Very clean and welcoming! It‚Äôs very central so you can get anywhere in the city without trouble! Alex was great with communication and made this experience amazing!  Would love to stay here again! Would be PERFECT for the stampede( we got to see the fireworks right from the couch)
Incredible find in the heart of Calgary. The place is perfect with amazing views of the city and totally walkable to do many restaurants and bars. Alex was friendly and responsive. Loved it!

This place was amazing! Great location, gorgeous apartment and walking distance from many things. Very clear and detailed instructions on how to get into the apartment and parking space. Very helpful. Definitely recommend!
reviews_details.host_response: Thank you Stephanie very much! You were a great guest and we will be glad to see you again!

reviews_details.review: Ideal place to stay while in Calgary. Beautiful space with every thoughtful detail included. Love having the food market across the street. We highly recommend Alex as a host!
Thank you Alex for providing this beautiful and clean space for my stay during Stampede. It is in the heart of all the business of Stampede which was perfect. I will definitely stay here again!

Wonderful stay! The place was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. Great location and smooth check-in.And easy access to public transit which helpful for banff, canmore trip..!
Highly recommend!

We stayed at Alex's while attending a conference. Great location! Close to great restaurants. Walkable to the conference center. Parking was easy. Condo amenities were perfect for us. I would definitely want to stay here again.

Wonderful condo in a great location. Restaurants and pubs acrossthe road. Close enough to walk into Downtown and Stephens Ave pubs and restaurants and shops. Very comfortable bed,well equipped kitchen and great shower, bathroom.

What a view, and felt right at home! We had a car rental so it was nice being able to leave the car in the garage, and walk around downtown area. Bed was comfy. Spacious home. Perfect for two traveling. Also, Alex provides clear instructions and is very responsive! Highly recommend!

Had a great stay! The location is close to everything and there is lots to do. The apartment was clean and it‚Äôs clear of clutter. The views are amazing. Alex is an amazing host, fast responses and very accommodating! Well worth it and would highly recommend

it all started well. I arrived early so got to check in personally with Alex. he was very welcome and explained everything.
the rest of the stay went smoothly form there.
I'll definitely aim to stay here again on future trips.
The place had an amazing view and close to so many amenities. The check-in process was easy and well-communicated as well!
AMAZING place to stay! Felt very high end. Gorgeous view from the 11th floor. The bed was so comfy! The whole place was amazing. Was flexible with check-in time!
The building is in a great location, very walkable to downtown and restaurants. The unit was beautiful, bright, and spotlessly clean. Highly recommended!
This experience was exactly as advertised‚Ä¶modern/clean condo located in a vibrant section of the downtown core with great views‚Ä¶no complaints at all!
Enjoyed my stay. Clean condo. Great location. Great check-in instructions.

description_html:
Welcome to our sleekly designed one bedroom downtown condo with views of the downtown skyline including an unobstructed sight of the Calgary Tower.

Located in the heart of the Beltline. Walking distance to everything such as restaurants, bars, shops, grocery stores and all popular avenues. 5 minute drive to the river, Stampede grounds and the Saddledome.

Please be aware the front doors of the building lock at 10pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location.

The space
Additionally, the surrounding area is a haven for food enthusiasts, with an array of fantastic restaurants, bars, and shops within easy walking distance. Immerse yourself in the vibrant nightlife Calgary is renowned for, knowing that a comfortable retreat awaits you at the end of the night.

Notable Features:
-Balcony with unobstructed view of the Calgary Tower
-King bed
-Dining table
-Fresh bedding & linens
-Fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries
-50" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix and cable
-Bright living room w/ sofa
-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities
-High-speed WiFi
-Hairdryer
-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machine
-Patio Furniture (seasonal)

ID Verification Required for our property.

All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.

Guest access
You will have entire private access to the condo

For patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.

*** POOL is closed for the winter.

This bright and modern 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo is perched above the city and features two private balconies with sweeping skyline views perfect for your morning coffee or sunset wind-down.Key Features:‚Ä¢ Prime downtown location ‚Äì Walk to Stampede Grounds, Calgary Tower, 17th Ave, river pathways, and more‚Ä¢ Two private balconies ‚Äì Double the space, double the views‚Ä¢ Free underground parking ‚Äì Safe, secure, and included‚Ä¢ Floor-to-ceiling windows ‚Äì Soak in natural light all day‚Ä¢ High-speed Wi-Fi & Smart TV ‚Äì Stream your favorites with ease‚Ä¢ Fully stocked kitchen ‚Äì Cook and entertain in style‚Ä¢ In-suite laundry ‚Äì Ideal for longer stays‚Ä¢ Gym & pool access ‚Äì Stay active or take a relaxing dip‚Ä¢ Modern, comfortable furnishings ‚Äì Designed with both style and comfort in mindWhether you're working remotely, vacationing, or simply exploring Calgary, this sub-penthouse is a perfect blend of luxury and convenience  your private oasis above the city.Registration DetailsBL292587
reviews: Wonderful stay! The place was exactly as described, spotlessly clean, and the host was responsive and helpful. Check-in was smooth, location was perfect for our needs, and all amenities worked great. Would absolutely stay here again and highly recommend to others. Thank you for a fantastic experience!

Chloe & Jason were phenomenal! Incredibly smooth check in and very thorough PDF doc outlining everything for the condo from check in & check out to amenities and even recommended spots! The condo itself was perfect and made for a wonderful stay! Would highly recommend and will definitely be back! Thanks again!

Large and comfortable apartment in Calgary.
We had to book the apartment very short notice due to a cancelation we received.
This was not an issue and we are very grateful for the great Organisation.
The bed in the big bedroom is large and very comfortable.
The view from the apartment is just amazing.
We really enjoyed the stay and can only recommend.

Very organized and looked exactly like the pictures. The communication was very open and available ALOT of details and instructions. Overall great stay I would stay here again. Thanks for being great Hosts Jason and Chloe.

I stayed here for 5 nights a my Mom. Always a treat getting to spend time with her, and staying at Chloe and Jason‚Äôs for the bill perfectly.
There‚Äôs a lot going on in the neighborhood. Good restaurants and bars, real businesses, and other residential projects. I was able to walk to my morning meetings downtown in no time. 17th Street is also just a quick walk with more bars and restaurants and even a pharmacy.
The suite is generous and beautiful. It‚Äôs very well designed and the two balconies face South and East. This isn‚Äôt your typical condo project - you don‚Äôt have to leave your room to change your mind :)
Chloe and Jason made sure everything was taken care of and responded inside of 10 minutes and sometimes immediately. It was very reliable communication.
Plenty of pillows and comfortable bedding to melt into after marathon days.

I wanted to share my stay in this apartment. The apartment was fabulous. The booking went smooth. I give them 5/5 but I faced a scary experience with the building itself. They have two garages in the underground parking. The main one and there's another trap metal door the further you drive down. If you drive an SUV it will give a small height space. I drove through this trap door following another car infront of me with a reasonable allowance. I followed since I was close to the car and the door was fully open when I looked. As I was in the middle I heard a sound that was the metal door hitting the top of my Audi q7 shattering the top of my windshield. Thankfully I was not injured but my hope through this message is that people will be careful with the garage when they stay at this location.
Thanks,
Moira
What a great view!! We enjoyed this condo and super easy to get around downtown
Great place for the price! We enjoyed our stay and the views of both the mountains and the city skyline. Comfortable furniture as well.
The place is extremely beautiful, very clean and perfect location. The view is extraordinary and we are looking forward to come back. We strongly recomand it to others
We had a great time at this location. Everything was really close, and the view was unforgettable.

We had a great stay at this Airbnb! The host was super friendly and very responsive throughout our stay. The unit was clean, well-maintained, and comfortably fit five people. The check-in process was very clear and smooth, and overall, we‚Äôre really happy with our experience.
One suggestion for the host: the checkout instructions ask guests to pile up used towels, linens, and rags in the bedroom. While it‚Äôs understandable to help the cleaning staff identify used items, I‚Äôd personally prefer if the host‚Äôs team handled that entirely to avoid any hygiene issues‚Äîespecially since guests might accidentally forget something.
Also worth mentioning (as other reviews have noted), there are some homeless people around the neighborhood, but this didn‚Äôt affect our stay and is, of course, outside the host‚Äôs control.
Overall, we‚Äôd definitely recommend this place and would stay again!

We were honestly quite disappointed with our 2-night stay, mainly because of two things. First, when we arrived, the master bedroom wasn‚Äôt clean at all. the floor was still dirty, like it hadn‚Äôt even been swept. The towels also smelled bad and we had to wash them before using them. The sofa in the living room also had an unpleasant smell which made it uncomfortable to sit on.
Second, the TV wasn‚Äôt working the whole time we were there. We were told it was already having issues and still being fixed but we feel like it should have been sorted out before our check-in. We were told multiple times that someone would come by to fix it, so we waited the whole day but no one showed up. That was really frustrating.
We paid the full price expecting a relaxing stay, but instead, it ended up being stressful. Please make sure the place is fully cleaned and ready before guests arrive. The thing is, the unit itself is actually nice and the view is beautiful. It just needs be maintained well.

This property was exactly what I needed during my stay in Calgary: spacious, well-equipped, and ideally located.
While the check-in process may seem a bit tricky at first, the hosts have provided an incredibly detailed and clear PDF guide that makes everything smooth and straightforward. Once inside, the space far exceeded my expectations, with stunning views and thoughtful touches throughout.
It's worth noting that some of the surrounding area faces social challenges, which are beyond the hosts‚Äô control, just something to be aware of. That said, the secure parking and overall convenience of the location more than made up for it.
I genuinely appreciated the care and effort the hosts put into making this a great stay.
Thanks again, and hats off to the hosts for doing such a great job. Keep it up!
One of the Best building in Downtown area, the best view and location
Chloe and Jason were good hosts I‚Äôll visit again.

Overall, the room is spacious and clean.They responded very quickly and were very friendly.The location is also very good, and you can walk to the nearby supermarket and restaurants.
The minor complaints were that there was no hair dryer, Netflix could not be watched in the designated way, there were no tissues, and the neighbors and surroundings were noisy until the middle of the night on Saturday night.
But I don't have any major complaints.
We have a very good place to stay.
Nice and spacious great location
It was a fun experience staying downtown.  Great views.
Lovely condo, great area and excellent hosts!
Great Place! Easy communication!
Great accomodation
Great host

description_html:
Welcome to your luxury sub-penthouse in one of Calgary’s most sought-after buildings. Soaring above the city, enjoy skyline views from two private balconies, floor-to-ceiling windows, a sleek kitchen, and open-concept living. Includes fast Wi-Fi, in-suite laundry, secure underground parking, plus access to a private gym and pool perfect for business trips or a relaxing getaway.

The space
Limited-Time Weekly & Monthly Discounts Available!

Step into your elevated escape in one of Calgary’s most sought-after sub-penthouse suites. This bright and modern 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo is perched above the city and features two private balconies with sweeping skyline views perfect for your morning coffee or sunset wind-down.

Key Features:
• Prime downtown location – Walk to Stampede Grounds, Calgary Tower, 17th Ave, river pathways, and more
• Two private balconies – Double the space, double the views
• Free underground parking – Safe, secure, and included
• Floor-to-ceiling windows – Soak in natural light all day
• High-speed Wi-Fi & Smart TV – Stream your favorites with ease
• Fully stocked kitchen – Cook and entertain in style
• In-suite laundry – Ideal for longer stays
• Gym & pool access – Stay active or take a relaxing dip
• Modern, comfortable furnishings – Designed with both style and comfort in mind

Whether you're working remotely, vacationing, or simply exploring Calgary, this sub-penthouse is a perfect blend of luxury and convenience your private oasis above the city.

Check-in was smooth, location was perfect for our needs, and all amenities worked great. Would absolutely stay here again and highly recommend to others. Thank you for a fantastic experience!

Chloe & Jason were phenomenal! Incredibly smooth check in and very thorough PDF doc outlining everything for the condo from check in & check out to amenities and even recommended spots! The condo itself was perfect and made for a wonderful stay! Would highly recommend and will definitely be back! Thanks again!

Large and comfortable apartment in Calgary.
We had to book the apartment very short notice due to a cancelation we received.
This was not an issue and we are very grateful for the great Organisation.
The bed in the big bedroom is large and very comfortable.
The view from the apartment is just amazing.
We really enjoyed the stay and can only recommend.

Very organized and looked exactly like the pictures. The communication was very open and available ALOT of details and instructions. Overall great stay I would stay here again. Thanks for being great Hosts Jason and Chloe.

I stayed here for 5 nights a my Mom. Always a treat getting to spend time with her, and staying at Chloe and Jason‚Äôs for the bill perfectly.
There‚Äôs a lot going on in the neighborhood. Good restaurants and bars, real businesses, and other residential projects. I was able to walk to my morning meetings downtown in no time. 17th Street is also just a quick walk with more bars and restaurants and even a pharmacy.
The suite is generous and beautiful. It‚Äôs very well designed and the two balconies face South and East. This isn‚Äôt your typical condo project - you don‚Äôt have to leave your room to change your mind :)
Chloe and Jason made sure everything was taken care of and responded inside of 10 minutes and sometimes immediately. It was very reliable communication.
Plenty of pillows and comfortable bedding to melt into after marathon days.

I wanted to share my stay in this apartment. The apartment was fabulous. The booking went smooth. I give them 5/5 but I faced a scary experience with the building itself. They have two garages in the underground parking. The main one and there's another trap metal door the further you drive down. If you drive an SUV it will give a small height space. I drove through this trap door following another car infront of me with a reasonable allowance. I followed since I was close to the car and the door was fully open when I looked. As I was in the middle I heard a sound that was the metal door hitting the top of my Audi q7 shattering the top of my windshield. Thankfully I was not injured but my hope through this message is that people will be careful with the garage when they stay at this location.
Thanks,
Moira

description: Three upper levels of a beautiful townhouse, in the heart of downtown Calgary. This suite has its own entrance and is set up with anything you could possibly need. Located just 3 short blocks from trendy 17th avenue, you will have no shortage of things to do during your stay! We are really close to the downtown core, MNP centre, city parks, BMO centre & stampede grounds.We have free street parking available AND no cleaning fees.Newly renovated bathrooms.Portable aircon in master bedroom.The spaceThe main floor has a welcoming entry, a bedroom, and a bathroom with a washer/dryer. On the next level, you‚Äôll find the kitchen, dining area, and living room ‚Äì perfect for hanging out. The top level features the master bedroom, another bathroom (complete with bathtub), and a rooftop patio to relax and enjoy the views. It‚Äôs a great spot for a relaxing, multi-level stay!Guest accessYou will arrive at the front door that contains a numbered lock and will have been given a code prior to check in. Once inside you will come into a lobby area with two doors. The door on the left will have the key hanging in the door for you to use during your stay. We ask that you leave your shoes in this area as a lot of the townhouse is carpeted.Other things to noteThe portable aircon is on the master bedroom only. There is a ceiling fan on the second level and a tower fan in the main level bedroom.Parking - we can register up to 2 vehicles for the City of Calgary Visitor Parking permit. The permit is valid for the duration of your stay in the 2hr unpaid zones. Please message us if you have any questions about the parking!There is a cafe table and patio available to you if you smoke or would like to sit outside! Please do not smoke on the patio off of the master bedroom, or on the juliette balcony.We will also send you a personalized front door code with instructions the day before your stay .Our house is equipped with a video doorbell to ensure our guests' safety.Registration DetailsBL290609
reviews: Geoff's place was well suited for what we needed. It felt spacious and comfy, in a safe and walkable neighbourhood right downtown. I appreciated the added touch of earplugs right next to the beds! Simple and clear instructions for accessing the building. Us old folks had a bit of trouble working the remotes, but Geoff was very responsive and came over to assist. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

I loved the apartment and the hosts were extremely responsive.  The apartment is 3 floors with first floor with one bedroom, bathroom with washer and dryer, plenty of closet space.  2nd floor is living room and kitchen.  3rd floor is master bedroom and bathroom.  It‚Äôs a nice, spacious apartment.  I would definitely recommend it.

We had a wonderful stay in the center of Calgary! Geoff and Taylor's home was more spacious than we imagined and perfect for a day working/ interviewing from home. They were very communicative and helpful. Street parking was easy to find. The only thing to note is there are 2 flights of stairs between the 3 floors, which were easy to navigate.

A great little place to stay downtown! Just a couple minute walk from some of the main streets, but still quiet at night. The hosts were very responsive and accommodating and checked in throughout our stay. All instructions were very clear and helpful which made check-in easy. Would stay here again.

The property is clean and well-stocked, and the host is very responsive to our inquiries and concerns. However, we were unable to use the laundry machine because it was dirty. Moreover, we did not feel safe walking to explore downtown, as we noticed some unkempt individuals roaming and rolling around the street who appeared to be under the influence of drugs.

Great stay at Geoff ! Everything is as described. The apartment was very friendly and clean. Geoff was very friendly. Easy check in and check out.
Easy walk for all main attractions of downtown, shops, restaurants.
You can always find people wandering in the streets nearby, but it‚Äôs the sale everywhere in downtown.
Overral a great stay. I would recommend !

Great communication, super easy to get into the property, easy check-out instructions, tons of great restaurants in the area, nicely remodeled primary ensuite, friendly hosts, and great value.  I would highly recommend!

We enjoyed the convenience of the location and it had everything we needed for the weekend.  Price was great and pictures and the description were accurate.  I would stay again if available for future trips to Calgary.

A nice central location, that is walking distance to many different places to eat and get groceries. The place was clean and the instructions provided made check in easy. Would stay again if in the area. Thanks!

Decent place. Skinny three story unit with a bedroom on bottom and top floors. Top floor has A/C middle and bottom floors do not so on hot days in the afternoon could be an issue. Street parking was okay. The walk over to 17th Ave was really nice. Overall good place!

We stayed with another couple at Geoff‚Äôs place for a Rotary convention. The rooms are far apart (one on the main level and one on the 3rd) so we had plenty of privacy. We didn‚Äôt need a car as Calgary is walkable and their mass transit is excellent.  Geoff is super responsive. There‚Äôs some unhomed folks in the area but that‚Äôs not unexpected for a city and the Airbnb is in a good neighborhood. I would stay here again without hesitation!!

Lovely townhome which was exceptionally clean and comfortable. Convenient central location with easy access to everything. Host was very responsive to an issue that arose and dealt with it immediately. He was very friendly and helpful offering recommendations for tourist interests. Overall loved our stay and would recommend Geoff‚Äôs place to others.

Great place to stay! Super clean and had all the necessities we needed. Very cozy and comfortable place. The location is great and convenient if exploring the downtown area. Will definitely come back here when I visit Calgary again in the future!

The location was fantastic, close to numerous bars, restaurants, and the train station, which made getting around by public transit super convenient. The place was clean and looked exactly like the photos. We‚Äôd definitely book again!

Spend two night in this great townhouse during Stampede 2025.
Central location and perfect for exploring the city.
Great hosts.
I can definitely recommend this place if you want to live near the center of Calgary.

Place was great to stay, was clean and matched the photos and description. Host communicated well and gave clear instructions and answered questions quickly. Location is great as most restaurants/venues etc are a short walk or very quick cab/uber ride away. Would stay again.
Great place to stay right in the heart of the city.  Easy walking access to the city.  The place also has a bath tub which we were delighted to find after a month of camping.  Thanks Geoff!

Geoff and Taylor were very great and communicative from the start. The airbnb was easy to find, check-in was easy. The place was clean, and all amenities included (except air conditioning), along with ear plugs. The ear plugs were needed as the surrounding area can get loud at night due to pubs and restaurants. Area is walkable to popular downtown and 17 Ave. Parking was a little difficult to find but we were given a parking pass so we could park on the street. If you like being within walking distance to restaurants and lots of things to do, this is the place!

The place is comfortable. Mostly very clean and new.
Location is convenient and walking distance to groceries, but not somewhere I‚Äôd feel comfortable as a woman after dark.
Overall very handy to walk to sites in the city.
The place is nice, alot of stuff close by. I will say parking on the street is very tricky. The street is very congested and not alot of parking especially if the bar nearby is busy.

Geoff & Taylor‚Äôs place was perfect for our weekend in Calgary. It‚Äôs an easy walk to downtown, and the free parking was such a bonus. The home itself is bright, spacious, and spotless‚Äî plenty of room for our family of four. I also really appreciated that they don‚Äôt charge a cleaning fee, which is so generous considering they still hire cleaners who do a fabulous job. Check-in instructions were clear, noting that the front door leads to two units (one being yours) - just be sure to read them carefully so you don‚Äôt miss it like I did haha. :) Taylor and Geoff were incredibly responsive and quick to answer any questions, which made the stay even better!

Geoff's place was great! I was travelling with my husband and daughter and we appreciated having the room to spread out. Each of us had either work / studying to do so having different spots to do that was helpful (desk in one bedroom, the dining room table, the comfy couch). Easy walking distance to cool restaurants on 5th and 17th. Highly recommend Milpa (amazing Mexican food and delicious cocktails / mocktails) and the Sweatered Hen (outstanding breakfast). We also went on a walk to Lindsay Park -- wish I'd had more time to explore. Geoff was really responsive with any questions we had! All in all a delightful stay! Thank you!
Geoff‚Äôs place was absolutely wonderful to stay at, perfect location and very nice and responsive hosts! Could not recommend this place enough!!
Geoff place was very nice and felt like home away home. I‚Äôll be definitely coming back to stay at Geoff place. Highly recommended. Thank you.

description_html:
Three upper levels of a beautiful townhouse, in the heart of downtown Calgary. This suite has its own entrance and is set up with anything you could possibly need.

Located just 3 short blocks from trendy 17th avenue, you will have no shortage of things to do during your stay! We are really close to the downtown core, MNP centre, city parks, BMO centre & stampede grounds.

We have free street parking available AND no cleaning fees.

Newly renovated bathrooms.
Portable aircon in master bedroom.

The space
The main floor has a welcoming entry, a bedroom, and a bathroom with a washer/dryer. On the next level, you’ll find the kitchen, dining area, and living room – perfect for hanging out. The top level features the master bedroom, another bathroom (complete with bathtub), and a rooftop patio to relax and enjoy the views. It’s a great spot for a relaxing, multi-level stay!

Guest access
You will arrive at the front door that contains a numbered lock and will have been given a code prior to check in. Once inside you will come into a lobby area with two doors. The door on the left will have the key hanging in the door for you to use during your stay. We ask that you leave your shoes in this area as a lot of the townhouse is carpeted.

Other things to note
The portable aircon is on the master bedroom only. There is a ceiling fan on the second level and a tower fan in the main level bedroom.

Parking - we can register up to 2 vehicles for the City of Calgary Visitor Parking permit.
The permit is valid for the duration of your stay in the 2hr unpaid zones.
Please message us if you have any questions about the parking!

There is a cafe table and patio available to you if you smoke or would like to sit outside! Please do not smoke on the patio off of the master bedroom, or on the juliette balcony.

We will also send you a personalized front door code with instructions the day before your stay .

Our house is equipped with a video doorbell to ensure our guests' safety.

You can always find people wandering in the streets nearby, but it‚Äôs the sale everywhere in downtown.
Overral a great stay. I would recommend !

Great communication, super easy to get into the property, easy check-out instructions, tons of great restaurants in the area, nicely remodeled primary ensuite, friendly hosts, and great value.  I would highly recommend!

We enjoyed the convenience of the location and it had everything we needed for the weekend.  Price was great and pictures and the description were accurate.  I would stay again if available for future trips to Calgary.

A nice central location, that is walking distance to many different places to eat and get groceries. The place was clean and the instructions provided made check in easy. Would stay again if in the area. Thanks!

Decent place. Skinny three story unit with a bedroom on bottom and top floors. Top floor has A/C middle and bottom floors do not so on hot days in the afternoon could be an issue. Street parking was okay. The walk over to 17th Ave was really nice. Overall good place!

We stayed with another couple at Geoff‚Äôs place for a Rotary convention. The rooms are far apart (one on the main level and one on the 3rd) so we had plenty of privacy. We didn‚Äôt need a car as Calgary is walkable and their mass transit is excellent.  Geoff is super responsive. There‚Äôs some unhomed folks in the area but that‚Äôs not unexpected for a city and the Airbnb is in a good neighborhood. I would stay here again without hesitation!!

Lovely townhome which was exceptionally clean and comfortable. Convenient central location with easy access to everything. Host was very responsive to an issue that arose and dealt with it immediately. He was very friendly and helpful offering recommendations for tourist interests. Overall loved our stay and would recommend Geoff‚Äôs place to others.

Great place to stay! Super clean and had all the necessities we needed. Very cozy and comfortable place. The location is great and convenient if exploring the downtown area. Will definitely come back here when I visit Calgary again in the future!

The location was fantastic, close to numerous bars, restaurants, and the train station, which made getting around by public transit super convenient. The place was clean and looked exactly like the photos. We‚Äôd definitely book again!

Spend two night in this great townhouse during Stampede 2025.
Central location and perfect for exploring the city.
Great hosts.
I can definitely recommend this place if you want to live near the center of Calgary.

Place was great to stay, was clean and matched the photos and description. Host communicated well and gave clear instructions and answered questions quickly. Location is great as most restaurants/venues etc are a short walk or very quick cab/uber ride away. Would stay again.
Great place to stay right in the heart of the city.  Easy walking access to the city.  The place also has a bath tub which we were delighted to find after a month of camping.  Thanks Geoff!

Geoff and Taylor were very great and communicative from the start. The airbnb was easy to find, check-in was easy. The place was clean, and all amenities included (except air conditioning), along with ear plugs. The ear plugs were needed as the surrounding area can get loud at night due to pubs and restaurants. Area is walkable to popular downtown and 17 Ave. Parking was a little difficult to find but we were given a parking pass so we could park on the street. If you like being within walking distance to restaurants and lots of things to do, this is the place!

The place is comfortable. Mostly very clean and new.
Location is convenient and walking distance to groceries, but not somewhere I‚Äôd feel comfortable as a woman after dark.
Overall very handy to walk to sites in the city.
The place is nice, alot of stuff close by. I will say parking on the street is very tricky. The street is very congested and not alot of parking especially if the bar nearby is busy.
reviews_details.host_response: Hey, thanks for the feedback! There is tons of parking around our place and it empties out often. Sometimes it does get busy, but it is free parking and you're close to all of the best things Calgary has to offer. Sorry to hear that it was difficult for you!

reviews_details.review: Geoff & Taylor‚Äôs place was perfect for our weekend in Calgary. It‚Äôs an easy walk to downtown, and the free parking was such a bonus. The home itself is bright, spacious, and spotless‚Äî plenty of room for our family of four. I also really appreciated that they don‚Äôt charge a cleaning fee, which is so generous considering they still hire cleaners who do a fabulous job. Check-in instructions were clear, noting that the front door leads to two units (one being yours) - just be sure to read them carefully so you don‚Äôt miss it like I did haha. :) Taylor and Geoff were incredibly responsive and quick to answer any questions, which made the stay even better!

Geoff's place was great! I was travelling with my husband and daughter and we appreciated having the room to spread out. Each of us had either work / studying to do so having different spots to do that was helpful (desk in one bedroom, the dining room table, the comfy couch). Easy walking distance to cool restaurants on 5th and 17th. Highly recommend Milpa (amazing Mexican food and delicious cocktails / mocktails) and the Sweatered Hen (outstanding breakfast). We also went on a walk to Lindsay Park -- wish I'd had more time to explore. Geoff was really responsive with any questions we had! All in all a delightful stay! Thank you!
Geoff‚Äôs place was absolutely wonderful to stay at, perfect location and very nice and responsive hosts! Could not recommend this place enough!!
Geoff place was very nice and felt like home away home. I‚Äôll be definitely coming back to stay at Geoff place. Highly recommended. Thank you.

Such a great find, beautiful apartment in a great location within walking distance to all the main attractions in calgary.  Great host and a stunning apartment with absolutely everything you need for your stay x

A charming condo with an amazing view of downtown Calgary.   Very central location, within walking distance to restaurants and shops.  Very easy check in and check out.   Gracious and responsive host.  I would definitely book it again when I come back to Calgary.

Our stay here was amazing! Very close to all the essentials and was easy to get around. The private parking space also made things a lot easier.
Jonathan was always on hand to help with anything we were unsure about.
The house was clean, with all the essentials that we required and we truly felt at home! The view of Calgary and the mountains was also incredible!
Would totally recommend this place to anyone looking for somewhere to stay.

WOW!   From booking to checkout, Jonathan was awesome.  VERY responsive.  The condo was even better than advertised!   My husband & I were there for a rotary conference at the BMO center.  Friends paid 3 times what we paid for a hotel room.  Location, price, cleanliness, security & Jonathan made our week perfect!  Would definitely recommend & would rent again if we ever come back to Calgary!

Beautiful clean condo in a great location. Everything was as described and very close to a lot of restaurants and cafes. Had a bit of trouble checking in but Jonathan was accommodating of a check-in after hours which was appreciated. Also sent lots of great recommendations for the area. Would definitely stay again!

What a gem of an Airbnb! The downtown location couldn't be beat for exploring the city, and waking up to that amazing view every morning was a highlight. Beyond the great space, our host was genuinely friendly and welcoming, making the stay even more enjoyable. Would definitely book again!"
It was the perfect place and just what we needed whilst staying in Calgary. Had all the amenities we needed and the view from the apartment is just beautiful. Thank you for the pleasant stay.
We had a lovely stay the views were amazing and we enjoyed watching the sunset. The space was lovely and comfortable it made a great base.
great place and location was very walkable.  only complaint was a lot of noise at night between the railroad and sirens.

I had such a wonderful stay at Jonathan‚Äôs 24th-story condo! The view is absolutely stunning, and the location couldn‚Äôt be better,just steps away from fantastic restaurants like Bridgette bar and sweet Loretta‚Äòs. Having secure convenient underground parking made everything so easy.
The condo itself is beautifully appointed with everything you could possibly need. It was spotlessly clean, with crisp white towels and linens that made it feel like a luxury hotel. It‚Äôs the perfect space for up to two people.
The building amenities are great,the pool may be on the smaller side, but it was more than sufficient for a refreshing dip. What really stood out were the thoughtful little touches Jonathan put into the space. His collection of retro cassette tapes and the ghetto blaster added such a fun, personal vibe and put a smile on my face throughout my stay.
Overall, a fantastic experience,I‚Äôd definitely recommend this condo to anyone looking for comfort, convenience, and character.

Spent 10 days here.  The place was exactly as described and with the clear weather the views towards the mountains spectacular. Jonathan was easy to communicate with and was flexible around our arrival time from the airport. I would definitely look to see if this place was available on my next visit to Calgary.

What a stunning condo. We stayed here for a week when we first arrived in Calgary and couldn‚Äôt be more happy. Everything is in walking distance, including grocery‚Äôs only a couple of blocks away. And the apartment, really cool decor, comfy bed, and everything you could possible need. To top it all off, Jonathan was quick to respond to any questions and amazing to deal with. Definitely check this place out if you need somewhere to stay in Calgary!

We spent almost two weeks at Jonathan‚Äôs apartment in Calgary and we enjoyed our stay. The photos completely coincide with the space. It is very comfortable for two people. In top of all that Jhonatan is a very attentive and ready to give you support.

Beautiful condo.  Exactly as advertised.  Clean, nice view.  Convenient location with lots of amenities within walking distance.  Jonathan was a great host.
Great spot to stay, centrally located and easy to access everything you could want and need! Highly recommend!
Jonathan is an excellent host with very clear, quick communication. The apartment was just as described. The location made it easy to walk to the grocery store and local eateries.
Jonathan‚Äôs apartment was the perfect space for our weeklong stay! Not only is it in the perfect location downtown, but it‚Äôs a beautiful space with everything we needed. I highly recommend it!

Beautiful place, clean and had everything we needed to make our valentines weekend a blast. Jonathan was a great host and always responded promptly. 100% recommend!

name: Condo in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.74 ¬∑ 1 bedroom ¬∑ 1 bed ¬∑ 1 bath
description: Welcome to this beautifully designed one bed one bath condo located in the heart of downtown Calgary, where industrial style meets comfort and elegance. This stunning condo boasts incredible views of the city skyline, with the iconic Calgary Tower standing tall in the distance.The spaceAs you enter the condo, you'll be greeted by an open concept living space that seamlessly blends modern and industrial elements. Exposed and high concrete ceilings create a chic and edgy atmosphere that is softened by the warm, earthy tones of the furnishings.The living room is furnished with a comfortable sofa,  perfect for lounging and enjoying the stunning views of the city through the floor-to-ceiling windows. The sleek and modern kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, and all the essentials needed to cook a gourmet meal.The bedroom is a cozy retreat, featuring a plush queen-sized bed with luxurious linens and plenty of storage space in the built-in closet. The bathroom is stylishly designed with a deep bath tub, contemporary fixtures, and plenty of soft towels.This condo also features a private balcony, where you can sit back and relax while taking in the breathtaking views of the city. Other amenities include air conditioning, high-speed internet, and a smart TV for your entertainment needs.Located in the heart of downtown Calgary, this condo is just steps away from some of the city's best restaurants, bars, and shops. Whether you're here for work or play, this industrial-style condo offers the perfect combination of comfort, convenience, and style.Guest accessGuests will have access to the entire suite plus Sky lounge/ fitness facility and poolRegistration DetailsBL267402
reviews: Clean place , amazing view and easy check in. Was al perfect lititle spot for our trip. If I could have changed one thing it was I didn‚Äôt realizie that the undergoing parking was not included and I didn‚Äôt like leaving my car on the street.  Other then that everything was great

Booked this BnB for a nice quiet gateway. The room was not so clean, had debris and dirt over the floors. The view was the only outstanding part of the apartment. We hardly got any sleep in due to the party happening. The closest was pre-broken when we got to the bnb, definitely does not match the pictures. I wouldn‚Äôt book again if I was looking for comfort. I will definitely book for the view. The communication between the host was smooth.

I had a fantastic stay here. The location is amazing - clear views of the Calgary tower from all areas of the condo.
The unit was clean, and communication from the hosts was very warm and near instant throughout the experience, which took a lot of stress off of the trip.
Kudos to the team, I enjoyed my stay and will be back.
Thanks again!
Great place and in a great location. Would definitely stay again

Pros... there are many:
Best thing about this place is the full view of the city from both the lounge and the bedroom - I couldn't get enough of it!
Place is much as pictured, photos are glossier and make it seem a bit bigger/ brighter. It's still a beautiful place, even without the gloss.
Check in was simple and contactless.
Everything was clean
Appreciated the Tim Hortons coffee pods every morning :)
Nice Japanese restaurant/ bento place nearby, and a convenient walk/ ride to Stephen Avenue.
Bed was very comfy, and there's loads of storage space.
-Shower head - please replace asap as that one is unusable - used the bottom tap which was frustrating.
- Soap dispenser - pump did not work throughout my stay
- Some sockets in bedroom don't work
- Not a major issue for me, but bedroom closet door is broken and leans on a wall
-Communication was prompt, except near check-out; requested delayed check out and had to follow up next day. Declined, so had to leave sharpish!
Place was wonderful. Right in downtown Calgary with amazing views of the city. Place was clean and tidy. I would definitely comeback!!
Pool area was a little underwhelming. Barely got any sun amd was undersized- no one uses this space but it has potential

Overall great place, it is common for elevator maintenance and operation to fluctuate affecting lift times, but other than that the space was clean, ready on-time, and cozy in the evenings. The team was available via messages 24/7. Would stay here again!
Nice place. Location is great, good view, smooth check in.
Definitely will stay again! Apartment have perfect view from the balcony and we liked it so much!
Really nice place definitely gonna come again
It was pretty chill and easy to get to
Great views of the city!!
Good location, place has nice views and pretty spacious!
The place was in good shape, and had a great view!
Beautiful apartment looked just like the pictures with a great view. Check in process was easy and I would stay here again . The apartment was very clean as well.
Nice view

Good bars and restaurants within walking distance. Check-in and out was easy and uncomplicated. Great view from the balcony, especially in the evening. If you have any questions, they responded quickly.
love it
Good stay
A few things were downsides but overall 9/10
Amazing time, no complaints would stay again ‚ú®
