description_html:
Welcome to this beautifully designed one bed one bath condo located in the heart of downtown Calgary, where industrial style meets comfort and elegance. This stunning condo boasts incredible views of the city skyline, with the iconic Calgary Tower standing tall in the distance.

The space
As you enter the condo, you'll be greeted by an open concept living space that seamlessly blends modern and industrial elements. Exposed and high concrete ceilings create a chic and edgy atmosphere that is softened by the warm, earthy tones of the furnishings.

The living room is furnished with a comfortable sofa, perfect for lounging and enjoying the stunning views of the city through the floor-to-ceiling windows. The sleek and modern kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, and all the essentials needed to cook a gourmet meal.

The bedroom is a cozy retreat, featuring a plush queen-sized bed with luxurious linens and plenty of storage space in the built-in closet. The bathroom is stylishly designed with a deep bath tub, contemporary fixtures, and plenty of soft towels.

This condo also features a private balcony, where you can sit back and relax while taking in the breathtaking views of the city. Other amenities include air conditioning, high-speed internet, and a smart TV for your entertainment needs.

Located in the heart of downtown Calgary, this condo is just steps away from some of the city's best restaurants, bars, and shops. Whether you're here for work or play, this industrial-style condo offers the perfect combination of comfort, convenience, and style.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire suite plus Sky lounge/ fitness facility and pool

reviews_details.review: Clean place , amazing view and easy check in. Was al perfect lititle spot for our trip. If I could have changed one thing it was I didn‚Äôt realizie that the undergoing parking was not included and I didn‚Äôt like leaving my car on the street.  Other then that everything was great

Booked this BnB for a nice quiet gateway. The room was not so clean, had debris and dirt over the floors. The view was the only outstanding part of the apartment. We hardly got any sleep in due to the party happening. The closest was pre-broken when we got to the bnb, definitely does not match the pictures. I wouldn‚Äôt book again if I was looking for comfort. I will definitely book for the view. The communication between the host was smooth.

I had a fantastic stay here. The location is amazing - clear views of the Calgary tower from all areas of the condo.
The unit was clean, and communication from the hosts was very warm and near instant throughout the experience, which took a lot of stress off of the trip.
Kudos to the team, I enjoyed my stay and will be back.
Thanks again!
Great place and in a great location. Would definitely stay again

Pros... there are many:
Best thing about this place is the full view of the city from both the lounge and the bedroom - I couldn't get enough of it!
Place is much as pictured, photos are glossier and make it seem a bit bigger/ brighter. It's still a beautiful place, even without the gloss.
Check in was simple and contactless.
Everything was clean
Appreciated the Tim Hortons coffee pods every morning :)
Nice Japanese restaurant/ bento place nearby, and a convenient walk/ ride to Stephen Avenue.
Bed was very comfy, and there's loads of storage space.
-Shower head - please replace asap as that one is unusable - used the bottom tap which was frustrating.
- Soap dispenser - pump did not work throughout my stay
- Some sockets in bedroom don't work
- Not a major issue for me, but bedroom closet door is broken and leans on a wall
-Communication was prompt, except near check-out; requested delayed check out and had to follow up next day. Declined, so had to leave sharpish!
Place was wonderful. Right in downtown Calgary with amazing views of the city. Place was clean and tidy. I would definitely comeback!!
Pool area was a little underwhelming. Barely got any sun amd was undersized- no one uses this space but it has potential

Overall great place, it is common for elevator maintenance and operation to fluctuate affecting lift times, but other than that the space was clean, ready on-time, and cozy in the evenings. The team was available via messages 24/7. Would stay here again!
Nice place. Location is great, good view, smooth check in.
Definitely will stay again! Apartment have perfect view from the balcony and we liked it so much!
Really nice place definitely gonna come again
It was pretty chill and easy to get to
Great views of the city!!
Good location, place has nice views and pretty spacious!
The place was in good shape, and had a great view!

love it

reviews:
This was an absolutely beautiful place to stay with amazing views of the city from floor-to-ceiling windows in every room. The furniture was comfortable and thoughtfully laid out to maximize the space.
Eos was easy to reach out to for any questions.
We will definitely stay here again in the future.

Stayed at Eos‚Äôs place in Calgary and had a great experience.  Communication was great, it was exactly as listed and had amazing views.  The cocktail bar downstairs in the building was awesome too.  5-stars!!

Would definitely stay again at this condo! Great location and the owner was very responsive and accommodating.Close to Stampede Park and Stephen Ave. , which was nice. Some snacks and beverages provided at check in, plus a gift card to a restaurant across the street‚Ä¶nice touch! Thanks for everything!

My wife and I had the pleasure to see Calgary for the first time while visiting family who had recently moved there.
Fairly new with Air BNB however, we are getting the hang of it.
The condo unit was perfect, we felt right at home.
Clean, quiet, secure, great views and fantastic location.
Our host was quick to reply to any questions or concerns.
As we plan on travelling to Calgary more often, this place will be our first choice if available.

A beautiful apartment overlooking the City on a high floor exactly as pictured in their listing.  Hosts were wonderful and communicated immediately when we had a question.  Highly recommend while staying in Calgary.  Great location.

I loved this AirBnb accommodation. It is a gorgeous, light-filled space with beautiful furnishings and many thoughtful amenities like bottled water, chips, and a generous Starbucks gift card, and also body lotion and a blow dryer. The mattress in the main bedroom was super comfortable for me, as were the pillows (I tend to be very fussy). Honestly, I felt so comfortable and well, I didn't want to leave. As for the location, there's so much to get to within walking distance, including an excellent food court right across the street. Thank you so much. I felt like a queen.

Perfect location, walking distance to great restaurants and cafes, supermarket and liquor stores just downstairs. The place is well appointed, clean and very comfortable. I would recommend and book again.

Eos was a great host - very responsive and was flexible with the check in time when we needed it! Additionally, the complimentary snacks and the other additional supplies were much appreciated. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and if I come back to Calgary again, I‚Äôd stay again. 10/10 recommend!
We had the most wonderful stay! The apartment and views are superb. Everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Highly recommended!
Fantastic place to stay. Great area, such beautiful views of downtown, especially at night, and within walking distance of all the best spots!
we had a great stay and  we requested an extension and our host was very generous and let us stay and use his place for the day prior to our flight. thank you.
Very clean and cozy! Super close to bars, restaurants, and anything else you might need. Very walkable area with nearby parks and attractions. We loved our stay!

This is the 3rd year in a row that we have stayed here and it remains great. The location is fabulous - central to so much in the city with excellent restaurants close by. It has a great view of the city, is modern, neat and clean and very comfortable (the beds are very comfortable). Amenities are plenty and well thought out. Same time next  year, we'll be back.

We loved our stay at this condo - beautiful space, great location, very responsive and friendly host. The layout, furnishings and decor are a step above. The location is central with great restaurants, pubs, and parks close by. As well, walkable to both downtown and 17th avenue. It was perfect for our girl's getaway. Will definitely book again! Thank-you!

We absolutely enjoyed the condo and especially the views.
The unit is well decorated and the host provides little extras for the guests, snacks, water, laundry detergent, etc.
It was perfect for a short stay and would be great for a longer stay too.
Host was responded quickly and all the instructions were very clear.
Highly recommend if you enjoy downtown life.

Place was gorgeous, stunning views, amenities galore. Only small nitpick is having to park and go get the fob, then having to do the same when leaving. Also one elevator was down one of the days and it made it incredibly annoying to get in and out. Otherwise, it was exactly as listed, EOS was fantastic with communication and gave very clear instructions.

EOS was a wonderful host.. super quick response times and always available when I needed to get a hold of them! Checking in and checking out was simple and had easy instructions. The location was perfect, super close to tons of restaurants, bars, grocery stores, etc. The apartment unit itself was beautiful and clean. I really enjoyed my stay here and will definitely be booking again with this host.
Great location with amazing city views and free parking was a huge help !
Place was amazing.Clive was amazing too with timely communication and helping out when needed

Thank you for the stay! Great location, walkable to lots of bars and restaurants. Close to the stampede grounds.
Thank you for being so helpful and responsive.
Very nice accommodations, liked the view. Unexpected easy location to many amenities was a plus. Would stay here again w/o hesitation.
Fabulous condo with breathtaking city views.  Host responded to questions within minutes.  We plan to stay again.  Only positive things to say.
Place was great! Would definitely stay again. Great location, great restaurants and shopping near by. Beautiful condo!

I had an amazing stay! The location was perfect, right downtown, close to tons of restaurants and cafes ,  all within walking distance. The view from the apartment was stunning.  The place was clean and comfy. I'd definitely book again.

description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located place in the heart of downtown Calgary. This property is located in the highly desirable downtown west end, providing easy access to everything thatthe city has to offer. Take a leisurely stroll along the Bow River or explore the endless shopping and dining options that are just steps away from your front door. Commuting is a breeze with the LRT station only a block away.The spaceThe building offers a full-time concierge,  secured heated underground parking, visitor parking, secured bicycle storage, as well as a private gym providing a convenient option for staying active.Other things to noteThe couch is also a pull out bed.Registration DetailsBL270312
reviews: Kelli and Jiad were incredibly accommodating, quick to respond and super friendly. Very easy to work with and the apartment was clean, convenient and exactly what I was looking for. An absolute pleasure to stay here and I‚Äôll definitely be back!

The space is very clean, the building felt safe, and everything is as described. There were plenty of towels and even full ice cube trays in the fridge. Jiad is very responsive and accommodated an earlier check-out time for my early morning flight. I had a wonderful stay, would highly recommend.

Jiad was a great host and very quick to respond. The neighbourhood felt safe and was a very short walk to the C Train as well as many shops and restaurants! I would definitely recommend his place and would stay here again in the future!

We had an amazing stay at Jiad's place. Everything was smooth since the beginning, and he was very accomodating to our requests. He was very responsive to questions, and often checked up on us during the stay. The location was perfect, close to many restaurants, supermarkets and dowtown. It was really easy to go anywhere because it was really close to the train station as well. All in all we have an amazing stay!
Thank you Jiad for the great stay! We appreciated how responsive you were and how you were happy to help resolve any issues we encountered. See you next time!

Location great
Nearby metro, just behind the building
Nearby everything: banks, government offices & very nice park.
Quite area and clean building

We had a great stay at Jiad‚Äôs place! The apartment was clean, cozy, and just as described. Perfect location ‚Äî close to downtown attractions, restaurants, and the C-Train. An underground parking spot is available in the building. It can get a bit noisy at night from the train and yard, so light sleepers take note. Overall, I would highly recommend this place and would stay again.
We had a great stay, the bed was comfy and easy to walk around the area!
This condo was right in the centre of Calgary so good for doing things in the city. A dedicated parking space was a bonus for a city centre location
Jiad was an excellent host! Very helpful and prompt responses. The apartment was clean and welcoming. He was also flexible with our checkout process. Great value!
perfect location. small place but has everything. dusty but with having the windows open because of the hot weather that's to be expected. would definitely go back

We stayed at Jiad's place because we needed a location close to Dickens - this was perfect, a 5-minute walk. The check-in was very easy with the liquor store holding the keys. If you need to leave before 9am on check out, this place might be an issue - you have to drop the keys off at the liquor store when it opens. For us, it was not a problem. The unit had everything we needed and looked like the photos. The bed was comfy. There is an issue with the pull-out sofa at the moment but we did mention to the host, as we had a 3rd person in the apartment with us. The host was very responsive and helpful. We had a couple questions regarding the check-in but he responded right away and got in the unit quickly. Overall, I would stay here again! Thanks, Jiad for having us.

Jiad‚Äôs place is comfortable and well-equipped. It‚Äôs conveniently close to the station, making travel easy, and it offered everything we needed for daily life. We had a great time staying here and would definitely recommend it to others!

Jiad‚Äôs place is well located and clean. I stayed for a month and I had a great stay. There‚Äôs everything you need and the host is super easy to communicate with. The check in was smooth and easy to do. Recommend staying at Jiad‚Äôs place

I really enjoyed my stay at Chloe and Jason‚Äôs apartment. The location is perfect for anyone who is looking to explore Calgary‚Äôs downtown area. The view of the Calgary tower was spectacular in the evening!

This was a great place to stay at. The owners were super professional and accommodating. They answered all of the questions we had! I am considering booking with them again in the future!

Central Downtown | High Rise Panoramic Views Calgary Tower + Free Underground Parking | STEPS from restaurants and entertainment | Spacious Home - FAST WIFI

The space
Indulge in luxury and soak in breathtaking views from our upscale 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom high-rise haven nestled in downtown Calgary.

Elevate your stay with complimentary perks including free underground parking, high-speed internet, access to the gym, and refreshing dips in the outdoor pool.

Explore the vibrant surroundings just steps away, including the scenic Bow River, iconic Calgary Tower, lively Stampede grounds, bustling Stephen Ave, and trendy 17 Ave.

Unwind in style on our couch while streaming your favourite shows on Netflix or unleash your culinary prowess in our fully equipped kitchen, complete with stunning views of the city skyline.

Your comfort and satisfaction are our top priorities, ensuring an unforgettable experience from start to finish.

reviews: I had a great stay, Richard was very fast to respond to me. It is a great space and has lots of restaurants around. I had an event at the BMO Centre and it was an easy walk. I would stay again
Richard was a very responsive and helpful host! The place was nice and very close to downtown and all public transit. Would definitely stay again if needing to go back into the city.
Comfortable stay and location was in proximity to many things. Only thing is, it does get noisy at night sometimes. Thin walls and some activity on going in outside. Overall worth the money.

Great clean spacious spot just minutes from 17th Ave. Richard was really helpful when we left a couple of things in the apartment after check out and we were glad we booked for our return leg - definitely recommend.

A lovely stay at Richard‚Äôs property.
It had everything we needed, and was super spacious.
A 20 minute walk from Downtown Calgary and there was loads of bits in the immediate vicinity too.
Would recommend!

Richard was helpful and responsive to issues that arose concerning excessive noise at night and lack of cleanliness. Unfortunately the issue was partially outside his control. I was unable to sleep well which negatively impacted my trip.

Richard‚Äôs place was a prime location for a short stay to explore the city. It‚Äôs a close walk to many restaurants, bars, and coffee shops on 17th Ave and an easy stroll to the core of downtown. Of course, with it being in the heart of the city, you‚Äôll hear noise throughout the night so bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper.
Place was overall in good shape but could use some sweeping in the kitchen. Bed was also very squeaky with any small movement. Overall worth the stay.

Richard was a truly exceptional host‚Äîcommunicative, helpful, and professional from start to finish. While staying downtown came with a bit of city noise (as expected), Richard made everything else seamless. His prompt responses and genuine care really stood out. I felt well taken care of and would absolutely rent from him again anytime. Highly recommend!

Great location, walking distance to everything you need. Richard was very proactive in sharing information and helpful in providing an early check in. Couldn‚Äôt ask for a better host. There is noise from a nearby bar that has loud music, but given it was during stampede, it didn‚Äôt bother us as it ended around midnight every night. The building is definitely older, but it has everything you need for a comfortable stay.

Clean, easy self check-in, and responsive host. Steps from 17th Ave‚Äôs bars and restaurants. The only downside is the view of a backyard with garbage bins and people drawn to somewhat shady surroundings. At night, we could hear noise from the restaurants and bars, but it wasn‚Äôt a big problem since we came back late from exploring. However, one morning a generator‚Äîor something similar‚Äîturned on, and the noise was awful for about half an hour.
Richards place was in a great location, easily walkable to restaurants and shops nearby. We were working remote here for a few days and there was enough space for two people to work comfortably.

Extremely comfortable stay. Richard was very helpful and always responded back in a timely manner. Located in a prime location in the city. Definitely recommend if your looking for a place to stay downtown Calgary

very central location during stampede.  lots of food places & bars nearby. had a great breakfast around the corner, walking distance. next door to a good bar(some noise but it stops around 1230 or 1ish, but it was during stampede week so its expected). cool lil spot to stay

Thanks a lot. The location is excellent, and the place itself is nice and cozy. However, it is quite noisy. There was a street fight around 4 a.m. that woke us up, and aside from that, the general noise level is high due to the area.

Great Location .Easiest access imaginable .Responsive host gave me late Check out the place was spotless 10/10 would stay again . it was a little pricey being right before the start of Stampede but the place didn't dissapoint

Richard was very easy to book with, he was very friendly and cooperative. The location was amazing, right next to the all the main bar and restaurants in Calgary 17 ave. I would highly recommended staying here for a city stay.
Clean apartment. Location has walkable restaurants around it. But be warned can get noisy. No AC in units, so if you have to open window it will be LOUD and hard to sleep.

Very convenient location on the edge of downtown. Walkable distance to restaurants, markets, coffee shops, transportation, parks and gyms.
Richard was extremely helpful and very quick to respond.
Place was cute and clean! Perfect location for anything on 17th ave or at the stampede grounds! Great stay.
Amazing place, we had a lot of fun would recommend this place for the price point and ideal location
It was an amazing experience. Richard always communicates and encourages you to let him know if you need anything.
Clean place, great location, great communication. We‚Äôre happy with our stay in Calgary. Thanks so much!

You will find a very spacious and cozy loft with a fully equipped kitchen and a full entertainment system for your streaming service. It is roughly 20 Min away from the Stampede and 30 Min away from Prince's Island Park so you can take long walks which is nice. As I understand, homeless people are a growing issue in Calgary. It is not to blame on the location, which is perfect, nor on the host who seems very friendly - but be aware that you will find them in the neighborhood. The floors in the building and the parking lot are under video surveillance and the door lock is changed frequently. So overall we felt save and we can recommend this loft.

It was exactly what we needed for the time we were there. We were able to comfortably leave our vehicle parked for the whole weekend and walk every where we needed to go. It was a tidy little place that served for the purposes we needed. We will contact Richard again when we come in for the Expo next year! Thanks Richard!
Evan

description_html:
Enjoy a private downtown studio just steps from 17th Ave’s restaurants, cafes, and nightlife. Walk to the Saddledome, Stampede Grounds, Calgary Tower, and Stephen Avenue. The studio includes a comfy bed, stocked kitchenette, seating area, and bathroom. Shared laundry in the building, plus 5 parking stalls (first come first serve) with a paid lot next door. A central and affordable home base to explore Calgary.

The space
This private studio condo is on the 2nd floor of a low rise downtown building with just 16 units. Compact yet efficient, it’s the perfect affordable base for exploring Calgary.

Sleeping Area
Comfortable bed with fresh linens, ideal for solo travellers or couples looking for a central stay.

Living & Kitchenette
A cozy seating area and kitchenette with cookware, dishes, utensils, and essentials for light cooking.

Bathroom
Clean and functional bathroom with shower/tub combo, fresh towels, and toiletries provided.

Building & Amenities
• Shared laundry in the basement
• 5 parking stalls (first come, first serve)
• Paid lot conveniently located next door
• Easy access to 17th Ave, Saddledome, Calgary Tower, and downtown attractions

Guest access
Guests have exclusive access to their private suite and all its amenities. Enjoy the convenience of self-contained living with a fully equipped kitchen. While the suites offer a peaceful retreat, the vibrancy of downtown Calgary awaits right outside your door.

Parking is available onsite, but please note there are only 5 stalls, and they’re first come, first served. If those are full, there’s a paid lot just one block away, and street parking is also available nearby.

Other things to note
The property is located in a lively urban area, and since it’s an older, wood-framed building, you may occasionally hear some city sounds. We do our best to ensure a comfortable stay, and while a bit of urban ambiance is part of the downtown experience, we’re here to help you feel right at home.

We are committed to ensuring the comfort and safety of all our guests. At this time, we are unable to accommodate pets in the suites. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation in maintaining a pet-free environment.


Please be advised that parties and large gatherings of any kind are strictly prohibited at this property. This policy is in place to ensure the tranquility of the neighbourhood and the preservation of the property's condition. Violation of this policy may result in immediate termination of the rental agreement and possible legal action.

reviews_details.review: I had a great stay, Richard was very fast to respond to me. It is a great space and has lots of restaurants around. I had an event at the BMO Centre and it was an easy walk. I would stay again
Richard was a very responsive and helpful host! The place was nice and very close to downtown and all public transit. Would definitely stay again if needing to go back into the city.
Comfortable stay and location was in proximity to many things. Only thing is, it does get noisy at night sometimes. Thin walls and some activity on going in outside. Overall worth the money.

Great clean spacious spot just minutes from 17th Ave. Richard was really helpful when we left a couple of things in the apartment after check out and we were glad we booked for our return leg - definitely recommend.

A lovely stay at Richard‚Äôs property.
It had everything we needed, and was super spacious.
A 20 minute walk from Downtown Calgary and there was loads of bits in the immediate vicinity too.
Would recommend!

Richard was helpful and responsive to issues that arose concerning excessive noise at night and lack of cleanliness. Unfortunately the issue was partially outside his control. I was unable to sleep well which negatively impacted my trip.

Richard‚Äôs place was a prime location for a short stay to explore the city. It‚Äôs a close walk to many restaurants, bars, and coffee shops on 17th Ave and an easy stroll to the core of downtown. Of course, with it being in the heart of the city, you‚Äôll hear noise throughout the night so bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper.
Place was overall in good shape but could use some sweeping in the kitchen. Bed was also very squeaky with any small movement. Overall worth the stay.

Richard was a truly exceptional host‚Äîcommunicative, helpful, and professional from start to finish. While staying downtown came with a bit of city noise (as expected), Richard made everything else seamless. His prompt responses and genuine care really stood out. I felt well taken care of and would absolutely rent from him again anytime. Highly recommend!

Great location, walking distance to everything you need. Richard was very proactive in sharing information and helpful in providing an early check in. Couldn‚Äôt ask for a better host. There is noise from a nearby bar that has loud music, but given it was during stampede, it didn‚Äôt bother us as it ended around midnight every night. The building is definitely older, but it has everything you need for a comfortable stay.

Clean, easy self check-in, and responsive host. Steps from 17th Ave‚Äôs bars and restaurants. The only downside is the view of a backyard with garbage bins and people drawn to somewhat shady surroundings. At night, we could hear noise from the restaurants and bars, but it wasn‚Äôt a big problem since we came back late from exploring. However, one morning a generator‚Äîor something similar‚Äîturned on, and the noise was awful for about half an hour.
Richards place was in a great location, easily walkable to restaurants and shops nearby. We were working remote here for a few days and there was enough space for two people to work comfortably.

Extremely comfortable stay. Richard was very helpful and always responded back in a timely manner. Located in a prime location in the city. Definitely recommend if your looking for a place to stay downtown Calgary

very central location during stampede.  lots of food places & bars nearby. had a great breakfast around the corner, walking distance. next door to a good bar(some noise but it stops around 1230 or 1ish, but it was during stampede week so its expected). cool lil spot to stay

Thanks a lot. The location is excellent, and the place itself is nice and cozy. However, it is quite noisy. There was a street fight around 4 a.m. that woke us up, and aside from that, the general noise level is high due to the area.
reviews_details.host_response: Thanks so much for your feedback! I‚Äôm really glad you enjoyed the location and found the space cozy. I‚Äôm sorry to hear noise was an issue‚Äîyour stay happened to fall during the Calgary Stampede, which is the city‚Äôs busiest time of year with lots of events and late-night activity. We understand it‚Äôs not ideal for lighter sleepers but its only 10 days in July. Appreciate you staying with us and hope you enjoyed the rest of your trip!

reviews_details.review: Great Location .Easiest access imaginable .Responsive host gave me late Check out the place was spotless 10/10 would stay again . it was a little pricey being right before the start of Stampede but the place didn't dissapoint

Richard was very easy to book with, he was very friendly and cooperative. The location was amazing, right next to the all the main bar and restaurants in Calgary 17 ave. I would highly recommended staying here for a city stay.
Clean apartment. Location has walkable restaurants around it. But be warned can get noisy. No AC in units, so if you have to open window it will be LOUD and hard to sleep.

Very convenient location on the edge of downtown. Walkable distance to restaurants, markets, coffee shops, transportation, parks and gyms.
Richard was extremely helpful and very quick to respond.
Place was cute and clean! Perfect location for anything on 17th ave or at the stampede grounds! Great stay.
Amazing place, we had a lot of fun would recommend this place for the price point and ideal location
It was an amazing experience. Richard always communicates and encourages you to let him know if you need anything.
Clean place, great location, great communication. We‚Äôre happy with our stay in Calgary. Thanks so much!

You will find a very spacious and cozy loft with a fully equipped kitchen and a full entertainment system for your streaming service. It is roughly 20 Min away from the Stampede and 30 Min away from Prince's Island Park so you can take long walks which is nice. As I understand, homeless people are a growing issue in Calgary. It is not to blame on the location, which is perfect, nor on the host who seems very friendly - but be aware that you will find them in the neighborhood. The floors in the building and the parking lot are under video surveillance and the door lock is changed frequently. So overall we felt save and we can recommend this loft.

It was exactly what we needed for the time we were there. We were able to comfortably leave our vehicle parked for the whole weekend and walk every where we needed to go. It was a tidy little place that served for the purposes we needed. We will contact Richard again when we come in for the Expo next year! Thanks Richard!
Evan

description: Enjoy this spacious 2 bedroom , 2 bath condo in the heart of downtown Calgary. Perfect for up to 4 guests, this modern space is ideal for families, friends, or business travelers. The building features a gym, outdoor pool (open in summer), and free secured parking. Safety is a priority in this secure building, and its prime location puts you near top restaurants, shops, and entertainment. Experience the best of downtown Calgary in comfort and style. Book your stay today!The space2 bed 2  full bath 1 queen 1 double Large outdoor balconyRegistration DetailsBL281544
reviews: I‚Äôm a local Calgarian and stayed here for a month. The location was great ‚Äî walkable to everything I love about this city. I didn‚Äôt hear any noise from neighbouring units through the walls or ceiling during my stay. For anyone who‚Äôs noise-sensitive, you can hear some street noise and trains, but earplugs helped. The building felt safe, and there‚Äôs a security guard on site. The kitchen had everything I needed to cook meals, and this was the cleanest Airbnb I‚Äôve ever stayed in. I would love to live in this building and would definitely stay here again.

I loved this place and will definitely be back!
The host was fantastic, everything was clean, and access was super easy. Having parking available ‚Äî especially in downtown ‚Äî was a huge plus.
I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient stay!

very responsive host and large, clean suite. suite well stocked. location being right downtown was not ideal for families with young kids, not alot of activities/parks for young kids. the pool was enjoyed by the kids.

A beautiful, spacious and conveniently located condo. The gym and pool are nice additions and the condo is very well equipped with everything you could
need for a comfortable stay.

I used to live in Calgary and this is one of the nicest, cleanest, and perfect bnb's / apartment I have ever stayed at in YYC! From the 2 bedrooms, to the huge balcony, pristine kitchen with all needed appliances and utensils, washer/dryer, hair dryer, 2 bathrooms, and overall extremely luxury feeling! I felt very safe with the 24/7 concierge. The neighbourhood itself felt very safe and friendly located conveniently downtown. Overall I cannot recommend this place more. If you desire a luxury, cozy home feeling, and want to experience there DT life of Calgary this is the place to book! Will definitely be back and cannot wait to book again! To also add, the hosts were extremely accommodating and allowed me to check in early, thank you both again for a great stay in Calgary!
Extremely easy check in. Michelle was more than flexible with our late arrival time. Would definitely stay here again.

This was our second time staying here.  We really enjoy the area, lots of things to do, good restaurants and shopping all within easy walking distance.  The apartment was very clean as before and well stocked with all the basics.  We enjoyed the large balcony and large windows with great views.  Will stay again next time we‚Äôre in Calgary.
We had a wonderful time staying at Michelle‚Äôs for Stampede. The condo was in a great location, spacious and matched the listing perfectly. I would absolutely book again!
Very central within downtown. Michelle & Mo were super responsive Hosts. Home was beautiful, modern and clean. Would recommend and stay here again!
Very nice place, great location downtown close to all the restaurants and pubs. So much to do, Uber‚Äôs are always around and scooters as well.
Great location, just parked the car & walked everywhere.  We were pleasantly surprised by the items in the kitchen-equipment & some basic items for use.
Wonderful stay, the apartment was beautiful, very well kept with thoughtful additions Thankyou
Michelle and Mo were fantastic‚Äîvery responsive and attentive and helpful! The apartment was clean, well stocked, and in a great location!

Accommodations were ideal for us. Location was perfect and we could walk pretty much everywhere. The unit is well stocked with essentials and more, and whatever was lacking was replenished pretty much immediately once the host was notified. The only thing not up to par was the gym downstairs- the bike was not rideable as the pedal crank was broken, dumbbells were minimal, even the barbell plates were unevenly numbered (??) and we couldn‚Äôt open the window for fresh air. Michelle had better weights and bike in the unit itself!
I would definitely return the next time I‚Äôm in Calgary!

Michelle‚Äôs place was pristine, beautiful and thoughtfully appointed. Great view and lot‚Äôs of sunshine. Aesthetically decorated home.A lot of care had been taken to make the guest feel right at home. We easily found everything that we needed on our holiday.

The floor to ceiling windows were great, wonderful views of the city from main room and both bedrooms.   Location was only a few blocks from the +15 and easy walking to restaurants and shopping.  Host was helpful and quick to respond to messages.  Would definitely stay again when in Calgary.
Great space have stayed before and will stay again. Place is immaculate, highly recommend
Enjoyed our stay here. Building and suite were great, very clean and quiet.
Great location, clean, exactly as advertised with well appointed kitchen.
close to the places I wanted to visit. Good security doors & elevator
Nice place. Quick response
A beautiful place , we really enjoyed it
It was really nice to stay here.

I had originally booked a different Airbnb who canceled my reservation on the day of check in. I was panicking trying to find another place as I had just arrived in a new country, but Michelle and Mo thankfully accepted my late reservation without hesitation and immediately sent over the check in instructions. They were friendly, responsive, and had such a beautiful place!
We had on site parking included, but it was also walking distance to the downtown areas. The inside was spotless and had all appliances we could have needed. There were also emergency instructions listed throughout the place if needed. The view from the balcony was beautiful. So incredibly grateful for Michelle and Mo! Would definitely return and recommend to future travelers!

description_html:
This spacious and beautifully appointed 950sf South-West facing condo offers 2 beds and 2 baths. Enjoy stunning views of the city skyline and the majestic Rocky Mountains right from your windows.

Just steps from the Kerby LRT station (free fare zone), this condo is a short stroll to the scenic Bow River pathways, 15 minutes to the Downtown core, and close to the vibrant neighborhoods of Kensington and Eau Claire, known for their great selection of restaurants, boutiques, and cozy coffee shops.

The space
Take a break from your busy life in this stylishly furnished corner suite
- Personal control over the Air Conditioner is with you in hot days
- 2x fobs are provided on request for your convenience
- 1x High chair and 1x travel crib are provided on request
- Literally steps away (half block) from the Kerby LRT station which is on the edge of the Downtown Free Fare Zone
- Relaxing balcony settings to enjoy the breathtaking Rocky Mountain views and almost a 1/4 of downtown city life and surrounding suburbs
- All cabinets and drawers in the kitchen are properly labeled for your easy find
- Dishwasher, toaster, water filter pitcher, electric kettle, Keurig Supreme Plus coffee maker
- In-suite washer and dryer
- Fire Extinguisher and First Aid kit are on hand in kitchen’s drawer
- Free high speed internet, Standard TV channels, Amazon Prime & Netflix
- Smoke free (not allowed inside or on balcony)
- Pet free
- Garbage room on the same floor
- Free Gym
- Free heated underground parking
- Business licence: #BL289679

Guest access
The guest has access to the whole condo, including but not limited to:
- fresh linens and towels
- extra blankets
- toiletries
- condiments
- coffee and tea

description_html:
Stylish and comfortable 1-bedroom condo with beautiful high-rise views of the downtown skyline.

This condo is located in the heart of the Beltline. Walking distance to everything, such as restaurants, bars, shops, grocery stores, and all popular/trendy avenues. 5-min drive to the river, Stampede grounds, & the Saddledome.

Please be aware that the front doors of the building lock at 10 pm. If you book, you'll have to pick up the key/fob in a different location.

* POOL is closed for the winter.

The space
Our condo boasts all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. The air conditioning ensures that you stay cool during the warmer months, while the cozy queen bed promises a restful night's sleep. You'll also have the convenience of underground parking, so you can explore the city without worrying about parking hassles.


Notable Features:
-Balcony with downtown skyline view
-Queen bed
-Dedicated work station
-Dining Table (4 seats)
-Fresh beddings & linens
-Fully equipped bathroom w/ clean towels & toiletries
-55" Smart TV w/ Free Netflix (No cable TV)
-Bright living room w/ sofa
-Stocked kitchen with basic necessities
-High-speed WiFi
-Free underground parking
-Hairdryer
-Complimentary coffee and Keurig machine

ID Verification Required for our property.

All guests must complete an ID verification, in order to receive Arrival Instructions.

Guest access
You will have entire private access to the condo

For patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.

*** POOL is closed for the winter.

Great views.
Great space , great hosts. Will definitely be using their place again !
Good experience‚Ä¶.

The space itself was perfect with easy access to everything Calgary has to offer.
Overall, we had a 5/5 experience and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great stay in the city!

Andrew and Kyle were fantastic hosts! The unit was spotless upon arrival, it was easy to check into, and it was the perfect location for what we needed. Also, the view is better than it looks in the photos! 10/10 would stay here again!

The space was beautiful. The views were amazing at night and during the day there‚Äôs tons of places within walking distance. Kevin and Kyle were helpful and were typically quick in response. reviews: In general, our stay was really good! We loved the place and especially the location. The only downside was that the toilet wasn‚Äôt working the first night we arrived, so we had to manage until the next morning. The couch is very dirty with visible stains , one will think twice before sitting on it, washroom didn‚Äôt have enough supplies - shower gel bottle was almost empty, bed sheets were smelly not sure if they were washed or not. View from the condo is nice - the only good thing about this place. Maintenance required - master bedroom closet door doesn‚Äôt close properly .

Overall we had a great stay. It was during prime stampede time and for that, the location was perfectly located. Beautiful view and Neil was a great host. This is a great condo in a excellent location.  Lots of restaurants and things to do in walkable distance.  A few minor repairs are necessary but nothing that would hamper anyone‚Äôs stay.  The view at night is great.  Hosts are easy to reach and access instructions were straightforward and simple.  Thanks for a great stay.

The place is a good size, big enough for four adults. It has a stunning view of downtown at night and in a great location. Walking distance to great food and bars.
Bonus parking included in a garage.
Neighborhood felt safe as did the apartment complex.
Highly recommend.

Nice, responsive host, great view, nice central location, free parking, and close to Stampede.
Unit in need of major repairs. Toilet flush button broke, terrible towels, pillows and linens, no ice maker or ice trays, felt dirty, limited kitchen ware and supplies, broken closet doors, bed footboard broken, rusted shower rod and bad shower curtain, very confusing instructions and difficult to get in and out of building and garage. Host is friendly but this unit needs work.

beautiful skyline view. However, the suite had so many broken furniture peices including the toilet. The floors where not cleaned as the bottoms of our feet were black after walking around barefoot. Neil was great at communicating. I just dont believe the price was worth the suite.
It is very welcoming and beautiful place. Location is easy to find. The view is pretty at night. All the necessities are around the corner. It felt like home and peaceful.
The place is strategically located and almost near to everything. The place has the magnificent view of the downtown skyline. It is an ideal place to explore the city. It has  work stations/ tables.

Such a wonderful place and the view from the apartment is just Wow! Very clean place, private, safe, quiet and everything you need in the kitchen! it's right in downtown, easy walkable to everything and restaurants nearby! Neil and co-hosts are friendly, provided clear instructions for check-in which was easy to follow, and responded quickly to our questions! We would 100% reserve again next time we visit Calgary! Thanks Neil!

I enjoyed the stay of six days. I did not spend much time locally due to busy schedule, but there seemed to be plenty of restaurants nearby. What really stood out in the place was the amazing view towards downtown from the 19th floor. I have stayed in many AirBnBs with nice views but this one took the price. The place was nice and had everything I needed.

The view from the suite is breathtaking ! Beautiful place with a perfect view of the city, clean and safe, an excellent experience, we loved it. Neil very attentive and willing to help, thank you very much for everything

I would recommend this place to anyone needing a spot in downtown Calgary! This is the best Airbnb we have found in Calgary by far! The hosts are great, and the place is great as well! We will definitely be trying to book this airbnb every time we are back!

description_html:
Stay in our stylish apartment in the heart of the very best neighborhood in the city. The location is a few steps away from trendy microbreweries, artisanal ice cream shops, must-try restaurants, and an upscale supermarket. Enjoy the panoramic view of our city or read a book on the spacious balcony watching the beautiful Calgary sunsets.

The space
Location: This condo is located on 1ST SW in Beltline.

Amenities Include:
✪ Sleeps 3 – One Bedroom with Queen Bed. Bedroom mattress softness: Medium Hard/Soft. Another twin sized bed.
✪ Couch also folds into bed for a 4th guest
✪ Free Secured Parking
✪ High Speed Internet

name: Rental unit in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.90 ¬∑ 2 bedrooms ¬∑ 2 beds ¬∑ 1 bath
description: No Party house! A short walk away is the Stampede Grounds, BMO Centre, Victoria Park C-Train Station, Cowboys Casino and the Scotiabank Saddledome, as well as all the shops, pubs and breweries that 17th Ave and DT Calgary has to offer.This bright and spacious 2 bedroom apartment offers all the amenities you'll need during your getaway or short stay in Calgary - perfect for couples, small families or groups of friends. We're close to all the action, and the best that Calgary has to offer!Registration DetailsBL272360
reviews:
Place was amazing! Very clean. Great restaurants and stuff nearby. Super clean.
The decorations and amenities were nice. Beautiful floor to ceiling windows. Beds weee super comfy. Only slight downside was the couch and furniture in the main room was kind of small and not super comfortable to spend a lot of time in. Totally fine for the evening we stayed!

Jane was a wonderful host. she gave me all the details with easy check in instructions and she responded to  my questions promptly. the unit location is walkable to most of the tourist attractions.. You have a good view of  the Calgary Tower from the balcony and the city. I will stay here again if I come back to Calgary.

I really enjoyed my stay and will surely do again next time and I highly recommend her place . It was very clean and comfortable. Host is very prompt with replying to messages and she is very considerate as well. It was worth every penny.

Very nice view, and a very cozy, chic apartment. Downtown Calgary at night is gorgeous from the apartment. You have to be quieter in this suite however. Jane keeps this place spotless and looking good. Very good hosting from Jane üëè
My wife and I enjoyed this apartment for the one night we needed it. Great views of Calgary and the space was very clean. Would stay here again. Jane was very helpful and very attentive as well.

This spot made for a fun staycation in such a rad part of Calgary - instant access to some of the best restaurants and bars in the city. The unit was as pictured/described, had great views - our only change would be that we would've enjoyed more living room furniture for sitting/relaxing.

place central downtown, with great views.  No major problems, needs a few minor repairs, and the checkin with a FOB is a pain, especially, when checking out, and having to take it back up to the unit, then come back down.

Would recommend! My friend and I only stayed overnight, but it was great for our needs. We arrived later evening, and opening the door to that view was wild! The curtains worked well for the morning light.
Jane‚Äôs place was located directly in the center of Calgary which made it really easy to get around and the view from the apartment was amazing, especially in the evening.
This is a great place to stay, we walked to everything. The place was clean and we felt right at home, Jane was a great host very responsive with text!! Thanks for a great stay!

Words cannot describe on how beautiful Jane‚Äôs place is during all hours of the day/night! Best air bnb view there is to offer in Calgary. I had even got locked out due to only having one fob but Jane was very helpful for getting me back in the building!!! Would stay here againüíñ

This is the place you want if you wanna see Calgary at its finest.
During the day, the view of the city is already beautiful full of life and energy. But at night, especially during sunset, it becomes absolutely breathtaking. The sky melts into orange, and as the city lights start to glow, the whole scene feels magical like something out of a dream.

The place was very clean and in a super convenient location for me and my girls to experience the downtown life! Everything was close by and easy to get to. We had a great stay and I‚Äôd definitely come back when I‚Äôm in town again.
Thank you Jane!!

The place had an amazing view of the Calgary Tower and the beautiful skyline of downtown. It was in a great location ‚Äî just about a 10-minute walk to 17th Avenue with lots of great restaurants and cafes. I really enjoyed my stay!

My stay at Jane‚Äôs condo was absolutely perfect! The place was clean, modern, and had everything I needed for a comfortable visit. Jane was a fantastic host‚Äîsuper responsive, clear with her instructions, and genuinely caring about making sure I had a great experience. The check-in and check-out process was smooth and easy to follow. I especially appreciated the little touches and how well-equipped the condo was. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone visiting Calgary. Thanks again, Jane!

Jane was great communicating from booking to finish.  The apartment is perfect for 1 or 2 couples.  Awesome views and has everything you need.  Definitely worth booking if you want to be in walking distance of the Stampede.  It was a great value and would stay again!  Thank you Jane.

The apartment is perfectly located, easy to get in and out and access the main sights.
The only thing that could have helped, would be to provide coffee for the first day. We spent one night as we were driving to Lake Louise the next morning but there is no coffee supplies for the first morning.
The place was neat, the view was amazing. I wish there was one more couch to relax in the living room. But overall I loved the place and will definitely recommend it to anyone.

Loved our stay! The location was great and the space was nice and clean with all the amenities we needed!
Jane was always available and making sure that everything was to our expectations.
Thank you so much for being a wonderful host! I would highly recommend this place

The space is clean & bright. Decor tasteful. If you are a couch lounger not the space for you. Wife is a bed lounger & loved the views reading in the master bedroom during downtime. Well stocked bathroom items you can think of & a lovely deep tub. Kitchen has anything you could need with a nice selection of dry goods. Cooking oils, spices, instant coffee, coffee whitener & tea if that‚Äôs important to you. Everything was easy to find and well stocked. You can not beat the daytime & nighttime views. Breathtaking especially at night. Easy to navigate around with plenty of restaurants & a Starbucks across the street.
Walking about felt safe & the playground about half a block over was excellent for our little one. Parking space is a nice size even for a larger vehicle.
Very nice space and building, and beautiful view from high above the city. A great central location for wandering Calgary and taking in the view at the Calgary Tower.
We had a wonderful weekend! Jane's  listing was a very relaxing place to come back to after a day of enjoying the city. We would have no problems recommending to anyone

Really enjoyed our stay at Janes condo. She was very friendly and responsive. The unit was well stocked, the location is outstanding,  free indoor parking is a lifesaver and it was very clean. Great views from the balcony. Access with a fob to all doors makes you feel safe but you need a second fob if you are a bigger family. Improvements to be made is the need for a real couch. The small purple one is very uncomfortable especially if you are a family of 4, staying for a lomg period of time. 2 people can barely fit on it. Also the listing says gym on site and boardgames but they are both not available. Beds are a bit firm but that is a personal preference. Overall its a great place and I highly recommend staying here.

Everything about this place was truly excellent. The apartment was sparkling clean, cozy, and exactly as pictured. It felt comfortable and well‚Äëcared‚Äëfor‚Äîfrom the well‚Äëequipped kitchen to the thoughtfully arranged living space. The place was spotless, beautifully decorated, and even better than the photos. The decor created such a relaxing atmosphere, and the views were absolutely stunning‚Äîsuch a treat to wake up to! Jane was welcoming and made check‚Äëin and check‚Äëout effortless. Bonus points for the convenient location and peaceful ambience. I wish I could have stayed longer, and I‚Äôd highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great stay!

Words cannot describe on how beautiful Jane‚Äôs place is during all hours of the day/night! Best air bnb view there is to offer in Calgary. I had even got locked out due to only having one fob but Jane was very helpful for getting me back in the building!!! Would stay here againüíñ

This is the place you want if you wanna see Calgary at its finest.
During the day, the view of the city is already beautiful full of life and energy. But at night, especially during sunset, it becomes absolutely breathtaking. The sky melts into orange, and as the city lights start to glow, the whole scene feels magical like something out of a dream.

The place was very clean and in a super convenient location for me and my girls to experience the downtown life! Everything was close by and easy to get to. We had a great stay and I‚Äôd definitely come back when I‚Äôm in town again.
Thank you Jane!!

The place had an amazing view of the Calgary Tower and the beautiful skyline of downtown. It was in a great location ‚Äî just about a 10-minute walk to 17th Avenue with lots of great restaurants and cafes. I really enjoyed my stay!

My stay at Jane‚Äôs condo was absolutely perfect! The place was clean, modern, and had everything I needed for a comfortable visit. Jane was a fantastic host‚Äîsuper responsive, clear with her instructions, and genuinely caring about making sure I had a great experience. The check-in and check-out process was smooth and easy to follow. I especially appreciated the little touches and how well-equipped the condo was. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone visiting Calgary. Thanks again, Jane!

Jane was great communicating from booking to finish.  The apartment is perfect for 1 or 2 couples.  Awesome views and has everything you need.  Definitely worth booking if you want to be in walking distance of the Stampede.  It was a great value and would stay again!  Thank you Jane.

The apartment is perfectly located, easy to get in and out and access the main sights.
The only thing that could have helped, would be to provide coffee for the first day. We spent one night as we were driving to Lake Louise the next morning but there is no coffee supplies for the first morning.
The place was neat, the view was amazing. I wish there was one more couch to relax in the living room. But overall I loved the place and will definitely recommend it to anyone.

Loved our stay! The location was great and the space was nice and clean with all the amenities we needed!
Jane was always available and making sure that everything was to our expectations.
Thank you so much for being a wonderful host! I would highly recommend this place

The space is clean & bright. Decor tasteful. If you are a couch lounger not the space for you. Wife is a bed lounger & loved the views reading in the master bedroom during downtime. Well stocked bathroom items you can think of & a lovely deep tub. Kitchen has anything you could need with a nice selection of dry goods. Cooking oils, spices, instant coffee, coffee whitener & tea if that‚Äôs important to you. Everything was easy to find and well stocked. You can not beat the daytime & nighttime views. Breathtaking especially at night. Easy to navigate around with plenty of restaurants & a Starbucks across the street.
Walking about felt safe & the playground about half a block over was excellent for our little one. Parking space is a nice size even for a larger vehicle.
Very nice space and building, and beautiful view from high above the city. A great central location for wandering Calgary and taking in the view at the Calgary Tower.
We had a wonderful weekend! Jane's  listing was a very relaxing place to come back to after a day of enjoying the city. We would have no problems recommending to anyone

Really enjoyed our stay at Janes condo. She was very friendly and responsive. The unit was well stocked, the location is outstanding,  free indoor parking is a lifesaver and it was very clean. Great views from the balcony. Access with a fob to all doors makes you feel safe but you need a second fob if you are a bigger family. Improvements to be made is the need for a real couch. The small purple one is very uncomfortable especially if you are a family of 4, staying for a lomg period of time. 2 people can barely fit on it. Also the listing says gym on site and boardgames but they are both not available. Beds are a bit firm but that is a personal preference. Overall its a great place and I highly recommend staying here.

Everything about this place was truly excellent. The apartment was sparkling clean, cozy, and exactly as pictured. It felt comfortable and well‚Äëcared‚Äëfor‚Äîfrom the well‚Äëequipped kitchen to the thoughtfully arranged living space. The place was spotless, beautifully decorated, and even better than the photos. The decor created such a relaxing atmosphere, and the views were absolutely stunning‚Äîsuch a treat to wake up to! Jane was welcoming and made check‚Äëin and check‚Äëout effortless. Bonus points for the convenient location and peaceful ambience. I wish I could have stayed longer, and I‚Äôd highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great stay!

reviews:
We had a wonderful one-month stay here üòä The condo is quiet, very comfortable, and fully equipped with everything needed for daily life. It was also super convenient for work, the guest room even has a auto-adjustable desk, docking station, and monitor, which made remote working really easy.
The host was amazing, very kind, quick to respond, and always helpful. Communication was smooth from start to finish. This place really made our stay in Calgary comfortable. Highly recommend staying here!

Stacey's place is cozy and authentic; it felt like a home, not just some cookie cutter hotel-like unit bought up for the sole purpose of renting out. She has fun playful decor, the space is tidy and uncluttered, and we felt at home immediately. Neighborhood was great for walks, and there were a lot of great restaurants nearby. If we're back in Calgary we would definitely stay here again!

Such a convenient downtown location, super walkable to many restaurants, grocery stores, shopping, and entertainment! Stacey was warm and welcoming and made the check in process very simple! description_html:
Beautiful condo in Calgary’s vibrant Beltline! Steps from groceries, cafes, shops, pubs & more in a vibrant neighborhood. Watch 12 Ave go by from the balcony. 10 minute walk from the C train and downtown. Features a new full kitchen, reclining sofa, WiFi, cable TV & Disney+. Spacious master has a queen bed and dresser; 2nd bedroom includes a queen futon & sit-stand desk—perfect for remote work. Includes a national park pass for day or ski trips. Heated underground parking available (extra).

The space
Condo on 7th floor with 2 elevators in building.
-crystal accents and light fixtures throughout this beautiful condo.
-open concept large kitchen with new appliances/ dining room with extendable table that seats 6, living room with TV, recliner sofa and chair, seats 4.
-spacious master bedroom has a queen sized bed and dresser.
-second bedroom has a queen sized
futon and work station with a sit stand desk and extra monitor.

-building has a small gym (P level), and a paid laundry room (M level).
-underground parking available for $30 / day extra, or see other details for parking around the condo

Guest access
Access to entire condo, except storage room and master closet will be locked.

Other things to note
Parking is not included, but could be available for $30 / day. There is unlimited street parking on weekends and after 6pm week days, and a number of paid parking lots within a block of the building.

description_html:
Welcome to Tribeca St., your stylish escape in the heart of Calgary’s vibrant Beltline district. This suite combines urban sophistication with modern comfort, making it perfect for both short city breaks and extended vacations.

The space
Step inside and be greeted by an airy layout framed by exposed concrete ceilings, giving the space a chic, industrial loft vibe. The large windows flood the suite with natural light and showcase incredible downtown skyline views, a perfect backdrop for your morning coffee or evening unwind.

The living space flows seamlessly into a fully equipped kitchen, complete with stainless steel appliances and everything you need to prepare meals at home. The cozy bedroom offers a plush bed with crisp linens, while the bathroom features modern finishes and fresh, hotel style essentials.

Located just steps away from Calgary’s best cafés, restaurants, bars, and shops, and a short walk to the downtown core, Stampede grounds, and major attractions, you’ll be right at the center of it all.

✨ Highlights:
• Open-concept 1 bed / 1 bath with a modern, industrial vibe
• Exposed concrete ceilings for a unique, loft-style atmosphere
• Stunning downtown Calgary views
• Fully stocked kitchen
• Prime location in the Beltline district, walkable to everything.

Whether you’re here for business, a romantic getaway, or to explore the city, Tribeca St. Suite offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and location.

Guest access
Guests have full access to the suite, privately.
The fitness centre.
The sky lounge.
The pool (availability is seasonal)

Welcome home!The spaceNestled in the charming neighborhood of Cliff Bungalow, Calgary, this heritage property blends timeless character with modern comforts. Impeccably maintained, our family-run retreat offers a unique escape that‚Äôs hard to capture without experiencing it firsthand. reviews:
What a great spot!
Perfect location, easy access to both 4th street and 17th Avenue with lots of shops, restaurants and pubs.
The house is beautifully decorated (we felt like we were sleeping at a museum!) but still cozy and welcoming. Everything we might need was there and ready for us. Perfect!

My mother and I had a very beautiful stay here at this Airbnb. It is very clean and tidy and all the rooms were very nice. The location is absolutely perfect in Cliff Bungalow and close to everything. I would definitely stay here again

Our stay at Courtney‚Äôs classic and contemporary home in Cliff Bungalow was ideal. A wonderful retreat in the heart of the city. Quite comfortable and close to so many restaurants and grocery options. I highly recommend staying here for a weekend or two.

Courtney‚Äôs place is great! We loved the mid-century modern charm of this historical home and it is so conveniently located to 17th and so many amenities! We would absolutely stay here again! Courtney was always responsive and helpful if we needed anything! 10/10

We loved Courtney‚Äôs place, location was ideal for us, everything was great, clean and tastefully furnished! We felt well as soon as we walked in! A little bit of traffic outside but did not bother us. It was really nice to be able to walk to the river for a run in the morning. Would definetely go back!

Overall great experience, the except the electricity issues. AC kept tripping initially but was able to troubleshoot and the flights were flickering the whole time.
Courtney communicated really well throughout the stay. I would recommend staying here!!

Awesome stay, clean and well laid out suite, fully stocked with everything needed. Easy check in and location is perfect for walking to restaurants/nightlife.
Window ac units keep the bedrooms nice and cool.
No complaints and would stay again!

Our stay was lovely. The condo has a well appointed kitchen was very clean and quiet. Lots of great restaurants and cafes within a 5 minute walk and a grocery store close as well. We loved this stay and would happily book again.
This is a gem of an Airbnb. Really happy we booked this place. Will definitely return for future trips to Calgary.

Beautiful heritage home with generous living spaces. Wonderful responses and hospitality from Courtney. Well stocked house and such a fantastic location, within a few minutes walk of everything you could want - parks, playgrounds, river, grocery store, restaurants, gyms - perfect!
Thank you Courtney for a wonderful stay!
Fantastic, quaint apartment in a great location. Comfortable beds, fully stocked unit and Courtney was wonderful to deal with. 100% would stay here again.
We loved our stay at Courtney‚Äôs place!  Such an incredibly inviting and cozy historic home, plus the location can‚Äôt be beat. We would absolutely stay here again!

Great stay.  Courtney was a great host, super responsive with questions but frankly, everything had great instructions so there was not much need once there.  Lovely homely home. Well equipped and terrific neighborhood.  Will be back!

We stayed for a week at Courtney's place and it was a real value for money. Spacious and will all required amenities.
Courtney was always very responsive and very helpful with the requests and questions we had.
Highly recommended.
Great stay‚Äîsuper location, lovely space with gear decor. Appreciated the nice touches like coffee, shampoo, even a spare a toothbrush. Excellent communication. Would recommend and will stay again!
Beautiful place in a great area to access city center and other Calgary locations
Lovely place with lots of charm. Great location.
By far my favourite place in Calgary :) thank you!

What a beautiful, artfully decorated home away from home! Full of light with gorgeous furnishings, comfortable beds and a lovely bathroom. Well equipped kitchen and laundry room. It was too cool to take advantage of the outdoor spaces but how to come back some day to enjoy them. Perfect walking distance to cafe's, restaurants and downtown Calgary. Thanks Courtney!

Courtney has an amazing place. Exceptionally spacious clean and very easy to get to. One of the BEST places I have ever stayed at. I will be back next time I am in Calgary for sure!!  Courtney was also very responsive to any request I had without question and clearly goes beyond the expected. Thanks very much for a great stay!!
Honestly one of the best air bnbs I‚Äôve stayed at. Courtney was so flexible I had a late check and she was very accommodating. Highly recommend this spot. Well decorated and location was perfect!

We had 4 days there, this is the place you want to stay. Whole house was clean and had everything we needed, full kitchen with good appliances, private parking, laundry, nice balcony, Courtney even prepared extra treats for us, we have a great time there.
Super cute, will stay again.
Just the perfect location. Lots to do in the neighbourhood and everything is walkable. The space was beautiful and well decorated

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Cliff Bungalow is a historic and vibrant neighborhood nestled in the heart of Calgary, Alberta. Known for its charming character homes, tree-lined streets, and eclectic atmosphere, this community offers a unique blend of urban living and peaceful retreat. Residents enjoy easy access to boutique shops, trendy cafes, and local eateries along 4th Street and 17th Avenue. With picturesque views of the city skyline and proximity to parks and pathways, Cliff Bungalow is a sought-after destination for those seeking a dynamic and connected lifestyle in Calgary.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Our guests will have access to a designated car port. We can also provide a guest pass for street parking during their stay. There are many walking paths, bike paths and e-scooters to use to get around the area.

Whether for business or pleasure, enjoy plush bedding and high-speed internet. Come experience Calgary's magic from our unique hideaway. Welcome home!

description_by_sections.value: Nestled in the charming neighborhood of Cliff Bungalow, Calgary, this heritage property blends timeless character with modern comforts. Impeccably maintained, our family-run retreat offers a unique escape that‚Äôs hard to capture without experiencing it firsthand. Enjoy a lush garden oasis teeming with birds and squirrels, a serene hideaway amidst the city‚Äôs vibrant hustle and bustle. Perfect for nature lovers and city explorers alike, our home promises an unforgettable stay.

description_by_sections.value: Guests will have access to the entire unit. They also have a designated carport stall and can use the garden area (the outdoor space is communal).

The space

Impeccably maintained, our family-run retreat offers a unique escape that’s hard to capture without experiencing it firsthand. Enjoy a lush garden oasis teeming with birds and squirrels, a serene hideaway amidst the city’s vibrant hustle and bustle. reviews: Boeden‚Äôs place was a great spot for staying central in Calgary. My partner and I liked the neighbourhood, it also has great local restaurants and bars just downstairs including a Starbucks, Subway and some other chains. Boeden also provided us local recommendations to visit as well. Highly recommend
Beautiful place, great location. parking isn't too far of a walk. Host was very helpful and friendly! Lots to do, just walk around! great restaurants and lots of friendly shops in area.
This place was very well located. Near downtown and many amenities. It was easy to access other neighborhoods like Inglewood. The place is spacious and well equipped for a travelling couple.

The apartment was light, bright and very  quiet. It was well supplied  with nice extra touches. Everything is as advertised. It‚Äôs  close to restaurants, pubs, coffee shops. Boeden  responds quickly. We would definitely stay again.

Our stay at Boeden's place was fantastic!  We came for the Stampede which was within easy walking distance as were the great restaurants around the apartment - loved the pedestrian only area on 8th Ave SW.  It was busy but a great vibe in the city.  Boeden was very helpful with suggestions for things around the apartment (restaurants, stores, parking, etc) and super prompt responding to messages.  We would stay here again for sure!

The place was great, had all the amenities and almost everything we wanted to do was in walking distance. The place was very clean and felt very comfortable. The host gave great local recommendations and was quick to respond. Would definitely stay again.

I would definitely stay here again
Great location, easy to reach. The apartment looks like on the pictures and has a great view. We received great suggestions for restaurants and bars.
Great location. Walking distance to everything we wanted to see. Comfortable living space. Would stay again for sure!

Lovely apartment, well supplied with extra amenities like toiletries, coffee, washing powder, etc.
Ideal location near all the restaurants and Starbucks opposite.
The view from the balcony was cool, 8th floor, would recommend!
Incredible host! Made our stay super easy.
It was a great stay in a very nice area.
Great stay. Always love the neighbourhood and the building. Would stay again.
Very nice place super spacious. Lots to do in the area would definitely stay again.
Fantastic spot. Well organized and clean. No complaints.

Great apartment and awesome deck with a city view! Comfy bed and couch bed. Almost bigger than the photos make it look! We had a lovely time and the host was responsive and resolved an issue we had with the AC. The apartment is perfectly situated to walk to the gorgeous library, river, the centre street hill overlooking the city, and public transportation.

Lisa‚Äôs place was wonderful. Easy walking distance for my conference at the Stampede. Bed was super comfortable and the condo was very well equipped. Lisa was so very attentive and made sure we were comfortable throughout our stay!! Fabulous place and great host! Will definitely stay here again next time we come back up to Calgary!

great condo in perfect position for Calgary stampede (10 mins walk) and downtown restaurants and shops. very comfortable bed and sofa.  Lisa was very helpful, as we arrived before check in time, which wasn't a problem. she also gave us the addresses of supermarkets and restaurants which was helpful. would highly recommend Lisa's condo and would certainly stay there again.

I had an excellent stay at this place, and the host made the entire experience incredibly easy and seamless. I needed to make some changes to my reservation, and she was super helpful, quick to respond, and very understanding. She guided us through the entire process and made sure everything was perfect. The place felt like home, with everything you could need for a short or long stay. The location is fantastic, close to downtown and nearby parking, making it convenient to explore all the nearby areas of interest. I highly recommend this place and would definitely stay here again!

We had a lovely stay in Calgary. The apartment is cozy and well located in the centre of Calgary. We had some problems to get in the apartment but Lisa was very proactive and resolved the issue quickly. The apartment has everything necessary. Can highly recommend to stay in this apartment!

We had a great stay at Lisa‚Äôs place. Great location, lots of walkable places and everything you need for a fun getaway. Parking can be a bit tough but besides that Lisa‚Äôs place is a great choice for anyone looking for a great stay and I would recommend staying here.

Loved my stay here! Very clean and tidy and host is very responsive and helpful. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to stay downtown Calgary as it is walking distance from a lot of popular places.

Lisa was a great host. She provided great instructions for check in and helpful recommendations. She even had a welcome basket with snacks! The location was perfect for our needs and had lots of great restaurants and pubs within walking distance. I would definitely stay here again.
Fantastic stay for extended period of time. Very clean and modern space with nice views and fun surrounding restaurants, cocktail bars nearby. Easy to follow instructions given well in advance.

Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located Condo.
