The A/C was broken so Boeden had someone come in with a portable A/C the evening I arrived so I could sleep (the apartment was 25 C). Unfortunately the portable A/C blocked the exit onto the balcony. Thank you Boeden for resolving my issue so promptly.
I would definitely stay here again
Great location, easy to reach. The apartment looks like on the pictures and has a great view. We received great suggestions for restaurants and bars.
Great location. Walking distance to everything we wanted to see. Comfortable living space. Would stay again for sure!

Lovely apartment, well supplied with extra amenities like toiletries, coffee, washing powder, etc.
Ideal location near all the restaurants and Starbucks opposite.
The view from the balcony was cool, 8th floor, would recommend!
Incredible host! Made our stay super easy.
It was a great stay in a very nice area.
Great stay. Always love the neighbourhood and the building. Would stay again.
Very nice place super spacious. Lots to do in the area would definitely stay again.
Fantastic spot. Well organized and clean. No complaints.

Great apartment and awesome deck with a city view! Comfy bed and couch bed. Almost bigger than the photos make it look! We had a lovely time and the host was responsive and resolved an issue we had with the AC. The apartment is perfectly situated to walk to the gorgeous library, river, the centre street hill overlooking the city, and public transportation.

Lisa‚Äôs place was wonderful. Easy walking distance for my conference at the Stampede. Bed was super comfortable and the condo was very well equipped. Lisa was so very attentive and made sure we were comfortable throughout our stay!! Fabulous place and great host! Will definitely stay here again next time we come back up to Calgary!

great condo in perfect position for Calgary stampede (10 mins walk) and downtown restaurants and shops. very comfortable bed and sofa.  Lisa was very helpful, as we arrived before check in time, which wasn't a problem. she also gave us the addresses of supermarkets and restaurants which was helpful. would highly recommend Lisa's condo and would certainly stay there again.

I had an excellent stay at this place, and the host made the entire experience incredibly easy and seamless. I needed to make some changes to my reservation, and she was super helpful, quick to respond, and very understanding. She guided us through the entire process and made sure everything was perfect. The place felt like home, with everything you could need for a short or long stay. The location is fantastic, close to downtown and nearby parking, making it convenient to explore all the nearby areas of interest. I highly recommend this place and would definitely stay here again!

We had a lovely stay in Calgary. The apartment is cozy and well located in the centre of Calgary. We had some problems to get in the apartment but Lisa was very proactive and resolved the issue quickly. The apartment has everything necessary. Can highly recommend to stay in this apartment!

We had a great stay at Lisa‚Äôs place. Great location, lots of walkable places and everything you need for a fun getaway. Parking can be a bit tough but besides that Lisa‚Äôs place is a great choice for anyone looking for a great stay and I would recommend staying here.

Loved my stay here! Very clean and tidy and host is very responsive and helpful. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to stay downtown Calgary as it is walking distance from a lot of popular places.

Lisa was a great host. She provided great instructions for check in and helpful recommendations. She even had a welcome basket with snacks! The location was perfect for our needs and had lots of great restaurants and pubs within walking distance. I would definitely stay here again.
Fantastic stay for extended period of time. Very clean and modern space with nice views and fun surrounding restaurants, cocktail bars nearby. Easy to follow instructions given well in advance.

This studio was amazing! Very clean and comfortable. I can‚Äôt say enough about the area. It is the perfect location for walking and checking out the local restaurants and little shops. Bev was an amazing host and very responsive. The rooftop patio is amazing!

Perfect little apartment in the best location in Mission. Comfortable and close to great restaurants and amenities. Bev was very flexible. I will definitely use Bev‚Äôs apartment as a base for my future visits.
Phenomenal spot! If you are a digital nomad or don‚Äôt require a ton of space and need a place to live and work, this place is perfect. Would highly recommend it for anyone.

Bev was an amazing host! She was super responsive and very accommodating. Whenever we had any questions we would get a reply within minutes! The place was even better than the photos and within walking distance of a lot of restaurants! Will definitely be back and highly recommend this place.
Super awesome place in a beautiful neighbourhood. very quiet at all times of the day and night. Bev is a very responsive and helpful host!

name: Rental unit in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ5.0 ¬∑ 2 bedrooms ¬∑ 2 beds ¬∑ 1.5 bathrooms
description: It's the spot, it's the vibe, it's the V√º. Located in the heart of Calgary's Beltline community, you're within easy walking distance to the Stampede, Scotiabank Saddledome and some of Canada's top dining destinations. If your goal is to unwind, detoxify in the 2-person infrared sauna or lounge on the 15-foot private balcony with views of the Calgary Tower & Canada Day/Stampede fireworks. A gateway to the Canadian Rockies; find yourself exploring the mountain ranges within a scenic hour's drive.The spaceWHY CHOOSE US‚Ä¶+ THE V√ú: Front row seating to the Stampede fireworks from the living room or the 15-foot long private patio, with peeking views of the iconic Calgary tower. The southeast-facing, floor-to-ceiling windows span from the primary bedroom throughout the living room. Those that live for sunrises are going to fall in love with the v√º. If you prefer to rise without the shine, each window has a blind so you can blissfully hit snooze over & over again. + LOCATION: Anything you could want is within a 10-minute walking radius. Whether you‚Äôre here for Stampede, catching a concert/hockey game at the Scotiabank Saddledome, or just craving a night out downtown without needing a car - this is it. Local-favourites Ten Foot Henry‚Äôs Restaurant is across the street & Proof cocktail bar is right at the bottom of our building, so you barely need to step outside to experience Calgary‚Äôs downtown must-sees. Here to see the mountains? You‚Äôre only an hour away from Canmore, or two from Banff & Lake Louise. + PRIVATE SAUNA: Immerse yourself with an at-home spa treatment with a session in the 2-person infrared sauna. Choose how you zen; level up the experience with your favourite show on the swivel Smart TV or toss on your favourite slide from the bedroom‚Äôs solar system projector. We leave extra towels for the sauna so you don‚Äôt need to worry about getting your bathing towels icky.+ HOME OFFICE: As remote workers, we understand the pains of working on an uncomfortable kitchen chair, or spending your day‚Äôs wages at a coffee shop.* We built a tucked away workstation with a monitor, HDMI cord, mousepad and an ergonomic mouse so you can clock-in while on vacay in comfort & style. The kitchen island bar seats are adjustable and extremely comfortable with power outlets on both ends, if you require extra work space. (*P.s.. If coffee shops are your jam - there‚Äôs a Starbucks just across the street.)+ DOG-FRIENDLY: We provide a dog bed, a dedicated dog blanket & dog bowls so even your furry friend feels like they‚Äôre on vacation. There are plenty of dog-friendly parks nearby to let them roam.+ COMFORT: From central air-conditioning, to luxurious 100% cotton sheets, white noise machines and too many cup choices‚Ä¶ We filled the space with items that aren‚Äôt just aesthetically-pleasing, but provide a level of comfort & function that we enjoy - and hope you will too. + UNDERGROUND PARKING: Your stay includes access to a single (1) underground parking space with a clearance of 6‚Äô9‚Äù. If you have a taller vehicle, there‚Äôs a large parking lot one block from us. + SUSTAINABLE: Working in this industry for so long, we know firsthand the incredible amount of waste that crafting rental units can make. We made it our mission to take our time, and either build or refurbish/repurpose/reuse as many items as possible to furnish the space (our FB Marketplace game is STRONG.) We also offer refillable items and stock eco-friendly products from local markets (no mini shampoo bottles here!) WHAT CAN I EXPECT IN THE SPACE? ‚òÄÔ∏è ‚Äã‚ÄãPrimary Bedroom: + King bed with a hybrid comfort Emma mattress+ 4 pillows with adjustable firm/plushness+ 100% cotton sheets+ White noise machine+ Mirrored-closet with hangers, clothes rack, a dresser & a luggage rack+ Dedicated workstation + Floor-to-ceiling, east-facing windows, each with room-darkening blinds+ Blackout curtains for the sliding doors that separate the living room and bedroomüåô Second Bedroom: + Queen bed with an Endy mattress+ Private 2-person infrared sauna w/ extra towels+ 40‚Äù Smart TV on a swivel base to watch in bed or the sauna+ 12-slide solar system projector+ Ceiling fan+ White noise machine+ Reading lamp+ 4 pillows with adjustable firm/plushness+ 100% cotton sheets+ Mirrored-closet with hangers, clothes rack, storage shelves, a luggage rack, and a pack & playüõãÔ∏è Living Room: + 55‚Äù Smart/Roku TV atop an electric fireplace+ Wide/cozy couch & the iconic PO√ÑNG to kick back on+ A selection of cozy blankets to bundle up in + Electric fireplace + Selection of games & books+ Floor-to-ceiling, southeast-facing windows, each with room-darkening blinds **perfect viewing space for the Stampede/Canada day fireworks!** üéÜ Patio/Balcony: + 15-foot balcony+ 4-seater outdoor sectional sofa+ Views of the Calgary Tower, Stampede fireworks, city skyline & moreüë®‚Äçüç≥ Kitchen: + Keurig K-Duo coffee maker+ Electric kettle+ Mini (3-quart) instant pot+ Air fryer+ Blender+ Coffee grinder + Ice/water dispenser on the fridge+ Ground coffee, tea & sugar+ Olive oil + Paper towel (1/stay)+ Cooking & baking essentials (baking sheet, sharp knives, etc.)üõÅ Full Bathroom:+ Shower/tub combo + Hair dryer+ Shampoo/conditioner/body wash/hand soapüöª Half Bathroom: + Hair dryer+ Makeup towels+ Expansive mirror that makes getting ready to go out a breezeüêæ Dog-Friendly Bits: + Dog bed + Dedicated dog blanket + Dog food tray & dishesüíª Dedicated Workstation: + Desk chair+ Computer monitor+ HDMI cord/dongle + Ergonomic mouse & pad‚Äã‚Äã‚ú®Honorary Mentions: + Foldable wagon/cart to help make hauling your items up & down a little easierHOW FAR AM I FROM‚Ä¶?+ Calgary Stampede Grounds (10-minute walk)+ Scotiabank Saddledome (10-minute walk)+ BMO Centre (10-minute walk)+ Kananaskis (1-hour drive)+ Canmore (1-hour drive)+ Banff (1.5 hour drive)+ Lake Louise (2-hour drive)Guest accessGUEST ACCESSGuests will have access to the entirety of the unit, along with a single (1) underground parking space. Please note that there is a locked cabinet in the front entrance closet that is for our storage and is not accessible to you. PARKINGYou will have access to a single (1) underground parking stall with a clearance of 6'9".Registration DetailsBL287519
reviews: We had a wonderful stay at Michael & Regina‚Äôs place. The space was quiet, clean and well appointed, with amazing views. The included parking was a nice touch. Given where it is, there are a ton of great restaurants within walking distance or a very quick Uber ride. Would recommend staying here if you‚Äôre looking for a spot in Calgary.

Excellent location with plenty to walk to or simply view through the gorgeous windows and balcony space. Had all the amenities as listed, including incredibly comfortable beds and sofa. Greatly appreciated the clear instructions and accurate photos of the space. Any concerns we had during our stay were promptly addressed and resolved by the hosts.

This was the perfect place to say for anything at the Saddledome, great restaurants and some shopping. We love that we could walk everywhere. The place was beautifully decorated with cozy blankets and nice dishes and mugs. Great place to stay if you want to be close to it all.

We had a great stay! The location was perfect for us - super walkable and close to everything we needed. The unit itself was beautiful and clean, with great views. Would totally recommend and will definitely stay again the next time we have to be in Calgary!

Really enjoyed staying here! Lots of natural light and the apartment was gorgeous. The sauna doesn‚Äôt get too hot and does take a while to heat up (at least an hour if not more) so keep that in mind. Michael and Regina were very communicative and responsive. Would absolutely stay again!
We enjoyed our time at the apartment for a few days ‚Äî it was clean, comfortable, quiet, and walkable to everything in downtown. Would definitely stay here again next time I‚Äôm in Calgary!

Great place to stay in a convenient location. Hosts were super helpful, even let us know we could check in early since the cleaners were done. The sauna is an awesome and unique touch, as well as the games. Beat my brother in backgammon many times- definitely recommend.

We really enjoyed staying here. Easy walk to the Calgary Stampede. Perfect place to sit and watch the fireworks after the Stampede evening performance. The apartment  is clean and quiet; the building is secure.  Nice restaurants within walking distance.

Mike & Regina's place was our home away from home when we were displaced due to flooding. Their place was super clean, nicely decorated, with luxury bedding/towels and stocked with amenities.  You can't beat the incredible views their place has to offer with the floor to ceiling windows. The sauna was such a nice little luxury especially during colder months. Location wise their place is right in the middle of so many restaurants and good bars literally steps away. They were very responsive when we had questions and were great at communicating. Highly recommend to others üòä
Michael and Regina‚Äôs place was amazing. The beds were comfortable, great views and had everything you need.They were always responsive. Loved our stay.

Lovely stay at Michael and Regina‚Äôs place in the Beltline.  If possible, the unit in person is even more beautiful than the pictures.  Wonderfully and tastefully appointed through with all the amenities and more need for a great stay and the unit was immaculate throughout.  Great balcony for city views as well.  Location is *perfect* for visiting Calgary, with some of the best restaurants and bars in Calgary literally at your doorstep and an easy walk to downtown or to shopping further into the Beltline.  Also, wonderful, friendly, and responsive hosts with a very clear and easy check-in/check-out process - A++ to Michael and Regina.  Couldn‚Äôt recommend more highly!

Perfect choice for convenience to the convention center and some of the best restaurants ever, like Calcutta Cricket Club and Ten Foot Henry, just a few steps away.  Everything in this apartment is in mint condition and high quality.  The furniture is extremely comfortable, the towels are thick and fluffy,  and the windows provide plenty of natural light.  It was easy to use the wifi, TV, and kitchen appliances.  The owners, Regina and Michael, are super-friendly and responsive.  The building feels safe and secure, with an immaculate simple lobby and hallways.  I would definitely stay here again, and recommend it highly.
Michael and Regina are great hosts. Very proactive and responsive to messages. The place is beautiful and location is perfect
Amazing hosts who were extra responsive!  The views are spectacular and fully equipped with everything we needed.  Super friendly hosts who were friendly and accommodating.

I recently stayed in this condo, and it was a great experience! The highlight was definitely the indoor sauna in one of the bedrooms - such a luxurious touch that made the stay feel like a mini wellness retreat. The condo itself had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The location was perfect, within walking distance to everything.
Check-in was seamless. If you‚Äôre looking for a unique stay in Calgary with a bit of extra relaxation, I highly recommend this spot!
Would definitely book again!
We had a great stay! I would choose to stay there again, thanks for everything!
Loved Loved Loved this place! Will absolutley stay again!
Great place and a good option to a stale hotel room.
Great hosts and great place!

The guys are great ! They took care of everything in the apartment. It was comfortable, like home. The location of the apartment is very convenient , everything is close ! Any questions that arise are answered immediately.
A wonderful stay!

location_details.title: Neighbourhood highlights
location_details.value: The V√º is located in the Colours by Battistella building in Calgary‚Äôs Beltline neighbourhood; the city's vibrant heartbeat, where urban energy meets eclectic charm. This bustling neighborhood is a kaleidoscope of modern living, with sleek high-rises standing side by side with quirky character-filled buildings. Picture a mix of cozy cafes, rooftop patios, and indie boutiques, all wrapped up in an artsy vibe that's never too far from the action.Whether you're grabbing a latte from a local barista, enjoying the latest art exhibit, or strolling through leafy parks, the Beltline is a place where the cool crowd and diverse communities collide. In the evenings, it transforms into a lively hub of music, dining, and late-night fun, with trendy spots offering everything from gourmet tacos to craft cocktails. It's where Calgary's past meets its future, with history-rich brick buildings making way for innovative new developments, all while the mountains in the distance remind you that nature is never too far from city life.In the Beltline, every corner offers a new adventure, whether you're catching live music, taking in an impromptu street performance, or simply watching the world go by. It's a neighborhood that's always buzzing, but still feels like home.When you stay at the V√º, you‚Äôll be close to‚Ä¶ ACTIVITIES+ Calgary Stampede Grounds (10-min walk)+ Scotiabank Saddledome (10-min walk)+ BMO Centre (10-min walk)+ Elbow River Casino (9-min walk)+ Yuk Yuk‚Äôs Calgary (9-min walk)+ Telus Spark Centre (10-min drive)+ Calgary Zoo/Wilder Institute (10-min drive)GYMS+ HotShop Hot Yoga & Barre (1-min walk)+ Anytime Fitness (2-min walk)RESTAURANTS+ Proof cocktail bar (1-min walk)+ Ten Foot Henry‚Äôs (1-min walk)+ First Street Market (1-min walk)+ Pat & Betty‚Äôs (1-min walk)+ Kama (5-min walk)+ Pigeonhole (7-min walk)+ Una Pizza + Wine (15-min walk)COFFEE SHOPS+ Starbucks (1-min walk)+ Deville Coffee (4-min walk)+ Rosso (6-min walk)+ il caffe (8-min walk)+ Element Coffee (9-min walk)BOUTIQUES/SHOPPING+ The Sunday Shop (1-min walk)+ Leo Boutique (18-min walk/6-min drive)+ Liz & Lottie (9-min drive)+ Peacock Boutique Consignment (19-min walk/7-min drive)+ Chinook Mall/CF Chinook Centre (10-min drive)SPAS/BEAUTY SALONS/ETC.+ Headkandi Salon Hotels Arts (1-min walk)+ Nuad Thai Massage (2-min walk)+ Lola Lash Bar (2-min walk)+ SKA Thermal Spa (13-min walk)GROCERERS+ H Mart (5-min walk)+ Sunterra Market (6-min walk)+ Real Canadian Superstore (4-min drive)DESTINATIONS+ Kananaskis (1-hour drive)+ Canmore (1-hour drive)+ Banff (1.5 hour drive)+ Lake Louise (2-hour drive)

description_html:
It's the spot, it's the vibe, it's the Vü. Located in the heart of Calgary's Beltline community, you're within easy walking distance to the Stampede, Scotiabank Saddledome and some of Canada's top dining destinations. If your goal is to unwind, detoxify in the 2-person infrared sauna or lounge on the 15-foot private balcony with views of the Calgary Tower & Canada Day/Stampede fireworks. A gateway to the Canadian Rockies; find yourself exploring the mountain ranges within a scenic hour's drive.

The space
WHY CHOOSE US…

+ THE VÜ: Front row seating to the Stampede fireworks from the living room or the 15-foot long private patio, with peeking views of the iconic Calgary tower. The southeast-facing, floor-to-ceiling windows span from the primary bedroom throughout the living room. Those that live for sunrises are going to fall in love with the vü. If you prefer to rise without the shine, each window has a blind so you can blissfully hit snooze over & over again.

+ LOCATION: Anything you could want is within a 10-minute walking radius. Whether you’re here for Stampede, catching a concert/hockey game at the Scotiabank Saddledome, or just craving a night out downtown without needing a car - this is it. Local-favourites Ten Foot Henry’s Restaurant is across the street & Proof cocktail bar is right at the bottom of our building, so you barely need to step outside to experience Calgary’s downtown must-sees. Here to see the mountains? You’re only an hour away from Canmore, or two from Banff & Lake Louise.

+ PRIVATE SAUNA: Immerse yourself with an at-home spa treatment with a session in the 2-person infrared sauna. Choose how you zen; level up the experience with your favourite show on the swivel Smart TV or toss on your favourite slide from the bedroom’s solar system projector. We leave extra towels for the sauna so you don’t need to worry about getting your bathing towels icky.

+ HOME OFFICE: As remote workers, we understand the pains of working on an uncomfortable kitchen chair, or spending your day’s wages at a coffee shop.* We built a tucked away workstation with a monitor, HDMI cord, mousepad and an ergonomic mouse so you can clock-in while on vacay in comfort & style. The kitchen island bar seats are adjustable and extremely comfortable with power outlets on both ends, if you require extra work space. (*P.s.. If coffee shops are your jam - there’s a Starbucks just across the street.)

+ DOG-FRIENDLY: We provide a dog bed, a dedicated dog blanket & dog bowls so even your furry friend feels like they’re on vacation. There are plenty of dog-friendly parks nearby to let them roam.

+ COMFORT: From central air-conditioning, to luxurious 100% cotton sheets, white noise machines and too many cup choices… We filled the space with items that aren’t just aesthetically-pleasing, but provide a level of comfort & function that we enjoy - and hope you will too.

+ UNDERGROUND PARKING: Your stay includes access to a single (1) underground parking space with a clearance of 6’9”. If you have a taller vehicle, there’s a large parking lot one block from us.

+ SUSTAINABLE: Working in this industry for so long, we know firsthand the incredible amount of waste that crafting rental units can make. We made it our mission to take our time, and either build or refurbish/repurpose/reuse as many items as possible to furnish the space (our FB Marketplace game is STRONG.) We also offer refillable items and stock eco-friendly products from local markets (no mini shampoo bottles here!)


WHAT CAN I EXPECT IN THE SPACE?

☀️ ​​Primary Bedroom:

+ King bed with a hybrid comfort Emma mattress
+ 4 pillows with adjustable firm/plushness
+ 100% cotton sheets
+ White noise machine
+ Mirrored-closet with hangers, clothes rack, a dresser & a luggage rack
+ Dedicated workstation
+ Floor-to-ceiling, east-facing windows, each with room-darkening blinds
+ Blackout curtains for the sliding doors that separate the living room and bedroom


🌙 Second Bedroom:

+ Queen bed with an Endy mattress
+ Private 2-person infrared sauna w/ extra towels
+ 40” Smart TV on a swivel base to watch in bed or the sauna
+ 12-slide solar system projector
+ Ceiling fan
+ White noise machine
+ Reading lamp
+ 4 pillows with adjustable firm/plushness
+ 100% cotton sheets
+ Mirrored-closet with hangers, clothes rack, storage shelves, a luggage rack, and a pack & play


🛋️ Living Room:

+ 55” Smart/Roku TV atop an electric fireplace
+ Wide/cozy couch & the iconic POÄNG to kick back on
+ A selection of cozy blankets to bundle up in
+ Electric fireplace
+ Selection of games & books
+ Floor-to-ceiling, southeast-facing windows, each with room-darkening blinds **perfect viewing space for the Stampede/Canada day fireworks!**

🎆 Patio/Balcony:

+ 15-foot balcony
+ 4-seater outdoor sectional sofa
+ Views of the Calgary Tower, Stampede fireworks, city skyline & more


👨‍🍳 Kitchen:

+ Keurig K-Duo coffee maker
+ Electric kettle
+ Mini (3-quart) instant pot
+ Air fryer
+ Blender
+ Coffee grinder
+ Ice/water dispenser on the fridge
+ Ground coffee, tea & sugar
+ Olive oil
+ Paper towel (1/stay)
+ Cooking & baking essentials (baking sheet, sharp knives, etc.)


🛁 Full Bathroom:

+ Shower/tub combo
+ Hair dryer
+ Shampoo/conditioner/body wash/hand soap


🚻 Half Bathroom:

+ Hair dryer
+ Makeup towels
+ Expansive mirror that makes getting ready to go out a breeze


🐾 Dog-Friendly Bits:

+ Dog bed
+ Dedicated dog blanket
+ Dog food tray & dishes


💻 Dedicated Workstation:

+ Desk chair
+ Computer monitor
+ HDMI cord/dongle
+ Ergonomic mouse & pad
​​

✨Honorary Mentions:

+ Foldable wagon/cart to help make hauling your items up & down a little easier


HOW FAR AM I FROM…?

+ Calgary Stampede Grounds (10-minute walk)
+ Scotiabank Saddledome (10-minute walk)
+ BMO Centre (10-minute walk)
+ Kananaskis (1-hour drive)
+ Canmore (1-hour drive)
+ Banff (1.5 hour drive)
+ Lake Louise (2-hour drive)

Guest access
GUEST ACCESS

Guests will have access to the entirety of the unit, along with a single (1) underground parking space. Please note that there is a locked cabinet in the front entrance closet that is for our storage and is not accessible to you.


PARKING

You will have access to a single (1) underground parking stall with a clearance of 6'9".

location_details_html:
The Vü is located in the Colours by Battistella building in Calgary’s Beltline neighbourhood; the city's vibrant heartbeat, where urban energy meets eclectic charm. This bustling neighborhood is a kaleidoscope of modern living, with sleek high-rises standing side by side with quirky character-filled buildings. Picture a mix of cozy cafes, rooftop patios, and indie boutiques, all wrapped up in an artsy vibe that's never too far from the action.

Whether you're grabbing a latte from a local barista, enjoying the latest art exhibit, or strolling through leafy parks, the Beltline is a place where the cool crowd and diverse communities collide. In the evenings, it transforms into a lively hub of music, dining, and late-night fun, with trendy spots offering everything from gourmet tacos to craft cocktails. It's where Calgary's past meets its future, with history-rich brick buildings making way for innovative new developments, all while the mountains in the distance remind you that nature is never too far from city life.

In the Beltline, every corner offers a new adventure, whether you're catching live music, taking in an impromptu street performance, or simply watching the world go by. It's a neighborhood that's always buzzing, but still feels like home.

When you stay at the Vü, you’ll be close to…


ACTIVITIES

+ Calgary Stampede Grounds (10-min walk)
+ Scotiabank Saddledome (10-min walk)
+ BMO Centre (10-min walk)
+ Elbow River Casino (9-min walk)
+ Yuk Yuk’s Calgary (9-min walk)
+ Telus Spark Centre (10-min drive)

GYMS

+ Anytime Fitness (2-min walk)


RESTAURANTS

+ Ten Foot Henry’s (1-min walk)

+ Kama (5-min walk)

COFFEE SHOPS

+ Starbucks (1-min walk)

+ Element Coffee (9-min walk)

BOUTIQUES/SHOPPING

+ Peacock Boutique Consignment (19-min walk/7-min drive)

SPAS/BEAUTY SALONS/ETC.

+ Headkandi Salon Hotels Arts (1-min walk)
+ Nuad Thai Massage (2-min walk)
+ Lola Lash Bar (2-min walk)
+ SKA Thermal Spa (13-min walk)


GROCERERS

+ H Mart (5-min walk)

DESTINATIONS

reviews_details.review: We had a wonderful stay at Michael & Regina‚Äôs place. The space was quiet, clean and well appointed, with amazing views. The included parking was a nice touch. Given where it is, there are a ton of great restaurants within walking distance or a very quick Uber ride. Would recommend staying here if you‚Äôre looking for a spot in Calgary.

Excellent location with plenty to walk to or simply view through the gorgeous windows and balcony space. Had all the amenities as listed, including incredibly comfortable beds and sofa. Greatly appreciated the clear instructions and accurate photos of the space. Any concerns we had during our stay were promptly addressed and resolved by the hosts.

This was the perfect place to say for anything at the Saddledome, great restaurants and some shopping. We love that we could walk everywhere. The place was beautifully decorated with cozy blankets and nice dishes and mugs. Great place to stay if you want to be close to it all.

We had a great stay! The location was perfect for us - super walkable and close to everything we needed. The unit itself was beautiful and clean, with great views. Would totally recommend and will definitely stay again the next time we have to be in Calgary!

Really enjoyed staying here! Lots of natural light and the apartment was gorgeous. The sauna doesn‚Äôt get too hot and does take a while to heat up (at least an hour if not more) so keep that in mind. Michael and Regina were very communicative and responsive. Would absolutely stay again!
We enjoyed our time at the apartment for a few days ‚Äî it was clean, comfortable, quiet, and walkable to everything in downtown. Would definitely stay here again next time I‚Äôm in Calgary!

Great place to stay in a convenient location. Hosts were super helpful, even let us know we could check in early since the cleaners were done. The sauna is an awesome and unique touch, as well as the games. Beat my brother in backgammon many times- definitely recommend.

We really enjoyed staying here. Easy walk to the Calgary Stampede. Perfect place to sit and watch the fireworks after the Stampede evening performance. The apartment  is clean and quiet; the building is secure.  Nice restaurants within walking distance.

Mike & Regina's place was our home away from home when we were displaced due to flooding. Their place was super clean, nicely decorated, with luxury bedding/towels and stocked with amenities.  You can't beat the incredible views their place has to offer with the floor to ceiling windows. The sauna was such a nice little luxury especially during colder months. Location wise their place is right in the middle of so many restaurants and good bars literally steps away. They were very responsive when we had questions and were great at communicating. Highly recommend to others üòä
Michael and Regina‚Äôs place was amazing. The beds were comfortable, great views and had everything you need.They were always responsive. Loved our stay.

Lovely stay at Michael and Regina‚Äôs place in the Beltline.  If possible, the unit in person is even more beautiful than the pictures.  Wonderfully and tastefully appointed through with all the amenities and more need for a great stay and the unit was immaculate throughout.  Great balcony for city views as well.  Location is *perfect* for visiting Calgary, with some of the best restaurants and bars in Calgary literally at your doorstep and an easy walk to downtown or to shopping further into the Beltline.  Also, wonderful, friendly, and responsive hosts with a very clear and easy check-in/check-out process - A++ to Michael and Regina.  Couldn‚Äôt recommend more highly!

Perfect choice for convenience to the convention center and some of the best restaurants ever, like Calcutta Cricket Club and Ten Foot Henry, just a few steps away.  Everything in this apartment is in mint condition and high quality.  The furniture is extremely comfortable, the towels are thick and fluffy,  and the windows provide plenty of natural light.  It was easy to use the wifi, TV, and kitchen appliances.  The owners, Regina and Michael, are super-friendly and responsive.  The building feels safe and secure, with an immaculate simple lobby and hallways.  I would definitely stay here again, and recommend it highly.
Michael and Regina are great hosts. Very proactive and responsive to messages. The place is beautiful and location is perfect
Amazing hosts who were extra responsive!  The views are spectacular and fully equipped with everything we needed.  Super friendly hosts who were friendly and accommodating.
reviews_details.host_response: Thank you endlessly for your review, Jennifer - this truly means the world to us. üíû

reviews_details.review:
I recently stayed in this condo, and it was a great experience! The highlight was definitely the indoor sauna in one of the bedrooms - such a luxurious touch that made the stay feel like a mini wellness retreat. The condo itself had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The location was perfect, within walking distance to everything.
Check-in was seamless. If you‚Äôre looking for a unique stay in Calgary with a bit of extra relaxation, I highly recommend this spot!
Would definitely book again!
reviews_details.host_response: Ahhh thank you Brittany. Our hearts are exploding with gratitude. Your review hits the nail on the head with the type of experience we worked hard to curate. Thanks for being such a wonderful first guest of ours!

reviews_details.review: We had a great stay! I would choose to stay there again, thanks for everything!
Loved Loved Loved this place! Will absolutley stay again!
Great place and a good option to a stale hotel room.
Great hosts and great place!
A wonderful stay!

reviews: Had a nice stay at Jesse‚Äôs condo. I booked last minute and had a really seamless check in process. The space was clean and well stocked including things like cooking oil and spices. I deducted a star because I found the bed to be very soft to the point of discomfort while sleeping. Otherwise this was a 5 star stay in a great location with a great host.
Only downside is that getting into the parking lot is mildly inconvenient with the remote needed from inside the apartment. Other than that the place is perfect and a great price.

We had a lovely stay at Jesse‚Äôs place. The condo is very comfortable and in an excellent location. Jesse is quite possibly the most responsive host that I have dealt with!  We had absolutely no concerns and would be happy to stay there again ‚Ä¶

Jesse's place was great and the detailed instructions for getting into the building and parking were excellent. The location was perfect, right in the heart of downtown with excellent restaurants nearby. the Food Hall across the street was very handy and yummy.
Fantastic condo in a great location and at a great price. Very responsive and friendly host. Everything you need is provided. Parking was a big plus. We‚Äôll be back for sure.

This is such a great location to explore Calgary. The apartment was spotless, had everything we needed and the coffee was great! Our host‚Äôs communication was superb and we couldn‚Äôt have wanted anything more.

Really enjoyed our short stay! Great location, apartment is very spacious, lots of sunlight. We were positively surprised with kitchen - you can find not only normally provided staff like glasses and plates, but spices, sugar, cooking oil, simple things which could make it way more convenient if you like to cook. Communication with Jesse was great as well - very helpful(I made sure to ask stupid questions:)) and friendly. Would recommend!

Great stay! Jesse was very responsive and checked in to make sure everything was going smoothly. The apartment is in a great location‚Äîjust a short walk to downtown, with plenty of restaurants and coffee shops nearby. It also has a nice view of the city skyline. The space was clean, well-equipped, and had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. Highly recommend!

Beyond what I have listed in my ratings about the location, cleanliness, and host responsiveness I wanted to highlight that they beds were very comfortable and the pillows were a premium variety (none of that folding pillows in half to get a decent head lift lol). Great stay, completely as advertised and right in the heart of downtown - close to working spaces, excellent food and drink options, and also to the Stampede grounds. Fantastic stay!

Clean place, exactly as described. Thoughtful details that a lot of other hosts miss. Location couldn't be better. Jesse is a very responsive and accommodating host. Would stay here again without hesitation.

Although I had sent my id for the host twice, my access was not activated because of id request!
The condo was clean , but the second bedroom was actually a den without walls or window
Jessie‚Äôs is a very pro active host. Friendly and helpful. The place is super convenient and lots to do with in the area, the bed is comfort and it has peaceful balcony patio. I will def stay again.

the place was very nice. and spacious like it said. I liked the view. it was clean the check in was easy host was fast to response and it's downtown in a great location I would definitely book again when I come back to calgary.
Jesse was amazing with his communication. He reached out during my stay to ensure everything was up to par! His place had everything my friends and I needed! Would say here again!
Great location super close to what we needed, house was clean and self check in worked well for us. House is stunning and balcony is great :)

Place was as described with no issues
Easily fit a full size truck in parking spot
Great place !
We were only here for one night, but I wish we could have stayed longer! Such a cute place, great location, nice view, comfy beds, loved it!
Great location,exactly what we were looking for. The place was inviting, well-maintained, and exceptionally convenient.  Highly recommended!

Great place to stay in downtown Calgary, great view, awesome place to stay, and very helpful host. We had a little of trouble getting in (totally my fault, didn‚Äôt read the instructions well enough) and Jesse was extremely helpful and made sure we made it in. Very nice furniture, comfortable beds, and was extremely clean! Would definitely recommend a stay!

Had a great stay, amazing views of the City, great locations to bars and arena. Place was clean, and enjoyed the kitchen for breakfast - had everything you needed. I received random message asking how the stay was, it was great to hear
From the host, even though we did not need anything. Highly recommend!
Clean unit with all amenities included. Great location as well! Jesse is the man üëç

Nice big flat
Stayed there with three other friends. Nice, functional apartment for a group of four.
Great place in a nice neighborhood with fun restaurants nearby. Close to downtown and convenient for everything we wanted to do in Calgary!
Perfect location for our convention at  the BMO, we were able to walk there and all around Calgary. The apartment was comfortable and peaceful.

description_html:
Experience Prime Downtown Living

Perfect Location:
Walk to the Saddledome, BMO Centre, dining, and shopping.
Just minutes from the Calgary Stampede!

Comfort & Convenience:
High-speed Wi-Fi with Netflix.
Relaxing patio with views.
Fully equipped kitchen & coffee station.
Master bath with large bathtub, second with stand-up shower.
Laundry room with essentials.

Sleep & Storage:
Queen-sized beds in both bedrooms.
Ample storage space.

Extras:
Heated, secure underground parking included.

The space
This beautiful property offers a comfortable and spacious layout, perfect for a relaxing stay.

As you enter, you'll find a generously sized main bathroom with a variety of linens and supplies for your convenience. The bathroom also includes a sleek glass stand-up shower.

Continuing down the hall, you'll find the secondary bedroom to your left. This room features sliding glass doors for privacy, a queen-sized bed, a closet for storage, and an alarm clock for added convenience.

Next, the open-concept living and kitchen area boasts abundant natural light from the floor-to-ceiling windows, creating a bright and inviting atmosphere. The living room includes a cozy fold-out couch, ideal for relaxing or watching TV. A desk is also available, perfect for work or reading, with plenty of space for your personal items.

The kitchen is fully equipped with both large and small appliances to meet all your needs, and we've added a Keurig coffee station for your enjoyment.

Step outside onto the smaller but cozy patio accessible from the living room, where you can enjoy beautiful views and unwind.

The master bedroom, located immediately to the right as you enter, offers a spacious retreat with a comfortable queen-sized bed, a closet for your belongings, and an alarm clock.

Connected to the master bedroom, the en-suite bathroom features a relaxing tub and a spacious vanity area, providing ample space for your personal items.

This property offers everything you need for a comfortable and enjoyable stay—book now for an unforgettable experience!

Guest access
Guests have access to all areas within the property.

Other things to note
If you have any questions or concerns please ask!

This is such a great location to explore Calgary. The apartment was spotless, had everything we needed and the coffee was great! Our host‚Äôs communication was superb and we couldn‚Äôt have wanted anything more.

Really enjoyed our short stay! Great location, apartment is very spacious, lots of sunlight. We were positively surprised with kitchen - you can find not only normally provided staff like glasses and plates, but spices, sugar, cooking oil, simple things which could make it way more convenient if you like to cook. Communication with Jesse was great as well - very helpful(I made sure to ask stupid questions:)) and friendly. Would recommend!

Great stay! Jesse was very responsive and checked in to make sure everything was going smoothly. The apartment is in a great location‚Äîjust a short walk to downtown, with plenty of restaurants and coffee shops nearby. It also has a nice view of the city skyline. The space was clean, well-equipped, and had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. Highly recommend!

Beyond what I have listed in my ratings about the location, cleanliness, and host responsiveness I wanted to highlight that they beds were very comfortable and the pillows were a premium variety (none of that folding pillows in half to get a decent head lift lol). Great stay, completely as advertised and right in the heart of downtown - close to working spaces, excellent food and drink options, and also to the Stampede grounds. Fantastic stay!

Clean place, exactly as described. Thoughtful details that a lot of other hosts miss. Location couldn't be better. Jesse is a very responsive and accommodating host. Would stay here again without hesitation.

Although I had sent my id for the host twice, my access was not activated because of id request!
The condo was clean , but the second bedroom was actually a den without walls or window
Jessie‚Äôs is a very pro active host. Friendly and helpful. The place is super convenient and lots to do with in the area, the bed is comfort and it has peaceful balcony patio. I will def stay again.

the place was very nice. and spacious like it said. I liked the view. it was clean the check in was easy host was fast to response and it's downtown in a great location I would definitely book again when I come back to calgary.
Jesse was amazing with his communication. He reached out during my stay to ensure everything was up to par! His place had everything my friends and I needed! Would say here again!

Great place !

Great place to stay in downtown Calgary, great view, awesome place to stay, and very helpful host. reviews:
The apartment was very clean and beautifully decorated.
I loved the nice view.
you can even see the Calgary Tower!
The balcony was lovely too, but it‚Äôs a shame I couldn‚Äôt use it because of the cold weather.
The kitchen was well-equipped with dishes and utensils, and there was plenty of hot water.
The location was perfect, right in the heart of downtown.
I‚Äôd definitely recommend this place!

The place itself was nice and very clean. Easy to find. Beds were comfy and clean. It could have used a few more essential items like first aid and some more blankets. The outdoor pool was closed so that would have been nice to know ahead of booking our stay.
The communication from Beth however, was amazing! She addressed every concern right away and offered solutions.
Will definitely book again when having coworkers in for work as well use as referral if other guest require somewhere to stay. Place was convenient and affordable for the location!

Beth was a great host. Very quick to respond to questions at any time, which was super helpful. The airbnb was spotless, check-in was easy, and the location was convenient, close to many attractions. Thanks, Beth!

Our stay at this place was great and very comfortable. It is a new-er construction with many modern features, located at the very center of Calgary. It was well equipped with all the necessities and the place was kept very clean. 10 minute walk west to co-op groceries, 20 minute walk north to peace bridge and river walk, 20 minute walk east to central shopping district, and 3 streets away from the light rail, LRT. This place was perfect to venture out to see the core of Calgary. We enjoyed our stay and thank you for hosting us.

Enjoyed our stay in the condo. Very central, close to a grocery store, downtown attractions. The condo had everything we needed. It was spotless. Enjoyed the two washrooms, washer/dryer. Only thing is the fob system, there's only one. We were limited as a family on going anywhere. If husband left for hockey game with child. Wife stayed did some groceries with other child...he came back tried calling and the process in very unclear on what procedures to follow.

This place is great! Great location. Very well stocked. Nice and clean. Comfy beds.
Host was very easy to communicate with. Always answered our questions super quickly! I would definitely recommend this place!

Everything about our stay was great. The location is central and close to everything we needed and walkable. A short 5 min walk to Safeway for groceries was awesome. The hosts were friendly and helpful. The space was clean and well kept. The parking spot fit a Nissan Frontier with no problem, and we parked a second vehicle across the street in an Impark lot for a reasonable price. We would be happy to stay here again.

We loved our stay! It was pretty central to most things, so it never took us very long to get anywhere and super close to c train stations. Lots of nightlife around and great restaurants within walking distance. Place was super nice and clean - would definitely stay again!

A great place to stay and the host was very responsive and attended to our needs.  Thank you and surely we will come back to your place whenever we have another opportunity to visit Calgary again.  Thanks a lot for your assistance.

Great place to stay with a responsive and proactive host. The place was clean and enjoyable to stay in. The check-in process was a bit arduous with a third party website (property management style), this portion of the experience I did not enjoy.

We had a great experience. The place was clean, well-equipped, and exactly as described. The location was perfect‚Äîclose to everything we needed but still quiet and relaxing. I‚Äôd definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone visiting the area!
Great place to stay, and I will definitely stay there again. Amazing hosts, who were very responsive. The unit is modern, clean, and well-kept.
We were in Calgary for a wedding and we enjoyed our stay for 5 nights. Location was great and close to many restaurants.
A great stay downtown Calgary, I would totally recommend it! It‚Äôs central so it‚Äôs super close to everything and it had some stellar views of the city!
Very good location. Excellent place. Not every child friendly for under 3 yrs if you have young children.

The place was beautiful and close to many restaurants, bars, and shopping. I will definitely stay here or with this group again when I go back to Calgary!
For future guests: Please know that there is a bottle depot (recycling/refund for bottles) across the street that may attract a certain group of people. Please do be careful and drive slowly when going through the alley to the parking garage as these types of people seem to not pay attention and may wonder infront of your vehicle without looking and gather in groups to work on phones/bikes. This is expected in any downtown area. This has no impact on my staying here again. I do recommend this place!

This Airbnb was a wonderful . Right from the check in it was easy. They gave clear instructions and was easy to access. The condo itself was gorgeous. Close to tons of restaurants and shopping downtown Calgary with amazing views of the Calgary Tower, but had amenities in the apartment that could stay in if we wanted. Couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better place to stay while in Calgary.
Quick response to our questions was very much appreciated. Great location and nice decor.
Clean spot in a great location! Beth took good care of us. I would stay again.
Our stay was great! The place was extremely clean and had everything we needed! Would definitely stay again!
great location, responsive host and clear instructions. the place was great for our family of 5
Good comfortable stay in a central location. It is close to a train track and bottle depot which can get noisy at times.
A 10/10 stay! Beth was very, very responsive to any questions or concerns we had. The apartment is in a great location and has lots of natural light! Would definitely return.

description_html:
As you step inside, you'll be greeted by a spacious and modern living area adorned with contemporary furnishings and chic decor.

The open-concept layout seamlessly connects the living, dining, and kitchen areas, making it perfect for socialising or relaxing with loved ones.

Floor-to-ceiling windows not only flood the space with natural light but also offer uninterrupted views of Calgary's skyline.

The space
This suite can accommodate 1-6 guests as there is a sofa bed in the living room.

Offering;
- Two bedrooms (both queen beds)
- Sofa bed in living room
- Two bathrooms both with tub shower combos (no walk-in shower)
- Full kitchen; complete with coffee maker, toaster, pots, pans and everything you need to make meals at home
- Shared gym in the building
- Private patio and shared rooftop patio
- Shared pool (seasonal)

In the summer guests will enjoy access to the rooftop pool (seasonal, outdoor).

Guests have access to one underground parking stall.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire condo and the patio.

Registered guests are welcome to use the shared building amenities; a gym and outdoor pool. Please note that access may change at any time, including routine maintenance, change to bylaws or seasonal availability. We do not refund based upon their availability.

Guests have access to one underground parking stall

The balcony fire pit is not for guest use.

Other things to note
CHECK-IN CUTOFF TIME IS 10PM, AFTER HOURS CHECK-IN REQUIRES A FEE OR ALTERNATE KEY PICK-UP LOCATION

reviews: I had a really nice time with friends here. the place is very beautiful, and big. The view is also pretty, worth what you paid for. The instructions are very helpful, and I really like the fact the host‚Äôs are easy to communicate with! Definitely recommend!
Our stay at Chloe and Jason‚Äôs Airbnb was amazing. Apartment was clean, stocked up, and had a comfortable environment. Great area for many different activities and restaurants. 10/10. Thank you!

Chloe and Jason‚Äôs place was perfect for what we had planned in the city! Close walk to the Calgary tower, quick drive to the zoo for a day and tons of restaurants near by. The view was amazing, we could easily see all of Calgary with a perfect view of the tower!
Inside had everything we needed to feel at home! The bed in the second bedroom was a little uncomfortable for two people, I would say only one person in there would be best! However the view and location made up for all of that ‚ò∫Ô∏è

The apartment was exactly as shown in the photos, and the view was incredible, especially at night.
The apartment had everything we needed.
The hosts communicated perfectly ‚Äî all the instructions were clear, easy to follow, and very detailed, even with attached photos.

Great location for a long weekend; everything downtown was walkable. Kitchen was stocked and everything was very clean. Super detailed instructions made check in easy, even when we arrived a few hours later than expected. The unit is a bit small for five adults (only four bath towels provided) but it‚Äôs a great option if you plan to be out on the town enjoying the city and want more space than a hotel. We would definitely stay here again!

The pictures don't do justice to the beautiful view and peaceful space. The hosts were very responsive (my parents stayed here while I was in Texas so quick responses were important!) and the experience was fantastic. This is an amazing space for exploring Calgary or enjoying the beauty of the area.

We stayed here with our family and everything was great! The apartment was clean, cozy, and well-equipped ‚Äî it had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The location was very convenient, and the host was friendly and quick to respond to any questions. We really enjoyed our time here and felt at home. I‚Äôll definitely choose this place again when I come back to Calgary. Highly recommend to anyone visiting the city!
This was a great spot to stay for Stampede as it was only a 5 minute walk to the grounds. Also surrounded by restaurants, shops, and a quick 10 minute walk to Stephen Ave.

I had a great stay here. The host was really nice and informative, which made everything so easy. The view was amazing, and the location was super convenient for getting around. I‚Äôd definitely recommend this place and would stay here again.

Chloe and Jason‚Äôs place was amazing! The views were phenomenal, it was easy to access and plenty of local bars, restaurants and attractions in the area. Great place to stay, will definitely be back!

Beautiful apartment downtown!
We made our way to Calgary for my Birthday and Chloe and Jason's bnb was definitely the right choice! Their thorough instructions including maps and restaurant recommendations made everything so easy since we're not super familiar with Calgary. The bnb was very tastefully decorated, located in a quiet building and had everything we needed for a fun and relaxing stay.
We caught a show downtown that was close enough to walk, right across the street you have a delicious late night pizza place and Starbucks for your morning coffee. I'm not sure which was more beautiful- the city skyline view at night or the view in the early morning!
All in all was a great place to stay and helped make our trip absolutely perfect!

Great play to stay! Good restaurants near by and coffee right across the street. The view is amazing and the location is great. The place was super clean and looked super great! The only thing is I couldn‚Äôt convert the ‚Äúsofa bed‚Äù and not sure if it actually is one, but slept on it like a normal couch. Hopefully I was just doing it wrong and that‚Äôs not the case! Otherwise everything was great. The duvets were super soft and I loved them.
Great location with convenient underground parking. Quick to respond to messages.
Great stay! Very peaceful. The hosts were very responsive and flexible with booking.
Chloe and Jason were wonderful hosts, and very responsive whenever we had questions or concerns.

Nice place with nice views and is situated in a convenient location. Clean place with comfy beds and sofa. The hosts are very accommodating and replies to inquiries almost instantly. I would 100% recommend this place.
Great location and amazing views

The place was a great value for the money, with an excellent location and an incredible view of the city. It‚Äôs comfortable for one couple, but the smaller bedroom is more suited for use as an office rather than a second sleeping space. The walls are also quite thin, so noise from neighboring units, hallway or within the apartment is loud. We had some challenges communicating with the host, including not receiving the correct number of towels. We also suggested providing a second fob key, as sharing one isn‚Äôt ideal for groups with different schedules. Overall, the stay was enjoyable, and with a few improvements, it could be even better!
It was a very cozy, clean, and well-located place.
Everything is accessible, it is located in the heart of the city. We enjoyed our stay. Great restaurants and bars are just a stroll away. FANTASTIC CITY VIEW!
This was a good property in a great location, with wonderful hosts. The only issue was that the on-site laundry wasn't working.
Check in was a little different having to get into building to obtain key fob for garage but doable. Instructions were good. Great view and clean apartment.
All good
Great place for a quick stay!

description_html:
The YYC Lookout | Iconic Tower Views + Free Underground Parking | Steps from Top Attractions | Modern Comforts & Fast WiFi

Offers luxury, comfort, and unmatched views of Calgary’s iconic skyline.

The space
Limited-Time Weekly & Monthly Discounts Available!

Welcome to The YYC Lookout, your luxury high-rise escape with the best views in Calgary. This modern and stylish 2-bedroom, 1-bath retreat offers floor-to-ceiling windows, breathtaking city views, and a private balcony your personal front-row seat to watch the sunrise over the Calgary Tower or the city lights twinkle at night.

Key Features:
🏙️ Prime Downtown Location – Steps from the Calgary Tower, Bow River, Stephen Ave, Stampede Grounds, and top dining spots

🚗 Free Underground Parking – Safe and convenient for your stay

📶 High-Speed WiFi & Smart TV – Stream your favorites or stay connected while you unwind

🍳 Fully Equipped Kitchen – Cook meals while soaking in the stunning views

Whether you're here for business, a romantic escape, or a fun getaway, The YYC Lookout offers luxury, comfort, and unmatched views of Calgary’s iconic skyline.

Important Guest Info:
To ensure a safe and secure stay, we’ve partnered with Know Your Guest, the leading vacation rental guest-screening provider. Before check-in, you’ll need to verify your identity through their trusted platform.

Book now and experience Calgary from a whole new perspective… from the top! 🏙️✨

host_details.response_time: They typically respond within an hour

reviews_details.review: I had a really nice time with friends here. the place is very beautiful, and big. The view is also pretty, worth what you paid for. The instructions are very helpful, and I really like the fact the host‚Äôs are easy to communicate with! Definitely recommend!
Our stay at Chloe and Jason‚Äôs Airbnb was amazing. Apartment was clean, stocked up, and had a comfortable environment. Great area for many different activities and restaurants. 10/10. Thank you!

Chloe and Jason‚Äôs place was perfect for what we had planned in the city! Close walk to the Calgary tower, quick drive to the zoo for a day and tons of restaurants near by. The view was amazing, we could easily see all of Calgary with a perfect view of the tower!
Inside had everything we needed to feel at home! The bed in the second bedroom was a little uncomfortable for two people, I would say only one person in there would be best! However the view and location made up for all of that ‚ò∫Ô∏è

The apartment was exactly as shown in the photos, and the view was incredible, especially at night.
The apartment had everything we needed.
The hosts communicated perfectly ‚Äî all the instructions were clear, easy to follow, and very detailed, even with attached photos.

Great location for a long weekend; everything downtown was walkable. Kitchen was stocked and everything was very clean. Super detailed instructions made check in easy, even when we arrived a few hours later than expected. The unit is a bit small for five adults (only four bath towels provided) but it‚Äôs a great option if you plan to be out on the town enjoying the city and want more space than a hotel. We would definitely stay here again!

The pictures don't do justice to the beautiful view and peaceful space. The hosts were very responsive (my parents stayed here while I was in Texas so quick responses were important!) and the experience was fantastic. This is an amazing space for exploring Calgary or enjoying the beauty of the area.

We stayed here with our family and everything was great! The apartment was clean, cozy, and well-equipped ‚Äî it had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The location was very convenient, and the host was friendly and quick to respond to any questions. We really enjoyed our time here and felt at home. I‚Äôll definitely choose this place again when I come back to Calgary. Highly recommend to anyone visiting the city!
This was a great spot to stay for Stampede as it was only a 5 minute walk to the grounds. Also surrounded by restaurants, shops, and a quick 10 minute walk to Stephen Ave.

I had a great stay here. The host was really nice and informative, which made everything so easy. The view was amazing, and the location was super convenient for getting around. I‚Äôd definitely recommend this place and would stay here again.

Chloe and Jason‚Äôs place was amazing! The views were phenomenal, it was easy to access and plenty of local bars, restaurants and attractions in the area. Great place to stay, will definitely be back!

Beautiful apartment downtown!
We made our way to Calgary for my Birthday and Chloe and Jason's bnb was definitely the right choice! Their thorough instructions including maps and restaurant recommendations made everything so easy since we're not super familiar with Calgary. The bnb was very tastefully decorated, located in a quiet building and had everything we needed for a fun and relaxing stay.
We caught a show downtown that was close enough to walk, right across the street you have a delicious late night pizza place and Starbucks for your morning coffee. I'm not sure which was more beautiful- the city skyline view at night or the view in the early morning!
All in all was a great place to stay and helped make our trip absolutely perfect!

Great play to stay! Good restaurants near by and coffee right across the street. The view is amazing and the location is great. The place was super clean and looked super great! The only thing is I couldn‚Äôt convert the ‚Äúsofa bed‚Äù and not sure if it actually is one, but slept on it like a normal couch. Hopefully I was just doing it wrong and that‚Äôs not the case! Otherwise everything was great. The duvets were super soft and I loved them.
Great location with convenient underground parking. Quick to respond to messages.
Great stay! Very peaceful. The hosts were very responsive and flexible with booking.
Chloe and Jason were wonderful hosts, and very responsive whenever we had questions or concerns.

Nice place with nice views and is situated in a convenient location. Clean place with comfy beds and sofa. The hosts are very accommodating and replies to inquiries almost instantly. I would 100% recommend this place.
Great location and amazing views

The place was a great value for the money, with an excellent location and an incredible view of the city. It‚Äôs comfortable for one couple, but the smaller bedroom is more suited for use as an office rather than a second sleeping space. The walls are also quite thin, so noise from neighboring units, hallway or within the apartment is loud. We had some challenges communicating with the host, including not receiving the correct number of towels. We also suggested providing a second fob key, as sharing one isn‚Äôt ideal for groups with different schedules. Overall, the stay was enjoyable, and with a few improvements, it could be even better!
It was a very cozy, clean, and well-located place.
Everything is accessible, it is located in the heart of the city. We enjoyed our stay. Great restaurants and bars are just a stroll away. FANTASTIC CITY VIEW!
This was a good property in a great location, with wonderful hosts. The only issue was that the on-site laundry wasn't working.
Check in was a little different having to get into building to obtain key fob for garage but doable. Instructions were good. Great view and clean apartment.
All good
Great place for a quick stay!

name: Apartment in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.98 ¬∑ 2 bedrooms ¬∑ 2 beds ¬∑ 2 bathrooms
description: As soon as you walk in you are greeted with a picturesque view of downtown Calgary! The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place, with Starbucks right downstairs and other great restaurants along 1st street within walking distance.Registration DetailsBL276384
reviews: Angela's place was centrally located on the eight floor of the building and with an elevator easily accessible.  We enjoyed the clean space with a nice of Calgarys skyline and the TV tower. Parking in the building was a bit tricky to figure out for people coming from outside of Canada, although there are clear instructions.

We had such a wonderful stay! The place was clean, cozy, and exactly as described in the listing. Angela was very responsive and accommodating, which made everything smooth and stress-free. The location was perfect, close to everything we needed yet quiet enough to relax. Would definitely recommend staying here and would love to come back!! ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Angela's place is just as the photos appear. A lovely apartment with amazing Calgary skyline views, a stone's throw from plenty of bars and restaurants and an easy walk to downtown.

Our stay at Angela‚Äôs place was spectacular! Definitely exceeded my expectations. The unit is right downtown Calgary, surrounded by awesome restaurants, bars and a few local spots. The building itself is easy to navigate and Angela‚Äôs unit is beautiful. We stayed as a pair and were more than comfortable with the two bedroom two bathroom, a group of 4 could stay with plenty of space. Angela left everything you could need, and the place had spectacular views of the city with the full windows and balcony. I would 100% return and stay again at Angela‚Äôs place!

Our stay at Angela‚Äôs was outstanding!
The condo was everything and more!
So spacious for 4 people.
Quiet, clean, excellent location and absolutely amazing view of the city!

Angela was a fantastic host. She left me clear instructions on how to enter and leave and was very responsive. Location was great with plenty of places in walking distance and an incredible view. I would definitely stay here again.
place was perfect!  middle of downtown, everything is walking distance away from it. Angela was  a great host, quick responses and easy to follow instructions. I woild definitely come back here!

The rental property is clean and hygienic, and its location is convenient for traveling. The landlord responds to the questions we raise enthusiastically and promptly. The nearby restaurants and tourist attractions are within walking distance. We will stay here again if we have the chance next time.

The flat has a breathtaking view and is really close to the city centre, nice bars and caf√©s. It was really clean and the communication with Angela was really easy. We highly recommend staying there!

We loved this place so much and thanks for hosting such a nice place! Nice location with markets and restaurants blocks away, beautiful view of the city and amenitied were all considerate. would visit again!
Angela‚Äôs place is just the most special and beautiful Airbnb I stayed at. It is perfectly located and the view is breathtaking! We loved everything about this place !! Highly recommend!

This unit is great for a friend trip. spacious for 4 people, lots of getting ready space, open kitchen and living space for communal time, but closed bedrooms for privacy. loved that there were 2 bathrooms. it's walkable to so many things (saddledome, stephens walk,  17th ave). there are good restaurants, a food hall, Starbucks all within steps of the front door. Great views of downtown (Calgary tower) and excellent for people watching. the decor was beautiful and minimal with the comforts of home added (basket full of throw blankets for the couch with comfy throw pillows).

I stayed two nights in this apartment. It has great views. Wide glass windows and great interiors. Very spacious and cosy.
It is Luxurious and cosy. We loved our stay to the fullest.
Best thing is it‚Äôs being in the heart of downtown.

Nice bedrooms, clean bathrooms, with complete amenities. Walkable to Calgary Tower, BMO Center, Saddle Dome and Stampede park. The unit has an excellent host, Angela. We love the place and will definitely stay there again in our next visit.
wonderful place: stylish and cosy at the same time, spacious, clean! Perfect location to explore the city of Calgary! Angela is one of best hostess I have met!  We were sad to leave

We had a great stay at Angela's condo. The condo was spotless. The location perfect for going to the BMO centre. The lights at night from surrounding buildings including the Calgary tower were beautiful. Angela was also very friendly and easy to reach.
Beautiful place, very cosy, lovely views from the apartment, kitchen was well stocked up with essentials. Exception was dishwasher had screws jutting out, hence we could not operate it.
This condo was fantastic. Extremely central, lots of bright natural light, very clean, comfortable, spacious and well decorated. We would definitely stay again.
Very clean with everything we needed. Location has lots of great restaurants nearby. Check in was easy and space was lovely.
Starbucks right outside really helped and the view is beautiful of course. Angela was very quick with responding to messages.
Great downtown stay. Able to walk to the saddledome in 15 minutes for Korn last night. Plenty of restaurants/bars within walking distance. Beautiful views of Calgary.
This apartment and its view is absolutely stunning! We felt very welcoming and had a great time. Everything is as described!

Our stay was very good Angela is very
thorough and very responsive the view is awesome and close to saddle dome 10 min walk. I would recommend her unit to anyone.
We had a wonderful stay in Angela‚Äôs place for the first destination on our trip. Perfect location, great communication and clean, lovely home. Thank you so much.

name: Condo in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.45 ¬∑ 2 bedrooms ¬∑ 1 bed ¬∑ 1 bath
description: Furnished condo. Walkable to many amenities, and all of downtown. Right in front is a bus stop. A few steps away is a free Train station to ride in downtown, restaurants, 17th Ave, Safeway, shopping, Shaw Millennium Park.Access to the bow river, parks & More. Freshly clean all the time.Longer than 2 month stay will adjust pricing for Dec(please note furnishings and condo may have been changed due to upgrades and renovations from pic)The spaceThe condo comes with:-Wifi - 6 appliances (Fridge, Stove, Dish Washer, Microwave, Washer & Dryer)- Secure, Heated Underground Over-Sized Parking Stall.- Free Gym/Fitness Facilities On-SiteGuest accessthe entire condo access to the fitness room underground heated parking lotOther things to noteThere a DVD player with dvd's to watch and a T.V to connect to your own laptop to, cable not included. bedding, towels, and pillows are provided.after a 7-day stay you must provide your own Toilettree
reviews: Amandeep's apartment is great! It's comfortable, the kitchen is well equipped, it's a 10-minute walk from the c-train and a few blocks from the hustle and bustle of 17th Avenue! Plus, there's a great market right behind the building! Amandeep is very careful with the instructions and gives great tips about the surroundings! When I come back to Calgary, I'll stay there!

We had a great short stay at Amin‚Äôs place. The place was a 40 mins walk from stampede and the area was safe. It had a kitchen and a dishwasher but no dishwasher detergent. Also the AC did not work at the time of our stay. The location was great, there‚Äôs a coop right behind and pubs and coffee shops are within walking distance.
Thank you.

Amin's place is great and well equipped for 2 people to stay. It is very comfortable and had everything we needed. This is a great neighbourhood, with a grocery store across the parking lot, shops, boutiques and restaurants all within walking distance. a great jumping off point to see the rest of the city.

Amin was a fantastic host. When I met her, she was thorough in explaining all the amenities around her lodging and was very easy to contact if I had any problems. Furthermore, her lodging is positioned in a very happening part of downtown.

Neat little condo on the 16th floor, garage was easy access and building was well-maintained. Only big downside at the time was the dirtiness of the balcony & windows, which I‚Äôm sure they‚Äôll have cleaned in the future. Great location.
Amin's place was super clean and easy to find! Great location downtown while not being too close to the craziness of stampede. Super convenient with the co-op right there as well.
Amin was a fantastic host! She met me and ensured I knew where to find everything within the condo. As well, she made herself accessible should I require anything additional. Thank-you!

Great place to explore Calgary. Excellent location close to Ctrain and plenty of places to eat/drink closeby. Amin welcomed us and personally and   communicated clearly throughout our stay. We had a problem with the fob for entering the garage not working and Amin made every effort to get us new batteries (including buying a chocolate fudge cake to make up for the inconvenience - thanks again!). The balcony is facing east making it ideal for an outdoor breakfast on a sunny spring morning. The bed is comfortable. No wifi or tv connection when we stayed there.

Amin was a great host.  She was able to meet me a bit earlier than planned and showed me around the condo. The place had great views of the city and  was a perfect location,  central to everything.  I would definitely stay again.

Amin was there to meet me on short notice and handed over the keys and showed me all the property had to offer.  She was very pleasant and it was a good experience.  She also was able to answer questions on short notice.

Amin was great; quick response and very friendly. The process of staying with Amin was easy, as I needed a place on short notice.
The location was great and was easy to walk right down to 17th Ave.
I would recommend staying with Amin.

Amin is a great host.  Very responsive and easy to deal with.  Her condo is in a great location with an adjacent grocery store,  great coffee shops and restaurants nearby.  Close to two train stations.  Great place if your in town for business or to soak up some western hospitality.

I was given a tour at check in and all information was supplied for my stay. Host took the time to meet me and give me keys. The apartment was great, very clean, and in a great location. Close to the river and biking/walking/running trail and park.
Great condo with amazing views! Amin did everything to make our stay in Calgary as wonderful as could be
Good experience booking and meeting to arrange keys. Easy location to travel to downtown hot spots.
Excellent place to stay, great communication, highly recommended.

Great. Thank you.
Internet and tv will be a plus if can be added.
overall it was good.
Thanks for the great stay Amin!
Was clean and good location
The place is haunted.

Amin was a fantastic host. When I met her, she was thorough in explaining all the amenities around her lodging and was very easy to contact if I had any problems. Furthermore, her lodging is positioned in a very happening part of downtown.

Neat little condo on the 16th floor, garage was easy access and building was well-maintained. Only big downside at the time was the dirtiness of the balcony & windows, which I‚Äôm sure they‚Äôll have cleaned in the future. Great location.
reviews_details.host_response: this is a high rise building.  and the windows are cleaned yearly by the building and they look pretty good.

reviews_details.review: Amin's place was super clean and easy to find! Great location downtown while not being too close to the craziness of stampede. Super convenient with the co-op right there as well.
Amin was a fantastic host! She met me and ensured I knew where to find everything within the condo. As well, she made herself accessible should I require anything additional. Thank-you!

Great place to explore Calgary. Excellent location close to Ctrain and plenty of places to eat/drink closeby. Amin welcomed us and personally and   communicated clearly throughout our stay. We had a problem with the fob for entering the garage not working and Amin made every effort to get us new batteries (including buying a chocolate fudge cake to make up for the inconvenience - thanks again!). The balcony is facing east making it ideal for an outdoor breakfast on a sunny spring morning. The bed is comfortable. No wifi or tv connection when we stayed there.
reviews_details.host_response: Hi yes i replaced the garage remote. Please see amenities if wifi is or isn't connect the couple was told it was not connected before they booked and it states on my amenities also. Tv works to watch movies but no cable as stated in amenities.

Amin was there to meet me on short notice and handed over the keys and showed me all the property had to offer.  She was very pleasant and it was a good experience.  She also was able to answer questions on short notice.

Amin was great; quick response and very friendly. The process of staying with Amin was easy, as I needed a place on short notice.
The location was great and was easy to walk right down to 17th Ave.
I would recommend staying with Amin.

Amin is a great host.  Very responsive and easy to deal with.  Her condo is in a great location with an adjacent grocery store,  great coffee shops and restaurants nearby.  Close to two train stations.  Great place if your in town for business or to soak up some western hospitality.

I was given a tour at check in and all information was supplied for my stay. Host took the time to meet me and give me keys. The apartment was great, very clean, and in a great location. Close to the river and biking/walking/running trail and park.
Great condo with amazing views! Amin did everything to make our stay in Calgary as wonderful as could be
